story:
Personalise your Wafer tags now!

If you have chosen the Personalised Wafer tags from our list of perks, then you can fill in your customization details right away.

Click Here


You guys are awesome!


Wafer in the News



"Wafer lets you achieve many mobile tasks with ease."

- Trak.in


"A Robust, Futuristic and Simplistic NFC tag which can do anything when accompanied with a creative mind like yours."

- Le Geeks


"Wafer is something one should not miss if having an NFC capable device."

- Megaleecher.net


"We tested one of the final prototypes of Wafer NFC Tags over the past couple of weeks and were absolutely delighted with its overall quality. "

- TechPP.com



The Wafer tag just got better. We've upgraded the Memory of the Wafer from 160bytes to 512bytes. Now you can store three times the amount of data.

NOTE: All existing contributions and future contributions will be shipped with Wafer tags having 512 Bytes of memory. 

Here is where the Wafer tag stands with a whooping 512 Bytes compared to the rest of the tags out there!

Want to win free Wafer tags? All you need to do is earn referral points!

Here is how you can win free Wafer tags:

1) Log in to your Indiegogo account OR make one if you don't have one already.

2) Use one of the sharing tools below the Wafer tag video or share the link from the browser address bar. We automatically get notified about your referral once you share the link.

3) If anyone contributes to our campaign using your link you earn a referral point. You earn 1 referral point per contribution made using your link.

For existing Contributors: 1 referral point = 2 FREE Wafer tags

For Non-Contributors: 3 referral points = 5 FREE Wafer tags

START SHARING NOW!



With the wafer tag you can complete most of your everyday tasks. 

Share your business card digitally with the Wafer tag, hassle free.

Stay away from unwanted calls when you don't want to be disturbed, with just one tap,  

Do those little, but important tasks while you're on the go.

Share your ideas, suggestions with friends, family and colleagues.

Post those tweets and updates quickly within your circle.

And a lot more things. All this with just a simple tap.


Wafer is an NFC tag, a tag embedded with a chip that allows you to store small payloads of data and is re-writable. Wafer uses the Near Field Communication (NFC) technology. 


                                                   

Click here


1. Our Story
2. Features 
3. Tech Specs 
4. Competitors 
5. Support us 
6. FAQ




Our goal was to design a product that is not only top-notch in terms of build, design and features, but something that would effortlessly work with all existing NFC-enabled devices. 

We discovered that most of the NFC tags out there do not support all the NFC-enabled devices. The reason behind this is:

  • The tags are of a 'type' which isn't supported by the older generation of NFC-enabled devices.
  • Or the tags aren't NFC forum compliant.

So, we decided to design a tag that is compatible with all NFC-enabled devices.

Now you don't have to worry about sharing things with someone who doesn't have a similar phone as you. The Wafer tag is compatible with all NFC-enabled devices.

Also, we made sure Wafer works flawlessly with all the NFC writer apps in the Android market or the Windows phone store.

That’s not all!

To make the Wafer tag even more awesome, we brought in the customization option and a wide range of colors to choose from.





The Wafer tag is not just another NFC tag. Choose your tag from a wide range of colors. 

The Wafer tag comes in Dodger Blue, Lime Green, Crimson Red, Orange, Dandelion Yellow for the Trendy.

And of course, in Snow White.

In order to make interaction with the Wafer tags more convenient we included the option of customization. 

With this option you can add your own text to your tag, and will print customized Wafer tags for you. 

Now you can have unique personalized tags for all your tasks. This way you will never forget what task each tag is assigned.

NOTE; The text limit is up to 20 letters. When you choose the customized Wafer tag perk, make sure you fill the form to send us your message to be printed. 






One of the key aspects while designing the Wafer tag was compatibility. We made sure that the tag would work with all the NFC devices out there, whether it was one of the older generation devices or the newer ones.

The Wafer tag is NDEF formatted. We have tested our prototype with different NFC-enabled devices. It works without any issues. 

The Wafer tag does not work with the iPhone because the iPhone does not support the NFC technology.


The Wafer tag can be written, erased, locked or re-written using any NFC-writer and interactor application. 

You could either use your existing NFC writer app or we have listed some of the popular NFC apps for different platforms which you could use with the Wafer tag: 

Android

Download it Here

Windows

Download it Here

Symbian

 Download it Here

Blackberry

 Download it Here



*Best buy.

**As per Samsung website, US.

***Requires NFED formatting to work with all devices.

The price mentioned above for the Wafer tag is for the Non-Early bird perks, the early bird perks are cheaper but limited.

NOTE: All the above mentioned prices are excluding Shipping charges.



We have been working on the Wafer tag for the last 3 months. After a lot of iterations, we finalized the design and made sure that there are no issues regarding its compatibility with different NFC devices and interaction with it.

So far, we have known that the applications of the NFC technology are vast, but the issue being its compatibility with all devices, user-friendliness and the price tag people haven’t been keen on adopting it.

We the Wafer team have taken care of all these factors and made the perfect NFC tag for everyone.



Your funds will be used for the production of the Wafer tags in large numbers. 

Choose a perk that suits your needs, or be a backer by making a contribution towards our project. 

If you believe in us but do not have the money right now to contribute, then help us by spreading the word. Every bit matters to us at the Wafer community. :)



Shipping Details:

The charges for international shipping are $2. Please make sure you add an additional $2 during check-out, as your shipping charges.

If you have multiple orders then you need not add shipping each time, just make sure you use the same email address if you have multiple orders.

The shipping charges for Re-sellers pack is $10, due to the weight and size of the package. 

Shipping within India is free of cost.


                                                   

Click here



1.  What is NFC?

Ans: NFC (near field communication) is a short- range wireless technology which allows for the transfer of data between two NFC enabled devices.

2. Do all phones support NFC?

Ans: Almost all phones today have NFC. You can check if your phone has NFC from this list here. The iPhone does not support the NFC technology. 

3. What is the Wafer tag?

Ans: The Wafer tag is an NFC tag. A tag that has a microchip that allows you to store small payloads of data on it. This data can be accessed by any NFC-enabled device, when it is within range.

4. What kind of data can be stored on the Wafer tag?

Ans: You can store various kinds of information on the Wafer tag, like URLs, Phone numbers, email ID's, messages etc. You can also launch apps on your device or change different settings on your phone using the tag.

5. How do I store data on the Wafer tag?

Ans: There are various NFC writer apps available in the Android, Windows, Nokia and the Blackberry app stores. You can use any of these apps to store data on the wafer tag and interact with it. We have listed some of them in our 'App support' section on this campaign page. 


6. Can I rewrite/erase the data on the tag?

Ans: Yes, you can rewrite or erase the data written on these tags with the apps available. 

7. Can someone else change the data on my tags?

Ans: NFC tags can be locked so that once data has been written, it cannot be altered. For most tags this is a one way process so once the tag is locked it cannot be unlocked.


8. Do these Wafer tags require batteries?

Ans: No. They don't require batteries. They get their power from just being near a powered NFC device, for example a mobile phone.


9. How long do these tags last?

Ans: The wafer tags have 1,00,000 write cycles. You can rewrite the tag about 1,00,000.


10. At what distance from my phones will the tags work?

Ans: As far as we have tested the Wafer tags, they work up to a distance of 5cm. But this will vary depending on your phone, because some of the phones have a weaker NFC antenna.


11. Will NFC drain my phones battery?

Ans: NFC is a short-range wireless technology, it uses very less amount of your phones battery, considerably less compared to Bluetooth. Leaving NFC on all the time will NOT consume much of your battery life


12. How do I get these Wafer tags?

Ans: Choose one of our perks from the right hand columns above to either pre-order the NFC tags or make a contribution to our campaign.


13. How can I get customized Wafer tags?

Ans: Choose the 'personalized' tags perk to customize your own NFC tag. You can send us your message by filling the form here, after you purchase the perk.


14. Can I get Wafer tags of a colour of my choice?

Ans: Yes. But this is available in the non-early bird perks only. 


15. I forgot to add international shipping, what should I do?

Ans: If you forgot to add international shipping to your order then select the perk which says, 'Forgot International Shipping?' and make a payment of $2. Make sure you use the same email address as your order. Shipping within India is free!


If you have any other questions besides the FAQs, or any suggestions we would love to hear from you. You can either write to us in the comments section or contact us via email at:  thewafertag@gmail.com


                                                   

Click here

story:
We’re saving you from cables and all complexity. Roboting is interchangeable part robotics development system. It’s designed for both hobbyists and developers. Everything is open-sourced and 3D printable.

With Roboting, you might easily snap variety of modules together, to build your dream robot. Your Roboting story begins with a base module. It can be a tank drive, car, hovercraft or even a boat! Then, it finds personality with mission modules. These are robotic arms, range finders, surveillance kits or object throwers. Finally, surround modules add sensing capabilities to your robot, with distance sensors, GPS and compass modules. Everything is plug and play.

Now, it’s time to play with your robot. It’s easy to control Roboting with Kinect®, Leap Motion®, Gamepad or mobile devices without any technical experience. It’s just like playing with an R/C car.

If you’re a programmer, you’re welcome to use our API’s to program Roboting®. Even you may use your own Arduino® or .NET Micro Framework boards. Roboting accepts all.

You might want to buy Roboting modules as a final product, or download STL files to 3D print your very own robot.

We’re trying our hardest to make Roboting ready before 2014 ends!

Here is the Roboting!

We’re living in connected devices era, where more and more devices get IP addresses every day. Our robots deserve that too. In Roboting, we’re orchestrating hardware, software, and cloud perfectly, hence you’ll get the ultimate connected device. Let’s take a look at how we’re connecting these things.

H for Hardware

Customizing your own robot is so easy with Roboting. We have three parts.

Base Modules

These are the bodies of your robot. Each module has its own characteristics and easily upgradable parts. We have three base modules now, and more bases will be added to our inventory soon. Our current base modules are:


Car: Like an R/C car, but there is more. The car module has 4 motor slots, so you are free to choose from DC and brushless motors. We have also steering servo kit options for the front wheels.


Boat: Have you ever imagined a robot on the water? It's possible with Roboting! The boat has upgradable motors, interchangeable sensor and mission modules.


Hovercraft: With its air pressured body, hovercraft makes the robot move on both land and water.


Mission Modules

Here is the fun factor comes! These modules add main mission functionality to your robot. They are plug and play, so Roboting automatically detects and sets the modules. Now we have three mission modules and working on others.

Robotic Arm: For grabbing and moving things, we have 3 DOF and one grabber parts.

Object Thrower: It’s easy to aim on your target and throw something to it. Object thrower is a fun way to enjoy with your robot. It has pan and tilt servos and two throwers.

Security Camera: This module captures the moments and saves or streams the recordings to the internet. The camera has pan and tilt servos, and waterproof design.

These are the some possibilities, when we combine base and mission modules. Except for the some limitations, each mission module will be compatible with each base module.

Surround Modules

To make your device an autonomous robot, we need some sensors. Surround modules are interchangeable and plug and play parts that make your robot detect its surroundings. We're currently working on disrance, light and compass sensors.

Combining everything together, we have a modular robotics system.


Controller Module

As we're supporting open-source, we're also happy to say that you are free to choose your embedded platform. Roboting® is Arduino® compatible, therefore you may use your favorite Arduino board. We also support Netduino® and STM32 boards. The details will be announced soon.

S for Software

A great hardware complements with a great software. We're excelling Roboting's software for both hobbyists and programmers.

Control Panel

An easy to use user experience is waiting for hobbyists.

Our control panel, called Roboting Maestro, connects with your robot over the Bluetooth, WiFi or Internet. It detects all the modules and sensors on your robot, and then shows their respective controls.

It is possible to use a gamepad, Kinect®, or Leap Motion® sensor to control the robot. Everything is engineering so perfectly for the hobbyists to use the functions without any programming experience.

More details and best practices are coming soon.

API

Roboting is more than a remote controlled device. With our open sourced API's, its easy to communicate with each module. Currently we're working on Arduino, .NET Micro Framework and STM32 firmwares and C# API. We'll add other platforms soon.

C for Cloud

Soon, we're going to start adding cloud functionalities, such as;

Controlling your robot over the internet,
Remote data logging, and
Video transport.

Project Diary

On March 2014, we moved to San Francisto to make up the Roboting. We attended as many meetups as we can to get people's opinions. In the meantime, we developed Roboting's first concept prototype, which is being controlled by a gamepad over the Bluetooth.

Then, we optimized the firmware and API's to make a robust infrastructure. Everything is made modular, to accept any future models easily. By the time, we decided which base and mission modules to add into our inventory.

On June, we started to build SolidWorks® drawings of the models.

On July, it was the time of a new beginning! We 3D printed Roboting's first parts. Then, we optimized them for the right size and 3D printable structure. We hired a workspace on TechShop San Francisco to access tools and space we needed. Here are the first 3D prints:

7/11/2014: Side parts of car base, sensor and motor modules, controller box slot.

7/16/2014: Top and bottom parts of car body.

7/18/2014: Robotic arm grabber module parts.

7/18/2014: Building the grabber.



7/23/2014: Our first workshop at TechShop San Francisco!


7/23/2014: Invested on a 3D Printer for better prototyping results.


7/26/2014: Wheel kits are ready!

7/31/2014: Hovercraft model is made.

We're continuously working on module development and 3D optimization.

You're welcome to visit our blog at www.roboting.io/blog to get involved with our recent activities.

We Need Your Support!

However we're making the 3D prints and software development, we need some financing for;

Injection molding of the parts,
Circuit board production,
Sensor development,
Marketing, and
Packaging.

With your help, we're going to build the world's most user friendly open-sourced robotics system.

Here is our projected timeline:

About Us

"People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do."

Robothing is a family, consists of technology experts, future designers, engineers, and you! Our passion drives us to combine technology and creativity to make everybody to reach their full potential. Here is our core team:

Safak Guzel

Graduated from Erciyes University Mechatronics Engineering in 2014, Safak involved in two summer internships, two part time, one full time engineering jobs about R&D. He is specialized on embedded systems, industrial automation, modular robotics, system design and applications. Safak also orchestrates all aspects of life to be a great engineer.

Umut Erkal

Umut is an embedded systems designer, specialized on Internet of Things. He grown up with Technic Lego's and made some great inventions. Umut granted 3 times Turkish championship and a worldwide #4 classification on Microsoft's Imagine Cup competition. He is running seminars and workshops on the universities about robotics, and is a Microsoft Embedded MVP since 2012. Umut is also an R/C pilot.


We'll be adding more details frequently, so please stay tuned!

We'll add other platforms soon.C for CloudSoon, we're going to start adding cloud functionalities, such as;Controlling your robot over the internet,Remote data logging, andVideo transport.Project DiaryOn March 2014, we moved to San Francisto to make up the Roboting. We attended as many meetups as we can to get people's opinions. In the meantime, we developed Roboting's first concept prototype, which is being controlled by a gamepad over the Bluetooth.Then, we optimized the firmware and API's to make a robust infrastructure. Everything is made modular, to accept any future models easily. By the time, we decided which base and mission modules to add into our inventory.On June, we started to build SolidWorks® drawings of the models.On July, it was the time of a new beginning! We 3D printed Roboting's first parts. Then, we optimized them for the right size and 3D printable structure. We hired a workspace on TechShop San Francisco to access tools and space we needed. Here are the first 3D prints:7/11/2014: Side parts of car base, sensor and motor modules, controller box slot.7/16/2014: Top and bottom parts of car body.7/18/2014: Robotic arm grabber module parts.7/18/2014: Building the grabber.


7/23/2014: Our first workshop at TechShop San Francisco!

7/23/2014: Invested on a 3D Printer for better prototyping results.


7/26/2014: Wheel kits are ready!
7/31/2014: Hovercraft model is made.



We're continuously working on module development and 3D optimization.

You're welcome to visit our blog at www.roboting.io/blog to get involved with our recent activities.
We Need Your Support!
However we're making the 3D prints and software development, we need some financing for;
Injection molding of the parts,Circuit board production,Sensor development,Marketing, andPackaging.
With your help, we're going to build the world's most user friendly open-sourced robotics system.
Here is our projected timeline:




About Us

"People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do."
Robothing is a family, consists of technology experts, future designers, engineers, and you! Our passion drives us to combine technology and creativity to make everybody to reach their full potential. Here is our core team:
Safak Guzel
Graduated from Erciyes
University Mechatronics Engineering in 2014, Safak involved in two summer
internships, two part time, one full time engineering jobs about R&D. He is
specialized on embedded systems, industrial automation, modular robotics, system
design and applications. Safak also orchestrates all aspects of life to be a
great engineer.
Umut Erkal
Umut is an embedded systems designer, specialized on Internet of Things. He grown up with Technic Lego's and made some great inventions. Umut granted 3 times Turkish championship and a worldwide #4 classification on Microsoft's Imagine Cup competition. He is running seminars and workshops on the universities about robotics, and is a Microsoft Embedded MVP since 2012. Umut is also an R/C pilot.

We'll be adding more details frequently, so please stay tuned!

story:
In partnership  with Livingston Products, Inc.

www.greenenergymotors.com


My name is Arnold Sharkan, inventor of the COMMUTE-CASE ™ and President of Green Energy Motors Corp. As a seasoned inventor, I am passionate about bringing to market innovative consumer products that positively impact our lives while minimizing our carbon footprint.

Over the years, countless hours of R&D have been devoted into making this dream a reality. With the rise of crowd funding and technological advancements, the Commute-Case can migrate from a mere prototype to a consumer product.

As far as engineering is concerned, technological improvements in batteries and electric motors allows for the COMMUTE-CASE ™ to be feasible. This is where you come in. Your contribution will allow us to finalize the prototyping stage and prepare for mass production to make this innovation a reality.

Below you can view videos of the latest design in the prototyping stage, and an early prototype that serves as a proof of concept.


PRODUCT VIDEO


 


 

EARLY PROTOTYPE VIDEO

 

 

PRODUCT REVIEW


 

COMPACT DESIGN


VERSATILE



HOW TO RIDE THE COMMUTE-CASE


After the left and right footrests (or wings as some refer to them) deploy, along with the steering column, front and rear wheels, the Commute-Case ™ is now in ride mode.

Grabbing the steering column of the Commute-Case ™, the rider simply straddles over the deployed unit, (much like one straddles a bicycle), placing his or her left foot onto the left footrest, or, placing the right foot on the right footrest, whichever seems most comfortable. Next, the rider pushes the Commute-Case ™ forward slowly. Once forward movement begins, the rider adds the other foot onto the remaining open footrest. The Commute-Case ™ rider is now in powered forward motion, using the push button accelerator and manual lever brake to control the forward speed (up to 12.5 M.P.H.), and to slow down and stop the vehicle.

NOTE: The Commute-Case ™ is a Stand-On vehicle only, when the unit is in ride mode. You do not ever sit on the product, in any of its three modes. However, a seat attachment option may be considered for future models, as we receive more customer feedback. For those using Commute-Case ™ for local shopping, a handy flexible fabric shopping bag that expands when filled, attached to the case in trolley mode will function as a shopping cart while in the store. This optional shopping bag relocates above the rear wheel when returning from store. Both of these options/features are currently not available. However, when these options become available, they will be compatible with the purchased unit. 




FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS

  • Top Speed: 12.5 MPH
  • Size: Fully folded in briefcase mode: 18" long by 13" wide by 4" tall (Commute-Case ™ laying on flat surface)
  • Size: Deployed in Ride mode: 18" long by 4" wide by 46" tall (Commute-Case ™ from ground to top of steering column).
  • Product Weight: 24 lbs
  • Battery Level Indicator Gauge
  • GPS/Smart phone mount
  • Cup holder
  • USB connection for smart phone charging
  • Ultra powerful, high torque rated, permanent magnet, DC Motor 
  • Proprietary rechargeable 25.6 volt lithium ion battery pack includes a quick connect/disconnect feature, allowing user the option to recharge battery pack with any standard office/home AC outlet, while battery pack remains on Commute-Case ™, or when removed from Commute-Case ™. Our battery pack is the safest on planet, without any hazardous or noxious substances (SGS CE and ROHS accredited), thus environmentally friendly. Our pack is powerful, with long cycle life (over 4000 cycles with capacity staying at 80% minimum), with no memory effect, capable of operating at a wide temperature range (-4 °F to 158 °F). The battery pack life equals 100,000 miles or 10 years. Battery pack and recharger unit are included.
  • No gyroscopic sensor controls, period. (All vehicles using gyroscopic control sensors have no manual brake(s) and no manual accelerator). If you own/drive an automobile or a standard pedal type bicycle, then you go, stop and maintain control using manual controls, not gyroscopic sensor controls. Commute-Case ™, like your car and bike, uses a safe, manual brake and accelerator, allowing you to maintain vehicle control. 
  • Deploy/retract mode transition, push button activated, at a 3-5 second activation lapse time.
  • Slip resistant footpad surface.
  • Optional shoulder carry strap.
  • Optional foldable storage bag.
  • Optional mounting attachment unit for addition of a seat.


SELECT FROM 8 DESIGNER COLORS




PRESS

 ...Ideal for Your Earth Day Commute
  Jetsons-inspired briefcase transforms into a scooter
  It's like Optimus Prime, if he was an electric scooter.



Click on the banner above to listen to the OSGOOD FILE interview.




THE GREEN ENERGY MOTORS CORP. TEAM

Arnold Sharkan
Founder/President
Green Energy Motors Corp.

 


Arnold Sharkan served as President, SFT Sports Inc. (1988-2004). He is an entrepreneur and an inventor; awarded U.S. patents 4,869,269 and 5,209,184. He was first to import electric scooters into the U.S. Arnold did executive award sales with the Carlson Marketing Group. 


Troy W.  Livingston
Advisor

Owner/founder of Livingston Products Inc., Troy W. Livingston is CEO of the highly successful research and development firm that bears his name, located in Buffalo Grove, Illinois.  With over 27 years of product design, development and manufacturing experience, he continues serving as a valuable asset in guiding GE.M.C.'s COMMUTE-CASE ™ into full production.  As part owner of Green Energy Motors Corp., Troy has a vested interest in building the "highest quality COMMUTE-CASE ™ possible", thus assuring a production unit that will "delight Green Energy's customers" world-wide,  when  they take delivery of a product that is awesome in so many ways. Troy has been awarded over 60 United States Patents , and continues to serve the product design and development needs of dozens of clients annually, including  small start-ups to global giants.


MANUFACTURING TIMELINE

G.E.M.C is working hard in tandem with our partner firm, Livingston Products, Inc., (http://livingstonproducts.com/)  and others to begin an initial production run of the Commute-Case™ to meet our projected goal to deliver an extremely high quality, made in the U.S.A. product by December of 2014. We will do everything in our power to exceed our projected delivery date and provide you with our product even sooner!


USE OF INDIEGOGO FUNDING

President and company founder Arnold Sharkan has self-funded the development of Commute-Case over many years, completing a series of prototypes proving out the viability of the product. Your contribution will be used to fund the finalization of our latest prototype and the initial production run. We would like to thank you for your contribution to help make the production of Commute-Case possible.


F.A.Q.

HOW MUCH DOES A COMMUTE-CASE™ WEIGH?
The GVW, or Gross Vehicle Weight is 24 lbs, or (11kg). That includes the quick release, removable battery pack.

WHAT IS THE TOP SPEED OF COMMUTE-CASE™?
12.5 M.P.H.

HOW FAR CAN COMMUTE-CASE™ TRAVEL ON A SINGLE CHARGE?
25 miles, or (40km) depending on varying driving conditions.

 WHAT MAKES THE COMMUTE-CASE™  GO SO FAR ON A SINGLE  CHARGE?
Commute-Case™ is powered by a proprietary state of the art nano-phosphate lithium-ion battery pack, connected to an awesomely powerful mega torque, permanent magnet,  DC motor.

HOW IS THE BATTERY PACK RECHARGED?
Recharging to full capacity takes about 5 minutes to 1 hour by plugging the charger cord into any standard home/office 120 volt or 220 volt wall outlet. Each COMMUTE-CASE™ will be shipped with a power supply compatible with the customer’s location. E.g., if you live in a country with 220 volt outlets, you will receive a COMMUTE-CASE™ made to plug into a 220 volt outlet to recharge.

WHAT ABOUT LEGALITY?
Since Commute-Case™ is classified as a "Electric Personal Assistive Mobility Device" by the U.S. Consumer Products Safety Board, rather than the U.S Department of Transportation, it is regulated as a consumer product, rather than a motor vehicle, and therefore does not require state motor vehicle registration, license plates or a driver’s license. In general, it can be driven anywhere pedal bicycles are allowed to be operated, by adults 18 and over.

HOW IS COMMUTE-CASE™ OPERATED IN DEPLOYED RIDE MODE?
Commute-Case™ is a "stand-on" unit, at present. However, an optional seat attachment will be available at a future date. The optional seat and mounting bracket will adapt to the initial production models available Dec. '14, or sooner.

HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO PURCHASE A COMMUTE-CASE™?
Commute-Case™ can be pre ordered on our web site,www.greenenergymotors.com, using a special introductory offer of 50% off MSRP of $5,990 usd, or ($2,995 usd), and/or by paying a fully refundable 5% deposit using PayPal or by mailing a check or money order to G.E.M.C. in Vernon Hills, Illinois. However, someone who wants to get one of the first production run model's, for just one pledge of  only $999 usd, (vs. the  $2,995 usd, 50% off price), can do so if they act fast, as this perk will be closed after 100 contributions are reached, at which time this incredible deal will end !

IS COMMUTE-CASE™ AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS?
There is a choice of eight cool designer colors, from jet black, purple, metal flake gold, silver, green, red, blue and perfectly pink !

WHAT ACCESSORIES AND OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE?
Some of the accessories included with every unit are the front and rear led inset lights, the electronic horn, the removable battery pack and the recharger, to name a few. Options include carry strap (for going up stairs), warning light for extra safety when driving at night, a shopping bag with Velcro mounting and a seat with a mounting bracket.

WHAT IS THE MAXIMUM LOAD COMMUTE-CASE™ CAN HANDLE?
275 lbs.

WHAT WARRANTY DOES THE COMMUTE-CASE™ COME WITH?
Each and every Commute-Case™ comes with a limited one year factory warranty. Ease of use, the unique dual functionality of a briefcase/personal vehicle, and "product perfection" have always been our goals. Please see warranty details on our web site at www.greenenergymotors.com

WHAT WILL BE THE RETAIL PRICE OF THE COMMUTE-CASE™?
Indiegogo contributors are receiving a special $999 usd low cost for helping Green Energy Motors launch the commute case. The retail price, after the Indiegogo campaign ends will be an estimated $3,000.00 usd.

WHAT IS THE TOTAL SHIPPING COST TO DELIVER A COMMUTE-CASE™?
The Commute-Case™ will be delivered for free to the lower 48 U.S. states. For Alaska and Hawaii, add $100 for shipping. For EU and UK, add $200 for shipping. The optional accessories will ship for $6 to the lower 48 US States, $15 for Alaska and Hawaii, and $19 for U.K. and E.U. backers. For other International shipping, email us for a quote at info@greenenergymotors.com. Our team will email contributors  a notice around 14 days before we will be delivering the Commute-Case™ to you. All international shipments will be sent via insured Air Freight (we select carrier). Please allow 5-7 business days for your Commute-Case™ to arrive,  after it leaves our facility. For the lower 48 U.S. states, units will be shipped via insured ground carrier; allow 3-5 business days for product to arrive.  For Alaska and Hawaii, units will be shipped via insured  air freight; allow 5-7 business days for product to arrive.



Become part of the Team and help make it happen! Contribute to Commute-Case™ now and become part of the effort to change the way people commute Everyday, Everywhere!

story:
VIP Universal Desktop Tablet PC Stand

A Quality Product “Made in Canada”

   Look no further; we have holders for all uses in your daily life from in the home, office, to public areas such as:

  • Home, Livingroom, Bedroom, Bathroom and more...
  • Office, Conference rooms, Reception area display and more...
  • Retail Kiosks, Stores, Trade show displays and more...
  • Reasturants, Health clubs, Doctors offices and more...
  • Schools, Training rooms and more....

Product Description:

  • Perfect for all 7~10.1-inch Tablet PC’s models, ideal for video calling via Skype app!.
  • Tablet Table Stand and Holder.
  • Dual locking knobs to adjust to your tablets size.
  • Super strong goose neck!.
  • Solid Steel Base 1” X 5” ( 25.4mm X 127mm )
  • Silicon Anti-Scratch / Anti-Skid Base

 If we reach our goal, we will continue to develop the following options and other types of tablet stands,

  • Key Lock Holders for additional security.
  • Spring Lock for saftey and quick release.
  • Holders with tilt / 360 swivel to allow for viewing in Portait and Landscape mode.

If you are local and wish to pick up your stand, do not add shipping cost.

About Us:

We are product designers, developers and have in-house mold making capabilities with 25 years of experience. We focus on environmental and green product development. We always place our focus on using or at least making products that are recyclable and not to add to more junk that will end up in landfills.

" Please help support North American built products and keep employment local "

Black Style:

 

Chrome Style:

 

Holder also fits with IPAD covers:

 

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

What type of tablet will fit in the stand?
The stand is a universal bracket and works on all common 7" to 10.1" tablets like IPADs, Samsung and HTC.

What is the Stand made out of?
The stand is compiled of both steel and polycarbonate plastic material.

Is the Stand recyclable?
Yes, all parts of the stand is recylable.

story:
All Unlocked

Meet HALO BACK Super Cable

Charging cable is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but it's far from perfect!

Most cables are prone to wear & tear, charge slowly, have confusing orientations, and don't work over time. We are here to change that! Introducing the Super Cable.

Tech Brief

1. Patented Blind Plug Design. Easy to plug in and out. Say goodbye to the pain of plug failures.

2. Ultra High Strength. 

3. Express Charge. Faster than original Apple cable.

4. Lifetime Warranty. Super Cable will be the last cable you need to order for your iPhone.

5. MFi Certified.

 

HALO BACK Super Cable

 

Blind Plug Design

 

Ultra High Strength

 

Cat Proof

 

Patented Blind Plug Design

Based on ergonomic research results, the upper side of USB plug is designed to fit the thumb tip perfectly. User-friendly design makes it super easy for users to determine the correct orientation of USB plug of Super Cable even in the dark. 

Also, a much better touch experience makes users more willing to hold Super Cable in the correct orientation.

Easy to hold and plug:

 

Ergonomic shape fits the thumb tip perfectly:

 

Correct Orientation VS Wrong Orientation. Different orientations result in completely different touch experience. Users will feel unpleasant when holding USB plug in the wrong orientation.

 

Make it much easier to plug into any type of device:

 

Ultra High Strength

Bullet Proof fiber is used to strengthen the conductors and enhance protection. This material is an advanced material used in bulletproof vests and is 5 times stronger than steel.

Insulated conductors reduce friction and creates added flexibility and protection.

Thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) cable jacket is pliable, soft, and eco-friendly

Braided exterior is abrasion resistant, which reduces fraying and lasts longer

An adult can use HALO BACK Super Cable to pull a car without damaging the cable:

 

Super Cable is tested to bend 10 more times than low-end cables.

 

Faster Charging

The world's fastest Lightning cable. Super Cable charges 3 times as fast as generic lightning to USB cables due to our ultimate material combination, which is a complete trade secret!

 

Stranded Tinned Copper Wires (23AWG) and 144 Knitting net ensures fast and stable charging. 

Worry-Free Lifestyle:

 

 

What is Apple MFi certified?​

MFi Certified is short for ‘made for iPhone/iPad/iPod’ Certified, which is the official certification from Apple. Accessories that owns MFi certification will not damage your Apple devices or cause any danger such as electric leakage.

MFi Licensed Accessories

Those cables designed with fresh ideas below are not able to obtain MFi Certification and can't work well with iPhones. Super Cable has MFi certification and is trustworthy.

Rewards

Super Cable Engineering Design

 

Type C & Micro USB

TimeLine

About us

HALO BACK, founded in 2013, is a pioneer of smart phone functionality and innovation.

Starting from a small idea on Kickstarter, HALO BACK has accumulated tens of thousands of supporters world-wide and been featured in over 200 major media outlets including Gizmodo and CNET.

Our team aims to provide clever new products that improve performance for our customers while creating a seamless user experience. Currently with users in nearly 200 countries world-wide, HALO BACK continues to develop consumer products that are on the cutting edge of ‘smart’ technology.

HALO BACK supply 'Tech, Smart, Easy' lifestyle and products. We are searching for global co-partners. If you want to order wholesale or become a distributor of HALO BACK, please contact us through: sales@haloback.com.

Press

Want to write about us? Download our Press Pack! Any questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at press@haloback.com

International Backers

 

We have partnered with global warehouses and the most reliable global logistics services including DHL, USPS, Royal Mail, TrakPak, Shunfeng etc, assuring efficient delivery to every corner of the world.

We charge $4’s shipping fee for backers from US and China. For backers from all the other countries, we charge $5 for shipping. Free shipping globally if you support 10 HALO BACKs!

In US we ship by USPS. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.

In China we ship by Shunfeng. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.

In countries as listed: BE, DK, FR, DE, IE, NL, PT, ES, IB, AU, CN, we use Royal Mail and TrakPak as logistic solution. Estimated delivery time: 3–8 days since dispatch.

For all the other countries around the world, we ship by DHL. Estimated delivery time: 1-2 weeks since dispatch.

Risks and challenges

 

All hardware products carry associated risks and challenges. Our team has been working hard to address every one of them.

Prototyping is the hardest part for a new product. More problems may come out when trying each detailed modification, we have finished all major technical hurtles when it comes to manufacturing and engineering. This also isn’t our first cable! So the manufacturing is becoming more and more stable. This time we are aiming at 100% on time rate delivery.

We have experienced customer support personnel with logistic tracking skills and will work diligently to reply backers promptly because our past Kickstarter experience.

Our team has successfully operated two hardware projects and got plenty of experience in handling all these problems. If any unexpected issue occurs, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to solve the problem quickly.

We are always looking for great distributors /co-partners globally.

Whether you are interested in becoming our distributor or making a single bulk order, don’t hesitate to contact us through: sales@haloback.com. We are looking forward to helping you find a solution.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHVjLgJdm2bY91...

Hiya! My name's Josh. On my YouTube channel, I create well-edited Smash Bros. content consisting of mostly montages and tutorials (as of now). However, I'm unable to edit content or stream anymore on my current setup due to my laptop not being able to handle anything demanding anymore. There's that along with frequent blue screens. I've tried everything I could to prolong the life of this laptop but I think it's time I put it to rest. That said, I've started building a PC though I still need some money to finish it since I uh... ran out of money. And have no source of income apart from Patreon ($11/month currently).

So if you enjoy my content, feel free to contribute! It's extremely appreciated. ♥

You will be mentioned in an update video once my PC is complete.

story:
Most people own multiple electronic devices, like iPhone 8/X, Apple Watch, and AirPods, and they all need different chargers and cables. Now, Apple users can switch to wireless chargers. With Plux and its Qi compatibility, you can charge your new iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch wirelessly and quickly.

Plux allows you to truly embrace the convenience of wireless charging. It works as a pad or a stand so you can still use your phone at any angle. With an output of 10W, it saves you tons of time and money.

Plux Is Featured In:

Charge Three Devices At Once

Plux is the world’s best wireless fast charging stand. It’s specifically designed to power up all of your devices easily in one convenient place! Just simply place all your devices on the charger. Now you can leave the mountain of cables and chargers at home and charge your devices all in one.

Support 10W Fast Charging

Using fast charge technology, Plux can deliver up to 10 watts of power to all your iPhone 8/X, Apple watch, and AirPods. It’s a convenient, safe, and reliable way to charge and power all your electrical devices 33% faster than the standard wireless chargers.

Wireless Charging Pad And Stand In One

With the Stand Converter that comes with Plux, easily transform your charging pad into a charging stand, you don't have to worry about the battery life when binge-watching or listening!

See More, Hold Less

Whether you’re texting, calling, or watching your favorite shows, don’t let your wireless charger restrict your mobility! We’ve designed Plux to be an aesthetically pleasing and a highly usable stand that holds your phone up under a viewer-friendly angle. It has the best angle for your Face ID and Nightstand Mode! You can still get notifications, messages, calls or binge-watch with comfort.

Work With Phone Case

 

No one wants the hassle of having to remove their beautiful phone case while using a wireless charger. With Plux, you'll have no issue charging the phone while it’s secured in its case(not magnetic); as long as it's not thicker than 3mm.

Premium Device With Added Protections

When enjoying the safe and convenient wireless charging, Plux also provides intelligent safeguards to prevent overheating and overcharging.

 

 

How To Set Up Plux(Apple Watch Charger Excluded)

 

 

How To Set Up AirPods Holder

There are plenty of wireless chargers available on the market, new or old, cheap or expensive. However, to charge multiple devices at the same time seems to be an impossible obstacle for Apple users. Even though the AirPower will be released in March, how fast can it actually charge your phone are yet to be known. So, we decided to create a fast charge wireless charger. We start our journey with Indiegogo because we believe the backer community will play an indispensable role in the development of Plux. Your support not only helps us get Plux to market, but also supports a young company consisting of eight passionate and dedicated designers with many innovative ideas and exciting visions. If you’re on the prowl for an easy to use, beautifully crafted, and an extremely efficient wireless charger, then Plux is made for you.

As our product design and testing are gearing up to the final stages and heading to large-scale product, we’d like to invite you to the last chapter of this adventure to enjoy the convenience of wireless charging as much as we do.

We are really excited to launch the first ever fast charge wireless charger that could charge multiple devices at the same time. We know that the most important part of our process is the commitment we made to you and to deliver the charger to you on time! All rewards are expected to start shipping in April, 2018. We are confident in our supply chain management and production capability. However, if there are any uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages, we will be sure to keep you well informed every step of the way and do our best to quickly solve the problem. We are excited to bring Plux to life and get this revolutionary wireless charger into your hands!

story:
If you Missed out on our Campaign no worries, we are now selling on amazon. You can purchase the pouch with the following link: http://amzn.to/2vhfDKt

Thank you for support.

Quintessentialz

What is The Squeeze Pouch?

It's a sunglasses Squeeze pouch that can fit small and large Sunglasses and eyeglasses as well as smart phones.

 

How do I use it?

The Pouch utilizes a squeeze top opening for easy opening and closing. The carabiner allows you to quickly attach it to many things and the mobile clip allows for a sleeker more elegant look.  The Pouch is made out of neoprene making the outside water resistant.

 

 Where Can I use it?

The carabiner allows you to quickly attach it to backpacks, bags, sports equipment, purses, car head rests and more.

 

What makes it Different?

Carabiner or mobile clip allows you to easily attach it to a different bag and when it is not being used it returns to its slim form, only 0.25 inches thick.

 

What are the dimensions and What is it made out of?

Measures: 7 x 4 x 0.25 inches. 100% real Neoprene.

Rewards.

 

Stretch Goals.

Timeline.​

Our First Pouch Shipped out to our First Backer, Thank you for your Support.

First Pouches Being Prepared to be Shipped to there New Homes

Our very first box of Pouch's Arrived and are ready to be shipped.

A Thank you to our Backers and Supporters​

 

Thank you so much for backing and supporting our project on Indiegogo. Our goal is to bring you a high quality product that is elegant and functional. We hope you enjoy your Pouch and get lots of use out of it.

Thank you again

David Quintero

Risks and challenges

While this is our first Indiegogo campaign; we have designed and brought to production other products. While we have done our do diligence of having manufactures and suppliers ready to produce The Pouch, there is always the possibility of unforeseen delays. With that possibility we want you to be assured that we will keep you updated with any delays in the process. Thank you for your Support.

story:
Yela is a mobile application that inspires trade between communities. Creating the first app that combines Transportation, Services, Space and Products on your smartphone. Location based, with chat and calling functions. The App functions online as well as offline due to our integrated mesh system. Smartphone to smartphone mobile payments. Yela is an on-demand app made for both the consumer and the provider. 

  Here are some easy to understand concepts. 

  Transport

Stuck in traffic and want to get somewhere fast? Use YELA to see what mode of transportation is within your budget range.  For example maybe a taxi, a rental car or limousine.  Too slow? How about a motorbike or helicopter instead! 

  Services

 You just got to the office and want a new suit. Use Yela to get the tailor to your doorstep and do the fitting. Need your offices cleaned the same day? Hire a cleaner based on your GPS location. Choose the best reviewed cleaner and get your office cleaned asap. 

  Space

Just landed in Timbaktu  and have no clue where to stay? Open Yela and see whats available around you. Find the best reviewed location for the price you want, all within your GPS location.

  Products

-  In the office but you don’t feel like eating at the same old restaurants? Check YELA and find someone selling home cooked meals around you.  Did it just start raining and you need an umbrella?  Check YELA products to see if it’s sold close by.

Life gets simpler when everything around you is accessible with a simple click of a button.

Imagine using YELA with your local currency choice.  If you’re in Vietnam and someone is charging you 2.2 million Vietnamese Dong; you don’t need to worry because your side of the app will show you its $100 USD.  You will never be cheated or short changed as it acts as a POS system for vendors. 


 

At YELA, we are all avid users of On Demand technology who aim to make YELA a part of everyone’s life.  YELA has been created with both the consumer and seller in mind as the next logical step in the evolution of On Demand technology.  Innovation is what is needed and expected today.

YELA is a simple app that allows for brand loyalty with a desirable reward system for using what is today, normal ‘touch button to reality’ deliverables.  With the amount of smartphone users today and the huge amount of apps available to users, YELA makes it more appealing to have something that allows you to start micro-economies and making life simpler without the need for paying extra for things like data charges. 

YELA is the one app that does it all and makes your life easier.  Complete reviews of both consumers and vendors alike will provide people with a wiser decision making tool.  This ensures quality, security and reliability.  We won’t give you a false sense of security or give users with little to no experience, less of a chance to work.  It is all based and rated by review of your peers with in and on the system before you choose who you buy or sell to. 

 

The core team of Yela contains 7 people. 

The founder of Yela is Ritish Dorai. Delighted to share our creation and appreciating any help that can be given to making Yela into reality. 

Marnix Troudes is running the Online Presence and helped build Yela from the ground up along with Ritish. 

Jesper Terkelsen is Head of Business Development and handles all future partnerships. 

Adrienne is a director of the company and serves as Financial Controller. With more than 25 years of experience in Investment Banking she's a great addition to our team.

Advent Phang and Alvin Chua are the owners of the development team that created the base for the Yela App. The App is being built by Infinity Labs Sdn. Bhd. and are involved in a shareholder partnership with Yela.

Zeeshan Ahmed Heads the Development Team


What we are solving and passionate about..

  Our vision is to inspire trade between communities worldwide. We have so many resources available around us, yet an easy platform to connect us all is missing. We all have something to share, sell, rent or produce. Yela will be the platform to connect with the people around you at the touch of a button. Giving everyone the opportunity to participate in the on demand economy while giving security with smartphone to smartphone payments. With 50 billion smartphones worldwide we foresee a (mesh network) connected world. 

  • Filling the need to connect all under one roof. 
  • Having the App review based so you always connect to the best vendors and service providers.
  • Best value for money
  • Giving everyone the possibility to compete on quality service
  • Offline and online wallet system


Mesh Networks

A mesh network is a network connection that connects smartphones together. Connecting the smartphones together the mesh network will enable connectivity without connecting to "the internet". The mesh network gets stronger when many people are using it.This means that when Yela is used in your community, offline trade and payments will be possible. We believe this will change the game, as smartphone numbers continue to grow rapidly each year. We also think about third world countries where people are getting better access to smartphones but still lack the money to pay for a reliable internet connection. These communities can trade, offer services to each other and chat through the mesh network.


Humanitarian Mode

When disaster strikes more often than not communication lines are cut off. Yela wants to help communities, areas and regions affected by natural disasters or any other form of emergency by being a tool that assists in rebuilding and rescue efforts.

The services module of Yela will facilitate the location of volunteers and people who are equipped to help out when disasters occur. The Yela App will serve as an effective bridge between rescue workers and trapped survivors, and aid the success of recovery efforts and the rescue of human lives through the real-time nature of the App.

The transport module of Yela will make it possible to request and provide transport to all affected areas.

The products module of Yela will enable NGO's to showcase their available supplies on the App following which volunteer workers can mobilise them for delivery to designated pick up points. Through Yela, they will know exactly what supplies are required and tailor the perfect fit of essentials such as medicine, food and clothing to the needs of victims.

Look at Yela as not only a new but more importantly essential communication tool in times of emergency or when disaster strikes when all conventional channels of communication are down.Through Yela's off grid capabilities people can continue to call and text each other, ensuring more people are saved and supplied with their needs. 

The Yela App will operate in humanitarian mode in disaster and emergency zones.In this mode, usage of the Yela App will be completely free of charge. 


What’s your plan, and what’s your schedule?

 To be able to complete, test and launch Yela fully in 2016. The other modules will just complement the system which will already run from December 2015.

  The App is being developed with Xamarin and can be cross translated to any platform. IOS, Windows, blackberry etc.


Normal Apps cost any where between  3k to 30k to make 

more specialized Apps cost 100k to even more

Our app also has evolved into some thing awesome from its original plan

We have 4 on demand capabilities.

Wireless connectivity phone to phone encrypted. 

on and offline wallets with encryption with block chain sync

chat and calls. 

Review system.

And as we have covered 75% of the development.  

We are here in need of your help

We are here.

 Process

  1. Complete soft launch the android app development process. (December)
  2. Complete IOS version (January)
  3. Release Yela into the market (January)
  4. Give out rewards to our contributors (January)
  5. Full released App (Spring 2016)

The Time line

Where we are now

Crowdfunding and Beta testing the Transport and Services modules of Yela.

 

Why We Choose EMP pouches as perks , well when disaster happens we need working phones. These pouches are Faraday cages which protect electronics from being damaged and water proof. This goes great when you need a phone thats working and using Yela off grid mesh to connect to other Yela users.
$5 USD

Thank you for you kind support

- We appreciate every penny and will give you a shout out on our website, Facebook.

 Number Available: 1000

$10 USD

Ref-feral code name

Choose the nick name you would prefer rather then having one made for you. Please realise Terms and Conditions Apply and they can not be copyrighted. We will send you a letter with confirmation as records and receipt. We will give you a shout out on our Facebook page

Number Available: 1000


$25 USD + Shipping

EMP Bag Phone + Tshirt

Shipping charges are separate and we will send them the fastest and safest ways

We are building something that is off-line and on-line with huge amount transactions we will need to have our own AWS servers with a complete 24/7 development working team. This will be the brunt of the expenditure.

We are 75% complete and with these we can secure what would be first database of its kind with data, on the off-line users in the world. 100k. 

We need 40k to setup and launch to our neighboring markets with minimal amount of hiring. 

30k more would go into running costs. 

10k would go into dispersing perks. 

 

300k we will be able to fully launch in South East Asia.

400k we will be able to develop the offline wallets fully with block chain capabilities

500k we will we will be able to launch in Asia fully

1 million we will we will be able to launch globally

 

The implementation of our idea has certain risks which are governments regulations and the local countries natural business , we are in no ways being in competition but trying to make things more easy to deal with and encouraging more trade.

Example Malaysia is not for on demand drivers as it has a local authority using metered taxis and wants the apps only approved by them. This is also the case in France and and Washington DC. We have developed the app where taxis can use it , people can call for them using the app the taxis can respond.. use their own meter and plug in the figures of the amount into the app to be charged cashless. We have made a solution, which solves the problem.

If we do not get the total amount we obviously will scale and do things more slowly but surely. With the amount of exposure and publicity we are sure to run into many VC and are ready also to sell equity to get where we want. 

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “Yela” family.If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

Contributions...

Your generosity and support could make all the difference in the fruition of “Yela”. 

It would be great to have 180 people to contribute $1,000. But in reality, 40000 people contributing $5 would work too.  Of course you may contribute more. We will be eternally grateful!  Please share this with anyone you think would be willing to help. Old school?  No Problem!For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact us via email: info@yelayela.com and we will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to.  I will post your contribution on the campaign with your name and we will deliver 

whatever perk you would like. 

Please help spread the word!

This has proven to be one of the hardest things we have ever done.  We don't have a million friends to share this with.  But, we have the Internet and wonderful people who want to see through. Whether or not you contribute financially, please use the share tools on this page. Tweeting, sharing on Facebook or any other venues you have at your disposal will greatly enhance our exposure and increase our chances to succeed. Thank you very much. Here's the link to the Facebook page:

Please like and share it.  Feel free to leave a message also.

 YouTube:  infoatyela

Contact Information

Send us PM

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to 

hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@yelayela.com
story_txt:
Yela is a mobile application that inspires trade between communities. Creating the first app that combines Transportation, Services, Space and Products on your smartphone. Location based, with chat and calling functions. The App functions online as well as offline due to our integrated mesh system. Smartphone to smartphone mobile payments. Yela is an on-demand app made for both the consumer and the provider. 
  Here are some easy to understand concepts. 
  Transport

Stuck
in traffic and want to get somewhere fast? Use YELA to see what mode of
transportation is within your budget range. 
For example maybe a taxi, a rental car or limousine.  Too slow? How about a motorbike or helicopter
instead! 
  Services
 You just got to the office and want a new suit. Use Yela to get the tailor to your doorstep and do the fitting. Need your offices cleaned the same day? Hire a cleaner based on your GPS location. Choose the best reviewed cleaner and get your office cleaned asap. 
  Space
Just landed in Timbaktu  and have no clue where to stay? Open Yela and see whats available around you. Find the best reviewed location for the price you want, all within your GPS location.
  Products

-  In the
office but you don’t feel like eating at the same old restaurants? Check YELA
and find someone selling home cooked meals around you.  Did it just start raining and you need an
umbrella?  Check YELA products to see if
it’s sold close by.
Life gets simpler when everything around you is accessible
with a simple click of a button.
Imagine using YELA with your local currency choice.  If you’re in Vietnam and someone is charging
you 2.2 million Vietnamese Dong; you don’t need to worry because your side of
the app will show you its $100 USD.  You
will never be cheated or short changed as it acts as a POS system for vendors. 


 



At YELA, we are all avid users of On Demand technology who
aim to make YELA a part of everyone’s life. 
YELA has been created with both the consumer and seller in mind as the
next logical step in the evolution of On Demand technology.  Innovation is what is needed and expected
today.
YELA is a simple app that allows for brand loyalty with a
desirable reward system for using what is today, normal ‘touch button to
reality’ deliverables.  With the amount
of smartphone users today and the huge amount of apps available to users, YELA
makes it more appealing to have something that allows you to start
micro-economies and making life simpler without the need for paying extra for
things like data charges.  
YELA is the one app that does it all and makes your life
easier.  Complete reviews of both
consumers and vendors alike will provide people with a wiser decision making
tool.  This ensures quality, security and
reliability.  We won’t give you a false
sense of security or give users with little to no experience, less of a chance
to work.  It is all based and rated by
review of your peers with in and on the system before you choose who you buy or
sell to. 
 

The core team of Yela contains 7 people. 
The founder of Yela is Ritish Dorai. Delighted to share our creation and appreciating any help that can be given to making Yela into reality. 
Marnix Troudes is running the Online Presence and helped build Yela from the ground up along with Ritish. 
Jesper Terkelsen is Head of Business Development and handles all future partnerships. 
Adrienne is a director of the company and serves as Financial Controller. With more than 25 years of experience in Investment Banking she's a great addition to our team.
Advent Phang and Alvin Chua are the owners of the development team that created the base for the Yela App. The App is being built by Infinity Labs Sdn. Bhd. and are involved in a shareholder partnership with Yela.
Zeeshan Ahmed Heads the Development Team


What we are solving and passionate about..
  Our vision is to inspire trade between communities worldwide. We have so many resources available around us, yet an easy platform to connect us all is missing. We all have something to share, sell, rent or produce. Yela will be the platform to connect with the people around you at the touch of a button. Giving everyone the opportunity to participate in the on demand economy while giving security with smartphone to smartphone payments. With 50 billion smartphones worldwide we foresee a (mesh network) connected world. 



Filling the need to connect all under one roof. 

Having the App review based so you always connect to the best vendors and service providers.
Best value for money
Giving everyone the possibility to compete on quality service

Offline and online wallet system



Mesh Networks
A mesh network is a network connection that connects smartphones together. Connecting the smartphones together the mesh network will enable connectivity without connecting to "the internet". The mesh network gets stronger when many people are using it.This means that when Yela is used in your community, offline trade and payments will be possible. We believe this will change the game, as smartphone numbers continue to grow rapidly each year. We also think about third world countries where people are getting better access to smartphones but still lack the money to pay for a reliable internet connection. These communities can trade, offer services to each other and chat through the mesh network.

Humanitarian Mode

When disaster strikes more often than not communication lines are cut off. Yela wants to help communities, areas and regions affected by natural disasters or any other form of emergency by being a tool that assists in rebuilding and rescue efforts.
The services module of Yela will facilitate the location of volunteers and people who are equipped to help out when disasters occur. The Yela App will serve as an effective bridge between rescue workers and trapped survivors, and aid the success of recovery efforts and the rescue of human lives through the real-time nature of the App.
The transport module of Yela will make it possible to request and provide transport to all affected areas.
The products module of Yela will enable NGO's to showcase their available supplies on the App following which volunteer workers can mobilise them for delivery to designated pick up points. Through Yela, they will know exactly what supplies are required and tailor the perfect fit of essentials such as medicine, food and clothing to the needs of victims.
Look at Yela as not only a new but more importantly essential communication tool in times of emergency or when disaster strikes when all conventional channels of communication are down.Through Yela's off grid capabilities people can continue to call and text each other, ensuring more people are saved and supplied with their needs. 
The Yela App will operate in humanitarian mode in disaster and emergency zones.In this mode, usage of the Yela App will be completely free of charge. 

What’s your plan, and what’s your schedule?
 To be able to complete, test and launch Yela fully in 2016. The other modules will just complement the system which will already run from December 2015.
  The App is being developed with Xamarin and can be cross translated to any platform. IOS, Windows, blackberry etc.


Normal Apps cost any where between  3k to 30k to make 
more specialized Apps cost 100k to even more
Our app also has evolved into some thing awesome from its original
plan
We have 4 on demand capabilities.
Wireless connectivity phone to phone encrypted. 
on and offline wallets with encryption with block chain sync
chat and calls. 
Review system.
And as we have covered 75% of the development.  
We are here in need of your help
We are here.
 Process



Complete soft launch the android app development process. (December)

Complete IOS version (January)
Release Yela into the market (January)
Give out rewards to our contributors (January)
Full released App (Spring 2016)

The Time line

Where we are now
Crowdfunding and Beta testing the Transport and Services modules of Yela.
 





Why We Choose EMP pouches as perks , well when disaster happens we need working phones. These pouches are Faraday cages which protect electronics from being damaged and water proof. This goes great when you need a phone thats working and using Yela off grid mesh to connect to other Yela users.

story:
SINEX is a portable fast charging power bank with wired and "wireless" charging simultaneously, the USB-C HUB function can also become your simple workstation. SINEX supports the Power Delivery 3 protocol, 10000mAh 18max charging your devices faster than ever you’ve been.

 

If you don’t have a charger cable on hands, the portable “wireless ” vacuum suckers hook charging technology makes your cellphone always fully charge for anywhere and anytime, no extra charger cable needed.

 

 

Even though wireless charging technology may not seem a relatively new phenomenon in charging your telephone, it does not perfect for you daily life for now. But SINEX can do things well.

 

You can’t stand the charging phone up with a comfortable and ergonomic view angle when you’re working or having entertainment. A small movement makes your device out of place and stop the charging.

SINEX “wireless” charging technology makes things perfect. It designs a 50cm PU charger cable which can be freely pulled out, and 8 seamless vacuum suckers strongly stick your device without moving. You are able to watch videos or to work the job emails with your fully charge phone anywhere, anytime.

The eight suction cups strongly stick the phone or your device, while the 50cm PU charger cable draw back the falling in order to protect device, rather than heavily fall to the ground.

 

Sheet stand is accompanied on the back of the “wireless” charging board,  one-click to easily pop out into a phone stand mode. While is charging, you still have a great experience of the vertical and horizontal screen.

 

When pocketed SINEX, the LED battery display screen still shows the remaining battery, there is no need to take it out of pocket or bags.

 

 

Integrated with a USB-C HUB function, SINEX solves the normal problems of MacBook and other Ultrabooks, it’s easy to read data with the USB 2.0 and up to 480Mbp/s transfer speed. Keyboard, mouse and other devices are also can be connected.

 

 

 

 

SINEX supports the latest Power Delivery (PD) technology to offer you a faster charging experience.   SINEX is equipped with a 100W/ 18W USB-C 3.0 Power Delivery port and a 18W USB-A 3.0 Qualcomm Quick Charge ports. You can easily fast-charge multiple devices at the same time, don’t forget the “wireless” charging board.

 

 

 

SINEX also supports up to 18W of fast charging capability through both its USB-C port and USB-A port. With up to 18W of Power Delivery (PD), which can charge iPhone X up to 50% in 30 mins with a USB-C to Lightning cable.

 

 

 

SINEX is furnished with USB-C, a new high power connector that can charge virtually any modern device with new laptops, tablets, smartphones and Switches to USB-C charging everyday.

 

 

With USB-C PD (Power Delivery) technology and 10,000mAh of charge capacity, SINEX conveniently maintains 1-2 days of mobile power for flagship phones and tablets, and can nearly double the battery life of smaller laptops. SINEX’s broad compatibility extends to Apple, Samsung Galaxy, Huawei, OnePlus and Nintendo products, to name a few.

 

 

 

SINEX stands for Supreme, Incredible, Non-stop, Evolution and X , it dedicates that ’s principle for a better and new product to change human beings’ life. The future with infinite hope.

 

SINEX power bank is the second production of SINEX team, we found the inconvenience and disadvantage when using the normal power bank. That's the reason why we have SINEX power bank to slove the problems that we met so far. Hope everyone likes SINEX power bank.
