story:
Shred Screen Open and Make The Data Free

For many, many years we can only see, click or touch the visualized data on screen but you can never take it out or drop in data just right on screen. Is that stupid? Kind of. The data is contained in a box with a glass front panel (called as display) the only way to get the data out/in is to press a button to “send or receive” it from one place to another. It is kind of ridiculous and maybe the largest legacy technology surviving right under our eyes everyday but ignoring by us for so long. 


Why do not we just pick up a piece of data, pictures, text, videos, colors, links right from the surface of screen and drop it onto another screen? That is simple, intuitive and elegant way to engage the data around us. Hard to say we didn't even think about it but all in Sci-Fi stories.

Guys, it is 2013, that can not stay in Sci-Fi anymore. We are exciting to announce that you can do that with Tagtal tStylus powered by OSP (On-Screen Port) now. And, OSP SDK is going to be open for all developers. 

This is NOT just another stylus but an innovation of human computer interaction. It is also our dream, a dream to have ability to pick, hold, and drop digital data as real matters, a dream we have imagined, novelized, filmed and posted for years.

Now it is going to be true with your support financially and mentally.If the goal is reached not only we give birth to tStylus but also breakout the jail of data and the ceiling above our imagination. 

 

Press

 

  

     

  

     

   

  

  

 

Gizmag

Tagtal tStylus lets you transfer data between device screens

Mashable
Stylus Moves Content From One Screen to Another

tStylus: Data Transfer between Screens at the Point of a Stylus
tStylus : le transfert de données à partir d’un écran se fait à la pointe du stylo

Tagtal tStylus Has Drag& Drop Copy & Paste: What You See is What You Copy

Crowdfund Insider  Crowdfunding Mailbox: Tagtal Stylus  
Canthostnes (Vietnam)  Bút truyền tải dữ liệu Tagtal
SBWire
Founder Linchuan Wang Launches Indiegogo Fundraiser for Tagtal tStylus, the First Digital Dropper

Desire This Tagtal tStylus Digital Dropper

 

Tagtal tStylus


tStylus is a connector of digital and physic world. With tStylus, you pick up everything you see or draw on the screen and drop down it to anywhere you point on screen just in one movement with no pairing at all. And surely, no shouting, shaking or bumping any more. 

The industry design is extremely simple and elegant. Not a single button on the body of tStylus except the power button at rear.
No need to press any button to switch among send, receive or other operations, all need to do is just touch the OSP with the tip of tStylus. The process of sending, receiving etc. will be conducted as intended and designed. 

With tStylus You Can

  1. Draw with any other drawing apps on iPad (no surprise)
  2. Pick up data from computer, tablet, smart phone
  3. Hold it and have a go
  4. Drop down data on tablet, smart phone 

Example App: A jewelry designer(up half) and a student(bottom half) are using tStylus with Tagtal Paper

 

 

Tagtal Paper

Tagtal Paper is a notebook application powered by OSP that can give you intuitive way to sketch your and share your ideas with your finger or tStylus. tStylus works as a chemical dropper to Pick Up and Drop the content displayed on different screens which are running Tagtal Paper, it makes you share information freely.

Without tStylus, Tagtal Paper is simply a normal notebook application, just let it record your great ideas. You can free up your mind on Tagtal Paper, drawing, editing and sharing. 

Tagtal Paper 1.0 is already available on App Store!  Free Download Today! The update is on the way to send AppStore for reviewing with more great features.

Compatible with iPad 2, iPad 3, New iPad, iPad Mini.

 

Tagtal Album

Tagtal Album is a picture viewing and sharing application powered by OSP.

You can access the albums and pictures of your Facebook/ Flickr /Picasa/ Instgram... or capture the wonderful moment whenever you want by launch camera in Tagtal Album. Most important is that you can pick up or drop down content in Tagtal Album.

Tagtal Album is under the review of AppStore and will be available on App Store soon.

Compatible with iPhone4, iPhone4S, iPod Touch.

 

Potential Apps 

OSP SDK is going to open to developers, that can be used to create more and more apps or integrated with existing apps (we are approaching more 3rd part app developers to empower more apps to support OSP). 

On Screen ID for Online Pay

You can also lock or unlock your private information with tStylus securely. You just simply use your tStylus to touch the locked content or login zone on the screen to access securely. The device will check the identity of your tStylus to make sure you have authority to copy or access the content. You do not have to entering your password to login. What you need to do is just keep your tStylus safe, as like a touch key. And all this identity check can be done without user’s interfering at all. We call it capacitive fingerprints of your tStylus. That makes human computer interaction is even more fluent and secure.

Sticker App

Video and audio editor

Games

"you call it..."

Tech Specs

Dimension: 137×10×13 (mm)

Battery：AAAA×2

Battery Life： >6 months

Compatibility:

iPhone4, iPhone4S, iPod Touch, iPad 2 iPad 3, New iPad, iPad Mini;

compatible with Regular Display for “Pick Up” Feature.

 

 

Open OSP API for Developers

We are going to make OSP API open for all developers. So once you get tStylus you can also create your own Apps or add unique features to your existing Apps with OSP API easily. The first preview of OSP SDK is going to open in September, 2013.

 

What We already Done and Where We Will Go

The team already spent a year to do some research and prototype tStylus. The first working prototype is built in 2012 coded as MARK. Since it is such an inspiring capacitive stylus in this world ever there is no clues at all in our way to make it real in the very beginning. In last 12 months, we overcame a lot of challenges or even difficulties and found a way out from darkness to turn the idea into a product.

What you see in the pictures or videos are ACTUAL injection samples, NOT PROTOTYPES made from 3D printers.

We designed and built 8 versions of PCB, software running in tStylus. OSP SDK for iOS, OSP Web App for Chrome (Windows and Mac OSX), Apps of Tagtal Paper, Tagtal Album...

And we even shoot and edited the pictures and videos by ourselves (btw, HD video editing is really a tough and 'impossible' job for my 13" MacBook Pro, but I still made it with couple of weeks).

How to use the money raised on Indiegogo

  1. Pay moldings of the parts
  2. Design and make package boxes
  3. FCC, CE certificats
  4. Purchase components for mass-production
  5. Buy some beers and chips

The Future

We're going to add more sensors into tStylus in next version according the demands from the market in near future. For instance, pressure and color sensor.

And we are also planning lots of great features which can not be disclosed yet.

Further more, OSP as a data communication channel can be used in vary situations along with other kind of hardware, e.g. gloves, toy cars which communicates with computers, tablets or phones, or more straight, screens. We just take tStylus as a beginning. What in our pipeline for next are even more incredible cool gears powered by OSP and you will be keep posted down the road.

 

Schedule

Jul - IndieGoGo Campaign

Aug - Pre-Production of tStylus and Optimize Apps (Web App, Tagtal Paper and Album)

Sep - OSP API Preview and more 3rd Part Apps Integration

Oct - Mass-Production preparation

Nov - FCC and CE certification

Dec - Production and Delivery

 

The Team in Chengdu, China

 

Contact Us

E-Mail: info@tagtal.com

Tweet us: @TagtalOfficial

Facebook us: facebook.com/TagtalOfficial

 

FAQ

1) What’s the difference between existing stylus and tStylus?

- tStylus can be used as regular capacitance stylus and be able to pick up and drop digital content on surface of screen like chemical dropper. 

2) What screen is tStylus compatible with?

- tStylus is compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch Screen, you can also Pick Up on regular screen. 

3) Can I use t-Stylus in Android?

- You can use tStylus on iOS at this moment; we’re now working on Android.

4) How to get a tStylus?

- Please fund this campaign and get tStylus on Indiegogo at this step, we will inform you on Twitter and Facebook if there is any news, please follow us.

5) How does it work?

- General speaking, Tagtal tStylus "pick or drop" URLs or other data (e.g. password, RGB values) through OSP. In most cases,  the actual data of the content will be download form the network in background.

6) Help URGENT Indiegogo has a bug at payment whereby it showed " Please enter your house number or house name"

- Close your browser, reopen the Indiegogo Tagtal page. Uncheck the box ‘same as shipping address’ BEFORE filling out card details, proceed to filling out all the fields that come up below and it will go through.

7) Where the data is stored?

-it is stored internally or in the cloud. tStylus has internal memory, URLs. password, Ids or other small data are stored in tStylus. We're developing UI app to navagate those data. As per cloud , we have our dedicated Tagtal portal servers and storage, currently all user data and history are stored on Tagtal servers. In the future, we will support configuration and connection to Cloud storages such as Dropbox etc., user may configure Cloud settings and choose to store data on their own account.

8) Is my data safe?


- The data transmission protocol is HTTP/HTTPS, and session control is enabled in the whole process. Login request is sent through HTTPS and data transmission is on HTTP with session control. All data are encrypted using AES algorithm before sending out and decrypted after received. On server side, encrypted data are directly stored into storage/DB, so even there is data leak, they are still encrypted and protected.

 

 

 

Photo and video credits: Linchuan Wang, the inventor of OSP and funder of Tagtal

story:
PRSRV is an 8,000 mAh power bank that you connect your phone with overnight instead of a normal mobile charger. Once your phone is fully charged the electric supply stops going to the phone and is redirected to the power bank. This preserves your battery life and keeps your phone from draining even faster over time.

PRSRV also has an ejectable credit card shaped battery that can be used away from the main power bank. This means you can take PRSRV where ever you go.

PRSRV is first power bank in the world that can be used in two different locations at the same time.

Do you charge your phone overnight?

Busy schedules force us to charge overnight, in turn causing damage to the battery and wasting electricity. Our current chargers are inefficiently charging our phones. The most efficient way to charge your phone is to unplug it when it is fully charged. The other way is using PRSRV.


Apple and Samsung both recommend taking off your phone cases while charging your phone – a highly inconvenient practice. The phone cases restrict the flow of heat and cause even more inefficiencies. PRSRV prevents overheating issues but redirecting electricity.

PRSRV stores surplus electricity for use later on. No other product effectively handles the problem of electric leakage while a mobile remains plugged in. 

Did you know?

Energy efficiency must be both large and small scale to overcome the biggest problem of our generation, the energy crisis.

Portability of PRSRV's removable battery:

If you are traveling and need lots of extra charge you can take the entire power bank with you, or, on a regular day you can eject the smaller, credit card shaped battery and carry it in your wallet.

and use it conveniently when you need to.

This feature makes PRSRV the first power bank in the world that can be used in two different locations at the same time. The removable battery can be used on its own, you can share the power bank with friends and family.

These days people carry way too many things, power banks and a bunch of wires...

PRSRV is simple....

1) You simply connect your phone through the USB cable into PRSRV.

2) PRSRV sits between your phone and the power source.

PRSRV does the rest...

 

  • Battery Capacity: Up to 8,000 mAh
  • Battery: Li-on
  • Base Charging Rate: quick charge 3.0
  • Removable Battery Charging Rate: 5.1V-2.1A
  • Number of ports: 2 = 1 base battery + 1 removable battery
  • Indication: 4 level LED indicator
  • Base Power Bank Dimensions: 110mm x 67mm x 12mm
  • Removable Battery Dimensions: 86mm x 54mm x 3mm
  • Total Weight: 190g
  • Operating Temperature: -10˚C to +45˚C

PRSRV's final sketches:

Placing of PCB's and batteries:

Main PCB (top view):

Main PCB (bottom view):

Ejectable battery PCB :

PRSRV (front view):

PRSRV (rear view):

PRSRV final outcome:

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page).

We are confident you will be able to enjoy PRSRV with your family and friends without a hitch. However, to cover our valued customers from any unlikely and unforeseen manufacturing defects or faults, every PRSRV comes with a 2 year warranty. 

A) One day while Hamza was forced into sitting next to a charging socket to charge his phone during the day he realized how inefficient this practice was in this high tech 21st century. He then pondered why this was not an issue for people and came to realize most people charge their phones overnight. Research led him to him believe there was no efficient way to charge your phone overnight unless one plugged the socket out in the middle of the night. His quest to start working on this idea ended in this first proof of concept working prototype.

B) Over the course of the next 6 months a team was formed and the conclusion was reached that educating consumers on this uneconomic and wasteful habit of over charging phones overnight would not be enough to get consumers attracted. After over fifty ideas considered to incorporate in this power bank; the team finally pivoted and decided to include an ejectable battery to carry just the right amount of charge with them - which according to research was 30%.

C) Over the next year the idea went into development and incorporating both an eco-friendly algorithm and the right amount of charge for a person to carry in the day. Our design experts came up with the most optimal solution. A credit card shaped battery that could be ejected out of the main power bank providing the optimal amount of charge to get by the day.

D) We hired the best product designers and indulged in different researches to provide the most optimal design for our consumers. It was this hard work and endeavor shown by the team that managed to help us raise our seed round of funding.

E) Our highly qualified research, development and design team have finalized the PCB's, schematics and components of PRSRV.

F) Final appearance of PRSRV 

With the help of our manufacturing partners we currently have a working prototype and we're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Getting product certifications
  • Tooling

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Designing packaging
  • Designing the supply chain process
  • Materials procurement
  • Production

PRSRV was created with the environment in mind, together our collective effort at the macro level can help address the energy crisis. PRSRV's energy efficient design also allows users to save money on electricity bills and phone replacements by preserving battery life. 

With PRSRV you are getting portability that no other power bank offers. Users can travel with the larger power bank which provides multiple full charges, or on a regular day use the removable credit card battery for convenient charging on the go. 

Do you remember the time someone borrowed your phone charger or power bank to charge their device? Wasn’t that annoying? PRSRV’s removable battery can be ejected and given to a person without needing to have them sit in the same vicinity. 

Why would I buy PRSRV over any other power bank?

PRSRV is a first of it’s kind power bank that uses eco-friendly technology to not only charge devices but prolong battery lifespan. PRSRV's energy efficient design protects mobile’s battery life and prevents overcharging by automatically cutting off electricity to the mobile once it is fully powered. Surplus power is then directed to charge the back up power bank, reducing energy consumption and efficiently charging first your mobile and then PRSRV.

PRSRV is the first power bank in the world that can be used in two different locations simultaneously, it includes a charging station as well as a removable battery that functions as a charger on the run!

I preordered a PRSRV, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at info@innovation-101.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

When is PRSRV expected to ship?

PRSRV's estimated shipping date is end June. Depending on your address your PRSRV's should reach your addresses by July.

How will my order be shipped?

Depending on your location, your PRSRV will be shipped to you using different couriers. We will provide a shipping notification and tracking information for each order. Due to the changes in courier regulations on lithium battery products, our shipping methods are subject to change.

How can I get in touch with your team?

If you want to get it touch with the PRSRV team for anything to do with the campaign, send us an email over to info@innovation-101.com or reach out to us on our social channels. We will be happy to help.

Why have you partnered with Indiegogo?

Partnering with Indiegogo allows us to kick start our production & get PRSRV to customers quicker than traditional methods.  As an international platform, Indiegogo can also get us exposure to customers across Europe and the U.S, which is important to us.

Why is there a delay from purchase to delivery?

We are a small company without limitless access to finance to build a supply of stock.  By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production runs which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis.

What will happen after the campaign?

PRSRV will be retailing at $99 after the campaign through our website - www.innovation-101.com. We will advise on delivery times for those orders at the time.

How much will PRSRV cost to buy on Indiegogo?

The sooner you buy, the less you pay!  We will be using a tiered pricing structure throughout the campaign with an initial price of $49.  Don’t worry though, for those of you who are a little late to the show PRSRV’s final campaign price will still be lower than the RRP after the campaign concludes.

I’m having trouble making a payment. Who should I reach out to?

We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payments specialists will be able to assist you within 24 hours.

If I have questions, how can I reach your team? 

Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! 
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
For all other questions regarding PRSRV, contact us at info@innovation-101.com.

Does PRSRV come in any other colors?

PRSRV is currently only offered in one color.  Since the beginning of the campaign we’ve received suggestions for additional colors of PRSRV. Initially, our production capacity could not allow us to entertain the idea of offering new colors, but the success of the campaign could make it an option.

As we don't want to slow down production of PRSRV, we will initiate research for different colors after the campaign and will keep you updated on our progress and timeline for production.
story_txt:
PRSRV is an 8,000 mAh power bank that you connect your phone with overnight instead of a normal mobile charger. Once your phone is fully charged the electric supply stops going to the phone and is redirected to the power bank. This preserves your battery life and keeps your phone from draining even faster over time.PRSRV also has an ejectable credit card shaped battery that can be used away from the main power bank. This means you can take PRSRV where ever you go.PRSRV is first power bank in the world that can be used in two different locations at the same time.Do you charge your phone overnight?Busy schedules force us to charge overnight, in turn causing damage to the battery and wasting electricity. Our current chargers are inefficiently charging our phones. The most efficient way to charge your phone is to unplug it when it is fully charged. The other way is using PRSRV.Apple and Samsung both recommend taking off your phone cases while charging your phone – a highly inconvenient practice. The phone cases restrict the flow of heat and cause even more inefficiencies. PRSRV prevents overheating issues but redirecting electricity.PRSRV stores surplus electricity for use later on. No other product effectively handles the problem of electric leakage while a mobile remains plugged in. Did you know?Energy efficiency must be both large and small scale to overcome the biggest problem of our generation, the energy crisis.Portability of PRSRV's removable battery:If you are traveling and need lots of extra charge you can take the entire power bank with you, or, on a regular day you can eject the smaller, credit card shaped battery and carry it in your wallet.and use it conveniently when you need to.This feature makes PRSRV the first power bank in the world that can be used in two different locations at the same time. The removable battery can be used on its own, you can share the power bank with friends and family.These days people carry way too many things, power banks and a bunch of wires...PRSRV is simple....1) You simply connect your phone through the USB cable into PRSRV.2) PRSRV sits between your phone and the power source.PRSRV does the rest...

story:
Update - September 14th

We added a video demo of the product under the Gallery tab.

Introduction

We believe that the Emoticon Toy is going to change the way people communicate thru social media by allowing them to send personalized animated emoticon messages.  It will be a new way to send a heartfelt message to your sweetie, an apology to a friend, a note of encouragement to a classmate and so many other things.  We are so close to releasing this fun tool on Facebook, but we need your help to add the finishing touches.

With the development of Double Barrel Digital’s tool, Xpress, we are able to create rapid lip sync animation in any language with unlimited expressions and emotions so much quicker than was ever possible before.  However, due to limitations with our current funding we were only able to build and animate a small number of messages at this time.  We are looking for $11K to complete and launch the tool, and add to our collection of messages so that there’s a message for everyone.  

Who are we?

We are a game/application developer and an artist/animator with 30 years experience developing games, animation and applications.

John Molinari, Lead Software Engineer

John started working in computer graphics in 1989, at Time Arts, Inc., in Santa Rosa, CA and since then has worked on Lego Land, EA Sports Madden Football and Disney games. John's experience in this space is vast and includes working as a web developer, web designer, QA manager, animator, artist, producer and director.

Tom McKeon, Lead Creative Director

Tom studied painting and photography at the School of The Art Institute of Chicago, and film making at Columbia College of Chicago. He has worked in advertising at Leo Burnett and on projects for clients like McDonalds, Nintendo, Samsonite, United and Heinz. He has won awards for his work as an Animator / Director / Web Designer / and Fine Digital Painter.

Both Tom and John have extensive experience in storytelling and digital technology production. Our talents led us to develop a groundbreaking new way of distributing digital media in a social animated app called the Emoticon Toy.

How did we create the The Emoticon Toy?

We believe that animation should be built by animators, not programmers.

How can an animated messaging and storytelling product be used in a social environment without an animator? It can't. Programmers can't make quality animation; you need custom animation which takes a long time.

How can a small company generate the enormous custom animation needed to make an animated consumer messaging product with a limited budget? It can't. Unless, it has an unfair advantage; meet Double Barrel Digital Xpress. You can check it out here: 

With the use of our patented product Double Barrel Digital's Xpress, we can now produce fast custom talking animation with full eXPRESSions and emotions.

We’ll use Xpress often to generate new extensions for the Emoticon Toy.  Extensions will include fun new characters and voices relevant to current events, sports, politics, entertainment and other things.

It takes about 2 days for an artist to draw an Xpress Character in Adobe Flash Professional. With Xpress, we can create about 800 phrases a week with one animator.  We believe we have a new product model that can be used to distribute new media which combines the entertaining value of a game and the social engagement necessary in today’s market.

Consumers and professionals of all ages will love using the Emoticon Toy and will return every week to see what's new.

How will we use the funds?

We will use the funds to finish the basic emoticon character to add a lot more animations. We want the character to say everything that a user would potentially want to tell another user; from greetings, to invitations, to happy birthday messages.  We also plan to target specific genres like music, sports, romance and politics.

If we exceed our goal, the extra money we raise will be spent on hiring voice over talent, artists, and animators to create additional characters and we’ll extend the tool to port to new devices.

What is the potential impact of this tool?

The Emoticon Toy, supported by Xpress production, is a breakthrough in 2D animation due to its production speed and delivery medium. Our technology will advance the quality of 2D animation for messaging and provide a fun and engaging way to communicate your message to your friends, family, colleagues, customers and the community. The Emoticon Toy is easy enough for your child to enjoy and powerful enough for professionals to use in social campaigns.  It will give you the cool and powerful impact you need to get your message across. With your help, we can make history!

Claim your perk on the right of this page to make this project happen!

What you get

 Here are some sample new Emoticon Characters

Other ways you can help

If you think this looks cool please spread the word, even if you can't contribute.

  • Share this campaign on Facebook, or tweet about it.  There are handy Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page.
  • Follow the Emoticon Toy on Twitter.
  • Like Double Barrel Digital on Facebook.
  • Check out our Blog for more information about the Emoticon Toy.
  • Tell your friends, your kids, your partner and your colleagues about our products and IndieGoGo campaign.

story:
Thanks to all the contributors and all who helped us take our new product forward. We are in talks with several leading retailers and online stores, where you can find the Zeos Screen Protector. In the meantime, if you wish to purchase one, you can get it at our online factory store by clicking the url below:

www.ZeosDirect.com


Introducing the world's first Smartphone, Tablet and Digital Camera screen protector that is made with Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) glass, that is laser cut, bubble-free, shatter-proof, re-seatable and re-usable, among other things!

For a complete list of compatible models of phones, tablets and digital cameras, please see the chart below.

Our Premium Screen Protectors are available for different digital devices in different thicknesses.

We started out by using ultra-thin Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) Glass. Then added high quality materials including a special high performance acrylic adhesive and silicone coating, which makes the screen protector re-seatable and re-usable, among other things. You can even gently wash it and re-use it! Then we laser cut it (an industry first) for an exact match to your model of smartphone, tablet or digital camera. And for smartphones, we gave it a beautiful beveled edge, so it does not stick out like a sore thumb on the sides! End result of going into all these finer details, is a screen protector that fits perfectly to your phone/tablet/digital camera model, looks stunning and is tough. Really tough!! (Mohs scale of hardness 8-9H). And is scratch proof (even steel cannot scratch it) and shatter proof and the list goes on and on. Bottom line is, if you drop your device and it lands on the screen, this screen protector will save the user lots of money, time and the hassle of replacing it. 

After the initial .40 mm thin prototype was ready and after we tested them, we decided to take it one step further, and made even thinner ones by making .33 mm and .28 mm ones! And finally an ultra-thin one - an unbelievable .20 mm thin! All made with Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) glass.

(Just FYI, even though the hardness of all 4 versions is the same, the maximum protection is achieved with the .40 mm and .33 mm ones).

Protect the screen from scratches and even items dropping on your iPad/Tablet screen.

Simple self adsorbing* installation

We even thought of a way to make sure the installation is easy, by having a positioning sticker (for smartphones), so you never get it on wrong! (Though even after this, if installed incorrectly, remember, this screen protector is re-seatable. Simply take it off and re-seat it!
(* adsorb: The process by which an ultra-thin layer of one substance forms on the surface of another substance.)

Installation Guide for SmartPhones. Installation is Simple, Easy & Fast.

Installation guide for Digital Cameras too, is also ready for mass printing.


Current phone, tablet and digital camera's our new product works with. We're continuously adding new models and will continue to do so.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mix and match for tons of possible color combinations between your phone color, case color and our screen protector color, for your iPhone 5c!! Of course, you can use them for your iPhone 5 or 5s as well!

Colors to be available for iPhone 5c SmartPhones! Feel free to use them on your Apple iPhone 5 and 5s as well.

iPhone 5c matched colors are: Green, Blue, Yellow, Pink and White.

PLEASE NOTE: 

Color screen protectors are available only in the 0.40mm 0.33mm and 0.20mm versions.

If you pledge for a smartphone screen protector, and need a color screen protector for an iPhone (at this time color ones are available only for iPhone 5c only), just go ahead and pledge for the reward. We will send out a survey at the end of the campaign, asking you which phone make/model you have and which color you desire, if you wish to get a color one. We will ship the right color for you. Available only for iPhone 5 at this time.

We've designed all the packaging inserts. And even made several prototypes of the smartphone case box in a clear transparent hard plastic material, that provides adequate protection and also to show that our product is made of glass :)

Perks:

Above rewards are for screen protectors for the 3 kinds of devices mentioned. Phones, Digital Cameras and Tablets not included :)

Manufacturing Plan

Once we designed the product and got suppliers for the components in place, part of making a project a success, is to have a solid manufacturing plan in place. We've signed an agreement with a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in China, to make the actual product for us. And we also have a packaging company in place, who will mass produce our retail packaging and deliver it to the factory, as and when needed. Although one of us plans to go there on a regular basis, we also have a local representative there, to take care of day to day things.

We Need Your Support!

So we've now got all things in place, and got to this stage using our own funds and resources. We now need your help to make this project a reality. The factory we have partnered with, has MOQ's (Minimum Order Quantities) for a production run, and we would like to get our first order out to them, with your help. And of course, we could also use your help in getting the word out, during and after the project has ended. Thank you.

Risks and challenges

We've overcome many challenges to get to this point, where we can go live with our first production run, and offer it to you on Indiegogo. We have a great team of dedicated professionals, with a mix of those who like to keep it simple (in design and engineering), and others, who think outside the box! We have a set of reliable suppliers, though in rare instances, they may temporarily run out of product, but we do not expect that to happen very often, and plan to keep some raw materials on hand at all times. We've partnered with an excellent factory, and as we plan to make regular visits, and have a local representative to help as and when needed, we will make sure our product quality is never compromised and delivery timelines are met.

We've allocated extra time in our timeline, to ensure that we can deliver the rewards on the promised date, if not earlier. If we're lucky enough to exceed our project goal, not only will we start production before the campaign ends, we'll also have the factory run overtime, to make sure all backers get their rewards on time.

We know that it is possible we might encounter some unforeseen challenges along the way. We are fully committed to this project, and will keep you posted, if any such thing happens.

Thank you once again, for your help in trying to make this product a reality!
story_txt:
Thanks to all the contributors and all who helped us take our new product forward. We are in talks with several leading retailers and online stores, where you can find the Zeos Screen Protector. In the meantime, if you wish to purchase one, you can get it at our online factory store by clicking the url below:www.ZeosDirect.comIntroducing the world's first Smartphone, Tablet and Digital Camera screen protector that is made with Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) glass, that is laser cut, bubble-free, shatter-proof, re-seatable and re-usable, among other things!For a complete list of compatible models of phones, tablets and digital cameras, please see the chart below.Our Premium Screen Protectors are available for different digital devices in different thicknesses.We started out by using ultra-thin Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) Glass. Then
 added high quality materials including a special high performance 
acrylic adhesive and silicone coating, which makes the screen protector 
re-seatable and re-usable, among other things. You can even gently wash 
it and re-use it! Then we laser cut it (an industry first) for an exact 
match to your model of smartphone, tablet or digital camera. And for 
smartphones, we gave it a beautiful beveled edge, so it does not stick 
out like a sore thumb on the sides! End result of going into all these 
finer details, is a screen protector that fits perfectly to your 
phone/tablet/digital camera model, looks stunning and is tough. Really 
tough!! (Mohs scale of hardness 8-9H). And is scratch proof (even steel 
cannot scratch it) and shatter proof and the list goes on and on. Bottom
 line is, if you drop your device and it lands on the screen, this 
screen protector will save the user lots of money, time and the hassle 
of replacing it. After the initial .40 mm thin prototype was ready and after we tested 
them, we decided to take it one step further, and made even thinner ones
 by making .33 mm and .28 mm ones! And finally an ultra-thin one - an 
unbelievable .20 mm thin! All made with Corning (TM) Gorilla (TM) glass.(Just FYI, even though the hardness of all 4 versions is the same,
 the maximum protection is achieved with the .40 mm and .33 mm ones).Protect the screen from scratches and even items dropping on your iPad/Tablet screen.Simple self adsorbing* installationWe even thought of a way 
to make sure the installation is easy, by having a positioning sticker (for smartphones), 
so you never get it on wrong! (Though even after this, if installed incorrectly, remember, this screen protector is re-seatable. 
Simply take it off and re-seat it!(* adsorb: The process by which an ultra-thin layer of one substance forms on the surface of another substance.)Installation Guide for SmartPhones. Installation is Simple, Easy & Fast.Installation guide for Digital Cameras too, is also ready for mass printing.Current phone, tablet and digital camera's our new product works with. 
We're continuously adding new models and will continue to do so.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Mix and match for tons of possible color combinations between your phone
 color, case color and our screen protector color, for your iPhone 5c!! 
Of course, you can use them for your iPhone 5 or 5s as well!Colors to be available for iPhone 5c SmartPhones! Feel free to use them on your Apple iPhone 5 and 5s as well.iPhone 5c matched colors are: Green, Blue, Yellow, Pink and White.PLEASE NOTE: Color screen protectors are available only in the 0.40mm 0.33mm and 0.20mm versions.If you pledge for a smartphone screen protector, and need a color screen protector for an iPhone (at this time color ones are available only for iPhone 5c only),
 just go ahead and pledge for the reward. We will send out a survey at 
the end of the campaign, asking you which phone make/model you have and 
which color you desire, if you wish to get a color one. We will ship the
 right color for you. Available only for iPhone 5 at this time.We've designed all the packaging inserts. And even made several 
prototypes of the smartphone case box in a clear transparent hard 
plastic material, that provides adequate protection and also to show 
that our product is made of glass :)Perks:Above rewards are for screen protectors for the 3 kinds of devices 
mentioned. Phones, Digital Cameras and Tablets not included :)Manufacturing PlanOnce we designed the product and got 
suppliers for the components in place, part of making a project a 
success, is to have a solid manufacturing plan in place. We've signed an
 agreement with a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in China, to 
make the actual product for us. And we also have a packaging company in 
place, who will mass produce our retail packaging and deliver it to the 
factory, as and when needed. Although one of us plans to go there on a 
regular basis, we also have a local representative there, to take care 
of day to day things.We Need Your Support!So we've now got all things in place, and got to this stage using our
 own funds and resources. We now need your help to make this project a 
reality. The factory we have partnered with, has MOQ's (Minimum Order 
Quantities) for a production run, and we would like to get our first 
order out to them, with your help. And of course, we could also use your
 help in getting the word out, during and after the project has ended. Thank you.Risks and challengesWe've overcome many challenges to get to this point, where we can go 
live with our first production run, and offer it to you on Indiegogo. 
We have a great team of dedicated professionals, with a mix of those who
 like to keep it simple (in design and engineering), and others, who 
think outside the box! We have a set of reliable suppliers, though in 
rare instances, they may temporarily run out of product, but we do not 
expect that to happen very often, and plan to keep some raw materials on 
hand at all times. We've partnered with an excellent factory, and as we 
plan to make regular visits, and have a local representative to help as 
and when needed, we will make sure our product quality is never 
compromised and delivery timelines are met.
We've allocated extra time in our timeline, to ensure that we can 
deliver the rewards on the promised date, if not earlier. If we're lucky
 enough to exceed our project goal, not only will we start production 
before the campaign ends, we'll also have the factory run overtime, to 
make sure all backers get their rewards on time.
We know that it is possible we might encounter some unforeseen 
challenges along the way. We are fully committed to this project, and 
will keep you posted, if any such thing happens.
Thank you once again, for your help in trying to make this product a reality!

story:
OMNIMOBILE Series

The latest innovation from Omnicharge brings you a range of powerful fast charging power banks, all in a small compact form factor. Equipped with advanced USB-C and wireless charging technologies, we offer unparalleled power and charging speeds for your everyday mobile lifestyle.

WHY OMNI MOBILE?

Our goal with the Mobile line is to take our best Omni features and pack them into an everyday affordable package. We wish to make Omnicharge something that anyone can feel comfortable carrying around, while still being good enough for professionals and techies.

PAST SUCCESSES

With three crowdfunded products under our belt, we are not new to the concept of Crowdfunding. With very few delays on past campaigns and the Ultimate campaign even starting fulfilment a month early, we are confident that we can, yet again, create a campaign that will be on time, with high-quality products.

POWERFUL LAPTOP CHARGING

Our two larger models are designed to be a portable solution for your laptop, tablets, phones and more. Capable of 60W USB-C output, this is the perfect power companion for your mobile lifestyle.

ALL NEW MOBILE ACCESSORIES

The smaller two models are designed as a portable everyday powerbank for you to carry around in your pocket. With fast charging USB ports and a sleek compact form-factor, these are great devices for everyday use.

NOW AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS

Through the last few crowdfunding campaigns we've heard many of you ask for our products in white. We've heard your suggestions, and are happy to bring you the Omni Mobile line in an all new premium white color.

BRAND NEW 100W USB-C

Recently we've been receiving many requests to develop a 100W USB-C Omnicharge. Our engineers have been hard at work, and have finally cracked the puzzle. We will be implementing this new technology on our refreshed Omni 20 USB-C along with 10W wireless charging. To show our appreciation, we are offering a discounted price here on IndieGoGo before bringing it to retail.

OMNIMOBILE 25,600

MAXIMUM CAPACITY

Loaded with a 25,600 mAh battery you never need to worry about being stranded without power. With a multitude of power output options, you can charge any of your professional devices you carry on a daily basis.

BEST IN CLASS USB-C

Our PD enabled USB-C port can provide up to 60W output and 40W input. Compared with similar products, it can provide nearly twice the wattage output. Capable of powering all modern USB-C laptops including, Dell, Apple, Chromebooks and Lenovo.

ULTIMATE CHARGING EFFICIENCY

With the four most commonly used DC voltages, the Omni Mobile 25,600 can directly charge your laptop without needing your laptop charger. This portable and lightweight charging solution provides the ultimate in charging efficiency.

25,600 mAh
CAPACITY

With a massive 25,600 mAh capacity, the Omni Mobile 25,600 is at the upper limit of what you can bring on Airplanes. With our top-tier battery cells, you can fully charge nearly any laptop.

OMNIMOBILE 12,800

POCKETSIZED LAPTOP POWER

With a high powered USB-C port, the Omni Mobile 12,800 mAh is our smallest laptop power bank. With the added benefit of wireless charging, you can leave your charging cables at home and efficiently charge your phone just by placing it on the Omnicharge.

NO CABLES, NO PROBLEM

With our easy to use wireless charging, you can feel safe leaving your phone-cables and chargers at home. Our wireless charger supports a wide range of phones and wireless accessories, giving you a truly wireless experience no matter where you are.

HIGH POWERED USB-C

With a high powered USB-C port the Omni Mobile 12,800 now brings you one step closer to a world where a single port can be used to charge laptops, tablets, gaming devices and more. The Mobile 12,800 has an ideal capacity for smaller 13'' USB-C laptops and ultrabooks, but has enough power to charge even large 15'' MacBooks and other laptops.

OMNIMOBILE 9,600

PORTABLE FAST CHARGING

Power up your mobile devices with the Omni Mobile 9,600. With this 9,600 mAh pocket-sized battery you can get over two full phone charges or a full charge to an iPad. With our advanced USB-C technology you can fast charge both your phone and Omnicharge at top speed.

FAST CHARGING

Charge your mobile devices with our high powered USB-C port. Capable of outputting up to 18W of power, you can charge up your mobile devices at lightning speed.

OMNIMOBILE 3,200

EVERYDAY PORTABLE POWER

With its compact form factor and affordable price, the Mobile 3,200 is the perfect power companion for everyday use. This may be the smallest power bank in the mobile series, but it still packs a punch and can provide a full charge for your phone.

REMOVABLE CABLES

Our unique cable design provides a stylish yet practical method of charging. With an integrated cable you no longer need to worry about forgetting your charging cable at home.

OMNI20 USB-C 100W

20,100 mAh

Loaded with a 20,100 mAh battery you never need to worry about being stranded without power. With a multitude of power output options, you can easily charge all your USB-C devices, as well as wirelessly charge your compatible phone.

BEST IN CLASS USB-C

Our PD enabled USB-C port can provide up to 100W output and 45W input. Compared with similar products, it can provide nearly twice the wattage output. Capable of powering all modern USB-C laptops including, Dell, Apple, Chromebooks and Lenovo.

USB HUB FOR
FILE TRANSFER

With the USB hub you can seamlessly sync and manage your files on multiple devices. Turn 1 USB-C port into 3 high-speed outlets, freeing up your laptop ports. Simply plug your laptop into the hub port, and activate hub mode to transfer files between devices.

WIRELESS CHARGING

With our easy to use wireless charging, you can feel safe leaving your phone-cables and chargers at home. Our wireless charger supports a wide range of phones and wireless accessories, giving you a truly wireless experience no matter where you are.

PRODUCT COMPARISON

GENERAL TECH SPECS

Expertly designed from the ground up.

story:
The Best Of It's Kind

* Supported on IPhone and Android  

* Download the app and start decorating

* Free shipping all over the globe  

* Quick and simple to use  


We Need 18,000 for :

- 8 permits 

- Press & publicity

- Programmers 

- T-shirts


  How to use:

- Download the app  

- Take a photo of a room you want do decorate  

- The app find's you the best furniture you could use in that room, but it offers you to manualy enter the measurments of the wanted piece of furniture  

- You pick the furniture which you think is the best suitable for the room - Pick the color and the material of the furniture piece  

- After you pick the furniture you like, the app offers you the best suitable price and a store where you can buy it  

Why Funama?

 Istead of hiring architect's and givin away lot of money for traveling from store to store, Funama is quick and money saving app for decorating homes or any other buildings, all you need is your mobile device and you become your own architect.

Auto cad, Mega cat and similar programs are very expensive and for profesional use . It takes long time to learn to use them, so we are developing a new program who is going to be much simpler for sketching furniture and it will be available to everyone who want's to do this by themself. The program will enable producing the bill for needed materials for the project.

Program is going to have a base of pre-manufactured product's of  standard dimensions whereby you will be able do decorate the whole apartment, with the lovest budget. 

Funama invitation

Funama invites all partners, privateer's to join as providers for  production of this app, because we want to enable the users competitive, quality and wide offer on the market.

story:
Order now at - www.gethook.io


Press mentions!

Well, there is not much to talk about. Current solutions are both crazy expensive and difficult to setup. That's why we created Hook! 

What is Hook?

Hook is a new device that makes inexpensive remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets Smart - to enable Home Automation on a Budget.


These remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets are already commercially available. You can buy them from Amazon, Costco and Home Depot. They come with a remote control. An appliance plugged into the outlet adapter or a bulb screwed into the socket can be turned on/off with press of the button on the remote. They are really inexpensive - often as low as $5/ea in pack of five. They are not line-of-sight and work through walls. 

Hook makes these outlets adapters and bulb sockets Smart. All you have to do is clone the remote control to the Hook app (see setup video). It's fun and one-time! And the best part, you only need one Hook for your home. 

Existing appliances and lighting in the home like lamps, light bulbs, coffeemaker, window fan - anything that is powered by electricity - can now be controlled with your phone from anywhere in the world.


Hook works with IFTTT (via Particle channel). You can schedule operations of routine tasks like operating holiday lights between sunset and sunrise and create rule-based scenarios like turning your coffee maker 'on' when the alarm goes off.

Lastly, some technical bit. Hook is a RF-to-WiFi hub with remote cloning technology built-in. It works over 315MHz and 433MHz RF frequency bands. Devices like remote controlled outlet adapters, bulb sockets, LED strip controllers, ceiling fan remotes, motorized blinds, window fans and space heaters work on the same frequency. WiFi chip in Hook is supplied by particle.io - this is the reason Hook  is easy to use and incredibly reliable!

Outlet adapters or Bulb Sockets - What to get? For anything you will plug in to an electrical outlet get an outlet adapter. For lamps, get outlet adapters. Bulb sockets work best with ceiling lights. 

Hook does not ship with a USB wall adapter. You can use ANY standard wall charger like an old iPhone charger to power Hook. Or get one from us that's guaranteed to work with Hook! Just add $5 to your pledge.  

Why USB? USB helped us keep costs down while allowing tinkerer in you to get access to Hook's core.

Remote controls? Yes, kits come with the original remote control(s) for times when you pressing the button is far more satisfying that tap on your phone.

If you pledge for one of the kits, you have two options to get part of your perk:  

Get the outlets and sockets early (Aug '15).Get started with home automation sooner and do the pairing yourself with Hook when it ships (it's simple, fun, and one-time). Hook will still arrive around Dec. '15.

Get everything pre-programmed with Hook (Dec. '15). The outlets and bulb sockets come pre-programmed and ready to go with your Hook.

You don't have to decide now. We will get your preference in the survey sent out after the campaign ends.


  • 1. Connect Hook to a USB power source - an old iPhone USB adapter will do.
  • 2. Connect lamps and appliances to outlet adapters, and light bulbs to bulb sockets.
  • 3. Pair the remote(s) - Skip this step if you are getting them pre-programmed.
  • 4. Enjoy the benefits of a smart home! 

The Hook app will be available for iOS and Android when the Hook ships. It controls outlet adapters and bulb sockets connected to the Hook. It monitors the state of appliances and lights connected to the outlet adapters and bulb sockets even when you don't use the app to control them. You can still use the remote to control. The app makes it easier to remember your devices by allowing you to name them. It also enables simple rule-based scenarios through IFTTT (now IF). Hook app will also have machine learning built-in so that it can learn to serve you better. For example, it can notify you if you accidentally leave an appliance On, like a space heater or curling iron. When you get more outlet adapters and bulb sockets, the app allows you to clone the new remote to your phone.

Imagine a cold winter night. You are all cozy in your bed. You notice that you forgot to turn off the stupid lamp. You don't want to get out of the bed to turn it off, yet it is bothering you...

This is what exactly happened to our Anigo multiple times! He found the remote controlled outlets at his local Home Depot. He thought they could solve the problem. But, alas...every now and then, he would lose the remote. What he always had with home was his phone. An idea was born - connect these outlets to the Internet so that the lamp can be controlled with a phone. 

Anigo met Rahil and found that even had a similar experience, but the smart electronics whiz that Rahil is, he was already a step ahead. Thanks to the internet and wonderful people at Particle community, he had built the first version of Hook with wires soldered to the remote itself!

However, with the 'Hack', Hook was still far from a commercial solution. What we discovered next became the essence of Hook’s innovation. We figured a way so that everybody can do the 'hack' - and make any existing remote controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets SMART.

The Hook project became a full-fledged team when Max and Robert joined the effort. We founded Hack-a-Joe Labs LLC, filed a patent for RF-to-WiFi remote cloning technology, and started working heads-down to make Hook a reality.

At this moment, we are actively making minor tweaks and improvements and finalizing the design for production. We did a successful Kickstarter campaign to validate the idea. We have 30 prototypes with our alpha testers and have been getting great feedback. Our app and web service are being developed in collaboration with our partner SimplifyS. 

Hook has partnered with Etekcity and GGI International to bring exclusive pricing of remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets to our backers. We have partnered with Simplifys software solutions to build the entire software stack and the iOS and Android apps.


We have tested with every remote controlled outlet adapter and bulb socket out there to make sure Hook supports them. If you have something that you aren't sure about, let us know and we'd happy to look into it. 

In theory, Hook should be able to connect any device working on RF 315/433MHz to the Internet as long as it has static codes. Car remotes work on same frequency - but they will not work. Some old garage door openers might. 

Other than outlet adapter and bulb socket, following have been tested to work with Hook and some community-suggested projects:

  • LED strips with RF controller - Do cool lighting that change color to suit your circadian rhythm
  • Wireless door chimes - Make an internet-enabled doorbell
  • Ceiling fan - Smart ceiling fan that turns off when Nest via IFTTT tells its cold
Motorized blinds like Somfy RTS may work. There is still some work needed to ensure compatibility. 



Help us spread the word-- share Hook with your social media followers and friends and family! We believe that if we can start a loud enough conversation, we can change the home automation industry! 

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Youtube


We did a Kickstarter campaign last month to raise capital to fund our first manufacturing run. We got much love and support. Our gears are in full motion, and it would be great if we could meet even higher quantities for manufacturing. This is where this campaign comes in. 

All the contributions made through the Indiegogo campaign will make into the first manufacturing run for delivery in Dec 2015. 


Hook campaign on Kickstarter ended on May 27, 2015. We are opening for pre-orders through this campaign.

Risks and challenges

Indiegogo campaign is much like writing Phd general exam proposal (personal experience on our team). Before proposing your thesis aims, you identify all the risks, all the things that could go wrong and then take proactive steps to iron out the concerns or prevent them altogether. We have applied the same approach in bringing this campaign to you.

Even the most prepared can fall short. This is especially true for hardware projects. We do understand that delays and issues can occur at any stage of production. However, we want to assure you we have a unique access to resources and advisers who want to build Hook as much as we do, and we believe this synergy is key to success.

Lastly, if an unexpected scenario does occur, we do promise to keep absolute transparency and to keep our backers always in loop. We are committed to bringing you the best possible product to our backers.

FAQs

1. How many devices can I connect to one Hook?

We have tested with 15 devices without interference causing a problem. We believe you can do more depending on your surroundings and ambiance.

2. What RF frequencies does Hook support?

315 MHz and 433 MHz

3. What other RF devices does Hook work with?

Hook works with any RF remote that has static codes. Some examples include motorized window blinds*, LED strip controllers, ceiling fans, wireless door chimes and some garage door openers. Pretty much any remote that doesn't have the "eye" at the front, as in IR. Of course, Hook will work with your existing remote-controlled outlets and bulb sockets. Hook does not work with Hampton Bay ceiling fans yet.

4. Do these bulb sockets support dimming?

No, this model is just on/off.

5. Why can't people from the EU buy the kit options?

Homes in the EU operate with different plugs and voltages than North America. RF remote-controlled outlets and socket adapters are available and work with Hook, but not through our collaborators on this campaign. Feel free to buy a Hook and purchase RF devices separately!

6. I have a big house, do I need more than one Hook?

No! We have tested it on a Multi-Storied 2000 SqFt house and we were able to control all the outlets and sockets with just one Hook. You are always welcome to buy more Hooks and give them to your friends and family or put them in your vacation home (not from personal experience btw, must be nice!).

7. I already have a home automation product like NEST, SmartThings, NEEO. How will the Hook work with them?

IFTTT makes Hook talk to all the awesome smart home products out there

8. Why does Hook have a USB plug?

Hook receives its power by USB. We chose USB (as opposed to a built-in outlet plug) to keep costs down and allow easy access for tinkerers. You can use a standard USB adapter you have around the house or get one from us with Hook

9. I don't see an option to purchase a USB adapter. How do I get one with my Hook?

Just add $5 to your pledge amount and we'll ship a USB adapter with your Hook.

10. Does Hook only work with these particular brands of outlet adapter and bulb socket?

No. Hook works with almost every remote controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets that are out there.

11. I don't have a smartphone, would the Hook work for me?

Yes, we have you covered. The Hook can be controlled with a Web App as well.

12. Did you use a green screen for the Machu Picchu shot?

No, Robert was really there! We wouldn't deceive you like that ;-)
story_txt:
Order now at - www.gethook.io
Press mentions!Well, there is not much to talk about. Current solutions are both crazy expensive and difficult to setup. That's why we created Hook! What is Hook?Hook is a new device that makes inexpensive remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets Smart - to enable Home Automation on a Budget.These remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets are already commercially available. You can buy them from Amazon, Costco and Home Depot. They come with a remote control. An appliance plugged into the outlet adapter or a bulb screwed into the socket can be turned on/off with press of the button on the remote. They are really inexpensive - often as low as $5/ea in pack of five. They are not line-of-sight and work through walls. Hook makes these outlets adapters and bulb sockets Smart. All you have to do is clone the remote control to the Hook app (see setup video). It's fun and one-time! And the best part, you only need one Hook for your home. Existing appliances and lighting in the home like lamps, light bulbs, coffeemaker, window fan - anything that is powered by electricity - can now be controlled with your phone from anywhere in the world.Hook works with IFTTT (via Particle channel). You can schedule operations of routine tasks like operating holiday lights between sunset and sunrise and create rule-based scenarios like turning your coffee maker 'on' when the alarm goes off.Lastly, some technical bit. Hook is a RF-to-WiFi hub with remote cloning technology built-in. It works over 315MHz and 433MHz RF frequency bands. Devices like remote controlled outlet adapters, bulb sockets, LED strip controllers, ceiling fan remotes, motorized blinds, window fans and space heaters work on the same frequency. WiFi chip in Hook is supplied by particle.io - this is the reason Hook  is easy to use and incredibly reliable!Outlet adapters or Bulb Sockets - What to get? For anything you will plug in to an electrical outlet get an outlet adapter. For lamps, get outlet adapters. Bulb sockets work best with ceiling lights. Hook does not ship with a USB wall adapter. You can use ANY standard wall charger like an old iPhone charger to power Hook. Or get one from us that's guaranteed to work with Hook! Just add $5 to your pledge.  Why USB? USB helped us keep costs down while allowing tinkerer in you to get access to Hook's core.Remote controls? Yes, kits come with the original remote control(s) for times when you pressing the button is far more satisfying that tap on your phone.If you pledge for one of the kits, you have two options to get part of your perk:  Get the outlets and sockets early (Aug '15).Get started with home automation sooner and do the pairing yourself with Hook when it ships (it's simple, fun, and one-time). Hook will still arrive around Dec. '15.Get everything pre-programmed with Hook (Dec. '15). The outlets and bulb sockets come pre-programmed and ready to go with your Hook.You don't have to decide now. We will get your preference in the survey sent out after the campaign ends.
1. Connect Hook to a USB power source - an old iPhone USB adapter will do.
2. Connect lamps and appliances to outlet adapters, and light bulbs to bulb sockets.
3. Pair the remote(s) - Skip this step if you are getting them pre-programmed.
4. Enjoy the benefits of a smart home! 
The Hook app will be available for iOS and Android when the Hook ships. It controls outlet adapters and bulb sockets connected to the Hook. It monitors the state of appliances and lights connected to the outlet adapters and bulb sockets even when you don't use the app to control them. You can still use the remote to control. The app makes it easier to remember your devices by allowing you to name them. It also enables simple rule-based scenarios through IFTTT (now IF). Hook app will also have machine learning built-in so that it can learn to serve you better. For example, it can notify you if you accidentally leave an appliance On, like a space heater or curling iron. When you get more outlet adapters and bulb sockets, the app allows you to clone the new remote to your phone.Imagine a cold winter night. You are all cozy in your bed. You notice that you forgot to turn off the stupid lamp. You don't want to get out of the bed to turn it off, yet it is bothering you...This is what exactly happened to our Anigo multiple times! He found the remote controlled outlets at his local Home Depot. He thought they could solve the problem. But, alas...every now and then, he would lose the remote. What he always had with home was his phone. An idea was born - connect these outlets to the Internet so that the lamp can be controlled with a phone. Anigo met Rahil and found that even had a similar experience, but the smart electronics whiz that Rahil is, he was already a step ahead. Thanks to the internet and wonderful people at Particle community, he had built the first version of Hook with wires soldered to the remote itself!However, with the 'Hack', Hook was still far from a commercial solution. What we discovered next became the essence of Hook’s innovation. We figured a way so that everybody can do the 'hack' - and make any existing remote controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets SMART.

The Hook project became a full-fledged team when Max and Robert joined the effort. We founded Hack-a-Joe Labs LLC, filed a patent for RF-to-WiFi remote cloning technology, and started working heads-down to make Hook a reality.

At this moment, we are actively making minor tweaks and improvements and finalizing the design for production. We did a successful Kickstarter campaign to validate the idea. We have 30 prototypes with our alpha testers and have been getting great feedback. Our app and web service are being developed in collaboration with our partner SimplifyS. 


Hook has partnered with Etekcity and GGI International to bring exclusive pricing of remote-controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets to our backers. We have partnered with Simplifys software solutions to build the entire software stack and the iOS and Android apps.



We have tested with every remote controlled outlet adapter and bulb socket out there to make sure Hook supports them. If you have something that you aren't sure about, let us know and we'd happy to look into it. 
In theory, Hook should be able to connect any device working on RF 315/433MHz to the Internet as long as it has static codes. Car remotes work on same frequency - but they will not work. Some old garage door openers might. 
Other than outlet adapter and bulb socket, following have been tested to work with Hook and some community-suggested projects:


LED strips with RF controller - Do cool lighting that change color to suit your circadian rhythm

Wireless door chimes - Make an internet-enabled doorbell

Ceiling fan - Smart ceiling fan that turns off when Nest via IFTTT tells its cold

Motorized blinds like Somfy RTS may work. There is still some work needed to ensure compatibility. 








Help us spread the word-- share Hook with your social media followers and friends and family! We believe that if we can start a loud enough conversation, we can change the home automation industry! 

Facebook
Twitter
Youtube


We did a Kickstarter campaign last month to raise capital to fund our first manufacturing run. We got much love and support. Our gears are in full motion, and it would be great if we could meet even higher quantities for manufacturing. This is where this campaign comes in. 
All the contributions made through the Indiegogo campaign will make into the first manufacturing run for delivery in Dec 2015. 

Hook
campaign on Kickstarter ended on May 27, 2015. We are opening for
pre-orders through this campaign.




Risks and challenges

Indiegogo campaign is much like writing Phd general exam proposal (personal experience on our team). Before proposing your thesis aims, you identify all the risks, all the things that could go wrong and then take proactive steps to iron out the concerns or prevent them altogether. We have applied the same approach in bringing this campaign to you.
Even the most prepared can fall short. This is especially true for hardware projects. We do understand that delays and issues can occur at any stage of production. However, we want to assure you we have a unique access to resources and advisers who want to build Hook as much as we do, and we believe this synergy is key to success.
Lastly, if an unexpected scenario does occur, we do promise to keep absolute transparency and to keep our backers always in loop. We are committed to bringing you the best possible product to our backers.
FAQs


1.
How many devices can I connect to one Hook?
We
have tested with 15 devices without interference causing a problem. We believe
you can do more depending on your surroundings and ambiance.
2. What RF frequencies does Hook support?
315 MHz and 433 MHz
3. What
other RF devices does Hook work with?
Hook
works with any RF remote that has static codes. Some examples include motorized
window blinds*, LED strip controllers, ceiling fans, wireless door chimes and
some garage door openers. Pretty much any remote that doesn't have the
"eye" at the front, as in IR. Of course, Hook will work with your
existing remote-controlled outlets and bulb sockets. Hook does not work with
Hampton Bay ceiling fans yet.
4. Do these bulb sockets support dimming?
No,
this model is just on/off.
5. Why can't people from the EU buy the kit
options?
Homes
in the EU operate with different plugs and voltages than North America. RF
remote-controlled outlets and socket adapters are available and work with Hook,
but not through our collaborators on this campaign. Feel free to buy a Hook and
purchase RF devices separately!
6. I have a big house, do I need more than one
Hook?
No!
We have tested it on a Multi-Storied 2000 SqFt house and we were able to
control all the outlets and sockets with just one Hook. You are always welcome
to buy more Hooks and give them to your friends and family or put them in your
vacation home (not from personal experience btw, must be nice!).
7. I already have a home automation product like
NEST, SmartThings, NEEO. How will the Hook work with them?
IFTTT
makes Hook talk to all the awesome smart home products out there
8. Why does Hook have a USB plug?
Hook
receives its power by USB. We chose USB (as opposed to a built-in outlet plug)
to keep costs down and allow easy access for tinkerers. You can use a standard
USB adapter you have around the house or get one from us with Hook
9. I don't see an option to purchase a USB
adapter. How do I get one with my Hook?
Just
add $5 to your pledge amount and we'll ship a USB adapter with your Hook.
10. Does Hook only work with these particular
brands of outlet adapter and bulb socket?
No.
Hook works with almost every remote controlled outlet adapters and bulb sockets
that are out there.
11. I don't have a smartphone, would the Hook
work for me?
Yes,
we have you covered. The Hook can be controlled with a Web App as well.
12. Did you use a green screen for the Machu Picchu shot?
No, Robert was really there! We wouldn't deceive you like that ;-)

story:
RepRapPro - a collaboration between eMaker Ltd and RepRap Ltd - is running the new RepRap Huxley 3D-printer campaign for Christmas.



The RepRapPro Huxley

The RepRapPro Huxley 3D printer is a Replicating Rapid prototyping machine, or RepRap for short. It is based on the eMaker Huxley of our last campaign, but with a considerable number of design improvements.  The machine uses a process known a fused filament fabrication, which it employs to build three dimensional objects in a range of plastics and in a variety of colours.  This process enables the user to create almost any shape which can be modelled on a computer, including some which could not be produced by traditional manufacturing techniques at all. Many examples of the objects people have made with this and similar machines can be found on thingiverse.

The RepRapPro Huxley is one of the smallest 3D printers available at the moment in terms of footprint, but not in terms of build volume. Its primary design goals were to offer a printer which was small enough to be portable, fast to replicate, and fast to assemble and to commission.  The great thing about these machines being self-replicating is that they can also print upgrades and replacement parts for themselves.

The machines have been put through thousands of hours of printing, with a variety of materials, and the design refined to end up with a thoroughly robust and high-quality 3D printer. Examples of parts printed with these machines can be found on our eMaker blog, showing the range of features which can be produced, as well as the consistently high print quality which can be achieved.

We fully understand that merely assembling a 3D printer will not guarantee good prints, so we are also offering backers all the software and knowhow to produce high-quality parts. As well as access to online support, all of this information will be made available to backers on our website.

You can see the RepRapPro Huxley in action on eMaker's Youtube channel here.

We also have an active development plan for the RepRapPro Huxley 3D printer, so users will also have access to software updates and designs for upgraded parts which they can print themselves.


Machine specifications:

   - Build volume: 140x140x110mm
   - Overall size: 260x280x280mm
   - Printing materials: ABS, PLA, 1.75mm diameter thermoplastic.
   - Build surface: PCB-heated bed to ensure parts do not warp.
   - Accuracy: 0.1mm
   - Resolution: 0.0125mm
   - Building speed: 1,800 mm/min
   - Moving speed: 12,000 mm/min
   - Deposition rate: 33 cm3 / hr
   - Motion: Linear ball bearings on X and Y axes, Igus low friction bushings on Z axis.
   - Fully pre-soldered electronics with built-in microSD card slot for standalone printing.
   - Universal power supply; works with all mains voltages.
   - Enhancements to the printed parts to improve the ease of assembly of the X and Y axes


Sources of plastic filament:

You will get 100m of white 1.75mm PLA filament included with your RepRapPro Huxley kit, which is more than enough to make all the 3D-printed parts for another complete Huxley.

In addition, here are some current suppliers of 1.75mm diameter filament:

    www.faberdashery.co.uk
    www.ultimachine.com
    www.reprapsource.com
    diamondage.co.nz/pla.html

Cost ranges from $36/kg to $50, and both ABS and PLA are available in a range of colours.
ABS tends to be a little cheaper and easier to obtain, and PLA is available in more colours.


Who we are

One of the most trusted names in low-cost 3D-printer supply is eMaker Ltd.  Run by Jean-Marc Giacalone, eMaker Ltd have supplied over 300 RepRap Huxley self-replicating 3D printers.


RepRap Ltd is Adrian Bowyer's family company.  Adrian invented RepRap, and is the person who started the worldwide revolution in low-cost open-source 3D printing.


These two men, and their two companies, have pooled their resources to form a new joint enterprise: RepRapPro Ltd.  


Sally Bowyer is the third member of the team.  Sally is also RepRap Ltd's Production Manager.  RepRap Ltd has printed over 250 sets of RepRap parts for sale to the community, the great majority of them made under Sally's supervision.


Like its parent companies, RepRapPro is dedicated to the ideas of open-source 3D printing, and making low-cost replicating 3D printers available to everyone.

Our team has a lifelong experience of software engineering, mathematics, CAD geometry, electronic design, robotics, manufacturing engineering, and machine-tool technology.  It initiated RepRap, and has been involved in detail in every stage of RepRap's development and progress from an academic research project to a global phenomenon.


Dates and Times

We are running this Indiegogo crowd funding campaign to enable us to bulk purchase parts for a large quantity of RepRapPro Huxley 3D printer kits in order to offer you a great price.  We guarantee that the first 86 kits will be delivered before Christmas.

Due to the overwhelming demand for these kits, we have reviewed our manufacturing strategy and teamed up with some of the most qualified RepRappers in the world to increase our capacity.  All kits will be shipped from our RepRap factory in the UK.

Kits will be sent to backers in the order that funding is received, so the sooner you invest, the sooner you will receive your kit.

We will keep everyone informed of our progress with regular updates on www.reprappro.com as well as through our twitter account.


Included in the RepRapPro Huxley kit

Backers will receive a complete kit of parts to enable them to assemble and use a RepRapPro Huxley 3D printing machine. The only things which will need to be provided will be some simple tools, and a few hours to assemble and to commission the machine.  100m of  filament will also be included to get you started.

Please note: shipping costs will be added based on location, but will be charged at cost and should be less than $70.

If you have any questions regarding this campaign, please feel free to contact us at reprappro at gmail dot com or via the contact-us page on our website.
