story:
Done testing alpha version. Pictures in gallery and below!


CONGRATULATIONS!! By finding this page your eyes are already helping spread the word. Time to feel good about yourself.. perhaps a pat on the back?..... Maybe get a trophy of you holding the world on your back while surfing a dolphin? Alright.. that may be a bit much but honestly, thank you. Now to explain what this is all about.

What is FoodCam?

    

This application will go hand in hand with the studies that have come out about how simply taking a picture of what you are eating will make a difference in your overall diet. It was found that taking pictures is the best way to do this because of the speed at which you can record and the visual aspect of seeing what you are about to put in your body. Compare this to the time it would take to calculate calories! With this application you will be able to take a picture of your food and add some optional notes. The application will store this picture by date and time in a calendar. There will be a day view with large pictures and calendar to show which days you took pictures on.

 

 

Cheat Day!

    

The feature that I am most excited about is the cheat day feature. This will let you write down and take pictures of any cravings that you may encounter. This will get you to address the craving and even remind yourself when your cheat day finally arrives to eat what you were craving during the week. The idea behind the cheat day is once a week you eat whatever you like. This can mean anything from greasy burgers to a gallon of cookie dough (ok don’t go overboard). The point is when you eat these types of foods it will actually speed up your metabolism and allow you to more efficiently use the good foods you are eating in the next days. What better way to keep track than with the same application you are using to keep track of you eat.

 

 

 

Hit a wall.

     The app is within its last months of development but I no longer have the means to fully support it. I really want to put a good product out there especially when the market is filled with crap apps that limit your functionality rather than enhance it.

     With your help I can get this application out quickly and not have to shave any of the features I wanted y’all to be able to use. $1000 would allow adding the cheat day feature in the app in its entirety along with a smoother interface and an overall speedy application. I have supported most of the application on my own budget but have run out of funds. Even if I get half this amount I would greatly appreciate the support. So send your greenbacks, bones, gwap, dough, Benjamin’s and even your Washington’s. Everything helps.

 

P.S.  I'm very open to any and all suggestions. For example:

Leave a comment if you think I should offer a $100 perk that will offer a small percentage of the sales from when the app goes live.

 

P.S.S.  Spread the word

story:
AXIS by XTRUCASE
the ONLY truly modular iPhone 5 case
the ONLY "no screw" aluminum iPhone 5 case

"The new AXIS case from Xtrucase turns your iPhone 5 into a multi-tool. It's definitely unique and something any self proclaimed gadgeteer will want to try."

"XTRUCASE make some great aluminum cases for the iPhone 4/4S and if you like there line of cases you love the Axis."

"I am absolutely amazed at what you've guys has brought to the table. The case is definitely a game changer. Really love how it has some of the every day things we use in a business type environment."


SCROLL DOWN FOR MORE PHOTOS! =)

Short Summary

If you're used to thinking different, then you'll love the XTRUCASE Axis for the iPhone 5. When we started designing it, we wanted to make a case that not only matched Apple's gorgeous design aesthetic, but also protected your investment while granting you the ability to customize as much (or as little) as you want, in a way that's simple and fast.

The Axis case is a hybrid, with the mainframe CNC machined from aircraft grade aluminum, while the high impact poly carbonate core preserves and protects reception.  But most importantly, the unique design allows you to add Major Attachments (on the back) and up to four Micro Attachments (on the corners).

Help us bring the Axis to market, and you'll be rewarded not only with the first batch of Axis cases (and optionally our first two Micro Attachments, an USB flash drive and a stylus/pen combo), but also our undying gratitude, plus the intangible and invaluable joy that comes from being a patron of new and exciting developments in lifestyle technology.

Who We Are

We are Ben, Daisy, Enoch, Gabe, Jeff, Rich, and Tim -- the team behind the critically acclaimed all-aluminum bumper case for the iPhone 4/4S. We made three models for the 4/4S:

SLIDER (http://youtu.be/mNfRpKFUVPs)
DUO (http://youtu.be/cKIOTlGTc2c)
CRYSTALLINE (http://youtu.be/ys9PdMs4PL4)

Now, we're ready to give iPhone 5 owners the same easy slide-on/slide-off functionality.  

Existing aluminum iPhone 5 cases all require screws, wrenches, or other tools to install and uninstall.  Our Axis case is different: it features our patent-pending slider frame technology, so getting it on and off your iPhone 5 is a breeze.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $35k to start producing the Axis line of iPhone 5 cases.

We've done this before with our iPhone 4/4S cases, so we know exactly what the production schedule looks like.  Once funding is complete, this is what happens:

Days 1-40: make the plastic injection molds and ensure that the fit is perfect
Days 41-80: manufacture the poly carbonate and aircraft grade aluminum components
Days 81-90: ship it to you!

(note that we are shipping this first batch without retail packaging to save you money and get you the products faster)

The case is 66.5mm W x 131.5mm L x 12.3mm H, and weighs a mere 24.8g. As a contributor, you get your choice of colors when we ship:

  • Slate & Blue
  • Slate & Red
  • Silver & Blue
  • Silver & Red

In exchange for your support, check out the cool perks you get on the right hand side of the page!  Simply click on the CONTRIBUTE NOW button and choose which perk you want!

PHOTOS OF WHAT YOU GET:


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis iPhone 5 case in Slate & Blue


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis iPhone 5 case in Slate & Red


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis iPhone 5 case in Silver & Blue


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis iPhone 5 case in Silver & Red


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis Micro Attachment: Stylus/Pen Combo


Pictured above: Happy People Using Stylus
(happy people not included with purchase)


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis Micro Attachment: USB Drive


Pictured above: Happy People Sharing Photos Using USB Drive
(happy people not included with purchase)

COMING SOON:


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis Micro Attachment: LED Flashlight and Laser Pointer


Pictured above: XTRUCASE Axis Major Attachment: Back Plate Solar Panel Charger


CELEBRITY ENDORSEMENT?

We are in talks to do a custom line of iPhone cases for an internationally-known girl group (you may or may not have heard of them, but I guarantee you will know at least one artist signed to this label). Since the deal hasn't yet been finalized, we can't reveal who the group is -- but if this comes to fruition, all Contributors will be given the opportunity to get one of these custom cases at a significant discount to retail.

THE BOTTOM LINE

If you're interested in seeing the Axis and attachments made and would like to receive one of the first editions, please contribute.

If you love the idea and vision behind the Axis case but just can’t support us financially, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Link to our campaign on your social media pages!
  • Help us make some noise and get the word out!

Thanks, and see you on the other side!

The XTRUCASE Team
Ben, Daisy, Enoch, Gabe, Jeff, Rich, and Tim

AXIS by XTRUCASEthe ONLY truly modular iPhone 5 casethe ONLY "no screw" aluminum iPhone 5 case


"The new AXIS case from Xtrucase turns your iPhone 5 into a multi-tool. It's definitely unique and something any self proclaimed gadgeteer will want to try."
"XTRUCASE make some great aluminum cases for the iPhone 4/4S and if you like there line of cases you love the Axis."
"I am absolutely amazed at what you've guys has brought to the table. The case is definitely a game changer. Really love how it has some of the every day things we use in a business type environment."

SCROLL DOWN FOR MORE PHOTOS! =)

Short Summary
If you're used to thinking different, then you'll love the XTRUCASE Axis for the iPhone 5. When we started designing it, we wanted to make a case that not only matched Apple's gorgeous design aesthetic, but also protected your investment while granting you the ability to customize as much (or as little) as you want, in a way that's simple and fast.
The Axis case is a hybrid, with the mainframe CNC machined from aircraft grade aluminum, while the high impact poly carbonate core preserves and protects reception.  But most importantly, the unique design allows you to add Major Attachments (on the back) and up to four Micro Attachments (on the corners).
Help us bring the Axis to market, and you'll be rewarded not only with the first batch of Axis cases (and optionally our first two Micro Attachments, an USB flash drive and a stylus/pen combo), but also our undying gratitude, plus the intangible and invaluable joy that comes from being a patron of new and exciting developments in lifestyle technology.
Who We Are
We are Ben, Daisy, Enoch, Gabe, Jeff, Rich, and Tim -- the team behind the critically acclaimed all-aluminum bumper case for the iPhone 4/4S. We made three models for the 4/4S:
SLIDER (http://youtu.be/mNfRpKFUVPs)DUO (http://youtu.be/cKIOTlGTc2c)CRYSTALLINE (http://youtu.be/ys9PdMs4PL4)

story:
For Xero Users, by Xero Users.
Delivered Worldwide.

Xero is an accounting system hosted entirely in the cloud for small businesses and their advisors. This means that wherever you have an internet connection, you and your advisor has access to your accounts. There's no ball and chain quite like having to only work from your desk. With Xero however, it doesn't matter if you want to access your accounts from the office or from home in your pyjamas. You can work on your accounts at a time that suits you!

Xero's popularity is increasing daily. So is the momentum of the hundreds of thousands of small business owners across the globe that are using Xero in their businesses. With in excess of 250,000 paying users and over 9,000 partners (accountants, bookkeepers, advisors, add-ons) it is clear that Xero is rapidly gaining market share and a radical following.

There’s a wealth of information out there, including hundreds of blogs, forums and also the recently launched Xero TV and Xero University. But we realised as Xero users that we haven’t always got the time to go and search and look at all of those resources.

What we want to do, is to bring together the very best information and articles into one magazine, along with exclusive articles, to save Xero users hours of time from searching on the internet.

XU Magazine is the independent magazine run by Xero users, for Xero users. The magazine is aimed at the ever growing 250,000+ strong community of Xero users and will be delivered worldwide in print.

There's something for everyone:

Its quality glossy format will captivate readers and keep them turning the page. Initially, XU Magazine will be printed quarterly and delivered straight to the office or homes of its readers. The magazine will initially have 52 full colour A4 (21 x 29.7cm / 8.3 x 11.7 inches) pages.

Do more than you thought possible

Useful content you can expect from the magazine includes:

  • Feature Articles. XU Magazine's feature length articles are thoughtful, insightful, educational and informative. They will cover a wide range of topics that will provoke readers to explore the Xero accounting system and add-ons in greater depth.
  • Tutorials. Exploring not only the basics but also advanced subjects. We focus on not only what can be done, but also how it's done. Tutorials are written in simple to follow steps and in plain English to appeal to all Xero users. 
  • Letters/Emails to the Editor. Something to say? Something to share? Then we actively encourage you to get in touch.
  • Reviews. Independently reviewing Xero approved add-ons and other 3rd party software applications.
  • Interviews. Each issue we will feature an in depth interview with a senior figure from one of the Xero approved add-ons or 3rd party applications. We will explore their vision, how their software assists Xero users and what their strategies are for the coming year.
  • Short news. Our short news section is intended to bring attention to interesting developments that are of interest to the Xero user community and to connect people to interesting new resources, information and insight that may not warrant an entire regular article.
  • Sounding board. We pick a topic and invite both Xero users and industry experts to share what they have they say.
  • One for the Devs. Code snippets, tips, tricks and how-tos.
  • Diary/What's on. Seminars, webinars, Xero events and much more.
  • Case Studies. A chance for add-on partners to submit how they've assisted a Xero user's business after they've implemented/integrated their software. We also seek out unique and unusual case-studies where the Xero accounting system has been adopted.
  • Add-ons. What's new? What's popular? 
  • Add-ons in Beta. Be one of the first to know and get exclusive invites to new add-ons still in private beta.
  • Mystery 'shopper'. We will pick up to three add-ons in the market, subscribe to their service, implement their offering and request support and advice. Each recipient of our mystery 'shop' will be marked on a series of criteria and given a score. We will be looking at friendliness as well as technical knowledge and suitability to our imaginary business.
  • Gadgets/Accessories. We all love gadgets! What better than to discover the latest and greatest gadgets out there that will not only keep you connected with colleagues and friends but aid you in the workplace too!

You bet! We have some fantastic stretch goals in mind, including doubling the page count and increasing the publication to bi-monthly. When announced, any existing supporters backing us on a subscription level pledge will automatically have their subscription increased to 6 issues per year instead of 4 - FREE of charge.

But that's not all! We'd also like to create a fully interactive iPad version with bonus content including great videos, audio snippets, podcasts and live link-ups with the authors so you can ask away with questions and get additional support and advice. 

The Indiegogo community meets the Xero community 

We recognise that Indiegogo hosts an important community: innovators, early adopters and the intellectually curious. The thriving, 250,000+ strong Xero community are likeminded.

If you share the same passion and believe we're onto something, then please get involved...

We're reaching out to fellow Xero Users. We have a lot of planning and ideas in place but need the support of the Xero user community to make this a reality.

We need your pledges, but as importantly, we need your support in many different areas...

Our ambassadors play a vital role. They're our eyes and ears in their respective countries and offer a convenient way for readers to get in touch.

Heather Smith, Ambassador for Australia

Recently, we were extremely fortunate to meet-up with Heather Smith whilst she was here in the UK on holiday. With only a matter of 24 hours to go before she had to catch her flight back to Australia, we were able to share this project with her over coffee. Heather is a writer, speaker, Xero Certified Advisor and author of Xero for Dummies (amongst other titles in the Xero for Dummies series of books). Heather is extremely passionate about Xero and helps small businesses in a wide range of industries with Xero set-up, migration, training and on-going support. We're pleased to announce that Heather is XU Magazine's first Representative and Country Ambassador for Australia.

Gayle Buchanan, Ambassador for New Zealand

For many Xero users, Gayle requires very little by way of an introduction as she is very active in the Xero Community Forums. Gayle is the founder of Number Nurses. Number Nurses are cloud integrators, who specialise in helping business owners and accountants master cloud applications like Xero, Xero Add-ons and the Google suite.

Kirsten Barrie, Ambassador for the USA

Kirsten is a Xero Certified Financial Advisor with over 10 years experience (CFO, Accounting Manager). Certified in a dozen+ of Xero's add-ons, she and her team are expertly able to integrate them with Xero. She lives in San Francisco with her extra-large husky, Bella, and is the Chief Cloud Integrator & Owner of Verte Consulting.

Jonathan Gaunt, Ambassador for the UK

Having spent the majority of his career in 'big' businesses, Jonathan now works as an advisor to ambitious small businesses in the creative and tech sector and is a massive fan (and certified partner) of Xero. He's a lover of tech and great design, and he knows a thing or two about Xero add-ons! Jonathan is based in Bristol, UK and is the founder of FD Works.

We're listening and open to suggestions - If you'd like to contribute or have a particular skill-set (writer, journalist, photographer, graphic designer, illustrator, ninja programmer, expert developer) that may be of interest to XU Magazine, then please do not hesitate to get in touch.

TOGETHER we can make this magazine a reality. Please could YOU:

  • Share the campaign website: www.xumagazine.com
  • Tweet your support on Twitter, post your support on Facebook, use Instagram, Google Plus, Reddit or even carrier pigeon! Don't know what to say? Please feel free to use the campaign teaser graphics (keep scrolling - you'll find them at the bottom of this page or by clicking on the gallery tab above).
  • Follow @xumagazine for updates.
  • Always use the #xumagazine hashtag in your tweets to create awareness and to generate buzz around the campaign.
  • Please tell your colleagues and friends who want to get involved and support the magazine. 
  • Please use all the Indiegogo sharing options (under the video at the top of this page).

Thank you!


Please feel free to share on Twitter, Facebook, your website, wherever! (Right-click on the graphics, then choose "Save image as...") Remember to add our shortlink URL so people can get to us! http://igg.me/at/xumagazine


Please feel free to share on Twitter, Facebook, your website, wherever! (Right-click on the graphics, then choose "Save image as...") Remember to add our shortlink URL so people can get to us! http://igg.me/at/xumagazine


Please feel free to share on Twitter, Facebook, your website, wherever! (Right-click on the graphics, then choose "Save image as...") Remember to add our shortlink URL so people can get to us! http://igg.me/at/xumagazine


Please feel free to share on Twitter, Facebook, your website, wherever! (Right-click on the graphics, then choose "Save image as...") Remember to add our shortlink URL so people can get to us! http://igg.me/at/xumagazine


Please feel free to share on Twitter, Facebook, your website, wherever! (Right-click on the graphics, then choose "Save image as...") Remember to add our shortlink URL so people can get to us! http://igg.me/at/xumagazine

Please do leave a comment here on Indiegogo. We would love to hear from fellow Xero users from across the globe. You can also follow us on Twitter @xumagazine


Please note: We are happy to provide any business supporter with a complete invoice upon request, in order to claim against your expenses. Please contact us after the campaign end date.

story:
The Snorkle combines a traditional vaporizer with a filtration system, connected together with a valve assembly.  You inhale, and it draws from the vaporizer, you exhale and the exhaled vapor is redirected to the filter, removing all vapor and odors.  The Snorkle is designed to fit inside a normal beverage cup with a normal straw, making it appear as if you are just taking a drink from your beverage.

We are really excited about this product because not only does it allow vapers the freedom to choose when and where they enjoy their products, but it also helps others around you that are concerned about their air quality.

We could really use some help from the vaping community to ensure that we can deliver the best product possible.  Funds received through this campaign will go towards creating the molds and tooling needed to manufacture the Snorkle.

Thanks in advance for your contribution! We are excited to have you be a part of this with us!

If you think this idea is as cool as we do would you mind sharing it with your friends and family? A simple share on Facebook or Twitter would mean the world to us!
