story:
Our Story

FlyGrip is an accessory that enables you to use your smartphone one-handed. I came up with the idea for FlyGrip after noticing how frustrating it was to rely on both hands when texting, surfing the web, or composing an email. With FlyGrip, you don't have to worry about misclicking, fumbling, dropping your phone, and compromised reception due to the "death grip" issue. When not in use, FlyGrip snaps into place and takes up only a ¼” on your phone or case, so your device can still fit in your pocket or purse. FlyGrip was engineered in response to the inherent difficulties with holding and navigating touchscreens with one hand.








Why FlyGrip?

FlyGrip is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably around your fingers. The spring loaded top and versatile low profile design allows for a secure and comfortable grip which provides a full range of motion for the thumb to navigate the entire display, even on the really large touch screens, and completely frees up one hand. As an additional feature, FlyGrip also doubles as a kickstand for both landscape and portrait views.

Once you have used a FlyGrip on your device, you will immediately notice how "right" it feels in your hand. Along with the added comfortable and navigation benefits, you will notice how it allows you to perform what I call "real-life multitasking" to save you time through your day.



Create  Your Own FlyGrip!

FlyGrip is a customizable piece of artwork. Just because technology is functional doesn't mean our devices can't be art. Just select your design and the body color of your FlyGrip. FlyGrip is your own personal canvas, and the beauty is in your design.

How to Apply FlyGrip


Clean Surface. Using an isopropyl alcohol wipe, clean phone/case surface and let dry. Do not use household cleaners. 

Apply FlyGrip. Remove the adhesive backing and align evenly on the back of your case. We recommend placing FlyGrip on the bottom center of your device, where gripping is most comfortable. 

Press Firmly! Hold in place for 30 seconds and press firmly with both hands. Wait 30 minutes before using. If possible, allow 48 hours before heavy usage for full bonding to occur.

How to Remove FlyGrip


Grab a dull, flat, thin object. Try a butter knife. Slide under your FlyGrip. Slowly and carefully, pry the edges of the FlyGrip up.


Clean Surface. Your FlyGrip adhesive is not secure for reuse. Please remove old adhesive and replace with new. 

FAQ:

WHAT KIND OF PHONES OR DEVICES DOES FLYGRIP WORK WITH?

Any phone or device works with FlyGrip! All you need is a smooth, solid area to stick FlyGrip on, either on the back of phone or on your case. Installation is fast and easy.

WHY DO I NEED FLYGRIP?

If you are constantly multitasking and glued to your phone, FlyGrip allows you to free up one hand and multi-task efficiently.

WILL FLYGRIP HELP WITH THE USE OF TOUCH SCREEN PHONES?

FlyGrip was developed to be used with touch screen smartphones. The sensitivity of touch screens causes accidental misclicks which can be frustrating. FlyGrip allows your phone to be secured on your fingertips, not in the palm of your hand, which allows for a much greater range of motion for your thumb. You will never misclick again!

CAN I USE FLYGRIP WITH A PHONE CASE? IF SO, WHAT KIND OF CASE SHOULD I GET?

Most phone cases can be used with FlyGrip as long as the back is smooth and made of a hard plastic or aluminum. Some soft TPU cases can be used as well, but a special primer may be necessary. FlyGrip is installed by using self-adhesive glue and sticking it to the back of either your phone or case. Some phones have a battery door in the back which may interfere with the installation of FlyGrip, so a case may be necessary for these phones.

WILL A PHONE HOLSTER WORK WITH FLYGRIP?

When closed, FlyGrip only takes up about ¼” of space, so as long as there is enough room in your holster for an extra ¼", FlyGrip will fit without a problem.

IS FLYGRIP DIFFICULT TO INSTALL?

FlyGrip is extremely easy to install and anyone can do it. Instructions are provided with each FlyGrip.

HOW CAN I REMOVE THE FLYGRIP? AFTER I REMOVE IT CAN I RE-USE IT?

We recommend that you carefully pry the edges of the FlyGrip with a dull, thin object such as a butter knife. Once removed, you can attach to a new phone using the extra adhesive provided.

DOES FLYGRIP COME IN DIFFERENT SIZES?

FlyGrip comes in 3 sizes: small, medium, and large. The best way to use FlyGrip is to have it between your fingers. Usually the middle finger and ring finger are most comfortable, yet, some people prefer to use their pointer finger and middle finger. The FlyGrip should fit a little snug around the fingers, as this allows the most secure hold while providing the best mobility to navigate your device. Grab a penny and try this simple size test to figure out which size works best for you.

1. Small will fit fingertips that are up to 3/8" of an inch tall. If your fingertip reaches the mouth of President Lincoln on a penny, then use small.

2. Medium is for 5/8" tall fingers. If you fingertip reaches the top of President Lincoln's head on a penny, medium is your size.

3. Large is for fingertips that are up to 3/4" thick. Your fingertip almost covers the top of the penny.

Each FlyGrip comes with a set of foam pad inserts. Use these inserts if you feel you need a little extra snugness.


Made in USA - Patent Pending
story_txt:
Our Story
FlyGrip is an accessory that enables you to use your smartphone one-handed. I came up with the idea for FlyGrip after noticing how frustrating it was to rely on both hands when texting, surfing the web, or composing an email. With FlyGrip, you don't have to worry about misclicking, fumbling, dropping your phone, and compromised reception due to the "death grip" issue. When not in use, FlyGrip snaps into place and takes up only a ¼” on your phone or case, so your device can still fit in your pocket or purse. FlyGrip was engineered in response to the inherent difficulties with holding and navigating touchscreens with one hand.













Why FlyGrip?

FlyGrip is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably around your fingers. The spring loaded top and versatile low profile design allows for a secure and comfortable grip which provides a full range of motion for the thumb to navigate the entire display, even on the really large touch screens, and completely frees up one hand. As an additional feature, FlyGrip also doubles as a kickstand for both landscape and portrait views.
Once you have used a FlyGrip on your device, you will immediately notice how "right" it feels in your hand. Along with the added comfortable and navigation benefits, you will notice how it allows you to perform what I call "real-life multitasking" to save you time through your day.







Create  Your Own FlyGrip!
FlyGrip is a customizable piece of artwork. Just because technology is functional doesn't mean our devices can't be art. Just select your design and the body color of your FlyGrip. FlyGrip is your own personal canvas, and the beauty is in your design.

How to Apply FlyGrip





Clean Surface. Using an isopropyl alcohol wipe, clean phone/case surface and let dry. Do not use household cleaners. 


Apply FlyGrip. Remove the adhesive backing and align evenly on the back of your case. We recommend placing FlyGrip on the bottom center of your device, where gripping is most comfortable. 



Press Firmly! Hold in place for 30 seconds and press firmly with both hands. Wait 30 minutes before using. If possible, allow 48 hours before heavy usage for full bonding to occur.



How to Remove FlyGrip





Grab a dull, flat, thin object. Try a butter knife. Slide under your FlyGrip. Slowly and carefully, pry the edges of the FlyGrip up.


Clean Surface. Your FlyGrip adhesive is not secure for reuse. Please remove old adhesive and replace with new. 
FAQ:


WHAT KIND OF PHONES OR DEVICES DOES FLYGRIP WORK WITH?
Any phone or device works with FlyGrip! All you need is a smooth, solid area to stick FlyGrip on, either on the back of phone or on your case. Installation is fast and easy.
WHY DO I NEED FLYGRIP?
If you are constantly multitasking and glued to your phone, FlyGrip allows you to free up one hand and multi-task efficiently.
WILL FLYGRIP HELP WITH THE USE OF TOUCH SCREEN PHONES?
FlyGrip was developed to be used with touch screen smartphones. The sensitivity of touch screens causes accidental misclicks which can be frustrating. FlyGrip allows your phone to be secured on your fingertips, not in the palm of your hand, which allows for a much greater range of motion for your thumb. You will never misclick again!
CAN I USE FLYGRIP WITH A PHONE CASE? IF SO, WHAT KIND OF CASE SHOULD I GET?
Most phone cases can be used with FlyGrip as long as the back is smooth and made of a hard plastic or aluminum. Some soft TPU cases can be used as well, but a special primer may be necessary. FlyGrip is installed by using self-adhesive glue and sticking it to the back of either your phone or case. Some phones have a battery door in the back which may interfere with the installation of FlyGrip, so a case may be necessary for these phones.
WILL A PHONE HOLSTER WORK WITH FLYGRIP?
When closed, FlyGrip only takes up about ¼” of space, so as long as there is enough room in your holster for an extra ¼", FlyGrip will fit without a problem.
IS FLYGRIP DIFFICULT TO INSTALL?
FlyGrip is extremely easy to install and anyone can do it. Instructions are provided with each FlyGrip.
HOW CAN I REMOVE THE FLYGRIP? AFTER I REMOVE IT CAN I RE-USE IT?
We recommend that you carefully pry the edges of the FlyGrip with a dull, thin object such as a butter knife. Once removed, you can attach to a new phone using the extra adhesive provided.
DOES FLYGRIP COME IN DIFFERENT SIZES?
FlyGrip comes in 3 sizes: small, medium, and large. The best way to use FlyGrip is to have it between your fingers. Usually the middle finger and ring finger are most comfortable, yet, some people prefer to use their pointer finger and middle finger. The FlyGrip should fit a little snug around the fingers, as this allows the most secure hold while providing the best mobility to navigate your device. Grab a penny and try this simple size test to figure out which size works best for you.
1. Small will fit fingertips that are up to 3/8" of an inch tall. If your fingertip reaches the mouth of President Lincoln on a penny, then use small.
2. Medium is for 5/8" tall fingers. If you fingertip reaches the top of President Lincoln's head on a penny, medium is your size.
3. Large is for fingertips that are up to 3/4" thick. Your fingertip almost covers the top of the penny.
Each FlyGrip comes with a set of foam pad inserts. Use these inserts if you feel you need a little extra snugness.

Made in USA - Patent Pending

story:
MYLE TAP is a touch-activated wearable voice recorder that helps you take notes and launch applications without having to touch your smartphone. Just tap MYLE TAP and say your thought, idea or instruction - MYLE TAP will instantly memorize it and take care of the rest.



MYLE TAP works with


Stretchgoals


How it works



Your day with MYLE TAP


Safely take notes while driving

With MYLE TAP, you can keep your focus on the road, where it should be. With just the touch of a finger, you can save and identify a song from the radio, send a text or audio message to somebody, or add a detour notification to help other people reach their homes faster.


Instantly capture ideas and share with your team

Need to jot down notes after the meeting, while they are still fresh in your head? One tap and they are in your Salesforce account or in Slack. Now you can have a break with a well-deserved caffeine shot, while your team evaluates your notes.


Post or tweet with your voice

When you see or experience something exciting, MYLE TAP gives you the ability to instantly share it with your friends. Post on your Facebook or Tweet it on the go using only your voice, and never lose time reaching your smartphone. 


Count calories or remember a new recipe 

With a single finger tap, MYLE TAP can give you ideas for your dinner based on your last grocery shopping list. It can also count your consumed calories, incorporate them into your calorie tracking app, so you can visualize the data via graphs and numbers. 


Capture outdoor experiences on the go

Make instant notes about your outdoor adventures. Hike, camp, kayak or fish, knowing that MYLE will keep your memories and impressions intact - even if you left your smartphone at home. 


Track your time with a single touch

We use multiple applications to run our busy daily lives. Using your voice is the simplest, fastest and most natural way to manage these apps. Just tap, speak, and relax! Keep that happy smile on your face, courtesy of MYLE!


Remember everything without a smartphone

During your sports break or morning exercise you will not be carrying a pen and a notepad. Often, not even a smartphone. When something dawns on you, simply tap the TAP to capture it.



MYLE TAP can do much more



Why you need MYLE TAP


Do you know that...




...and it can save your time

Savings come from all the time spent daily reaching for the smartphone, unlocking, opening apps, putting the phone back, etc. On top of that, MYLE will save much more time via automating routines and  accomplishing tasks that previously were completed manually. And you’ll remember everything. In just one tap.


And it can save your money too

It's simple math: assuming the average hourly pay in US and Canada is $25, you can easily calculate your yearly savings: $25 (per hour/day) x 20 (working days/month) x 12 (months/year) = $6,000 of just direct savings in just one year. 


All that with a single finger tap. Awesome?


Why MYLE TAP is so cool


We developed an amazing easy-to-use product with virtually unlimited functionality, which enables you to harness the full power of your mind.


Who is MYLE TAP for?


Business persons

All day on the run, endless meetings, endless list of things to remember, an avalanche of ideas… And simply not enough time for everything. A single finger tap will effectively capture and memorize a customer inquiry or a million dollar idea, and will track and optimize time… Easily and effectively.


Creative people

Hundreds, if not thousands, of ideas never strike on schedule. Pens, paper, smartphones may not be within arm’s reach and it takes too much time and effort to record. By then the idea will be gone. For creative types fountaining with ideas, MYLE TAP is the perfect solution. Simply tap it and speak out your next great idea.


Busy moms

Kids are wonderful, smart, adorable, interesting, as well as inquisitive, persistent and capable of consuming all your attention. For multi-multi-tasking moms life suddenly will become so much easier with just one tap. Shopping and to-do lists populated as fast as you speak – and never forgotten or missed. A funny phrase from your little one captured for family chronicles and shared on Facebook. A new recipe arrives into the recipe app. Time to recall how to have good time, again.


Health watchers

Our health is what we should care about. MYLE TAP helps you easily stay focused on a diet or on exercising. Keep track of consumed and burnt calories, diets or gym activities. Just tap and speak out. MYLE will do the rest. 


Perks


Mind-powered product


We believe that everyone - not just rocket scientists and Sheldon Cooper - is smart and capable to make the world around us a little bit better. We believe that everyone does generate millions of brilliant ideas. Still, we understand that our lives are so full of destractions and we are constantly short of time. That hampers us in remembering all of our great ideas or plans and putting them to work.

This is what engaged us to create MYLE TAP, a product which will change the way we think and memorize things. However, our biggest passion is the capability to make our lives easier, more enjoyable and effective. In developing this product we followed three basic principles:

Simple. The MYLE TAP is totally easy and intuitive to use for anyone. It requires very little to adapt and learn.

Intelligent. MYLE TAP is smart, self-learning and is powered by an extremely advanced analytic engine. It is packed with features, yet remains totally user-friendly.

Customizable. MYLE TAP is a user-driven product and comes with several customization options. MYLE user can easily and almost infinitely add applications and adapt MYLE TAP to his or her particular needs and preferences.

 

Specifications




Software Development Kit


We talked to over 500 people about ways to make their lives easier. Their feedback helped us design dozens of MYLE applications (called "Mylets") like "List of Thoughts", "Personal Budget", "Calories Counter" and others:



Of course, we understand that 500 are only a drop in the ocean. And this is why we decided to create free SDK/API to enable everyone to develop their own applications or integrate their existing apps with MYLE. We made extra effort to make this tool totally easy and user-friendly to use for everyone familiar with the basics of JavaScript, HTML, GitHub and frameworks. 

Interested? Contact us at sdk@getmyle.com. 


Service Plans


MYLE TAP includes the MYLE App and the standard free service package.  This will also include MYLE App free updates.

At a later date, after MYLE TAP shipments commence, optional service plans will become available for a fee. They will include such optional features as increased number of daily processed notes, more customized apps and ability to store events over a longer period of time. These premium plans still do not require signing a contract. Campaign contributions do not sign you up for a paid service plan. 


Why us?


We experienced first-hand the pain of trying to memorize and later recall all our ideas and thoughts, whether it's a casual thought to buy a milk on the way home tonight or a great idea on how to optimize an algorithm. As well, we wanted to not only remember everything but also make it beneficial. We tried to use existing solutions, but quickly discovered their functional limitations and amount of hassle involved when using them regularly. 

As we talked with hundreds of people to gather some feedback to our idea, and quickly found how common this problem is. People of all ages and from all walks of life confessed to having the same trouble of keeping their thoughts remembered and turning them into actions.

Inspired by the desire to make life easier for so many people as well as for ourselves, we committed to building our own solution. It would be totally simple and easy to use - just tap and talk - yet be intelligent and endlessly customizable.

To achieve this goal we assembled a dynamic and passionate team of scientists, engineers and entrepreneurs with a formidable intellectual power. We got strong support not just from families and friends, but also from experienced advisors in the tech industry. We believe that together we will make MYLE TAP a success. And ultimately will Make Your Life Easier.


Product Development


We started with crude 3D printer moldings and a bunch of wild ideas. We diligently, passionately and  tirelessly worked through various development stages. Hardware, software, firmware, system architecture, patents. We successfully went through all these challenges to now have fully functional wearable prototypes, backed by software platform and constantly growing number of MYLE Applications.


Why we need your support


To date, we have built several prototype devices and software applications, that are being tried by alpha-testers. We need your support to complete the developement stage and start manufacturing the commercial product. Your contributions will help turn the MYLE vision into a reality and help the MYLE team to bring this exciting product to the market.

The funds you contribute will be used to:

  • Finalize charging dock design
  • Order injection mold tooling
  • Finalize application and cloud platform
  • Pay for initial cost of goods; and
  • Most importantly, deliver the MYLE TAP to you!

Oh and we’re also looking for a smart and extremely creative Marketing Manager who will help us deliver our brilliant idea to the mass market. Is that you? Help us to build your professional future ;)



Timeline



Thank you!


Thank you for all your support and feedback! We couldn't have gotten as far as we have now without our families, friends, backers, mentors, and all the wonderful tech community. We are endlessly grateful and can't wait to bring MYLE TAP to market.



Risks and challenges


We are realists and are completely open about the possible obstacles that may delay your  MYLE TAP delivery. Having considered all possible risks we are sharing the main ones, so you know what we are dealing with.

Component supply: MYLE TAP is built using a significant amount of components coming from multiple global suppliers, which have different lead times. If any of these suppliers amends or extends their agreed lead times, this will disturb or delay the entire production cycle. To prevent this we are actively searching for reserve suppliers for TAP components.

Design changes and enhancements: Once the production has started, there will be several  parameters that can be changed or diversified  in order to improve your experience with TAP. Adding new shell shapes, expanding colour palette, increasing data transfer speed, etc. Making such enhancements during production can be challenging and potentially affect deliveries. We try to accomodate such changes in advance to ensure that TAP ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When shipping starts, there will always be a risk of the logistical delays caused by freighters, shipments getting stuck in Customs. It may happen either when we are receiving the products from the factory, or when shipping them to you. We are working on building our supply chain as reliable as we can and hope there won't be any delays.

MYLE Team


Pavel Bondarev, Co-founder, CEO. [@LinkedIn]
PhD in Math and Computer Science with over 20 years experience in Algorithms and Predictive Analytics resulted in many successful projects. The brainpower, the heart and the engine of the project.

Alex Vetsak, Co-founder, COO. [@LinkedIn]
Over 10 years experience in Computer Science, Project management and Business Development. A natural born project manager. A MYLE within MYLE, he just makes things happen.

Evgeny Gerasimov, Electronics Engineering Lead.
Hardware know-everything and go-to. Looks for challenges and opportunities to pack hugely powerful capabilities in a relatively tiny gadgets.

Sergei Agalakov, Senior Database Architect.
A seasoned data management and enterprise architecture professional, focused on scalable cloud-based architecture with ensured high availability, unmatched security and performance.

Mikalai Silivonik, Software Development Lead.
Software guru and enthusiast with diverse experiense in mobile application and cloud system development. Capable of turning a brilliant idea to a great software product faster than light speed.


Other than the MYLE core team, we assempled 12 smart minds, experts in Computer Science, Math, Electronics, Engineering and Design, all over the world (Canada, US, Russia, Belarus, Vietnam, Korea and UK) who believe in this great idea and dedicate themselves to the MYLE project.

F.A.Q.


About MYLE


Why should I care about instantly capturing my thoughts?

Because it’s so easy to forget them… Every single thought has value. One single thought can drive you to your dream, but usually it takes hundreds of thoughts and, most importantly, to review them on an iterative basis, before you achieve your goal and make your dream true.


Will MYLE really make my life easier?

It has already made our lives easier. We believe it will help you. That’s why we offer it for you.


Why did you call it MYLE TAP?

It is an acronym. MYLE: “Makes Your Life Easier” when you Think, Act and Perform (TAP) on your thoughts via a single fingertap.


What’s the difference between MYLE TAP and SIRI?

The only commonality between SIRI and MYLE is that both are voice powered solutions. Everything else is different. Here are some main points:

a).  MYLE does not pretend to have a mind of its own and argue with you, nor it will endlessly ask for clarifications, distracting you and losing your precious time. With MYLE, its user is fully in charge of the instant data input that requires minimum distraction.

b).  SIRI is an advanced search engine positioned as a personal assistant designed to execute a limited set of tasks. Once the task is processed, SIRI “forgets” it. You cannot revisit the note.

MYLE’s goal is to be your mind and memory backer and its goal is not only execute your orders but also to remember and categorize your thoughts and ideas as well as streamline your daily routines via automation, timely reminders and advice. All your notes are accessible at later time, until you decide to erase them.

c).  MYLE TAP can operate independently without any smartphone, while SIRI is a part of your phone.

d).  With MYLE you are the owner of your data and no one but you is able to access, use, share and utilize it.


I’m using apps like Evernote to save my ideas. Why do I still need MYLE?

MYLE is not a substitute to Evernote or to any other system. Rather, through instantly capturing your voice notes in the simplest and most natural way – by voice – MYLE simplifies and streamlines saving of your thoughts and notes into your existing systems that you use and already accustomed to. Like Evernote. And you don’t need to have your mobile devices in hand all the time.


Is there any reason to use MYLE for my business team?

Definitely: if you have total involvement in your business matters and you move around a lot. If you want to share your thoughts, ideas, know statuses of your tasks, improve your team’s and your own efficiency by not losing important pieces of data. Having MYLE makes teamwork easier and more productive, because we often happen to be struck by brilliant ideas in the most inappropriate time. Yet with MYLE you can capture them and share with your team members. Like, saying “Slack, we need to add the predictive analytics feature to the project” and your note will be shared with your team in your Slack team-channel.


Can I use MYLE app without TAP?

Technically yes, however our goal is to make your life easier by simplifying your daily routines and operations. We believe it is only achievable by a combination of instant thought catching and saving that can be done anywhere and at any time. We developed MYLE application and TAP device for this particular purpose. Without the TAP piece, MYLE app would be just another organizing application that you will get bored of using in a few days.


Why can't I use a simple microphone instead of MYLE TAP?

You can, but why would you? You would lose all the convenience and freedom you enjoy with MYLE TAP. The simple microphone would also limit a number of applications that you can use with it. 


Using your MYLE


How hard it is for a non-technical person to set up the MYLE TAP?

Very easy. Install the MYLE App as you would any other application. Start it, and once inside, just choose “Connect”. MYLE will do the rest automatically.


What is the speech to text recognition quality?

So far we test-proved it in 9 languages, using native speakers. That includes English, Spanish, French, Japanese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish and Portuguese. During a 60-days testing we’ve averaged the quality of up to 95%. The system has a serious self-learning capability, that with time, as it learns your speech and vocabulary, accuracy reaches to 95%-100% range.


Is English the only language MYLE recognizes? What other languages you support in your app?

MYLE supports over 40 languages. Voice recognition is provided by NUANCE Voice-to-text service. Additionally through MYLE self-learning algorithms, we can improve voice recognition quality by analyzing your speech and vocabulary.


I work in a noisy environment. Will my notes be still recognized?

It depends on how noisy it is. Based on our own experience – and our meetings are held in a small room with many attendees, so it can be pretty noisy - MYLE TAP still manages to work fine. Within MYLE App you can fine-tune MYLE TAP to the background noise level. In most cases it cuts off all surrounding noise.


What if the recognition is incorrect and I checked the text note on the phone much later. Can I play back my original voice note?

Yes, the notes are saved as well. In your mobile device access MYLE App, find the note you need and tap [PLAY] button. If you still need your note, you can then make corrections to the processed text.


Can I set different number of taps for different functions?

1, 2 and 3 taps are reserved for system purposes. Otherwise, you can set up any number of controlling taps as you want. However, we’ve found that once the number of tapping combinations exceeds 3, remembering their meanings becomes difficult. Which defies the very purpose of MYLE – simply making your life easier.


What is the maximum length of a single voice message?

Currently, we limited it at 30 seconds. The user can set his or her own message duration via settings in MYLE App.


Can I activate sound notifications from MYLE TAP?

Yes, you can do it by accessing settings in your MYLE App.


Will MYLE TAP talk back to me?

It will not. For the sake of simplicity, efficiency and minimum distraction, as well as our alpha-testers surveys we decided that we do not need yet another talking partner. Notes are captured quietly, instantly and in most cases you don’t need your device to “Roger That”.


Does MYLE TAP track my activities like other tracking gadgets do? Like, can I measure burnt calories and steps I took in a day?

Yes you can, but in a more enhanced way. You set up your goal and then save all notes and steps you make achieving this goal. As an example, number of calories you burn per day. After every meal tell MYLE what you ate to count consumed calories. Tell MYLE when you start exercising and it will activate the accelerometer to count burnt calories. All the results and analytics can be found later in your favorite activity tracking app or in your MYLE cloud account.


What if TAP is fully discharged. Will I lose all my saved notes?

No, you will not lose them. Recharge your MYLE TAP and once you have your paired mobile device within Bluetooth range, all your saved voice notes will be synced with your phone or tablet.


How can I attach MYLE TAP to my garment?

On the back of MYLE TAP has an aluminum bracket, with which you just clip it onto your clothes of choice.


Technical: Hardware


How can I connect MYLE TAP to my smartphone?

Charge your TAP device. Launch MYLE application on your smartphone. If you are using MYLE app for the first time, then select your device in its settings and read the readouts to confirm connectivity. Next time, when your MYLE TAP and your paired smartphone are within a Bluetooth range, the app and the device will connect automatically.


Does MYLE TAP need to be connected with my smartphone all the time?

No, MYLE TAP collects voice notes independently from the smartphone. Transfer of voice notes to the smartphone happens automatically whenever MYLE TAP and the smartphone are in Bluetooth range, and it doesn’t require user participation.


Can I connect my tablet to MYLE TAP?

Normally - yes. However, MYLE TAP utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) standard, so your tablet should support BLE. To find out, refer to your tablet user guide or contact the manufacturer. Other than that, it is not different from a smartphone.


May I connect my MYLE TAP to multiple smartphones or tablets?

Yes. Install MYLE App to each device you want to pair with MYLE TAP and run the same pairing procedure as usual. Your MYLE TAP will “talk” to any of these devices which happens to be in the Bluetooth range first. Once your data is processed in your personal Cloud Account, it becomes equally accessible from any of the paired devices.  


Can I use multiple MYLE TAPs with one mobile device?

Yes, eventually. This feature has not been fully tested as of today, but will be available by the time of commercial release.


What’s MYLE TAP battery life?

For an average user we estimate it to be able to last over one week.


How many messages can be saved in MYLE TAP memory? Can I upgrade the memory to store more notes?

MYLE TAP is capable of storing up to 2000 voice notes. Maximum preset length of each message is 30 seconds.


How are the saved notes transferred from MYLE TAP to my smartphone?

All communications within MYLE realm are based on our proprietary multi-stream Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) protocols.


Will my MYLE TAP notify me if its battery is low?

Yes. Once MYLE TAP requires charging, its red light indicator will start blinking. Additionally, via your MYLE App you can choose the beep alert as well.  


How long does the battery take to charge?

Around two hours from fully discharged state.


I don’t remember where I put it. Can I find it?

Yes. MYLE TAP has the Lost-&-Found feature. As long as your paired mobile device is in Bluetooth range, it will prompt your MYLE TAP to blink red and beep.


Will you expand the choice of MYLE TAP shell designs? Like rectangular, circle, etc.

At the start, there will be only one shape that gets the most votes from our supporters. But we’re already busy developing new shapes. Subscribe to our mailing list and let us know what you think – your ideas and your feedback is what will make MYLE successful.


There’s blue and red lights blinking, what does it mean?

The red light illuminates when the device is charging. Once the charge is complete, it will go off.  The blue light illuminates when the device becomes active and ready to record. It will go off once the recording is finished.


How can I turn off the TAP when I see it’s on?

Just wait for 3 seconds and the device will turn off automatically. The ON/OFF interval is customizable via MYLE App. Or, you can tap it twice.


Technical: Software


What mobile platforms will MYLE work with?

Currently iOS and Android only. Windows Phone 8 and Blackberry are coming soon.


What is  a “Mylet”?

It’s a single-purpose mini-application within MYLE App. It is focused on a specific problem and solution (e.g. sending your brilliant idea to your Evernote account; converting your words about an eaten apple into a calories intake report; etc.).


How can I install the Mylets?

Go to MYLE Market. Browse and choose the Mylet you like. Tap on the Mylet icon that you want. Then the Mylet icon is transferred automatically onto your MYLE App dashboard.


How many Mylets are there in MYLE Market?

At the moment we have two dozen Mylets for testing purposes. By the time MYLE TAP becomes commercially available there will be several hundred of them.


Is it possible to develop my own Mylet?

Yes. We have developed free MYLE SDK/API tools, named Constructor and Integrator, to help you easily design and develop your own Mylets. Required user-developer skill level – basic level of Java-Script and/or HTML 5. You can use your Mylet yourself AND share them with your friends and other users via MYLE Market.


Is it possible to link MYLE with my own application.

Yes, using our free MYLE SDK/API tools, Constructor and Integrator, you’ll be able to create your own mini-applications (Mylets) within MYLE environment (via Constructor) as well as integrate your existing applications with MYLE, its core and its data (via Integrator).


Will there be an SDK or API?

Yes, both are available and they are free.


Do I need to use MYLE Cloud Account?

Yes. All main processing is taking place in the Cloud.


What’s the technology behind MYLE platform?

Bluetooth Low Energy, nodejs, HTML 5, Cocoa, Java, Postgres, Linux, R, and a few others.


Privacy and Security


How secure is MYLE?

All communications from your smartphone to your cloud account are encrypted with SSL protocol. The weakest point of protection is your password. Ensure you have a strong one! On the cloud side we implemented proprietary math algorithms that make the saved data highly encrypted.


Will MYLE share my personal information with third parties?

No. You’re the sole owner of your data.


What if my TAP is stolen? Will the thief be able to access my personal data and notes?

No. The data is encrypted and cannot be read by a third-party tools.


Can I save and share my notes and thoughts with other users?

Yes. You have full control over your data and you can share it whenever and with whoever you want.


Purchasing and Shipping


What will be included into the shipping package?

One (1) MYLE TAP, one (1) charging station, one (1) charge cord, one (1) Quick-start Guide to help set up your MYLE.


What’s the warranty?

We provide 1 year limited warranty that protects you from manufacturing defects.


Can I get multiple perks?

Yes, you can back MYLE TAP campaign as many times as you want, and choose as many perks as you want.


Can I change or choose a different colour for my MYLE TAP?

When we achieve our first COLOURS stretch goal, we ask all backers to vote on additional colours. Based on your feedback we will add most popular – most voted for - colors and then you will be able to order from that expanded set of colors.


When is the soonest I can have my MYLE TAP shipped to me?

Our goal is to start shipping in Q4 2015.


What’s the shipping cost?

$20.


Do I need to add international shipping charges to Canada?

No, the price for both USA and Canada is the same.
story_txt:
MYLE TAP is a touch-activated wearable
voice recorder that helps you take notes and launch applications without having to touch your smartphone. Just tap MYLE TAP and say your thought, idea or instruction - MYLE TAP will instantly memorize it and take care of the rest.








MYLE TAP works with








Stretchgoals






How it works









Your day with MYLE TAP

Safely take notes while driving




With MYLE TAP, you can keep your focus on the road, where it should be. With just the touch of a finger, you can save and identify a song from the radio, send a text or audio message to somebody, or add a detour notification to help other people reach their homes faster.

Instantly capture ideas and share with your team




Need to jot down notes after the meeting, while they are still fresh in your head? One tap
and they are in your Salesforce account or in Slack. Now you can have a break with
a well-deserved caffeine shot, while your team evaluates your notes.

Post or tweet with your voice



When you
see or experience something exciting, MYLE TAP gives you the ability to instantly share it with your
friends. Post on your Facebook or Tweet it on the go using only your voice, and
never lose time reaching your smartphone. 


Count calories or remember a new recipe 






With a
single finger tap, MYLE TAP can give you ideas for your dinner based on your
last grocery shopping list. It can also count your consumed calories, incorporate them
into your calorie tracking app, so you can visualize the data via graphs and numbers. 




Capture outdoor experiences on the go



Make instant notes about your outdoor adventures. Hike, camp, kayak or fish,
knowing that MYLE will keep your memories and impressions intact - even if you
left your smartphone at home. 

Track your time with a single touch


We use multiple applications to run our busy daily lives. Using your voice is the simplest, fastest and most
natural way to manage these apps. Just tap, speak, and relax! Keep that happy smile on your face, courtesy of MYLE!


Remember everything without a smartphone


During your sports break or morning exercise you will not be carrying a
pen and a notepad. Often, not even a smartphone. When something dawns on you,
simply tap the TAP to capture it.




MYLE TAP can do much more









Why you need MYLE TAP

Do you know that...













...and it can save your time


Savings come from
all the time spent daily reaching for the smartphone, unlocking, opening apps,
putting the phone back, etc. On top of that, MYLE will save much more time via automating routines and 
accomplishing tasks that previously were completed manually. And you’ll remember everything. In
just one tap.


And it can save your money too



It's simple math: assuming the average hourly pay in US and Canada is $25, you can easily calculate your yearly savings: $25 (per hour/day) x 20 (working days/month) x 12 (months/year) = $6,000 of just direct savings in just one year. 


All that with a single finger tap. Awesome?







Why MYLE TAP is so cool
We developed an amazing easy-to-use product with virtually unlimited functionality, which enables you to harness the full power of your mind.







Who is MYLE TAP for?

Business persons

All day on the run, endless meetings, endless list of things to
remember, an avalanche of ideas… And simply not enough time for everything. A
single finger tap will effectively capture and memorize a customer inquiry or a
million dollar idea, and will track and optimize time… Easily and effectively.


Creative people



Hundreds, if not thousands, of ideas never strike on schedule. Pens, paper,
smartphones may not be within arm’s reach and it takes too much time and effort
to record. By then the idea will be gone. For creative types fountaining
with ideas, MYLE TAP is the perfect solution. Simply tap it and speak out your
next great idea.


Busy moms





Kids are wonderful, smart, adorable, interesting, as well as inquisitive, persistent and capable of consuming all your attention. For multi-multi-tasking moms life suddenly will become so much easier
with just one tap. Shopping and to-do lists populated as fast as you speak –
and never forgotten or missed. A funny phrase from your little one captured for
family chronicles and shared on Facebook. A new recipe arrives into the recipe
app. Time to recall how to have good time, again.


Health watchers





Our health is what we should care about. MYLE TAP helps you easily
stay focused on a diet or on exercising. Keep track of consumed and burnt calories, diets or gym activities. Just tap and speak out. MYLE will do the rest. 




Perks




Mind-powered product

We believe that everyone - not just rocket scientists and Sheldon Cooper - is smart and capable to make the world around us a little bit better. We believe that everyone does generate millions of brilliant ideas. Still, we understand that our lives are so full of destractions and we are constantly short of time. That hampers us in remembering all of our great ideas or plans and putting them to work.
This is what engaged us to create MYLE TAP, a product which will change the way we think and memorize things. However, our biggest passion is the capability to make our lives easier, more enjoyable and effective. In developing this product we followed three basic principles:
Simple. The MYLE TAP is totally easy and intuitive to use for anyone. It requires very little to adapt and learn.
Intelligent. MYLE TAP is smart, self-learning and is powered by an extremely advanced analytic engine. It is packed with features, yet remains totally user-friendly.
Customizable. MYLE TAP is a user-driven product and comes with several customization options. MYLE user can easily and almost infinitely add applications and adapt MYLE TAP to his or her particular needs and preferences.
 


Specifications














Software Development Kit

We talked to over 500 people about ways to make their lives easier. Their feedback helped
us design dozens of MYLE applications (called "Mylets") like "List of Thoughts", "Personal Budget", "Calories Counter" and others:



Of course,
we understand that 500 are only a drop in the ocean. And this is why we decided to create free SDK/API to
enable everyone to develop their own applications or integrate their existing apps with MYLE. We made extra effort to make this tool totally easy and user-friendly to use for everyone familiar with the basics of JavaScript, HTML, GitHub and frameworks. 
Interested? Contact us at sdk@getmyle.com. 













Service Plans
MYLE TAP includes the MYLE App and the standard free service package.  This will also include MYLE App free updates.
At a later date, after MYLE TAP shipments commence, optional service plans will become available for a fee. They will include such optional features as increased number of daily processed notes, more customized apps and ability to store events over a longer period of time. These premium plans still do not require signing a contract. Campaign contributions do not sign you up for a paid service plan. 


Why us?

We
experienced first-hand the pain of trying to memorize and later recall all our
ideas and thoughts, whether it's a casual thought to buy a milk on the way home tonight or a great idea on how to optimize an algorithm. As well, we wanted to not only remember everything but also make it beneficial. We
tried to use existing solutions, but quickly discovered their functional
limitations and amount of hassle involved when using them regularly. 
As we
talked with hundreds of people to gather some feedback to our idea, and quickly found
how common this problem is. People of all ages and from all walks of life
confessed to having the same trouble of keeping their thoughts remembered and turning them into actions.
Inspired by
the desire to make life easier for so many people as well as for ourselves, we
committed to building our own solution. It would be totally simple and easy to
use - just tap and talk - yet be intelligent and endlessly customizable. 
To achieve this goal
we assembled a dynamic and passionate team of scientists, engineers and
entrepreneurs with a formidable intellectual power. We got strong support not
just from families and friends, but also from experienced advisors in the tech
industry. We believe that together we will make MYLE TAP a success. And ultimately will Make Your
Life Easier.





Product Development







We started with crude 3D printer moldings and a bunch of wild ideas. We diligently, passionately and  tirelessly worked through various development stages. Hardware, software, firmware, system architecture, patents. We successfully went through all these challenges to now have fully functional wearable prototypes, backed by software platform and constantly growing number of MYLE Applications.







Why we need your support


To date, we have built several prototype devices and software applications, that are being tried by alpha-testers. We need your support to complete the developement stage and start manufacturing the commercial product. Your contributions will help turn the MYLE vision into a reality and help the MYLE team to bring this exciting product to the market.
The funds you contribute will be used to:

Finalize charging dock design
Order injection mold tooling
Finalize application and cloud platform
Pay for initial cost of goods; and
Most importantly, deliver the MYLE TAP to you!


Oh and we’re also looking for a smart and extremely creative Marketing
Manager who will help us deliver our brilliant idea to the mass market. Is that
you? Help us to build your professional future ;)









Timeline









Thank you!



Thank you for all your support and feedback! We couldn't have gotten as far as we have now without our families, friends, backers, mentors, and all the wonderful tech community. We are endlessly grateful and can't wait to bring MYLE TAP to market.


Risks and challenges

We are
realists and are completely open about the possible obstacles that may delay
your  MYLE TAP delivery. Having
considered all possible risks we are sharing the main ones, so you know what we
are dealing with.


Component supply: MYLE TAP is built
using a significant amount of components coming from multiple global suppliers,
which have different lead times. If any of these suppliers amends or extends
their agreed lead times, this will disturb or delay the entire production
cycle. To prevent this we are actively searching for reserve suppliers for TAP
components.
Design changes and enhancements: Once the
production has started, there will be several 
parameters that can be changed or diversified  in order to improve your experience with TAP.
Adding new shell shapes, expanding colour palette, increasing data transfer
speed, etc. Making such enhancements during production can be challenging and
potentially affect deliveries. We try to accomodate such changes in advance to
ensure that TAP ships with superior quality.
Shipping and customs: When shipping starts,
there will always be a risk of the logistical delays caused by freighters,
shipments getting stuck in Customs. It may happen either when we are receiving
the products from the factory, or when shipping them to you. We are working on
building our supply chain as reliable as we can and hope there won't be any
delays.





MYLE Team




Pavel Bondarev, Co-founder, CEO. [@LinkedIn]PhD in Math and Computer Science with over 20 years experience in Algorithms and Predictive Analytics resulted in many successful projects. The brainpower, the heart and the engine of the project.





Alex Vetsak, Co-founder, COO. [@LinkedIn]Over 10 years experience in Computer Science, Project management and
Business Development. A natural born
project manager. A MYLE within MYLE, he just makes things happen.





Evgeny Gerasimov, Electronics Engineering Lead.Hardware know-everything and go-to. Looks for challenges and opportunities to pack hugely powerful capabilities in a relatively tiny gadgets.





Sergei Agalakov, Senior Database Architect.A seasoned data management and enterprise architecture professional, focused on scalable cloud-based architecture with ensured high availability, unmatched security and performance.





Mikalai Silivonik, Software Development Lead.Software guru and enthusiast with diverse experiense in mobile application and cloud system development. Capable of turning a brilliant idea to a great software product faster than light speed.






Other than the MYLE core team, we assempled 12 smart minds, experts in Computer Science, Math, Electronics, Engineering and Design, all over the world (Canada, US, Russia, Belarus, Vietnam, Korea and UK) who believe in this great idea and dedicate themselves to the MYLE project.




F.A.Q.

About MYLE

Why should I care about instantly capturing my thoughts? 
Because it’s so easy to forget them… Every single thought has value. One
single thought can drive you to your dream, but usually it takes hundreds of
thoughts and, most importantly, to review them on an iterative basis, before
you achieve your goal and make your dream true.

Will
MYLE really make my life easier?
It has already made our lives easier. We believe it will help you. That’s why we offer it for
you.

Why did you call it MYLE TAP?
It is
an acronym. MYLE: “Makes Your Life Easier” when you Think, Act and Perform (TAP)
on your thoughts via a single fingertap.

What’s the difference between MYLE TAP and SIRI?
The
only commonality between SIRI and MYLE is that both are voice powered
solutions. Everything else is different. Here are some main points:
a). 
MYLE does not pretend to have a mind of its own and argue
with you, nor it will endlessly ask for clarifications, distracting you and
losing your precious time. With MYLE, its user is fully in charge of the instant
data input that requires minimum distraction. 
b). 
SIRI is an advanced search engine positioned as a personal
assistant designed to execute a limited set of tasks. Once the task is
processed, SIRI “forgets” it. You cannot revisit the note. 
MYLE’s goal is to
be your mind and memory backer and its goal is not only execute your orders but
also to remember and categorize your thoughts and ideas as well as streamline
your daily routines via automation, timely reminders and advice. All your notes
are accessible at later time, until you decide to erase them. 
c). 
MYLE TAP can operate independently without any smartphone,
while SIRI is a part of your phone. 
d). 
With MYLE you are the owner of your data and no one but you
is able to access, use, share and utilize it.

I’m
using apps like Evernote to save my
ideas. Why do I still need MYLE?
MYLE
is not a substitute to Evernote or to
any other system. Rather, through instantly capturing your voice notes in the
simplest and most natural way – by voice – MYLE simplifies and streamlines saving
of your thoughts and notes into your existing systems that you use and already
accustomed to. Like Evernote. And you
don’t need to have your mobile devices in hand all the time. 

Is
there any reason to use MYLE for my business team?
Definitely: if you have total involvement in your business matters and you move
around a lot. If you want to share your thoughts, ideas, know statuses of your
tasks, improve your team’s and your own efficiency by not losing important
pieces of data. Having MYLE makes teamwork easier and more productive, because
we often happen to be struck by brilliant ideas in the most inappropriate time. Yet with MYLE you can capture them and share
with your team members. Like, saying “Slack, we need to add the predictive
analytics feature to the project” and your note will be shared with your team
in your Slack team-channel.

Can I use
MYLE app without TAP?
Technically yes, however our goal is to make your life easier by simplifying your
daily routines and operations. We believe it is only achievable by a
combination of instant thought catching and saving that can be done anywhere
and at any time. We developed MYLE application and TAP device for this
particular purpose. Without the TAP piece, MYLE app would be just another organizing
application that you will get bored of using in a few days.

Why
can't I use a simple microphone instead of MYLE TAP?
You
can, but why would you? You would lose all the convenience and freedom you
enjoy with MYLE TAP. The simple microphone would also limit a number of
applications that you can use with it. 

Using your MYLE

How
hard it is for a non-technical person to set up the MYLE TAP?
Very
easy. Install the MYLE App as you would any other application. Start it, and
once inside, just choose “Connect”. MYLE will do the rest automatically.

What
is the speech to text recognition quality?
So
far we test-proved it in 9 languages, using native speakers. That includes
English, Spanish, French, Japanese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish and Portuguese.
During a 60-days testing we’ve averaged the quality of up to 95%. The system has
a serious self-learning capability, that with time, as it learns your speech
and vocabulary, accuracy reaches to 95%-100% range.

Is English
the only language MYLE recognizes? What other languages you support in your
app?
MYLE
supports over 40 languages. Voice recognition is provided by NUANCE
Voice-to-text service. Additionally through MYLE self-learning algorithms, we
can improve voice recognition quality by analyzing your speech and vocabulary.

I
work in a noisy environment. Will my notes be still recognized?
It
depends on how noisy it is. Based on our own experience – and our meetings are
held in a small room with many attendees, so it can be pretty noisy - MYLE TAP still
manages to work fine. Within MYLE App you can fine-tune MYLE TAP to the
background noise level. In most cases it cuts off all surrounding noise.

What
if the recognition is incorrect and I checked the text note on the phone much
later. Can I play back my original voice note?
Yes, the
notes are saved as well. In your mobile device access MYLE App, find the note
you need and tap [PLAY] button. If you still need your note, you can then make
corrections to the processed text.

Can I
set different number of taps for different functions?
1, 2
and 3 taps are reserved for system purposes. Otherwise, you can set up any
number of controlling taps as you want. However, we’ve found that once the
number of tapping combinations exceeds 3, remembering their meanings becomes
difficult. Which defies the very purpose of MYLE – simply making your life easier.

What
is the maximum length of a single voice message?
Currently,
we limited it at 30 seconds. The user can set his or her own message duration
via settings in MYLE App.

Can I
activate sound notifications from MYLE TAP?
Yes,
you can do it by accessing settings in your MYLE App.

Will
MYLE TAP talk back to me?
It will not. For the sake of simplicity,
efficiency and minimum distraction, as well as our alpha-testers surveys we
decided that we do not need yet another talking partner. Notes are captured
quietly, instantly and in most cases you don’t need your device to “Roger
That”.

Does MYLE
TAP track my activities like other tracking gadgets do? Like, can I measure burnt
calories and steps I took in a day?
Yes you
can, but in a more enhanced way. You set up your goal and then save all notes
and steps you make achieving this goal. As an example, number of calories you
burn per day. After every meal tell MYLE what you ate to count consumed
calories. Tell MYLE when you start exercising and it will activate the accelerometer to count burnt calories. All the results and analytics can be found later
in your favorite activity tracking app or in your MYLE cloud account.

What
if TAP is fully discharged. Will I lose all my saved notes?
No,
you will not lose them. Recharge your MYLE TAP and once you have your paired
mobile device within Bluetooth range, all your saved voice notes will be synced
with your phone or tablet.

How
can I attach MYLE TAP to my garment?
On
the back of MYLE TAP has an aluminum bracket, with which you just clip it onto
your clothes of choice.

Technical: Hardware

How
can I connect MYLE TAP to my smartphone?
Charge your TAP device. Launch MYLE application on your smartphone. If you are
using MYLE app for the first time, then select your device in its settings and
read the readouts to confirm connectivity. Next time, when your MYLE TAP and
your paired smartphone are within a Bluetooth range, the app and the device
will connect automatically.

Does
MYLE TAP need to be connected with my smartphone all the time?
No,
MYLE TAP collects voice notes independently from the smartphone. Transfer of
voice notes to the smartphone happens automatically whenever MYLE TAP and the
smartphone are in Bluetooth range, and it doesn’t require user participation.

Can I
connect my tablet to MYLE TAP?
Normally - yes. However, MYLE TAP utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) standard,
so your tablet should support BLE. To find out, refer to your tablet user guide
or contact the manufacturer. Other than that, it is not different from a
smartphone.

May I
connect my MYLE TAP to multiple smartphones or tablets?
Yes.
Install MYLE App to each device you want to pair with MYLE TAP and run the same
pairing procedure as usual. Your MYLE TAP will “talk” to any of these devices
which happens to be in the Bluetooth range first. Once your data is processed
in your personal Cloud Account, it becomes equally accessible from any of the
paired devices.  

Can I
use multiple MYLE TAPs with one mobile device?
Yes,
eventually. This feature has not been fully tested as of today, but will be
available by the time of commercial release. 

What’s MYLE TAP battery life?
For
an average user we estimate it to be able to last over one week.

How
many messages can be saved in MYLE TAP memory? Can I upgrade the memory to
store more notes?
MYLE
TAP is capable of storing up to 2000 voice notes. Maximum preset length of each
message is 30 seconds.

How
are the saved notes transferred from MYLE TAP to my smartphone?
All
communications within MYLE realm are based on our proprietary multi-stream
Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) protocols.

Will
my MYLE TAP notify me if its battery is low?
Yes.
Once MYLE TAP requires charging, its red light indicator will start blinking.
Additionally, via your MYLE App you can choose the beep alert as well.  

How
long does the battery take to charge?
Around two hours from fully discharged state.

I
don’t remember where I put it. Can I find it?
Yes.
MYLE TAP has the Lost-&-Found feature. As long as your paired mobile device
is in Bluetooth range, it will prompt your MYLE TAP to blink red and beep.

Will
you expand the choice of MYLE TAP shell designs? Like rectangular, circle, etc.
At
the start, there will be only one shape that gets the most votes from our supporters.
But we’re already busy developing new shapes. Subscribe to our mailing list and
let us know what you think – your ideas and your feedback is what will make
MYLE successful. 

There’s blue and red lights blinking, what does it mean? 
The red
light illuminates when the device is charging. Once the charge is complete, it
will go off.  The blue light illuminates
when the device becomes active and ready to record. It will go off once the
recording is finished. 

How
can I turn off the TAP when I see it’s on?
Just wait for 3 seconds and the device will turn off automatically. The ON/OFF
interval is customizable via MYLE App. Or, you can tap it twice.

Technical: Software

What
mobile platforms will MYLE work with?
Currently iOS and Android
only. Windows Phone 8 and Blackberry are coming soon.

What
is  a “Mylet”?
It’s
a single-purpose mini-application within MYLE App. It is focused on a specific
problem and solution (e.g. sending your brilliant idea to your Evernote
account; converting your words about an eaten apple into a calories intake report;
etc.).

How
can I install the Mylets?
Go to
MYLE Market. Browse and choose the Mylet you like. Tap on the Mylet icon that
you want. Then the Mylet icon is transferred automatically onto your MYLE App dashboard.

How
many Mylets are there in MYLE Market?
At
the moment we have two dozen Mylets for testing purposes. By the time MYLE TAP
becomes commercially available there will be several hundred of them.

Is it
possible to develop my own Mylet?
Yes. We
have developed free MYLE SDK/API tools, named Constructor and Integrator, to
help you easily design and develop your own Mylets. Required user-developer
skill level – basic level of Java-Script and/or HTML 5. You can use your Mylet
yourself AND share them with your friends and other users via MYLE Market. 

Is it
possible to link MYLE with my own application.
Yes,
using our free MYLE SDK/API tools, Constructor and Integrator, you’ll be able
to create your own mini-applications (Mylets) within MYLE environment (via
Constructor) as well as integrate your existing applications with MYLE, its
core and its data (via Integrator).

Will
there be an SDK or API?
Yes,
both are available and they are free.

Do I
need to use MYLE Cloud Account?
Yes.
All main processing is taking place in the Cloud.

What’s the technology behind MYLE platform?
Bluetooth Low Energy, nodejs,
HTML 5, Cocoa, Java, Postgres, Linux, R, and a few others.

Privacy and Security

How secure is MYLE?
All communications from your smartphone to your cloud
account are encrypted with SSL protocol. The weakest point of protection is
your password. Ensure you have a strong one! On the cloud side we implemented
proprietary math algorithms that make the saved data highly encrypted.

Will MYLE share my personal information with third parties?
No. You’re the sole owner of your data.

What if my TAP is stolen? Will the thief be able to access
my personal data and notes?
No. The data is encrypted and cannot be read by a
third-party tools. 

Can I save and share my notes and thoughts with other
users?
Yes. You have full control over your data and you can
share it whenever and with whoever you want.

Purchasing and Shipping

What will be included into the shipping package?
One (1) MYLE TAP, one (1) charging station, one (1) charge
cord, one (1) Quick-start Guide to help set up your MYLE.

What’s the warranty?
We provide 1 year limited warranty that protects you
from manufacturing defects.

Can I get multiple perks?
Yes, you can back MYLE TAP campaign as many times as you
want, and choose as many perks as you want.

Can I change or choose a different colour for my MYLE TAP?
When we achieve our first COLOURS stretch goal, we ask all
backers to vote on additional colours. Based on your feedback we will add most
popular – most voted for - colors and then you will be able to order from that
expanded set of colors.

When is the soonest I can have my MYLE TAP shipped to me?
Our goal is to start shipping in Q4 2015.

What’s the shipping cost?
$20.

Do I need to add international shipping charges to Canada?
No, the price for both USA and Canada is the same.

story:
Ottm is the most unique Smartwatch band yet. Each one is crafted from hand-selected wood and treated with tung oil for a smooth finish. The result is a watchband that is completely unique to you, no two bands are the same. Pair it with your Apple Watch, Android Wear or Pebble Watch.

Press Release | Press Quality Images | Video

"If this article reads a bit glowingly, it’s because this is one of our favorite crowdsourced projects that we’ve seen in the last few weeks." - Android Authority

"The Watch Bands Apple Should Have Made" - iPhonelife

"Remember those beautiful hardwood Apple Watch straps we mentioned a few days ago?" - Mackungfu


A subdued wood hailing from Canada, Maple's light cream color and straight grain make for an understated companion to your smartwatch. Comes in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.


Most known for it's striking finish, Zebrawood is used in fine woodcraft in everything from veneer to turned pens. The most distinct of our bands, Zebrawood commands attention. Native to Western Africa, it is widely considered to be a luxury hardwood. Available in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.


Prized for it's fragrance, Sandal Wood is widely used across Asia in incense and oils. The Sandalwood band is two toned: a striking earthy red hue contrasting a cafe noir subtly drawing attention . Available in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.



Each pledge plants a tree in an American national forest, we want to give back and make sure that future generations can benefit from the world's most renewable resource. 



1. Made with real wood: We've sourced three hardwoods to fit your wrist. Maple, Zebrawood and Sandalwood are the real deal.

2. Handcrafted and responsibly sourced: Each band is made by hand, a rustic touch that is subtle but appreciated.

3. Form, Function and Durability: Subtly rounded corners, sanded to a smooth finish - each band feels incredibly comfortable on your wrist and will go the distance with you.

4. Unique: Each band has its own grain, no two are alike.

5. Swappability: Easily change out one style of Ottm for another, or go back to using another band.

6. A commitment to Sustainability: Each band plants a tree.

6. Compatibility: Ottm fits all Apple Watches and supports Pebble Time, Original Pebble, Moto 360V1 (with steel connector), Moto 360V2 46mm, LG Urbane, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch, etc
Check our list for full compatibility results




 

I've grown up surrounded by the redwoods of the Santa Cruz mountains. Wood is a remarkable material, it's cool to the touch but not cold like metal. It feels natural on your wrist and the smooth polish imparts an amazing feeling. Lay your hand on any fine crafted wooden good and run your hand along the surface, it's a feel that no artificial material can recreate, it just feels RIGHT.

These bands impart an individuality and uniqueness to a smartwatch that hasn't been seen yet. In contrast to the dozens of identically machined bands out there, wood creates truly unique pieces.


We've set an agressive timetable to get Ottm on your wrist. We are looking to get Ottm in your hands June/July. Customs, QA and additional Android Wear device release testing may push delivery closer to the end of July than June.



We have several production ready prototypes ready and waiting, but we need your help to go into production. So far, my friends and family have helped fund the first leg of Ottm, but to get to the next chapter we need your support! Help us fund the next chapter, get a band, help bring a startup to life and get a really cool watchband to flaunt.





Q; When do you expect to ship Ottm? 
We are projecting Mid to late May as the shipdate for Ottm bands. Some backers may receive their bands sooner than others.
Q: Are the bands adjustable?
Yes, we use the same adjustment pin system that luxury Swiss watches use. You can resize your band at a jeweler or Watch retailer or alternatively use a re-sizing system purchased online or provided by us (if we reach our stretch goal).
Q: Will I get splinters? 
No, the wood has been sanded down and then treated with Tung oil - there is no coarseness or roughness and no chance of splinters.
Q: Do you plan on offering other woods? 
Not at the moment.
Q: Do you offer Apple/Android/Pebble adapters in the Space Gray/Gold color? 
No, to reduce cost and complexity, all adapters are in silver.
Q: Why aren't there more wood puns?
 I woodn't know.




We've already identified and have communicated with two factories on producing Ottm at a cost that is acceptable. Our chief concern would be around timing - it's possible that delays in manufacturing or more likely issues with customs and shipping could cause the delivery date of perks to slip by 1 month. We may also delay Android Wear by a little bit if a major new release (next 360, Huawei Watch, etc) is announced/shipped. We plan on testing and modifying band vertical/horizontal clearance as necessary for these new devices.

We will endeavor to be as transparent as possible about shipping and the production schedule. Backers will be first to know when they'll be getting an Ottm band. Updates will be posted here and on www.getottm.com


Thank you to the following folks:

  • Sydney Kasahara and Greg Er for their great work directing and filming the campaign's video
  • My Family for supporting the campaign for early on and the initial prototypes.
  • Justis Earle, for giving his insight into his own crowdfunding campaign.
  • Tom Padula, helping me with my initial crack at editing the video.
  • Music from Jukedeck - create your own at jukedeck.com (the song in the video)
story_txt:
Ottm is the most unique Smartwatch band yet. Each one is crafted from hand-selected wood and treated with tung oil for a smooth finish. The result is a watchband that is completely unique to you, no two bands are the same. Pair it with your Apple Watch, Android Wear or Pebble Watch.


Press Release | Press Quality Images | Video
"If this article reads a bit glowingly, it’s because this is one of our favorite crowdsourced projects that we’ve seen in the last few weeks." - Android Authority
"The Watch Bands Apple Should Have Made" - iPhonelife
"Remember those beautiful hardwood Apple Watch straps we mentioned a few days ago?" - Mackungfu






A subdued wood hailing from Canada, Maple's light cream color and straight grain make for an understated companion to your smartwatch. Comes in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.




Most known for it's striking finish, Zebrawood is used in fine woodcraft in everything from veneer to turned pens. The most distinct of our bands, Zebrawood commands attention. Native to Western Africa, it is widely considered to be a luxury hardwood. Available in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.




Prized for it's fragrance, Sandal Wood is widely used across Asia in incense and oils. The Sandalwood band is two toned: a striking earthy red hue contrasting a cafe noir subtly drawing attention . Available in 38/42mm Silver for Apple Watch and 22mm Silver for Android Wear and Pebble/Pebble Time.




Each pledge plants a tree in an American national forest, we want to give back and make sure that future generations can benefit from the world's most renewable resource. 




1. Made with real wood: We've sourced three hardwoods to fit your wrist. Maple, Zebrawood and Sandalwood are the real deal.
2. Handcrafted and responsibly sourced: Each band is made by hand, a rustic touch that is subtle but appreciated.
3. Form, Function and Durability: Subtly rounded corners, sanded to a smooth finish - each band feels incredibly comfortable on your wrist and will go the distance with you.
4. Unique: Each band has its own grain, no two are alike.
5. Swappability: Easily change out one style of Ottm for another, or go back to using another band.
6. A commitment to Sustainability: Each band plants a tree.6. Compatibility: Ottm fits all Apple Watches and supports Pebble Time, Original Pebble, Moto 360V1 (with steel connector), Moto 360V2 46mm, LG Urbane, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch, etcCheck our list for full compatibility results



















 

I've grown up surrounded by the redwoods of the Santa Cruz mountains. Wood is a remarkable material, it's cool to the touch but not cold like metal. It feels natural on your wrist and the smooth polish imparts an amazing feeling. Lay your hand on any fine crafted wooden good and run your hand along the surface, it's a feel that no artificial material can recreate, it just feels RIGHT.
These bands impart an individuality and uniqueness to a smartwatch that hasn't been seen yet. In contrast to the dozens of identically machined bands out there, wood creates truly unique pieces.





We've set an agressive timetable to get Ottm on your wrist. We are looking to get Ottm in your hands June/July. Customs, QA and additional Android Wear device release testing may push delivery closer to the end of July than June.






We have several production ready prototypes ready and waiting, but we need your help to go into production. So far, my friends and family have helped fund the first leg of Ottm, but to get to the next chapter we need your support! Help us fund the next chapter, get a band, help bring a startup to life and get a really cool watchband to flaunt.











Q; When do you expect to ship Ottm? 
We are projecting Mid to late May as the shipdate for Ottm bands. Some backers may receive their bands sooner than others.

Q: Are the bands adjustable?

Yes, we use the same adjustment pin system that luxury Swiss watches use. You can resize your band at a jeweler or Watch retailer or alternatively use a re-sizing system purchased online or provided by us (if we reach our stretch goal).
Q: Will I get splinters? 
No, the wood has been sanded down and then treated with Tung oil - there is no coarseness or roughness and no chance of splinters.
Q: Do you plan on offering other woods? 
Not at the moment.
Q: Do you offer Apple/Android/Pebble adapters in the Space Gray/Gold color? 
No, to reduce cost and complexity, all adapters are in silver.
Q: Why aren't there more wood puns?
 I woodn't know.   






    

 We've already identified and have communicated with two factories on producing Ottm at a cost that is acceptable. Our chief concern would be around timing - it's possible that delays in manufacturing or more likely issues with customs and shipping could cause the delivery date of perks to slip by 1 month. We may also delay Android Wear by a little bit if a major new release (next 360, Huawei Watch, etc) is announced/shipped. We plan on testing and modifying band vertical/horizontal clearance as necessary for these new devices.We will endeavor to be as transparent as possible about shipping and the production schedule. Backers will be first to know when they'll be getting an Ottm band. Updates will be posted here and on www.getottm.com
    


Thank you to the following folks:


Sydney Kasahara and Greg Er for their great work directing and filming the campaign's video
My Family for supporting the campaign for early on and the initial prototypes.
Justis Earle, for giving his insight into his own crowdfunding campaign.
Tom Padula, helping me with my initial crack at editing the video.
