All main components, including motherboard with CPU and memory, communication ports, 3G, Wi-Fi, FM modules, SIM slot is  taken out to the coordination module. There is a special connector located on the back side of the control panel used to connect to the coordination module. This module is designed to be mounted inside the dwelling. The coordination module features a built-in alarm siren that can be activated on movement detection or electronic seals corruption. This behavior can be configured by device administrator.Engineering drawing: items descriptionEngineering drawing: device mouldingFour mounting holes and one cable hole need to be drilled to attach the external panel to the door or wall. The rear (internal) camera is connected to coordination module and installed separately (rear camera is available depending on device build). In that way, a complete system can be installed after drilling nine holes in total: five for the external panel and four for the internal module. The cable length between main panel and coordination module can be up to twenty six feet long.Color range.We have chosen colors based on the ones that are used in the building and the door decoration, so they are not as rich and deep as for example, Apple used for iPhone 5c. Imagine how it would look bright yellow device on the dark brown door.
VITAphoneneo has complex antitheft system.«But this device, mounted right near or directly on my door will surely attract the attention of a thief» - You may think. Don't worry! We have done our best to make theft almost impossible and meaningless. That's because:

VITAphoneneo has an ultra-durable steel body, so any attempts to pry it open with a screwdriver will just not work.
Mounting bolts are protected by special covers with locks, that can be opened by the key. All four mounting loops are protected by the electronic seals.
In case a would-be vandal still managed to cut off the device, it will be completely non-functional without the communication module anyway. There is no sense in stealing the external front panel because it just can't work without the paired communication module.
Our device is equipped with a camera and motion sensor. The remote server video recording service will be immediately automatically activated as soon as a would-be thief approaches the VITAphoneneo.
In case of unauthorized violation of the electronic seal on any of the mounting bolts, an alarm will sound and your own personalized recorded message will be played (e. g., «MOVE AWAY FROM THE DOOR AND LEAVE! THE POLICE ARE BEING CALLED!» ) There is a configurable option that can intended to send a notification to the house owner or to make an emergency call to 911.
Clearly, there is no reason in the world for a thief to even try and steal the device.
Our stretch goalAs of now we have a working «VITAphoneneo Basic» draft version prototype and a full-featured client application for Android OS. Client software for most popular platforms: iOS, BlackberryOS, Windows Phone, Symbian and a web-client will be completed, when a $250,000 goal will be reached.You can preorder any of the stretch-goal models. In case if we will not reach target goal, you will receive most advanced model and a partial refund, with difference amount.
Perks and prices.Special offers!Harley Davidson «Fat Boy» for the share!Perk price: FREE - You can follow our campaign and share a link to it in social networks and become a participant completely FREE!Perk price: $3.00 - Non-refundable donation to participate in raffle without any needs to share and/or follow our campaign.Vitaliy was going to sell his motorcycle, Harley Davidson Fat Boy and invest the proceeds in VITAphoneneo promotion. But he decided that it would be better to just donate it to one of our backers who supported our project. We will raffle the Fat Boy randomly when the campaign goal will be reached. To participate in the raffle you have to follow the project and share it with your friends in social networks. If You don't want to follow or share the project, You can donate just $3 and become a participant of the draw. Use our $3 perk to donate.Vitaliy's «Fat Boy»Early birds awesome discounts.We decided to make a special discount for our first backers. Discount is limited only to VITAphoneneo Mini and VITAphoneneo Basic versions. Only first three hundreds of VITAphoneneo Mini and VITAphoneneo Basic devices will be sold at special price. Hurry up!The challenge for referrals.Perk price: FREE - 10 free pieces of VITAphoneneo Basic for our TOP-10 referrers.Want to get VITAphoneneo for free? It's easy! We will give a free «VITAphoneneo Basic» device for every user from the top 10 referrals list. We will periodically post an updated list of referrals to the campaign, so you will be able to keep track of the progress. Invite your siblings, friends and other potential backers to our project - it is suitable to all and sundry. The more backers you invite - the more chances you will have to win the challenge.Perks description.The retail VITAphoneneo price will be $479 for entry-level model and up to $689 for the full-featured «all-in-one» version. During our crowdfunding campaign we offer steep discounts on pre-order pricing for as low as $319 up to $529 respectively.We provide WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING for all VITAphoneneo versions!Perk price: $1.00 - Thanks for your contribution - Thank you very much for your donation. Your contribution has made us one little step closer to the goal.«Thank you» card for our backersPerk price: $319.00 - VITAphoneneo Mini – this build is almost identical to the «Basic» version (see below) except for a smaller 7.0 inches display size.Approximate retail price: $479.00.VITAphoneneo Mini(Device color: SKY, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $329.00 - VITAphoneneo Basic – this is the model for the budget-minded. It features all standard entryphone functions and is equipped with single IR-camera, PIR motion sensor, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth adapters, internal and external (protected charging) USB ports, mobile data connectivity, 100Base-TX Ethernet, two speakers, microphone, alarm siren and has built-in temperature and humidity sensors. This version has a built-in biometric scanner that can be used to control an electrical door lock system. This version is designed to install mainly to apartment or house door.Approximate retail price: $489.00.VITAphoneneo Basic(Device color: VERY VANILLA, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $379.00 - VITAphoneneo Standard – this is a mid-range build. It features all the same functionality as «Basic», but additionally has a rear camera. It also supports the DLNA protocol. This version is most useful for installation in a stairwell.Approximate retail price: $539.00.VITAphoneneo Standard(Device color: SMOKE, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $429.00 - VITAphoneneo Multimedia – this build features an FM radio module, HDMI connector, WiDi technology and GSM module with phone call support. It allows connections to an external display to show information or playback video stream right from the device. This version can be used in public places to provide a broad range of services from simple Wi-Fi HotSpot up to advertisements streaming over multiple external displays.Approximate retail price: $589.00.VITAphoneneo Multimedia(Device color: RIVER ROCK, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Security – this is a worthy alternative to full-featured alarm and security systems. It features all the same functionality, described in «Basic» version. Additionally, it provides a way to handle image streaming and recording from multiple cameras. It has internal and external GPS support, GSM module as well as WiDi and HDMI technologies support.Approximate retail price: $639.00.VITAphoneneo Security(Device color: LIGHT MOKA, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Auto – this build is designed to be installed in a vehicle such as a car. It features GPS-tracking capability, security and alarm systems that allows remote control of door locks and starting the engine. This version can be mounted on the dashboard, headrest, etc.. Biometric scanners can be installed on the doors and ignition. This device does not include any built-in cameras or motion sensors, but supports connecting up to 4 external ones: front, rear and two sides. Cameras can work as a parking helper, DVR or security system. This version can be connected to a car's audio system. Thanks to voice commands you can control engine - start and stop, manage security alarm system, door locks, audio system and GPS navigation. We have not yet finally decided about the screen size of this model. Possibly we will equip this device with portrait oriented 17-inch screen like Tesla motors does in it's cars. Please, give your opinion about screen size into campaign comments.Approximate retail price: $639.00.VITAphoneneo Auto(Device color: CINNAMON, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $529.00 - VITAphoneneo Professional – this is an «all-in-one», full-featured build, that provides all aforementioned functions and technologies (except for «Auto» version features).Approximate retail price: $689.00.VITAphoneneo Professional(Device color: SLATE GRAY, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $449.00 - VITAphoneneo Custom version – we will design and assemble the device with the features that you choose from those available. This model can be equipped with a custom-sized LCD display and include any described features. This version is highly business-oriented, as it allows you to create model that best meets all of your business requirements. Price indicated for a 13.3-inch multimedia version. Contact us with required build details to get exact pricing and deadlines.VITAphoneneo Custom(Device color: CHOCOLATE CHIP, all other colors are available for preorder).Remember - You can always can get together with fellow tenants in your apartment building and pool your resources to make the purchase allowing everyone to enjoy the benefits while saving money.
The VITAphoneneo StoryVITAphoneneo was born in Brooklyn, New York. Vitaliy lived at that time in Florida and in February, 2014 he came to Brooklyn to visit his mother. I (Igor) was living not far from his mother’s house at that time. Taking this opportunity and in spite of the terrible weather Vitaliy decided to drop by and visit me.Winter 2013-2014 was among the coldest on record and in those days there was a heavy snowfall in Brooklyn. I was home and delved into my garage (I can’t remember what I was looking for, but it doesn’t matter anyway). Vitaliy rang my doorbell for a long time, since he knew I was home since the light was on in my kitchen.Vitaliy began to freeze after about 5 minutes of trying to get me to come to the door. He took out his smartphone that flatly refused to work because he was wearing gloves and couldn't properly work his phone. Even after he took his gloves off, he had no luck because it was too cold for his phone's touchscreen to work.Vitaily then went to a nearby cafe and ordered tea to keep warm. After a few minutes, his smartphone warmed and started working again and Vitaliy called me. We talked and after he finished his tea he went to my house again. This time of course I was waiting for him.During the discussion of the occurred incident Vitaliy suddenly noticed: It would be cool if your entryphone could call directly to your smartphone. That evening we sat and chatted for a while and then Vitaly went home.The next evening Vitaliy come to me with an USB pendrive and presented a new awesome project to me - VITAphoneneo. Since then we added new features almost every hour and nothing could stop us until we ended up developing the VITAphoneneo which we are now introducing to you.We spent six months in planning and preparing VITAphoneneo and now we are ready to start device production.
Who Can Benefit from VITAphoneneo?From the beginning VITAphoneneo was just a simple entryphone replacement with an Internet connection that allows anyone to «receive visitors» online using their smartphone.At that time we had no idea how this project will grow, but right now we know that VITAphoneneo is useful literally for absolutely everyone! Now VITAphoneneo is not just a smart cloud intercom - it is a complex security system for your house, your business, your car, bike or boat as well as an interactive vehicle management system and DVR. VITAphoneneo can completely replace an existing visitor management system in your office. VITAphoneneo is an the heart of communication infrastructure that features notification, communication and organizational capabilities for residents of any home or apartment or office building.Imagine: you have an urgent business trip and you are flying out of town. At the same time your mom suddenly decided to drop in for a visit and nobody's there to give her a warm welcome or even let her in. Thanks to VITAphoneneo, this is no longer a problem - you can remotely open the door, add her fingerprint into VITAphone's database or authorize her smartphone to control your device with just a few touches on your smartphone. You can talk with your mom right there from the airplane.And this is just one of dozens of different scenarios. During preparation, planning and development of the system we have discovered hundreds and thousands of similar stories and we continue to discover more and more opportunities to use VITAphoneneo and make life easier.So, if after reading this information you still think that VITAphoneneo is not suitable for you, it is likely that you just yet haven’t realized all the possibilities VITAphoneneo has - they are almost endless.And if you come up with new and unique usage for VITAphoneneo, that makes it even bigger and better - we always happy to hear it and improve our device based on your suggestions!Authors of the best ideas will be rewarded with the free VITAphoneneo device that will be improved based on their ideas.
Why Crowdfunding?During the project preparation and development stages we have repeatedly raised the question about project financing. We considered various options on how to obtain money required to complete the project and start production.After repeated evaluations of all pros and cons of borrowing money, start-up investments from outside investors and our own savings, we realized that we needed something totally different, something new and unique, as all evaluated options had more cons than pros.Now, with our project in its final stage, we can’t think of anything better than crowdfunding to provide the money we need to make our idea a reality. That's because we can get the funds necessary to start production and our backers get new unique device at a substantial discount. In addition, we hope to get new ideas, comments and suggestions from the public. Every user can take a direct part in future VITAphoneneo product development by sharing their ideas and experiences with us.VITAphoneneo has amazing properties. Only one VITAphoneneo device is needed to manage residential or office building, therefore its price for every user can be less than one dollar, because users can organize a collective purchase.
Fulfillment fund.Here we providing approximate funds distribution based on our preliminary assessments.
Project deadlines.
Our team.Our core team consists of only two members despite the stunning size of the project. During different stages of our project we have attracted a huge amount of human resources: hardware engineers, designers, software developers and marketers, but our team left the same. Meet:Vitaliy SkugaryevIgor Filakhtov25 years old, author of the idea, enterpreur and excellent manager. Vitaly has a huge experience in field of IT and high-end gadgets development.23 years old, technical project director. Igor is an IT geek, experienced software and hardware platforms developer.We take this opportunity to thank all those people, who helped us to make VITAphoneneo such an outstanding project and who gave us their support during our work on this project. Thanks to all engineers, developers, coders, designers, marketers who gave part of themselves to our project.We also want to thank our families, who have tolerated our nightly gatherings, discussions, debates and disputes, and also constant mess in their life and others inconveniences during preparation period. Thank you very much for what you were side by side with us in a difficult times!
Stay in touch with us!We are always opened for new opportunities! If you have any ideas, questions or suggestions you can contact us using Indiegogo campaign, our project email info@softvit.com or give us a call to +1-855-SOFTVIT (toll free).

story:
After our incredibly successful Kickstarter campaign for ShiftCam, the iPhone 7 Plus camera add-on, in which we delivered on time to satisfied customers all over the world, we are now introducing our new game changer for all smartphones, RevolCam™. 

Developed with the same ethos that made ShiftCam such a success, RevolCam™ is designed to deliver a new smartphone photography experience while maintaining our core values:

 

 

Our goal with RevolCam™ is to offer even greater value, building on the lessons learned with ShiftCam to deliver more of what you want, adding value and improving everything we do. 

From refinements in design to improved performance, this campaign is built upon being better, to deliver more value for you, our users.

 

 

 

 

 

Cnet: スマホ用レボルバー式交換レンズ「RevolCam」--魚眼、広角、マクロを素早く変更

Dpreview: RevolCam comes with a universal design and its makers promise easy and secure attachment to any smartphone via a clamp mechanism.

YAHOO!: RevolCam, a smartphone accessory with a universal fit, became a fully funded Kickstarter project in less than five hours and now has nearly 10 times the original funding goal.

DIGITAL TRENDS: RevolCam mixes light and lens in a $29 five-in-one smartphone photo accessory

Geeky Gadgets: RevolCam enabled smartphone users a variety of different creative shots using the convenient and portable smartphone lens adapter

Cult of Mac: RevolCam is one attachment, but with three lenses, an LED light and selfie mirror and avoids the bulk each of those accessories could add to your pockets or bag.

 

 

RevolCam™ is an innovate approach to improving your smartphone camera. The compact, easy to use design fits on any smartphone, giving you many creative options. With three lenses that can be swapped in seconds with just a flick of the finger, thanks to the revolving design, this is smartphone photography evolved. 

The wide angle, fisheye and macro lenses give you incredible options for any situation, including a built-in mirror for high-quality selfies and a detachable LED light for perfect photos in any conditions.

RevolCam™ is the ultimate camera solution for your smartphone, helping you capture memories in perfect detail, with the choice of lenses and included lighting, with RevolCam™ you will never miss a moment again.

RevolCam™ comes with many innovations that change the way smartphone photography works:

Giving you a choice of wide-angle, fisheye and macro lenses, RevolCam™ opens up the creative options for Smartphones like never before. Get in close with the macro lens, capture glorious landscape vistas with the wide-angle lens, and explore the creativity of the fisheye. Because you can swap lenses at will in a second, you always have every option available, all the time.

It is our unique rotary lens system that is the core innovation in RevolCam™, as it ensures you can swap lenses with just the flick of a finger in a second. No need to remove anything or waste time swapping lenses when you want to be capturing the shot. With our RevoLens design, you simply revolve the lenses to choose the one you want. The lenses are automatically centered perfectly when you use them, so you have ALL the creative options available, ALL the time.  

Lightweight so you can take it anywhere, the bright, easy to use LED Light clips on and off RevolCam™ with ease. When the sun goes down there is no need to stop when you have this amazing light to hand. Get the high-quality photos your memories deserve whatever the conditions, create macro shots like the professionals and make sure your selfies look as good as they can every time with the included LED Light.

RevolCam™ puts you in control, and that includes the light! With 230 levels of light available, adjusted manually and just a touch away, you always have the light you need for perfect photos. From fill light to night time portraits, lighting will never be a problem again.

We all know the best camera on your smartphone is on the back, so why do we have to take selfies with the front one? With its built-in selfie mirror, RevolCam™ lets you use the best camera for the best feature – You! See just what you are shooting with the mirror and get the perfect selfie in the highest-quality your phone can manage every time.

Enjoy the revolution in smartphone photography whatever phone you use! RevolCam™ is designed to fit easily onto any smartphone, and is small and lightweight enough that you will barely know it’s there. You don’t need the very latest phones to enjoy the benefits of creativity and quality that RevolCam™ brings, and when you swap your phone, you can take RevolCam™ with you to the new one!

 

 

With so many projects available, we know that this is the question you are asking, why choose RevolCam™? As with our previous successful Kickstarter, ShiftCam, our focus during development has been to deliver quality, both in the RevolCam™ itself and the photos it produces, convenience, making sure it’s easy to use and own, and portability, because the only photo gear worth owning is the one you actually take with you!

 

 

RevolCam™ provides a complete solution for high-quality smartphone photography, giving you all the creative tools you need to get the images you desire. Whether capturing memories or exploring your own creative eye, this compact, lightweight solution is all you need.

With a detachable LED light to ensure you can shoot whatever the conditions, and a selfie mirror for capturing those precious memories in the highest quality your camera can manage, it’s got it all. Why take multiple gadgets when RevolCam™ has everything for a smartphone photography revolution.

 

 

 

Having all the tools to deliver quality photos from any smartphone is what RevolCam™ gives you, but you need to be able to access those tools and make the most of them anywhere, when you need them the most. That is why RevolCam™ is based around a revolutionary revolving design that means you can swap between the three lenses as you wish, it takes a second with a flick of the finger. No need to remove anything, it just works. The clever RevoLens system perfectly centers each lens when you want to use it, no messing, no calibration, simply flick the lens into place and take a photo.

 

Ease of use doesn’t stop there, with the detachable LED light, you have your own portable studio, no matter what the conditions or time of day, you have the light you need. Stick the light on a lamppost for fill-light on a portrait, keep it close for a macro shot, the options are endless with the adjustable brightness LED, and with everything so simple and straightforward, it never slows you down. RevolCam™ is designed to work with you, to give you the tools when you need them and let you focus on the important stuff, the photo itself.

 

 

 

One thing that people forget when it comes to photography, is that the only useful accessories are the ones you take with you. On a night out with friends, you will want quality photos to remember it all, but do you want to take a big photo bag with you to achieve it? No, of course not, that is why we made sure RevolCam™ is lightweight enough that you will forget you have it, until you want to use it.

It's easy to install, you just clip it onto any smartphone and off you go, whether you have the latest phone or something else, it even works with tablets and laptops if you want, the complete photo solution for everything you do!

 

 

With all this ability, ease of use and extraordinary performance, it should be clear that we have worked really hard to deliver the ultimate smartphone camera accessory, but we wanted to achieve more than that. We want to revolutionize smartphone photography, to give everyone the chance to explore the creativity that RevolCam™ unleashes, and that means we did not want to create a high-priced gadget that few could afford.

 

Instead, we have created an affordable package that offers all of this for a surprisingly low cost, but we did not skimp on quality to achieve it. With RevolCam™ you get a high-quality, premium package that looks and feels like a smart, expensive product, for a bargain price. RevolCam™ gives you the luxury experience of bespoke smartphone accessories without the expense.

 

With its three creative lenses, detachable light and easy to use selfie mirror, RevolCam™ provides incredible versatility for any phone camera, giving you endless options and delivering quality images whatever your subject.

High quality lenses that improve image clarity, giving you pictures with more impact. 

The Macro lens has high magnification, allowing you to take images of the unseen world around us, from insects to flowers, see more than ever before! 

 

The wide-angle lens gives you the chance to capture more than ever, broad vistas that show the majesty of what you see rather than just a small portion. 

With the easy lens swapping, you have access to the creative effects from the fisheye or macro lens whenever you want them, just flick the lens in place and you are set. Combine the fisheye lens with panorama mode to get a full, 360-degree image, it’s like nothing you have seen before. Whatever the moment, whatever the memory, capture it in new ways with RevolCam™. Unleash your creativity today!

 

 

With the built-in selfie mirror, you can use the superior rear camera to take your selfies, combine that with the high quality RevolCam™ lens and you have the perfect setup to deliver the highest-quality selfie possible. With adjustable brightness thanks to the LED light and the easy to use RevolCam™ system, taking the perfect selfie has never been easier.

  

 

 

 

RevolCam™ comes with everything you need to upgrade your smartphone photography, packed safely and securely to ensure it arrives in perfect condition, your RevolCam™ package will include:

 

  

 

RevolCam™ is the culmination of an idea to revolutionize smartphone photography, but to create a unique and easy to use solution that did not just perform, but encourages creativity. RevolCam™ is defined by the action of ‘revolving’, it is at the heart of the 3 in 1 clip on lens, and it is by revolving that the lenses are instantly interchangeable. That instant access to creativity is very important, we want to inspire your creativity, not get in its way.

 

The detachable LED module follows the same action, you revolve it to adjust the brightness, igniting your stories whatever the conditions around you, wherever you are, while the hidden mirror makes sure your selfie is always on target, use the best camera on your phone on you!

 

 

Right from the start, we implemented an edgeless form design language, a very modern approach that compliments most smartphones on the market today, you want the best quality photos, but let’s do it in style, right? Edgeless form also reflects the revolving dynamics of RevolCam™ itself, giving you the smooth and seamless photography experience that unleashes your creativity.

RevolCam™ is designed to work with you, to give you the tools when you need them and let you focus on the important stuff, the photo itself. 
The adjustable light detaches and, with a magnetic backing, can mount off to anything metal   One thing that people forget when it comes to photography, is that the only useful accessories are the ones you take with you. On a night out with friends, you will want quality photos to remember it all, but do you want to take a big photo bag with you to achieve it? No, of course not, that is why we made sure RevolCam™ is lightweight enough that you will forget you have it, until you want to use it. 
It sits low profile on the phone so never gets in your way, and is the only photo gadget you will need.It's easy to install, you just clip it onto any smartphone and off you go, whether you have the latest phone or something else, it even works with tablets and laptops if you want, the complete photo solution for everything you do!  With all this ability, ease of use and extraordinary performance, it should be clear that we have worked really hard to deliver the ultimate smartphone camera accessory, but we wanted to achieve more than that. We want to revolutionize smartphone photography, to give everyone the chance to explore the creativity that RevolCam™ unleashes, and that means we did not want to create a high-priced gadget that few could afford. Instead, we have created an affordable package that offers all of this for a surprisingly low cost, but we did not skimp on quality to achieve it. With RevolCam™ you get a high-quality, premium package that looks and feels like a smart, expensive product, for a bargain price. RevolCam™ gives you the luxury experience of bespoke smartphone accessories without the expense. With its three creative lenses, detachable light and easy to use selfie mirror, RevolCam™ provides incredible versatility for any phone camera, giving you endless options and delivering quality images whatever your subject.High quality lenses that improve image clarity, giving you pictures with more impact. The Macro lens has high magnification, allowing you to take images of the unseen world around us, from insects to flowers, see more than ever before!  The wide-angle lens gives you the chance to capture more than ever, broad vistas that show the majesty of what you see rather than just a small portion. With the easy lens swapping, you have access to the creative effects from the fisheye or macro lens whenever you want them, just flick the lens in place and you are set. Combine the fisheye lens with panorama mode to get a full, 360-degree image, it’s like nothing you have seen before. Whatever the moment, whatever the memory, capture it in new ways with RevolCam™. Unleash your creativity today! 
Panorama mode with RevolCam Fisheye Lens  
RevolCam gives you creativity and quality for your wonderful moments With the built-in selfie mirror, you can use the superior rear camera to take your selfies, combine that with the high quality RevolCam™ lens and you have the perfect setup to deliver the highest-quality selfie possible. With adjustable brightness thanks to the LED light and the easy to use RevolCam™ system, taking the perfect selfie has never been easier.     RevolCam™ comes with everything you need to upgrade your smartphone photography, packed safely and securely to ensure it arrives in perfect condition, your RevolCam™ package will include:    RevolCam™ is the culmination of an idea to revolutionize smartphone photography, but to create a unique and easy to use solution that did not just perform, but encourages creativity. RevolCam™ is defined by the action of ‘revolving’, it is at the heart of the 3 in 1 clip on lens, and it is by revolving that the lenses are instantly interchangeable. That instant access to creativity is very important, we want to inspire your creativity, not get in its way. The detachable LED module follows the same action, you revolve it to adjust the brightness, igniting your stories whatever the conditions around you, wherever you are, while the hidden mirror makes sure your selfie is always on target, use the best camera on your phone on you!  Right from the start, we implemented an edgeless form design language, a very modern approach that compliments most smartphones on the market today, you want the best quality photos, but let’s do it in style, right? Edgeless form also reflects the revolving dynamics of RevolCam™ itself, giving you the smooth and seamless photography experience that unleashes your creativity.

story:
We believe technology should be affordable for everyone. And this starts with electronic.

This is made possible with the Afforduino Starter Kit.

The 19$ kit is composed of :

  • 1x Arduino UNO R3-like with USB Cable

  • 1x Solderless Breadboard & 40x Jumper Wires

  • Cardboard box

Inputs :

  • 1x LM35 temperature sensor

  • 1x HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Ranging Module (to measure distances)

  • 5x Push buttons & 5x 10KΩ resistors

  • 1x 10KΩ potentometers

Outputs :

  • 1x Sound buzzer (bipper)

  • 20x LEDs (5x Green, 5x Red, 5x Blue, 5x Yellow) + 20x Resistors for the LEDs

  • 1x Basic LCD Module & 1x Header Pin Male 2.54 1*40


(resistors aren't represented in the picture)


In short, everything you need to begin electronic is included.

If you are looking for a great starting point into hardware programming or are simply on a budget, look no further than the Afforduino Starter Kit.

The components used in the kit have a high quality standard.

A soldering iron and soldering wire are necessary to solder the header pins to the LCD. They aren't included in the kit because many peoples already possess one. You can find them here or here for less than 10$.


// 20.000$ GOAL

We constantly look to improve our kit. If we raise more than 20.000$, we will have a sufficient manufacturing quantity to lower the price of the components. 

In this case, we'll add a 5V Relay Module to the kit, for free and for everyone.

A relay can be used to power on/off home elements like lamps, speaker, etc...

Imagine the possibilities coupled with the Arduino !


// THE BOARD

"Arduino is a tool for making computers that can sense and control more of the physical world than your desktop computer. It's an open-source physical computing platform based on a simple micro-controller board, and a development environment for writing software for the board.

Arduino can be used to develop interactive objects, taking inputs from a variety of switches or sensors, and controlling a variety of lights, motors, and other physical outputs. "

- Arduino.cc

Here is an original Arduino UNO compared to the Afforduino UNO. 


WE CONFIRM THAT OUR ARDUINO BOARD IS NOT AFFECTED BY THE FTDI DRIVER UPDATE WHICH BRICK THE BOARDS INCLUDING A CLONE FT232 CHIP.

An official Arduino UNO cost around 20$. As it is released under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 license. This means that anyone can use their project (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.5/).

To program the Arduino, nothing easier. Just connect the board to the computer using USB and download the Arduino IDE.


Why the Arduino UNO ?

Because it's the most popular and used Arduino. You will find a lot of tutorials around the web using an Arduino UNO. Furthermore, it is compatible with the majority of shields (giving you more functionalities).

The Arduino Uno is based on the ATmega328. It has 14 digital input/output pins (of which 6 can be used as PWM outputs), 6 analog inputs, a 16 MHz ceramic resonator, a USB connection, a power jack, an ICSP header, and a reset button. It contains everything needed to support the microcontroller; simply connect it to a computer with a USB cable or power it with a AC-to-DC adapter or battery to get started.


// EXAMPLES 

The endless possibilities with this kit are only limited by your imagination !

1. Pressing the button nearer the top of the breadboard will turn the LED on, pressing the other button will turn the LED off.

2. Showing how many retweet has a tweet

3. Bip when the temperature down below 20°C (reminder to close the windows)


// 19$ ?

To reach our 19$ price we can't manufacture the boards in Italy, like Arduino. The manufacturing of the Afforduino Kit has to be done in China.

Thus, we need to produce enough volume to bring the unit costs down.

Compared to the other equivalent kits on the market, the Afforduino Kit is about 4 times cheaper.


// OUR PROJECT

Since my youngest age I have always been passionate by technology, particularly electronic and felt the pleasure to create things.

Nobody in my family/friends was experimented in electronic, I undertake to buy electronics components from scratch. I bought for about 150$ of components but I just didn't know at all how to make them work.

Not so long ago, my brother saw me working on a project and asked me to teach him some things. My researchs on internet to buy him basics components leaded to the Sparkfun Inventor's Kit, an interesting concept. 

But wait... Almost 100$ !

This was the starting point of the project.

After spending a lot of time negotiating the production prices with different manufacturers, we managed to reach a final price of 19$.

Why the campaign duration is only 13 days ?

Because we need to be ready to produce the Christmas Edition.


// TIMELINE


// CHRISTMAS EDITION

You can receive your kit before Christmas with our special edition.

Choose the Christmas Edition for 29$. Since these kits will be shipped for France, we ask for different shipping costs whether you live in Europe or in the rest of the world.


// SUPPORT US

We really appreciate every single of your support, help us bring the Afforduino Starter Kit into the hands of people all around the world.

Let’s make this happen together, we can't wait to deliver the kit to you !

But wait... Almost 100$ !
This was the starting point of the project. 
After spending a lot of time negotiating the production prices with different manufacturers, we managed to reach a final price of 19$.

story:
Have you ever found yourself looking for the remotes for what seemed like hours on end? 

Having a bunch of them - one for the TV in the living room, one for the A/C, one for the A/V Receiver and so on, and you just can’t find them when you need them.Your easiest solution would be to buy a 6. remote to replace the 5 you have - just to be misplaced as easily as all the others? Really?

Not anymore.


The iRBeacon is the one, simple solution that will rid you of the cluster of remotes - and it is capable of much more.

The iRBeacon is the first step towards an intelligent home. It is a smart, elegant and tiny device which combines the infrared technology with the latest Bluetooth Low Energy (very energy efficient, more than a year working time with a single CR2032 coin battery), so the iRBeacon accompanied with the app (iOS, Android) can smart up your devices and replace your remotes in just a few minutes.


Just imagine getting home, tired from a hard day at work, and as you enter, your favorite radio starts playing or the TV is switching on for you to watch news and unwind. Without even touching a single button. You can set the timing, or let your devices react to your presence.

You’ll never have to worry wether you’ve switched off the TV or turned off the radio when you left home - the iRBeacon will do that for you.

Using the latest technology, the list of IoT networks and smart hubs the iRBeacon can cooperate with expands constantly - so you’ll be able to control your device from anywhere in the world. The iRBeacon's mesh networking capabilities help to overcome any distance so  the smarter home has never been easier and closer.


The iRBeacon has a range of up 50 meters / 150 feet making the use much more easy and versatile than any regular remote.

Take photography for example. A regular IR remote will work within about 5 meters / 15 feet. Look at the demo below to check how the iRBeacon does.


The range is of course highly depending on the environment and the phone used as well.

We even went out to the park to shoot around with the iRBeacon and a DSLR. 

With additional features the iRBeacon is a complete smart alternative for a remote trigger, and also much much more than that!

How does it work

  1. Place the iRBeacon near to the ir receiver (easy to find) of your device. With the two sided removable glue dot provided, it can be easily placed on every consumer electronics device.


  2. Download the app to your phone, tablet, laptop...

  3. Forget your old remote, and enjoy the comfort.

The iRBeacon is a really tiny gadget with its 30x30x10mm dimensions. 



The App

Our iOS and Android apps are capable of so much more than your everyday remote controller. Sure you can use it the old school way, but you can also set timers, edit personal preferences and set the way the iRBeacon should react to your presence.
Compatible with iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android 4.3 & later devices with Bluetooth 4.0.


Our database of compatible devices is extensive and growing fast. And if your device is not in our database yet, the iRBeacon can learn all the tricks from any regular IR remote.

Now the perks of the first almost 900 contributors are getting ready to be shipped. 

We are ready to look further.

We are ready to take the next step.

Come with us and join the fun:

Contributions for the second batch are now open. Estimated delivery date: June 2015.


Available in three colors

The iRBeacon is available in 3 different colors: 

Brilliant White, Aluminum gray and Piano Black. 


Contribute and share our project with your peers!


The iRBeacon in the media

FAQ

Have you considered enabling “macros”? e.g. clicking one button which executes a series of commands, with customizable preferences and settings.

Absolutely. We are working on a macro feature, and it will be available in the first public app.

Is the iRBeacon app capable of learning/recording any remote? 

Yes, even those with extra features like dedicated Netflix buttons or similar.

Why bluetooth and not over wifi? 

Bluetooth is incomparably cheaper and more energy efficient. Plus we love it.

How is it “able to control your device from anywhere in the world”?  

With the cooperation of smart hubs.  We are working closely with several smart hubs out there. Stay tuned for details and announcements in the coming weeks.

Could the iRBeacon also be integrated into a Home Automation setup (such as Ninja Sphere or Smartthings)? 

Absolutely. We are working on it quite a lot.

What’s the maximum distance the iRBeacon can be from the phone? 

The iRBeacon's Bluetooth range (the distance between the iRBeacon and the and your smartphone or tablet) can go up 50 meters (about 150 feet), while the infrared range (the distance between the iRBeacon and the controlled device) goes up to 1-2 meters (about 3-6 feet) to maximize battery life and ensure a stable connection. This of course depends on your smartphone’s Bluetooth radio as well as the environment you are in.

Do you ship internationally?

Worldwide free shipping is included in all the perks.

Can I still use the original remote together with the iRBeacon after sticking it on top of the IR receiver?

Absolutely. You actually have to stick the iRBeacon just next to the receiver and so the original remote will still work.

Do you need one iRBeacon per device? 

The iRBeacon is a tiny tool that you stick on all devices, and you can control all of them from your phone with the same app. We don’t believe in putting an IR transmitter in the middle of the room, however if the iRBeacon has line of sight it will work. Sticking an iRBeacon on the devices is the most elegant and simple way to turn your devices smart.

I have several family members in my household. Can all of us download the app and use our phones as remotes? 

Yes, of course and much more. You can set your personal preferences and set the way the iRBeacon should react to your presence separately for all of you.

story:
Prototype Testing

The next step, after a long process of creativity and engineering, was testing proof of concept and functionality. We were very excited to hold FlexCharger in our hands for the very first time and to reveal to others how this unique product works and the way it was going to feel like for them, when they use it. Here are some impressions.



Using Sleeves or Covers

We designed FlexCharger to be utmost flexible. So now you can also leave Sleeves or Covers on while charging. Even the Tiltable Dock Connector can be used with your smart device protection. The connector is elevated slightly so there is enough space for these difficulties and guarantees a good connection.



Dear Apple User

We would have loved to introduce "pure" Apple Lightning Connections to FlexCharger. We decided against this, because of the extreme costs that would occur (for you) when original Apple certified Lightnings are built in (see Apples MFI Program). We are determined to win you for FlexCharger, so we included 3 Original Certified Apple Lightning Adapters in the Perk. Nevertheless FlexCharger allows the use of adapters, so you shouldn't have difficulties. Furthermore, if we did produce an Apple Version and you or a family member changed to a non-Apple device in the future, you would then have to purchase adapters from Lightning to Micro-USB (as far as we know there are no Apple certified adapters available). Share any thoughts you might have. We'll appreciate an email from you.


Risks & Challenges

We have a lot of experience in bringing products on the market, so the risks are minimized. We have a really great relationship with our production partner who is already in the charger business for many years (see also our WallCharger campaign). We have taken all steps to avoid potential problems. We will accompany the tooling and production process by our own experts in close contact with the producer in order to adjust or correct problems. Contingency plans are agreed upon in case of production problems. We will continuously inform our backers during certification, production and shipping with regular updates.

Should you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact us anytime.


Why Indiegogo?

There is no better way for us to discuss the features of a new product with customers. Out of experience we know that we will get many useful comments which will help us to finalize/design FlexCharger in a way you will actually enjoy.


Where are we now?

The rule for the shipment to the contributors is First in (order) First out (shipment).


PLEASE NOTE: International Backers

Backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence.  We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur based on the value of your pledge.  Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties.  As a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information. We appreciate your understanding of this matter. Due to our past experience for Indiegogo campaigns, we believe to know that import taxes will not occur. 


Partner/Team

We are a German team of idea makers, creative thinkers, engineering & production experts with long years of experience in development, production as well as marketing & sales (..see our successful WallCharger campaign) who work closely together to create products which deliver true value, that find usable solutions and make great products even greater.


Peter in close cooperation with the production team

In 2014, we set out with a goal to change the way people charge their devices. Our vision was simple – to fill every home with easy to use charging stations and diminish the use of untidy cables. We’re making it very comfortable for everybody to charge with any smart device, in every room of their home. We strive to provide the newest charging technologies, adding flexibility and bring that all together into one product with beautiful design, flawless technology and a high standard of quality.

We’re doing what we started out to do. 
Changing the way people charge – one home at a time.


Reference

In February 2014 we started the WallCharger campaign successfully on Indiegogo.

So far we can say that our contributors are happy. Get your own impression by reading the comments and by browsing through the campaign!

Important for you as a contributor is that we have long experience with charging devices and also know exactly how to organize an Indiegogo campaign. The FlexCharger team is more or less the same as the WallCharger team, including the production partner. This is a very experienced company already producing charging and other electronical devices for many years. Furthermore, when you browse through the WallCharger comments page you will see that we had absolutely no complaints concerning the quality. 

The different versions of WallCharger



FAQ's

  • Which Wireless Charging standard are you going to integrate?
    We decided to integrated the Qi standard which seems to be the most sophisticated and successful standard in the market.
  • Why do you call your Wireless Charger "True Wireless Charger"?
    As a result of FlexCharger fitting directly into your power outlet, there are no cables whatsoever, therefore being "Truely" wireless. Other Wireless Chargers have a cable running from the Charger Pad to the outlet. As far as we know, FlexCharger is the only "True" Wireless Charger.
  • What do I have to add for shipping?
    - International $ 15
    - Germany $ 5
    Shipping is something we do not want to earn money with, so we calculated very tough to offer you the best rates possible.
  • How many different versions do you offer?
    3 versions
    - FlexCharger S
    - FlexCharger W: Wireless Charger integrated in the tray
    - FlexCharger W/R: Wireless Charger + Wi-Fi Repeater integrated
  • I heard about a new USB - C standard. Does this mean that my FlexCharger is not future proof?
    The C - standard is a great move of the USB Implementers Forum (USB IF). We really appreciate this new plug because it will bring us many advantages. Nevertheless it wouldn't make sense to integrate it already because it will take a couple of years until we get the first devices with the new standard integrated. Should you in the meantime acquire a device with USB - C, simply buy one or more adapters and FlexCharger will stay up to date! As soon as it makes sense we will integrate the new standard in our FlexCharger.
  • If I'm going to use adapters, is FlexCharger designed for this?
    FlexCharger was developed with the option of using Lightning adapters. These adapters can easily be connected and then integrated into the form of the casing. We also integrated a storage compartment at the back, primarily for Lightning adapters and or 30 pin adapters from Apple.
  • And what if I want to use an adapter for the Tiltable Dock Connector?
    This is also possible. Simply tilt your smart device towards the wall and you will get the necessary stability when touching the wall with the upper edge of the smart device.
  • Do I need to pull FlexCharger out of the power outlet when extracting the retractable cable for Walk & Charge?
    No. Simply pull downwards or sidewards. The retractable mechanism is designed in such a way that you can't pull out this cable straight towards yourself.
  • I use a case for my smartphone. Can I plug it in the Tiltable Dock Connector?
    Yes. We elevated the connector slightly in order to prevent loosing contact. 
  • I use a case for my smartphone. Can I plug it in upright position on the Tray?
    FlexCharger has a mini 3.9" (10 cm) cable for on-tray charging – integrated and retractable for vertical or horizontal charging. By charging devices in a vertical upright position, the cable can be passed through the tray window and connected. This concept also allows for sleeves or covers to be kept on while charging.
  • Can I charge a large tablet on FlexCharger?
    Yes. We recommend that you either charge horizontally on the tray with the long retractable cable or vertically with the short tray cable (USB 3.0 would also be an option). Although possible, we do not recommend the Tiltable Dock Connector because of eventual problems with stability.
  • Does my smartphone have enough stability when plugged into the Tiltable Dock Connector?
    Yes. With our Tiltable Dock Connector your smartphone can be simply leaned against the wall. This ensures stability.
  • Isn't there too much weight on the FlexCharger if I load 5 devices (full flight) on it?
    This depends on your wall socket. If the wall socket is correctly fixed in the wall there should be no difficulties. We did many tests in full flight configuration and had no problems at all (..with a stable wall socket). Other than that, we installed two stabilizers to the back lower part of the casing to resist the downward tilting force and made these retractable for exact positioning on the wall.
  • USA: I have vertical outlets (power plug is turned 90°).
    Is FlexCharger operational with such an outlet?
    Of course. We know about this problem in the US and therefore designed a so called HOM Adapter (Horizontal Orientation Management). You can order an HOM Adapter Perk (for more information see Features), Simply swop the standard adapter for this one and FlexCharger will be operational also with horizontal outlets.
  • Is the 6.6' (2 m) retractable cable a source for problems?
    No. We integrated a really smooth running high quality automatic cable drum with a special flat cable for an easy cable spool. If you pull it out until the red mark on the cable only, it will enjoy a very long life.

Disclaimer

Technology and Design may be subject to minor changes due to product development. 

Patents

Patents for FlexCharger are pending.
story_txt:
Prototype TestingThe next step, after a long process of creativity and engineering, was testing proof of concept and functionality. We were very excited to hold FlexCharger in our hands for the very first time and to reveal to others how this unique product works and the way it was going to feel like for them, when they use it. Here are some impressions.Using Sleeves or CoversWe designed FlexCharger to be utmost flexible. So now you can also leave Sleeves or Covers on while charging. Even the Tiltable Dock Connector can be used with your smart device protection. The connector is elevated slightly so there is enough space for these difficulties and guarantees a good connection.Dear Apple UserWe would have loved to introduce "pure" Apple Lightning Connections to FlexCharger. We decided against this, because of the extreme costs that would occur (for you) when original Apple certified Lightnings are built in (see Apples MFI Program). We are determined to win you for FlexCharger, so we included 3 Original Certified Apple Lightning Adapters in the Perk. Nevertheless FlexCharger allows the use of adapters, so you shouldn't have difficulties. Furthermore, if we did produce an Apple Version and you or a family member changed to a non-Apple device in the future, you would then have to purchase adapters from Lightning to Micro-USB (as far as we know there are no Apple certified adapters available). Share any thoughts you might have. We'll appreciate an email from you.
Risks & Challenges


We have a lot of experience in bringing products on the market, so the risks are minimized. We have a really great relationship with our production partner who is already in the charger business for many years (see also our WallCharger campaign). We have taken all steps to avoid potential problems. We will accompany the tooling and production process by our own experts in close contact with the producer in order to adjust or correct problems. Contingency plans are agreed upon in case of production problems. We will continuously inform our backers during certification, production and shipping with regular updates.
Should you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact us anytime.

Why Indiegogo?

There is no better way for us to discuss the features of a new product with customers. Out of experience we know that we will get many useful comments which will help us to finalize/design FlexCharger in a way you will actually enjoy. 


Where are we now?





The rule for the shipment to the contributors is First in (order) First out (shipment).



PLEASE NOTE: International Backers
Backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence.  We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur based on the value of your pledge.  Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties.  As a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information. We appreciate your understanding of this matter. Due to our past experience for Indiegogo campaigns, we believe to know that import taxes will not occur. 


Partner/Team
We are a German team of idea makers, creative thinkers, engineering & production experts with long years of experience in development, production as well as marketing & sales (..see our successful WallCharger campaign) who work closely together to create products which deliver true value, that find usable solutions and make great products even greater. 


Peter in close cooperation with the production team
In 2014, we set out with a goal to change the way people charge their devices. Our vision was simple – to fill every home with easy to use charging stations and diminish the use of untidy cables. We’re making it very comfortable for everybody to charge with any smart device, in every room of their home. We strive to provide the newest charging technologies, adding flexibility and bring that all together into one product with beautiful design, flawless technology and a high standard of quality.
We’re doing what we started out to do. Changing the way people charge – one home at a time.


Reference

In February 2014 we started the WallCharger campaign successfully on Indiegogo.
So far we can say that our contributors are happy. Get your own impression by reading the comments and by browsing through the campaign!
Important for you as a contributor is that we have long experience with charging devices and also know exactly how to organize an Indiegogo campaign. The FlexCharger team is more or less the same as the WallCharger team, including the production partner. This is a very experienced company already producing charging and other electronical devices for many years. Furthermore, when you browse through the WallCharger comments page you will see that we had absolutely no complaints concerning the quality. 



The different versions of WallCharger






FAQ's


Which Wireless Charging standard are you going to integrate?We decided to integrated the Qi standard which seems to be the most sophisticated and successful standard in the market. 


Why do you call your Wireless Charger "True Wireless Charger"?As a result of FlexCharger fitting directly into your power outlet, there are no cables whatsoever, therefore being "Truely" wireless. Other Wireless Chargers have a cable running from the Charger Pad to the outlet. As far as we know, FlexCharger is the only "True" Wireless Charger.


What do I have to add for shipping?- International $ 15- Germany $ 5Shipping is something we do not want to earn money with, so we calculated very tough to offer you the best rates possible. 


How many different versions do you offer?3 versions- FlexCharger S- FlexCharger W: Wireless Charger integrated in the tray- FlexCharger W/R: Wireless Charger + Wi-Fi Repeater integrated

I heard about a new USB - C standard. Does this mean that my FlexCharger is not future proof?The C - standard is a great move of the USB Implementers Forum (USB IF). We really appreciate this new plug because it will bring us many advantages. Nevertheless it wouldn't make sense to integrate it already because it will take a couple of years until we get the first devices with the new standard integrated. Should you in the meantime acquire a device with USB - C, simply buy one or more adapters and FlexCharger will stay up to date! As soon as it makes sense we will integrate the new standard in our FlexCharger.

These adapters can easily be connected and then integrated into the form of the casing. We also integrated a storage compartment at the back, primarily for Lightning adapters and or 30 pin adapters from Apple.


And what if I want to use an adapter for the Tiltable Dock Connector?This is also possible. Simply tilt your smart device towards the wall and you will get the necessary stability when touching the wall with the upper edge of the smart device.

I use a case for my smartphone. Can I plug it in the Tiltable Dock Connector?Yes. We elevated the connector slightly in order to prevent loosing contact. 

I use a case for my smartphone. Can I plug it in upright position on the Tray?FlexCharger has a mini 3.9" (10 cm) cable for on-tray charging – integrated and retractable for vertical or horizontal charging. By charging devices in a vertical upright position, the cable can be passed through the tray window and connected. This concept also allows for sleeves or covers to be kept on while charging.


Can I charge a large tablet on FlexCharger?Yes. We recommend that you either charge horizontally on the tray with the long retractable cable or vertically with the short tray cable (USB 3.0 would also be an option). Although possible, we do not recommend the Tiltable Dock Connector because of eventual problems with stability.


Does my smartphone have enough stability when plugged into the Tiltable Dock Connector?Yes. With our Tiltable Dock Connector your smartphone can be simply leaned against the wall. This ensures stability.

story:
Our Story

With the dawn of another decade comes more progression. We have seen advances in science, technology, and the arts surpass even the most wildest of dreams. Here is one more dream. This app has been created to be the mouth piece for Textovel.com. We can no longer ignore the fact that so many of us constantly stay busy throughout every second of the day. We drive from this place to that, take buses and trains all over the place, and fly to cities across the world. In order to maintain some resemblance of a personal life, many of us use our phones and laptops to stay fresh and current with the things we love in life that reminds us why we stay so busy in the first place. Some of us email. Some of us browse websites. Some us write. Some of us READ.

Welcome to EMoBo. It is with this app that the person always on the go can use their phone to have a pleasurable reading and writing experience. The Japanese have been doing this for years, but now it’s time for the rest of us to catch up. Just click on EMoBo and you will find thousands of books ready and available for instant download. Books will be suggested to you based on your reading habits. If you have already started to read a book, it will be waiting for you right on the front screen and you can pick up exactly where you left off. Even the reading experience itself is punctual, allowing you to read your book using different fonts, background colors, or if you want to skip ahead to the end, it’s all with a touch of a button. Speaking of touch, you can pseudo-flip pages from one side of your IPhone screen to the other, just like a real book. And where do all these books come from? The ever-increasing library at TextNovel.com, which will sync up daily with EMoBo to bring readers all the books they can possibly want.

Of course, these aren’t just any ordinary books. They are cell phone novels, sprung from the Japanese keitai tradition. Short, to the point, poetic, crisp, and beautiful are just a few words to describe the ALTERNATIVE STYLE OF WRITING. Oh, and if you are a writer of these kinds of books or perhaps you want to try writing in this powerfully concise form, there’s even a spot where you can do that on EMoBo. Just click the icon for authors, fill out your chapter, and update. It’s that simple. Your book will be made available for others to download and even come up as a suggestion for others to check out if they like your style of writing. Pretty neat huh? As me and my computer engineer who structured EMoBo have said to each other, “we’re making progress.”

EMoBo-novels on the go for people on the go. 

Benefits of Using Emobo

It's one thing to be general like we just were about emobo's place and role in the world, but let us break this down into specifics. Here is what Emobo does for you:

Benefits of using EMoBo-

A.      It’s an alternative style of publishing. If you are an author, what better way to show your creative abilities by tackling a new form of writing that will allow anyone to digest your vision in one sitting guaranteed? This is the kind of appeal necessary to promote with EMoBo’s usage, as creative writers are always looking for new mediums to tell their stories.

B.      It’s simple. EMoBo is user-friendly and doesn’t require anymore than five minutes of using before you will become a master expert at manipulating it to do what you want. Perfect for somebody who doesn’t have a lot of time to spend deciphering how to “apply" the features to his or her daily needs!

C.     It’s a natural extension for Textnovel.com.  TextNovel is a library database with strong customer relations and a loyal following. As somebody who can be counted among that loyal following, I must say many of us have clamored for TextNovel to create an app that will make the uploading of stories and reading them a much more engaging experience! Well, EMoBo allows anyone and everyone to access TextNovel’s library plus add to it on a whim. So if you don’t have time to sit on a computer or maybe you are in a place where pulling a laptop out just isn’t feasible, all you have to do now is pull your phone out and Textnovel.com comes to you. It’s beyond convenient for us text novelists!

D.   

 

EMobo can do all of the following:

A.   

B.     Author’s tool to make new novels and upload them right from their phone.

C.    Recommended reading function, which is based on Amazon.com’s model of suggested buys. This will allow the reader to constantly be discovering new books to read based on their own search algorithms and also allow an author’s book to gain advertising and exposure essentially for any book they make.

D.   Classification of books based on categories, downloads, however text novel would like to see the books be classified.

E.   Page Turning function which looks cool and models after a real book.

F.   Font resizing and white/black background for maximum reading enjoyment.

G.   Saves the place of a last read book and displays last read book on home screen of EMoBo’s app.

H.  

I.         Connects with Social Networks like Facebook so you can "Like" and share your stories with everyone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 The total cost of the app design is to cover the 100 or so man hours that need to be put into it. We have a prototype that we are working on and also have all the coding milestones ready to be met and just need the funding for the time to do all of them. The entire amount needing to be raised will go to these man hours being spent on coding. We are taking care of everything else, from the integration with Textnovel.com to the website construction and design for emobo to the submission and application to Apple. We hope that you will donate because you can believe in the advancement of books and literature going digital. This is NOT just another silly app or book reading device, as there are plenty of those out there. This is the ONLY APP AVAILABLE that will be used for the KEITAI SHOUSETSU tradition of writing short text novels and sharing them with people you love. Japan has seen tremendous results with this style of writing, as all of Asia and other parts of the world have too. We want to catch America up with the rest of these parts and YOU get to be responsible for this advancement and ushering in of a WHOLE new style of writing books! Also, we are offering various perks as well at each level of contribution from you. Check out what they are in the perks section. 


Other Ways You Can Help

First of all, thank you. Thanks if you even got this far in reading everything above. We encourage you to spread the word about cell phone novels and go out and write a few yourself. Better yet, the moment this app gets written, use the app and write a novel with it and enjoy reading what others have written too. It's super convenient and seems more relevant to the way the world is going these days. Don't get me wrong, we enjoy meaty novels just like the next person, but there's something so appealing about a book that you can read fast and in the time it takes from you to ride the subway or bus to work or pick up your kids. We want to spread the power of cell phone novels to everyone who needs a convenient literary fix that's fast and fun to use. Tweet about this new style, like it on facebook when the page is up for it (due to contractual obligations, we need to wait until it's actually running before we can have this available), and most of all, support it through helping us advertise it when the app is up and running. We would gratefully appreciate it. Take care and we hope to see what everyone offers! 

  Derek Vasconi, author of the iphone app eMobo.  Also owner of the independent book publishing company, SAKURA PUBLISHING and former guitar player for the Metal band, FROM A SECOND STORY WINDOW.

  Girish Chavan, Iphone app designer and author of the very popular WHAT' MY SIZE FOR MEN IPHONE APP.
