story:
Short Summary

Coexist2012, aka "The Anonymous Social Network", is a new social network that allows its users to anonymously post and "copy" (save) texts, images, videos, audio and files. It exists on the web (Coexist2012.org) with a responsive mobile version (iPhone/Android apps currently being designed).
It is currently live, 100% free and continually updated from our users, www.coexist2012.org.
 

***Quotes from our users***

"Most of the songs on my iTunes playlist I found on this site." - Ryan H.

"This site is like if 4chan mated with Reddit, it's addicting." - si3b3nal3r

"Now I can shamelessly post drunk photos. Genius." - Pablo A.
 

How The Website Works

Anyone can visit the website, read through the posts, view the images, watch the videos, listen to the music, and even download the files. However, by simply creating a free account with just a username and an e-mail address, both of which are kept private (you can make multiple usernames with the same e-mail address FYI), or by simply connecting it to your Facebook account (again this information if kept private) you will gain access to the following features:

A private "Settings" page that allows you to upload an avatar, change the e-mail address associated with your username or change the password for your username.

 

 

A private "Profile" page that displays all of your added posts in chronological order with your freshest posts appearing first.

 

 

A private "Copies" page that shows all of your copied posts in chronological order with the freshest post you copied appearing first.

 

 

A private "Edit" page that allows you to edit or delete any of your current posts with your freshest post being displayed first.

 

 

A private "Add" page that allows you to post unlimited texts, images (JPEG, GIF, PNG, URL), videos (MP4, URL), audio (MP3) and files (ZIP, RAR, PDF, DOC).

 

 

And a "Log Out" button to sign your username out. There is also a user friendly sticky bar that appears at the top of the screen for members giving them quick access to all of the above features.

When a user posts something onto Coexist2012, it appears both under the "Fresh Posts" section of the home page and on the category page of the users choice for everyone in the world to view. This is when the anonymity part comes into play. When anyone visits Coexist2012 (including yourself) and views your post, they simply see the title, the content you posted (text, image, video, audio, file) and the description you added. They see nothing about the author, nor the tags, therefore leaving you completely anonymous to post whatever you so choose.

Why We Are Anonymous

The word "Anonymous" has became a very popular buzz word due to the infamous hactivist group that goes by said name. Coexist2012 however is not a social network just for these hactivists. We chose to have our users remain anonymous so that everyone is equally together. Everyone is equal because no ones name is attached to the posts. And everyone is together because all of the posts are made publicly available for everyone to enjoy. Coexist2012 is not like most social networks in that our users don't register to gain "friends" or "followers" to share posts with. Coexist2012 users register so they can share posts with everyone in the world and the response you get from other users is based solely on the content you post, not just your name. No other social network in the world connects all of its users like Coexist2012.

Why We Created Coexist2012

Violations of personal privacy on many of today's leading social networking platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.) and the censhorship of news platforms (Fox, CNN, etc.) is at an all time high while completely legal websites (Megaupload, ThePirateBay, WikiLeaks) are being unlawfully persecuted by the United States government. We believe that we offer a service, the ability to anonymously socialize with the world, that is undeniably helpful and unbeatably priced, 100% free.

What You Get From Coexist2012

We are offering our donors the chance to grow with Coexist2012 with free bumper stickers, advertisement slides and neon yellow tank tops. As our social network expands, so will the audience that your posts (hopefully you have created a profile by now and have began posting) will reach. You can also use our audience to advertise (granted you donated $10 for the perk) for a variety of things from promoting your music, to selling a product you've made, to promoting your Youtube channel. The advertisement slide is a picture that will link directly to a URL of your choice so the possibilities for you to choose from are endless.

How We'll Spend the Funds

The money raised through this campaign will go directly towards improving the Coexist2012 servers. The better our servers are, the quicker our content gets delivered to you, it's that simple.

Other Ways People Can Help

Feel free to share our link, www.coexist2012.org, anywhere you like and please check out all of our social media pages (links below). And of course go ahead and sign up for a free account on Coexist2012, it's free.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Coexist2012, aka "The Anonymous Social Network", is a new social network that allows its users to anonymously post and "copy" (save) texts, images, videos, audio and files. It exists on the web (Coexist2012.org) with a responsive mobile version (iPhone/Android apps currently being designed).It is currently live, 100% free and continually updated from our users, www.coexist2012.org.
 

***Quotes from our users***"Most of the songs on my iTunes playlist I found on this site." - Ryan H."This site is like if 4chan mated with Reddit, it's addicting." - si3b3nal3r"Now I can shamelessly post drunk photos. Genius." - Pablo A.

 

How The Website Works
Anyone can visit the website, read through the posts, view the images, watch the videos, listen to the music, and even download the files. However, by simply creating a free account with just a username and an e-mail address, both of which are kept private (you can make multiple usernames with the same e-mail address FYI), or by simply connecting it to your Facebook account (again this information if kept private) you will gain access to the following features:
A private "Settings" page that allows you to upload an avatar, change the e-mail address associated with your username or change the password for your username.
 

 
A private "Profile" page that displays all of your added posts in chronological order with your freshest posts appearing first.
 

 
A private "Copies" page that shows all of your copied posts in chronological order with the freshest post you copied appearing first.
 

 
A private "Edit" page that allows you to edit or delete any of your current posts with your freshest post being displayed first.
 

 
A private "Add" page that allows you to post unlimited texts, images (JPEG, GIF, PNG, URL), videos (MP4, URL), audio (MP3) and files (ZIP, RAR, PDF, DOC).
 

 
And a "Log Out" button to sign your username out. There is also a user friendly sticky bar that appears at the top of the screen for members giving them quick access to all of the above features.
When a user posts something onto Coexist2012, it appears both under the "Fresh Posts" section of the home page and on the category page of the users choice for everyone in the world to view. This is when the anonymity part comes into play. When anyone visits Coexist2012 (including yourself) and views your post, they simply see the title, the content you posted (text, image, video, audio, file) and the description you added. They see nothing about the author, nor the tags, therefore leaving you completely anonymous to post whatever you so choose.
Why We Are Anonymous
The word "Anonymous" has became a very popular buzz word due to the infamous hactivist group that goes by said name. Coexist2012 however is not a social network just for these hactivists. We chose to have our users remain anonymous so that everyone is equally together. Everyone is equal because no ones name is attached to the posts. And everyone is together because all of the posts are made publicly available for everyone to enjoy. Coexist2012 is not like most social networks in that our users don't register to gain "friends" or "followers" to share posts with. Coexist2012 users register so they can share posts with everyone in the world and the response you get from other users is based solely on the content you post, not just your name. No other social network in the world connects all of its users like Coexist2012.
Why We Created Coexist2012
Violations of personal privacy on many of today's leading social networking platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.) and the censhorship of news platforms (Fox, CNN, etc.) is at an all time high while completely legal websites (Megaupload, ThePirateBay, WikiLeaks) are being unlawfully persecuted by the United States government. We believe that we offer a service, the ability to anonymously socialize with the world, that is undeniably helpful and unbeatably priced, 100% free.
What You Get From Coexist2012
We are offering our donors the chance to grow with Coexist2012 with free bumper stickers, advertisement slides and neon yellow tank tops. As our social network expands, so will the audience that your posts (hopefully you have created a profile by now and have began posting) will reach. You can also use our audience to advertise (granted you donated $10 for the perk) for a variety of things from promoting your music, to selling a product you've made, to promoting your Youtube channel. The advertisement slide is a picture that will link directly to a URL of your choice so the possibilities for you to choose from are endless.
How We'll Spend the Funds
The money raised through this campaign will go directly towards improving the Coexist2012 servers. The better our servers are, the quicker our content gets delivered to you, it's that simple.
Other Ways People Can Help
Feel free to share our link, www.coexist2012.org, anywhere you like and please check out all of our social media pages (links below). And of course go ahead and sign up for a free account on Coexist2012, it's free.

story:
Tablets, laptops, phones are meant to be mobile, yet the stands that I have come across just didn't offer that mobility.  I didn't want to be stuck in one position or place. With other stands I found secure attaching, and  removal of devices was an issue.  This is why I made these stands.  

Innovation

Cutting edge patent pending magnetic shielding technology offers instant secure attachment and fast easy detachment

Original patent pending biflex bipod design brings together the right flexibilty and geometrics, offer unparalleled versatility

Simple, minimal,  and light wieght

Compatible with Apple iPad, iPhone, Macbook, Android, Windows, Blackberry

Standard camera mounting screw for DSLR, Camcorders, GoPro



Neodymium Rare Earth Magnet 

Neodymium rare earth magnets comprise the attachment system.  They are strong enough to secure your device while simultaneously allowing you to detach it from the stand with ease.

CNC Machining/Anodized Aluminum

To create a strong product we precision machined high grade aluminum. The final product will be bead blasted and anodized.

3M adhesiveWe use innovative 3M VHB tape to ensure your attachment disks stay in place. To safely remove the tape, swab rubbing alcohol between the device and tape and the bond will dissolve and easily come off residue free.




Our Team


  Ananda Svarupa - Founder and Inventor

 Dan Martinez -  Industrial Designer

 Karni Kahlon - Co-founder


.

Our Team

Ananda Svarupa Das - Founder and inventor of Bungajungle products.  So far he has introduced 4 products and more are coming.  His creativity is harnessed in having an unusual background of education, lifestyle and pursuit of spiritual consciousness.  The products presented by Ananda show that simplicity is the key to function - that can be applied in any field from product design to how we eat, sleep and live.


Dan Martinez – Our industrial engineering specialist out of Los Angeles- Dan has been working with us since we first began preliminary designs. With his help and 25 years of experience of bringing products to life from concept to product. Dan has been indispensable in his knowledge and manufacturing connections in Asia, North America and his home town of LA where our first batch of Bungajungle’s are being assembled.


Karni Kahlon – Has been an integral part of Bungajungle's success. From his financial support, to marketing and manufacturing knowledge, without Karni we would not be here. For 20 years he has owned several companies, and has diverse knowledge in running small businesses and delivering quality service to customers.



Risks and Challenges


Although our prototype exceeded our expectations and was a great working product, we knew that we wanted to really have the latest technology to provide the greatest benefit to the end users. The addition of magnetic shielding helped us to be on the on the cutting edge.  This allowed the us to include hard disk laptops, Macbooks and take away the worry for any long term damage to devices from the association with magnets. Changes like these can be challenging, but in the end they help to create a better product.


We have secured an assembly house and suppliers here in the United States, so our first assembly will take place here in the USA supplying our batch that is already committed to our first round of pledgers.  With that, it will allow us keep track of quality control more closely.  With, changes, supplier lead time, and shipping time, unforeseen issues can always arise, and that is why we have chosen to expedite our manufacturing by doing ourselves here in the USA for 2013..


We however need more capital to finalize our product and secure large orders in Asia. Our initial startup costs have been covered by our investors, but we are seeking capital so that we can fulfill larger orders and have a more reasonable operating budget, and of course fulfill the orders of our Indiegogo contributors.  Our supporters on Crwodfunding are our number one priority and they will be the first to receive our next batch of stands/mounts.  Many of our interested parties are located in booming economies like Brazil, Russia, India and Turkey and we are eager to supply our partners with our amazing product line as soon as possible.

Please help us make this a reality sooner.  


Every pledge counts, every share and click helps.  


Thank You All For Your Support

story:
Our Story 

While playing Division I ball in college, and then professionally, we'd have someone video tape our swings.  With technology the way it is, people are visually oriented more so than having someone tell you what to do.  Watching yourself perform is a very effective way to identify what's working and what's not.  Simple things like how my stance looked, where was I holding my hands, or what did my swing path through the ball look like.  Funny how all the little things effect how far the ball goes and its path.  The most frustrating thing about video training in college was all the waiting and scheduling time to watch recorded videos.  Plus, there was only so much time you could spend with the coach before it was time for the next player to view his swing.  I wanted to take my swing footage with me for further analysis.  That's when it occurred to me.  I needed to build a mobile tool for my phone that did this so I could carry videos around and watch them whenever I wanted.  We'll, that's our Golf Coach Pro Mobile App.  An easy to use, simple tool that allows you to capture and compare your performance.  You can analize your best swings and compare them to your performance on any given day.  And when you need guidance, you can download professional swings for use as a training guide.  The bottom line is "it works, and it works great"!

As the founder and CEO of Athletic Improvement Company, our vision is to support fellow athletes with easy to use, reliable, affordable, sports improvement mobile technologies.  As a collegiate Division 1 and professional athlete, our quality is insured by the simple fact that our products are  "developed by the player, for the player".  Golf is one of my passions.  To check out the quality of our products, check out two previously released sports specific Apps - Baseball Swing Trainer iRake by visiting its website at www.iRake-App.com, and Softball Hitting Coach by visiting its website at www.SoftballHittingCoachApp.com, or visit Apple's iTunes Store and type in the key words: Baseball iRake and/or Softball Hitting Coach.  We have many more sports specific Apps on the drawing board.

As a 24 year old college graduate and professional, I believe in sports, and the life style, quality of life, sense of purpose, and relationships it builds. My passion is to give back to the sporting community with something I know works.  I want this App in the hands of the youth of America, and I need your financial support in making this happen.  We've priced our Apps for less than the cost of a hot dog and coke.  Our Golf Coach Pro Mobile App wasn't our first App, and won't be our last.  Your finalcial support will be greatly appreciated in making this happen.

While I recognize some people just can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help: Ask friends to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign - Tweet, Facebook, etc..  Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

I want to insure your satisfaction.  Should you need to contact me, I can be reached at Ryan@AICApps.com.  Please don't hesitate to reach out.  I love this stuff.

story:
• No Bluetooth!
  • No Cables!
  • Easy to Use!
  • Rechargeable!

If you love to listen to music and you're tired of carrying cables, then the Music A GoGo is for you! No Bluetooth needed!

Music A GoGo is big sound in a small package. Using its innovative acoustic mechanism, it delivers sound that is crisp, clear, and full-bodied. Sound emanates from the phones speakers and is transformed into a lively and enveloping sound without any connections.

You have the choice of a black or green Music A GoGo starting at just $19!

Unlike the Boom Bx, Music A GoGo is powered by a rechargeable battery. This benefits users by eliminating the cost of batteries. All you have to do is use a mini USB to charge their speaker, which is included. The Music A GoGo has a simple on/off switch that was used instead of the push button due to improving product quality. We have found that this power switch is much more reliable than the push button in Boom Bx. When the switch is in the on position, simply start playing music and place your device on Music A GoGo. You will be amazed at the music souring out.


Any Funding

All funds will be used for marketing the Music A GoGo plus providing the outstanding rewards to everyone. Along with this, the funding will help us develop additional products and increase our brand name. Ideas of Music A GoGo 2 are in the making but we need your help to make it happen!

What we ask...?

We need help in spreading the word about our GREAT project, "Music A GoGo". For your commitment, you will receive our commitment of delivery and our thanks for helping to take our product to the market place. We can't do it without your help.




OUR COMMITMENT

We are adamant this product will help you listen to music from your smart phone without any wires or Bluetooth.

The speaker is designed for smart phones and MP3 players. Simply, put any brand mobile phone or MP3 player on this speaker’s top, no need to plug in any cables or wires,  and the speaker plays music in a super rich & beautiful sound. No Bluetooth required. We didn't convince you when we ran the Boom BX project, however, when we ran that project, we learned a lot and were able to complete a better product, Music A GoGo. We are now ready for mass production and found a way to reduce the cost of the final product.

Who Are We?

I am Nick Robinson and I will soon be finished at the prestigious Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago. This has allowed me to run my project and bring fun into many lives with Music A GoGo. My partner is Mike Reeves. He has been developing successful projects over the past 30 years. Mike invented and patented four different products, one was marketed by him for 10 years on the QVC shopping channel. He was CEO of Comguard Inc. and Vice President of Engineering for Ameritech.

Your help with this project will allow us to finalize our mass production and marketing plans. Everything is completed and just needs the final push to Market. The rewards will all be fulfilled for each level and the prices were reduced on this Indiegogo campaign.

Whether you are able to contribute or not, please make some noise to help this important campaign through Twitter, Facebook or any other Social Media accounts that you may have.

Remember to also interact socially with our page!!!

THANKS!!!!

story:
iChief is a family/friend operated company out of San Diego CA. All iChief cases are USA manufactured and made from recycled materials.  Here at iChief we believe in the freedom to enjoy what you want, where you want. Introducing the worlds only iPhone case that gives you the convenience to roll up your favorite herbs on the go.

We appreciate your support and any contributions that you can make towards our campaign.  We have had great feedback and success with the iPhone 4/4s. We have only been in production as of January 2014 and have sold cases all over the west coast. Customers have purchased from as far as New York to Canada, and even Australia. Now we need your help and support to stay in front of the rapidly evolving cell phone case industry!  Working in the manufacturing industry can be very pricey and we can assure you that every penny funded will be spent strategically to satisfy YOU.  With your help, we can continue to bring you unique products made in the USA.



We are asking for $30,000 to help fund iChief. These funds will be invested as listed below:
~$15,000- iChief 5/5s steel mold and Manufacturing
-the prototype for this model is complete and with your help, we will be in stock with the 5/5s case this April.
~$5,000- Apparel and Accessories (screen printer, shirts, hats, premium quality rolling papers, etc.)

-With a great team of artists and designers, iChief has become more than a product, its a lifestyle that sees no boundaries.  We are stepping into new territory, making iChief housing for all portable apple products and top android phones.

~$10,000 - Innovation  (start new patent and steel mold)


-Our industry is one that is fast-paced, and that suits us best. Our team is constantly bringing new ideas and designs to the table.  With your help we can get the tools that will give us more flexibility and expand iChief horizons.  

www.ichiefsupply.com
Instagram-@ichiefsupply
facebook-iChief


Burlap Bag 14''x26''

story:
Short Summary

Do you love playing games in your spare time? Do you love browsing for incredible beauty and pampering bargains? Can you imagine playing games to win some incredible beauty and pampering bargains? We Can!!!!


That is our aim for our website www.pamperbids.com. The feedback we have received so far has been great, but we know we can offer so so so much more!

With YOUR Help we can reach a much wider audience (hopefully international too!) and evolve our current format into something Fun and Unique and somewhere that our members can escape the harsh realities of tight budgets, making cutbacks on their fashion and beauty and lifestyle choices, and Treat themselves and have some FUN!

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $5750 (roughly £3600)

This will mean we can  offer you the following features:

Upgrade our current script ($899 cost)

Which will allow us to:

- Give the site a nicer more professional look
- Make it easier to use
- Less glitching due to using a professional script
- Allow people to automatically gain free bids by sharing auctions on Facebook
- Add a new auction called Lowest Unique Bid, explained below
- Tiered wins, so bidders that come 2nd/3rd/4th are credited back a percentage of bids
- Ability to vote the next item to go up via the site
- A Weekly/Monthly leaderboard for people who have won the most auctions (prizes to the highest ranked)
- Ability to comment on single product pages with other customers also bidding
- Ability to play single player and multiplayer 'Flash Games' to make the competitive and winning process
more enjoyable and less stressful. Using games will also allow more skill to play a role in winning
and less about who has the most bids to win. People will be able to win prizes with limited bids
by playing games and setting the highest score to win auctions!
- A daily free spin the wheel feature to receive free bids! 
- A low cost premium service that will give our members better features and advantages!
- The ability to sign-up and sign-in with your Facebook Account

Imagine playing one 50p game of Gem Swap 2 and scoring the highest score to win a brand new £50 designer handbag! Or even better yet, imagine using one of your free bids to score the highest score and win the product completely free! This is all possible with our new features!

You may be asking yourself, "what if I'm not as good as others at these games"? No problem, we'll be integrating a ranking system that places you vs other players of similar skills. As well as this we'll be giving players back in the way of free bids for those that come in the top "x" place. So those who don't manage to win but always come in the top 10 for example will receive their bids back as free bids.

Lowest Unique Bid Explanation:

The Lowest Unique Bid auction is a new auction type that is far more safer than the original Penny Auction format due to being less about who has the most bids and instead who has the Lowest Unique Bid. 

Players are able to put in a bid from 1p onwards to as high as they would like. The only catch being that only the person with the lowest unique bid wins the auction when the auction finishes. 

So if 5 people entered an auction, 2 of which bid on 1p, 2 bid on 3p and the last person bid on 2p. The person who bid on 2p would win the auction because it is the 'Lowest Unique Bid' i.e. the lowest amount that only one person bid for.


Other Costs:

Cost of all games ($1,600)

Bingo
Bouncing Balls
Staries
Tri Peaks Solitaire
Gem Swap 2
Word Search 2
Towers
Snakes and Ladders

These 8 different games will give our users a variety of different games to play, so that they never get bored. Not only that, but as our site grows we will be adding new games to keep our users coming back and excited.

Extra plugins for script ($1,050)

These plugins are necessary to help the website function much faster and leave less room for error!

The extra $1,500 or so shall be used for marketing and script editing that'll need doing by hiring a professional programmer. The cost of hiring a programmer for 1 month is roughly $1,200 which will be necessary to put our plans into play.


If you choose to help us towards our goal, we have an exciting range of perks ranging from thank you message on our fanpage, free bids, free game entries (once theyre up and running), free gifts, and if you run a business yourself, we will do some advertising for you in our newletter, on our fanpage, and if you sell products that would go well on our site, we will include your items on the website, and get you some sales too :)

If we dont reach our final goal, then we will still be doing what we have planned, but it may take longer.

The Impact

Everyone knows that money is tight nowadays, and for most people, the first thing to go is luxuries, from make up, to hair cuts, beauty treatments, designer clothing etc.

This is why we set up the website, to try and help people to have some fun, and also get themselves some lovely treats they couldnt normally afford.

We try to make it personal by getting our fans to vote for what they want to see on the site, and to give us their personal 'wish list' and top ten beauty essentials. 

You can see the feedback we have already received from current members on our fanpage https://www.facebook.com/pages/PamperBidscom/435429179811013

With your help with extra funding, we can reach so many more people, and include much larger prizes alongside the current ones we feature.

Other Ways You Can Help

And that’s all there is to it.

Even if you aren't able to donate, you can still help us achieve our goal by sharing our campaign on facebook, twitter, with friends, businesses you think may want to get involved.

Any help is greatly appreciated and we thank you in advance for your support x

The feedback we have received so far has been great, but we know we can offer so so so much more!With YOUR Help we can reach a much wider audience (hopefully international too!) and evolve our current format into something Fun and Unique and somewhere that our members can escape the harsh realities of tight budgets, making cutbacks on their fashion and beauty and lifestyle choices, and Treat themselves and have some FUN!

story:
WE ARE BACK WITH A SECOND BATCH OF WIMOTO'S!

Wimotos are a family of small, wireless sensors for your iPhone, iPad, Android, Linux or Raspberry Pi device that measure environmentals such as ambient temperature, humidity, light, soil moisture, soil temperature, object temperature, human presence and movement. They last for about a year on a single battery and don't require an Internet connection to work. 

You can upload your data to our cloud service for analysis via our free app, or use the optional Wimoto Cloud Cube to do it for you in realtime via Wifi.

 

 



Instead of launching a weather app, wouldn't it be nice to know what the weather right outside your home is right now? Or if it's too dry or cold at night in your baby's bedroom? Or how long it take my fridge to cool down every time the door is opened? Or if my cigars turning to dust in my humidor? Or if that bottle of vintage wine is turning to vinegar in the basement? Or if my compost heap has finished its aerobic reaction?...

The Climote has literally hundreds of uses where you need precision temperature, humidity and light information. Like all motes, it records this information to its built-in memory when you're not around and can send you alerts when a minimum or maximum threshold is exceeded. You can even upload your mote's data to our cloud service to analyze it or export it to your own applications.

 

The Growmote measures the amount of water available in the soil surrounding the roots of a plant. the level of light available for growing, and even soil temperature to protect against frost. Unlike other devices on the market, they're economical enough to have several of and can 'push' alerts such as "I need water" directly to your smart device.

Imagine coming home from work, and your lawn telling you that it needs to be watered?


The Thermote doesn't measure the air temperature or even use a probe: it measures the temperature of an object just by being pointed at it! The techno-jargon for this is "infrared emissivitiy". In practical terms, it means that the mote:thermo doesn't need to be touching the object you want to measure the temperature of -- just point and measure!

This makes it great for measuring the temperature of the water in your hot tub or swimming pool or aquarium, your body tempature (via your temporal area), food, or anything else you might not want to stick a traditional temperature probe into for reasons of hygiene, comfort or practicality. 

Because it's tiny and can easily be stuck to an iPad or iPhone, you can even turn your iPad or iPhone into a portable contactless thermomter!

 

As we've now exceeded our original funding goal, we're able to introduce the...

The Securimote has a passive infrared motoion sensor that detects human movement up to around 5m/16ft away. It also has an onboard acceleromter, so it can detect if it's moved. Use it to notify you if someone is approaching your front door, if your toddler has climbed out of his bed again in the middle of the night, or that the mail is delivered -- the possibilites are enedless!

A Great Looking App

 

Our app features a minimalist deisgn and works with the whole range of Motes -- no need to launch separate apps for each type. Simple "sparkline" graphing is available on your iPhone and iPad to indicate trends and data can easily be uplaoded to the cloud service for more detailed graphing and data export with the click of an icon.

Signal strength and battery life for each Mote is displayed whilst that Mote is selected.

We will have an Android version of the app for Android 4.3 devices in June or July of 2013, although this is dependant on Google releasing Anrdoid 4.3 with a fully supported version of the Broadcom Bluetooth 4.0 stack. Only devices that have the necessary hardware (most Samsung devices, Google Nexus, etc.) will be compatible -- please ask if you're unsure if your device will be supported.


Common Features Of All Motes

Technical Specifications

How We'll Use The Money Raised and the Risks and Challenges

We've spent a long time developing our technology, going through various prototypes, developing the iOS app, putting together the beta of our cloud service, and more. We're almost at the pre-production stage, but we need your help to make the first production run a reality.

We'll use the funds raised for the following major tasks:

Plastic Enclosure Moulding

Even a seemingly simple plastic part can actually have a very expensive and complicated mould. These moulds sometimes cost tens of thousands and sometimes even hundreds of thousands of dollars.

Rather than have a custom enclosure for each Mote, we've opted to use one basic design that can be post-machined using a CNC. This saves time, money and reduces risk -- it's a lot easier to adjust machining a hole on a generic design than having to redesign the entire mould if the hole is completely wrong. 

We've worked with Protomold, a company that specializes in prototpye and short run injection moulding, to design an enclosure that is both functional and economical. Using CAD models they have identified potential issues with our designs *before* manufacturing and therefore we are confident we have mitigated any expensive issues before starting production.

Regulatory Testing

Because Motes are both tiny computers and wirelessly communicate with a smartphone, tablet or computer, they require regulatory testing and approval.

To ensure that we get Bluetooth complance approval we've worked with the manufacturer of the Bluetooth SMART system-on-a-chip we're using to ensure we follow their best pratices. We've also reused their reference design for the complicated radio portion, which also means we're assured compliance approval from the Bluetooth oversight body -- Bluetooth SIG. 

We have partnered with a testing facility that will perform our FCC (USA), Industry Canada (Canada) and CE (Europe) radio frequency emissions testing and provide consulting advice in the unlikely event we are not compliant. 

Electronics Assembly and Fulfillment 

One of the biggest challenges with producing a product is getting every part of it made, put together and ready for shipping.

For electronics our electronics, we have a worked with a contract manufacturer who will take on the procurement of most of the parts, manufacturing of the printed circuit boards, assembly of the printed circuit boards and the testing of the completed electronics sub-assemblies. 

But it's not economically feasible to do the above everytime we get a single order -- we need to order in bulk (1,000 Motes or more) to make it practical.

 

Press Coverage

"Whether you are a gardener or just had a baby, you will be alerted of changes in the environment with the Motes sensor. This is an affordable product that is durable, simple, and has a great app to go with it. Motes has doubled its goal on Indiegogo!" - The Crowdfund Mafia

"Notifications keep us appraised of email, Twitter and overall social presence, but what about the real world? That’s where Motes come in. These tiny 1×1-inch sensors keep tabs on their local environment, detecting either temperature, humidity and light (Climote), object temperature via infrared (Thermote), motion plus movement thanks to an accelerometer and infrared sensor (Securimote), or light exposure and soil humidity of a plant (Growmote). How they’re used is totally up to you, but they make it easy with 1-year battery life, water-resistant casings, wireless connectivity, two types of included mounting materials, plus an app that brings it all together." - GearHungry 

 

 
   

Questions and Answers

Are Motes waterproof?
While they are not designed to be submerged, they are water resistent and can be placed indoors or outdoors. We use the same stuff to coat their electronics that they use to keep electronics safe in the harsh conditions of oil rigs!

What kind of batteries do they use?
Motes use common, readily avaialble CR2032 "coin cell" batteries. Our Perks for Motes include an extra battery as an added thank you.

Does the app display in Farenheit as well as Celcius? 
Yes! Farenheit, Celcius and Kelvin will be supported.

Can you guarantee the range?
Unfortunately, no. Most building materials such as drywall/sheet rock, lumber and flooring do not severely affect the range. Thick concrete walls such as those in foundations will affect the range quite severely. If you're able to see where the Mote is from where you are ("line of sight"), you're pretty much guaranteed a 30-50 meter range.

How big is a Mote?
The Climote and Thermote are approximately 30mm*30mm*10mm. The soil probe for the Growmote adds approximately 90mm in height to that device.

Why not use Wifi?
Wifi is relatively power-hungry and wouldn't allow us to produce such tiny, battery powered sensors that run for so long on a single battery. We *will* release a Mote-to-Wife bridge (mote:cloud) later in the year that will connect your Motes directly to our cloud service for realtime, continuous data streaming, remote access and historical data.

Will you ship internationally?
Yes! Go ahead and select the Perk you'd like, and we'll contact you once we reach our goal to let you know exact shipping costs. As an example, shipping uninsured/untracked to Europe is about USD$9 per Mote or USD$44 for a 3-pack insured. Tracked and insured shipments are very expensive with Canada Post, so we're looking into courier services.

How many Motes can I talk to from one iPhone/iPad?
Our software is currently limited to 128 Motes per iPhone or iPad.

What devices are Motes compatible with?
At launch, you'll have to have an Apple iPhone 4S or 5, an iPad (3rd gen & 4th gen), or an iPad Mini, or a current iPod touch. Android support will arrive in June 2013 via Android 4.3 (developer API 18). If your device has Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and can be upgraded to Android 4.3, then it should work with our Motes.

Will there be a Software Development Kit (SDK)?
The mote.cloud bridge will have alternative firmware that will be Arduno compatible for hackers. We will publish details of our Bluetooth 4.0 profiles and services so that you can access the Motes from Linux or other environments that don't have an off-the-shelf app.

Will there be other Motes?
Yes! We already have prototypes of additional and very exciting Motes. We may even add them as "Stretch Goals" to the existing campaign if things go well. Stay tuned!

We're a distributor or reseller and would like to carry your products
We'd prefer you buy the 100-pack here and support our campaign, but you can also drop us a note at contact@wimoto.com and we'll talk.

story:
iSunCLOUD: 

The next generation of cloud making full use of your storage


iSunCLOUD was invented for growing need of cloud storage in the world. If we look at the incumbent cloud solutions in the market, each solution has some sort of problems, for instance, they can be costly, unreliable or slow. 

That is why we created iSunCLOUD, a shared economy (P2P) cloud storage system. iSunCLOUD shares the “share” concept of Uber, Lyft, and Airbnb. Instead of renting storage space from multi-billion dollar companies such as Apple or Dropbox, iSunCLOUD allows you to rent out your own storage in your existing PC(s) or any devices with storage function to people who need extra storage. Like any other share economy platforms, users can receive a payment in return. 

Why do we need you?

Our talented team has been working in developing iSunCLOUD since 2014. We are now in our final stage of testing the mutual cloud system. Similar to any other P2P network, the number of users and the stability of users’ activity are critical. In our testing, we found the typical PCs we use are not the most cost effective way to fully enjoy the benefits of iSunCLOUD. While it is true that PC users can access or connect to the cloud anytime, the cost of electricity maybe high to host it for 24/7.

That is why we are starting this crowdfunding campaign for iSunNODE (the node). iSunNODEis a device as a foundation for our P2P network. The node can perform complex encryption and sustain the heavy P2P network traffic. In additional, the node can be an entertainment center featured with nearly all typical functions performed by your home electronic products.

What is ISunNODE?


iSunNODE is the foundation for iSunCLOUD. It’s a hardware that can do many things. We designed iSunNODE to be a media center for all your electronics’ data. After many researches, we think this device is best fit to a big screen, your TV. You may use the TV to read the content in the cloud or in the node. Besides, we don’t want to design a device that just Does One thing, we want the node to fit anywhere and everywhere, that is why we designed the device to support Dual CPUs and of course, with many functions.

  • Processors: System CPU: 1.5GHz Octa Core (Android or Windows) + 2G RAM; Router CPU: Dedicated Router CPU 880MHZ 
  • Storage: 8G SSD and Up to 8TB Hard drive
  • Wireless:  Bluetooth 4.0, WIFI 802.11 AC Up to 1300mbps
  • I/O: HDMI 2.0 (4K 60FPS), LAN & WAN, Optical Audio, USB 2.0*5, USB3.0*1

Benefit of Dual CPU:

  • Remove interference between two major tasks from the hardware level (router task vs system task).
  • Specialized task for specialized CPU - System CPU runs system tasks, such as Android APP, TV APP, Windows System, Play Movie. Router CPU dedicated for traffic control, making sure the best performance for all connected devices at home.

iSunNODE +iSunCLOUD = Things iSunNODE can do

You can do many things with iSunNODE when you combine iSunNODE with iSunCLOUD.

1.  Personal Server

We think people should have all photos, videos and other data in a personal server inside their home, so that every time people want to retrieve the data, they will not have to download it from the internet.

2.  Private Cloud

Our goal is to create a cloud that are just next to you no matter where you are. Since your files are stored in our decentralized network, we can move your files to the nodes near you no matter where you are in the world. 

3.  Free for Lifetime (If you contribute)

iSunCLOUDis built on a P2P network. We back up all files in our decentralized cloud. In order to use the P2P cloud space for free, you can contribute a portion of your local storage space in exchange for other’s storage space.

4.  Safe! Safe ! & Safe !

Our cloud use “shred and disperse” technology. Each file that you upload will be cut into pieces and disperse all over the network. No one other than yourself can piece the file together.


5.  Potential income 

Contributors may able to receive income, if their space where used by users who pay for the spaces instead of exchanging with their own space.

6 . Media Consumption 

Most of the TV boxes today have you streamed your contents from a mobile. Streaming from phone may lead to temporary suspension of work of your phone. iSunCLOUD seamlessly backup and store your videos, data on your node. The next time you are "streaming" a 4K video that you shoot from your phone to the TV, it can be played from the node without a lag or drop frame.



Advantage of running a iSunCLOUD on iSunNODE than a PC

Lower Power Consumption - 10% of a normal tower PC's power consumption

Small Form Factor that fit everywhere in the home


How does ISunNODE work?

Personal Server: 

  1. Upload a file into your iSunNODE
  2. Now you have access of the file anywhere in the world
  3. Each time you download the file, it comes directly from your home server. NO COPY ON THE CLOUD, we value your privacy.

Join and Be Part of iSunCLOUD:

  1. Pick a contribution size of your storage
  2. Pick a safety level that you prefer: Level 2- Level 10. Each level represents how many copies of the file we keep on the decentralized cloud. 
  3. Depending on your safety level, your internet bandwidth demand for storage, you will be assigned a conversion ratio.   Your conversion ratio is most likely to be the same as safety level.
  4. If your conversion ratio is 3, for each 300MB you contribute, you have 100MB cloud space. 
  5. After you upload the file, the file is shredded into units of 100KB, each unit is copied 3 times*, and then saved in nodes across the network. (*assuming your safety level is same as conversion ratio) 
  6. If you need your file from the cloud, the file will arrive in seconds. By sourcing your file from multiple nodes and leverage on P2P technology, your download speed will be blazing fast.


Which One Should I Get? 

They can all be your Home Media Center, TV box, Mini PC, Gaming Box. Their difference are 
  1. ISunNODE Clean - If you have an idle drive at home, or you just want a powerful mini PC that one day it can be your home personal private cloud. This is your choice. 
  2. ISunNODE 2TB - If you are looking for a personal private server to use at home or work, 2TB will be enough for your personal daily usage.  In addition, the 2TB will be sufficient for personal data and media usage. Use 2TB with a TV, you will not only be able to stream 4K video on TV, but also store the video in the node. 
  3. ISunNODE 4TB - If you like the speed, safety and convenience of the iSunCLOUD, 4TB node will do the job. iSunNODE 4TB has all the benefits of 2TB as well as potentially get you free usage for life by contributing certain % of the storage. 
  4. ISunNODE8TB - 8TB is the BEST,  the 8TB Node will be the cornerstone of our network. 8TB will not only satisfy your daily need, but also save up store credits for future uses of the iSunCLOUD.


Clouds Comparison: 

By utilizing your own hard drives, you may use iSunCLOUD for free for life! By contributing to the network, you may get unlimited of cloud space. Of course, the size of your cloud is determined by your contribution.  
iSunCLOUD (code name Swarm) in action 

iSunCLOUD (code name Swarm) with back end

Team: 

Our Team was founded in late 2014. We were formed because of our passion for decentralized cloud. We see the growing need for cloud but dislike the price and security of the public cloud. We also dislike the fact that people have empty storage at home but still have to buy cloud from companies.  Therefore, we started the iSunCLOUD, with project code Swarn, a P2P decentralized cloud that builds on people's excess hard drive space.  Our team comprises of elites from different background, including former employees from companies like D-Link and Acer.  We got Jackson as the team leader in charge of UI and UX. Together with Luphia laying out the system structure, Jingji refining UX, Luke testing the solutions, Travis and Andy coding Android and IOS APP, and our full stack engineer Tony making sure everything goes well, we hope to bring you the software that can change the face of Cloud going forward. 


Timeline:

Legal Disclaimer:"Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."
story_txt:
iSunCLOUD: 


The next generation of cloud making full use of your storage



iSunCLOUD was invented for growing need of cloud storage in the world. If we look at the incumbent cloud solutions in the market, each solution has some sort of problems, for instance, they can be costly, unreliable or slow. That is why we created iSunCLOUD, a shared economy (P2P) cloud storage system. iSunCLOUD shares the “share” concept of Uber, Lyft, and Airbnb. Instead of renting storage space from multi-billion dollar companies such as Apple or Dropbox, iSunCLOUD allows you to rent out your own storage in your existing PC(s) or any devices with storage function to people who need extra storage. Like any other share economy platforms, users can receive a payment in return. 
Why do we need you?Our talented team has been working in developing iSunCLOUD since 2014. We are now in our final stage of testing the mutual cloud system. Similar to any other P2P network, the number of users and the stability of users’ activity are critical. In our testing, we found the typical PCs we use are not the most cost effective way to fully enjoy the benefits of iSunCLOUD. While it is true that PC users can access or connect to the cloud anytime, the cost of electricity maybe high to host it for 24/7.That is why we are starting this crowdfunding campaign for iSunNODE (the node). iSunNODEis a device as a foundation for our P2P network. The node can perform complex encryption and sustain the heavy P2P network traffic. In additional, the node can be an entertainment center featured with nearly all typical functions performed by your home electronic products.What is ISunNODE?iSunNODE is the foundation for iSunCLOUD. It’s a hardware that can do many things. We designed iSunNODE to be a media center for all your electronics’ data. After many researches, we think this device is best fit to a big screen, your TV. You may use the TV to read the content in the cloud or in the node. Besides, we don’t want to design a device that just Does One thing, we want the node to fit anywhere and everywhere, that is why we designed the device to support Dual CPUs and of course, with many functions.
Processors: System CPU: 1.5GHz Octa Core (Android or Windows) + 2G RAM; Router CPU: Dedicated Router CPU 880MHZ 
Storage: 8G SSD and Up to 8TB Hard drive
Wireless:  Bluetooth 4.0, WIFI 802.11 AC Up to 1300mbps
I/O: HDMI 2.0 (4K 60FPS), LAN & WAN, Optical Audio, USB 2.0*5, USB3.0*1
Benefit of Dual CPU:
Remove interference between two major tasks from the hardware level (router task vs system task).
Specialized task for specialized CPU - System CPU runs system tasks, such as Android APP, TV APP, Windows System, Play Movie. Router CPU dedicated for traffic control, making sure the best performance for all connected devices at home.

iSunNODE +iSunCLOUD = Things iSunNODE can do
You can do many things with iSunNODE when you combine iSunNODE with iSunCLOUD.1.  Personal Server
We think people should have all photos, videos and other data in a personal server inside their home, so that every time people want to retrieve the data, they will not have to download it from the internet.2.  Private Cloud

6 . Media Consumption Most of the TV boxes today have you streamed your contents from a mobile. The next time you are "streaming" a 4K video that you shoot from your phone to the TV, it can be played from the node without a lag or drop frame.

story:
Our mission

We are out to make a free nationwide legal resource platform for family law. Parents will be able to get state by state, county by county legal information, connections to non-profits and ratings for local attorneys. It will also provide step by step instructions on how to fill out the paperwork needed to respond or file for anything related to family law.  Along with all these other valuable resources our platform will provide smart petitioning that will help all of these great organizations trying to make positive change to family law get more traction and achieve a higher level of success. The time for a dynamic nationwide family law help resource is now!!! Thank you so much for supporting our mission to make this a reality.

How this came to be

     

Hi I'm Brandon Lyons, a 29-year-old single father to a beautiful 5-year-old daughter. I have worked really hard to be an active part of my daughter's life. Two years ago, in late 2011 I found myself in a situation where my daughter's mother was trying to take away the quality time my daughter and I were used to having together. The prospect of losing this quality time was horrifying. I was working as a low-wage construction worker, had my daughter the majority of the time while still paying child support, but I was so happy to have her full time that I didn't want to open up that can of worms with her mother. I was optimistic enough to think that one day things would change naturally for the better.

When my daughter's mother was finished with school she came to me and told me that my time with my daughter was going to be reduced to every other weekend and she wanted more child support. I wasn't keeping a record of how often I had my daughter because I never expected to face this; and when the child support case came I never thought they would increase my payment from $375 to $785 based purely on the fact that her mother said that she was going to file a new parenting plan that gave me every other weekend. When the child support case results came I was shocked. It took 4 weeks to hear the court decision and during that time frame I still had my daughter the majority of the time. Something had to be done but with no cash or credit resources to afford a lawyer my options were looking slim and scary. I set up meetings with lawyers but without money that was a no-go and then I contacted a firm that would fill out the paperwork needed for court, only to find out that they still cost in excess of $2000 just for the paperwork.

 Although I was extremely let down by these two paths they did both offer me one solid piece of advice as well as one harsh truth. The advice was to keep track of how often I had my daughter and the expenses that I incurred on a monthly basis as well as try my very best to backtrack my prior time spent. That was something other parents advised me to do as well. The harsh truth is that because I wasn’t the custodial parent it was going to be an extremely hard case to win. I immediately starting implementing their advice; looking back to figure out the precise times I had her in the past proved beyond difficult, but not impossible. I also started to research the outcomes of cases similar to mine and it didn’t comfort me one bit.  In fact it made me sick to find out how many great mothers and fathers had been run over and there was a direct cause: flawed laws and parents that abused the system for their own personal gain. It got me so fired up that I decided to make an organization aimed at protecting the great mothers and fathers that deserve to be partners in the raising of their children.

 I hit the books, started networking, met with law makers, and did the only thing that my finances could support--filling out the paperwork and representing myself in court. This wasn’t easy and I wanted to give up many times, but my daughter always motivated me to keep going. Here I was working full time, being a full-time father, working on getting my organization going and getting ready to represent myself in court. The paperwork alone was a huge task.  It involved over one hundred pages and took me filling out the wrong paperwork in its entirety four times to get it right.  Talk about frustration but I did end up getting it right. I was so busy that I was lucky to get 3-4 hours of sleep a night.

 While I was doing all this it was incredibly difficult to keep track of how often I had my daughter on a daily basis. I often found myself trying to think back to what exactly the schedule had been for the previous two weeks. This pattern continued for about another month until I thought “there has to be an app for this,” and so the search began. After a couple weeks of searching I was extremely disappointed that I had not yet found what I was looking for. As I was sitting down trying to remember my schedule for the last week it hit me, why doesn’t the app I had dreamt about exist? An app that not only conveniently helps parents keep track of scheduling and expenses but would also help parents get the free resources they would ordinarily have to spend days or weeks on Google trying to find, an app that can help them contact helpful non-profits in their area, an app that would help to increase the unity and the cooperation from organization to organization. From that moment I saw the vision of what an app like this can do for the movement and I set forth making my vision a reality.

 I didn’t have the resources to put this all together so I made a business plan and started approaching the banks. I remember the first time I e-mailed my 20 page business plan and the spelling and grammar was so bad that the response email literally contained laughter “hahahahaha have you prof read this” followed by everything incorrect being highlighted in red which was 90% of everything. This didn’t discourage me at all. Instead I corrected everything and turned that business plan from 20 to about 40 pages, turned it back and got a response back that it needed more specifics and information. I continued this back and forth routine and face to face meetings 40-50 more times with banks until I was left with a 200 plus page business plan and the recognition that banks would never loan me the money to a 500 credit score, $1,200/month income father like myself so I took the business plan that I had perfected and went in search of private investment. That path seemed impossible because none of my friends and family had the resources. If they did I likely would have been able to hire a lawyer for court, so needless to say those resources didn’t exist within my friends and family aside from the $300 dollars that I was really fortunate to receive from my grandma and the room and board my parents provided me.

 Because my daughter and other people were counting on me, failure was not an option. Over the next few months I contacted over 150 people via phone and email, and met with over 40 people in person to give my pitch and each sharpened my ability and resolve to get this done, until one day I finally heard the yes I longed for! I was able to get enough funds to build the basic app for Android and it has been an amazing, lesson-learning ride.  After over 6 months of development our first app, Dadmom is about to launch. This app is going to be a powerful tool for parents to keep record of scheduling and expenses. Unfortunately, I wasn’t able to add the other side of equally valuable features that I also still hoped to make a completely separate free application to make sure everyone can use these resources.  That’s why I’m here, to bring the entirety of this vision to fruition.

I am striving to bring a vision of fairness, transparency, accountability and accuracy to the family law system. A vision of parents being able to easily find the resources they desperately need, a vision of no good parent having to give all their quality family time, sleep, dreams, and money (borrowed or otherwise) just to get what is right out of family law. I’ve come too far to turn back, and I’m laser focused on making this a reality. It’s time we make a positive change for families by changing the way family law is practiced. Thanks so much for checking out my cause, I’m so grateful for everything we get for this cause, especially your support! 


What We Need & What You Get

I am hoping to raise $30,000 to go entirely towards enhanced software development. I currently have the base software functionality developed for the android platform; any money raised beyond our goal will go towards expanding availability to other platforms such as Apple and Windows. If we do not reach our goal then we will use the capital raised to complete the task in the following order. 

Where the funds are going

  1. Dynamic unifying organization to organization connecting
  2. Specific state by state information 
  3. Organized petitioning 
  4. More crisp and modern design
  5. Parent to parent resources and media sharing
  6. A second and completely free app that provides parents valuable resources
  7. Lay out the ground works for court integration

  8. Enhanced security



The Impact

By contributing to this cause you are helping to take this great nation one big leap towards adding fairness through transparency, accuracy, and accountability. We've never had the ability to have a dynamic system that makes it extremely convenient for parents to keep custody and expense information until now. It’s time the family law system utilizes it to make a far better system that protects the many great parents that are negatively affected by the way the system is currently set up. The family law revolution starts here! 

Not only will users be able to easily find local legal resources, non-profits and other organizations by simply using the Dadmom app, they will also be able to use the convenience of today's technology to help parents keep track of their child's expenses and how often they have them for legal, budgeting and/or other purposes. By using DadMom software, parents will be able to take date, time and location encrypted pictures, videos and receipt barcode by simply opening the DadMom app from their smart phone, tablet or computer and following a couple quick and easy steps. Users are able to set custom alarms and reminders to make a quick record of having their child or store their expense information. DadMom organizes the information into an easy-to-read and understandable legal format that can be exported to present to the court. The Dadmom app provides automatic uploading to a secure online database to ensure the information is accessible and safe. It will have many more features such as activity ideas, forums, classified ads, blogs, surveys, contests, prizes, important child medical information, interactive connections to social media, online parenting classes along with custom call and text recording.


Other Ways You Can Help

All the work I do stems from the passion I have for helping people. Over the last couple years I have dedicated all my free time to the parental equality movement. I’m passionate about helping the great parents that deserve to be an equal part in the raising of their child’s life, most do not have the financial resources to protect themselves in the family court. I run an organization were many of us don’t have the financial resources to sponsor this project but they provide something far more valuable, support, spreading the word and feedback in making sure the changes we seek are ones that will entire benefit of most import members of our society, our children! If you don’t have money don’t worry because your support in far more valuable, please help get the word out and connect with we on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/bfffr and twitter https://twitter.com/DadMomEquality. Get to know me, watch my video’s and feel my heart and if you support what I’m about then please like/follow me and tell you friends about this project. I owe everything to the men and women that have shown their belief in me, from the bottom of my heart thank you!


  1. Please spread the word!
  2. Follow me at
  • https://www.facebook.com/BFFFR
  • https://twitter.com/DadMomEquality
  • http://www.youtube.com/user/momdadus

The Impact
By contributing to this cause you are helping to take this great nation one big leap towards adding fairness through transparency, accuracy, and accountability. We've never had the ability to have a dynamic system that makes it extremely convenient for parents to keep custody and expense information until now. It’s time the family law system utilizes it to make a far better system that protects the many great parents that are negatively affected by the way the system is currently set up. The family law revolution starts here! 
Not only will users be able to easily find local legal resources, non-profits and other organizations by simply using the Dadmom app, they will also be able to use the convenience of today's technology to help parents keep track of their child's expenses and how often they have them for legal, budgeting and/or other purposes. By using DadMom software, parents will be able to take date, time and location encrypted pictures, videos and receipt barcode by simply opening the DadMom app from their smart phone, tablet or computer and following a couple quick and easy steps. Users are able to set custom alarms and reminders to make a quick record of having their child or store their expense information. DadMom organizes the information into an easy-to-read and understandable legal format that can be exported to present to the court. The Dadmom app provides automatic uploading to a secure online database to ensure the information is accessible and safe. It will have many more features such as activity ideas, forums, classified ads, blogs, surveys, contests, prizes, important child medical information, interactive connections to social media, online parenting classes along with custom call and text recording.
Other Ways You Can Help
All the work I do stems from the passion I have for helping people. Over the last couple years I have dedicated all my free time to the parental equality movement. I’m passionate about helping the great parents that deserve to be an equal part in the raising of their child’s life, most do not have the financial resources to protect themselves in the family court. I run an organization were many of us don’t have the financial resources to sponsor this project but they provide something far more valuable, support, spreading the word and feedback in making sure the changes we seek are ones that will entire benefit of most import members of our society, our children! If you don’t have money don’t worry because your support in far more valuable, please help get the word out and connect with we on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/bfffr and twitter https://twitter.com/DadMomEquality. Get to know me, watch my video’s and feel my heart and if you support what I’m about then please like/follow me and tell you friends about this project. I owe everything to the men and women that have shown their belief in me, from the bottom of my heart thank you!

Please spread the word!
Follow me at



https://www.facebook.com/BFFFR

https://twitter.com/DadMomEquality
http://www.youtube.com/user/momdadus

story:
Swiss Privacy Alliance

We, You and me and many others will support the Swiss Privacy Alliance with the goal to improve the human right for privacy in the internet!

Wir, Du und ich und viele Andere werden Swiss Privacy Alliance mit dem Ziel unterstützen, das Menschenrecht auf Privatsphäre auch im Internet mit technischen Mitteln durchzusetzen!

My name is Loeliger, Urs Loeliger
As a Swiss citizen I strongly support the human right for privacy since 30 years.

It is time to do more regarding internet privacy.

Swiss Privacy Alliance Vision: Make the Internet applications more secure in order to provide swiss privacy law for users around the world. There will be a certification process for secure applications. 
We recommend the following new safe APPs:
1. OpusTel the Swiss-based encryted Phone App  https://opustel.ch/en/home
2. Threema the Swiss-based encrypted Chat App  https://threema.ch/en
Both APPs are for Apple iOS and android Mobile phones and are using end to end AES encryption. The servers are based in Switzerland (no patriot act).


Swiss Privacy Alliance Mission:

1. Provide a highly-effective collaboration forum
2. Comprehensive Security for Everyone (for worldwide usage to support the human rights)
3. Grow the privacy application industry
4. Secure Cryptography (without man in the middle and no back doors)
5. Deliver great product connectivity through testing and certification

Currently several companies like Brainstorm AG are looking for more founding partners.

Brainstorm AG


Urs Loeliger
CEO
6376 Emmetten, Switzerland

You can become a passive or active member!

Swiss Privacy Alliance will be founded soon with your support.

Please forward this information to your friends.

story:
Why choose ChargeOriginal USB cables?

A functional and durable cable, which has been specifically developed for today's style savvy market in mind.

Braided Cable - stronger and more durable, tangle proof and more interesting with a variety of patterns.

The cable patterns available (please check relation of patterns available per length):

Pattern 1: RED ROYAL 

Pattern 2: FANTASY

Pattern 3: GREEN CAMO

PATTERNS FOR LIGHTNING

1.5M / 4.9FT

FANTASY

GREEN CAMO

RED ROYAL

3M / 9.8FT

FANTASY

PATTERNS FOR ANDROID / MICRO USB

1.5M / 4.9FT

FANTASY

GREEN CAMO

3M / 9.8FT

FANTASY

DESIGN

Moulded Casing - all ChargeOriginal cables are manufactured with moulded casings, which ensures the Lightning connector is securely fitted to the cable. In addition the moulded casings also incorporate a protective-case friendly design, in that the casing has a tapered lip closest to the connector, enabling the user to charge or sync their 'iDevice' without the need to remove the protective-case.


Length - ChargeOriginal cables are conveniently 1.5m/4.9ft or 3m/9.8ft long. Most devices batteries unfortunately last for a day or less, depending on usage, and therefore users end up still needing to use their devices while they are charging. The standard 1m/3ft long cables are not helpful at all, and users usually find themselves in very uncomfortable positions trying to adapt their bodies to reach their Devices. ChargeOriginal cables are therefore long enough to give users the extra length they need to operate their devices comfortably while they are still charging.


Specification:

Lightning:

Current: 2.4A 

Micro USB:

Current: 2.1A


Cable Holder - To help users keep their ChargeOriginal cables tidy, I will also include a cable holder. These cable holders have been developed to be easy to use and designed so as not to get lost - fitted with an elasticated band that 'locks' itself around the USB connector, and a strap users can then roll the rest of the cable in at the desired length.


Market Analysis & Solutions

Most of USB charging and syncing cables currently available in the market are boring and not as durable and functional as they should be.

Over the past year I have therefore been researching the perfect solution for the charging cable. Analysing a variety of cables available in the market, I identified that charging cables should have the following requirements:

1 - Apple Certified for iDevices; 

2 - Strong and easy to store ;

3 - Proper current charging rate;

4 - Protective-case friendly.

Apple Certification: non certified cables can be blocked by the Apple software the iOS, often immediately or later through new updates. Apple Certified products come with a official chip inside it that allows the cable to keep working over time and iOS updates.

Trust me it is not a very pleasant surprise to receive this warning message!

Strong and easy to store: Lightning cables are known for not lasting all that long, and get tangled and messy easily. The nylon woven that covers the cable taught it up and make the cable last much longer and don't tangle.


Proper current charging rate: not all chargers are created equal, even if they look similar.

Terminology – amps, milliamps and amperage.

First off let’s explain some terms. An amp is a measure of how much electrical charge is passing through a point in a given time. The higher the number of amps the faster your device can charge. The abbreviation for amp is A. 

The important thing to realise is that different chargers can charge at very different rates, despite having the same connector. Bigger and more powerful devices will require chargers that operate at a higher amount of amps.

For example, a small iPod Nano might require 0.5A to charge, a medium-size iPhone will require 1.1A, and a large iPad will require 2.1A. If you try to charge an iPad using an iPhone charger, you will find that it charges much more slowly or doesn’t charge at all!

The other way around isn’t as much of a problem. If you try to charge an iPhone (1.1A) using an iPad charger (2.1A), then the iPhone will just charge at 1.1A, although it might get a little hotter than normal. Even if you charge an iPod Nano (0.5A) with an iPad charger (2.1A), nothing bad will happen.

If you buy a new charger, it’s important to ensure that you get one that provides at least as much amperage as your device needs.

Bad USB charger Bad USB charger Note: Some devices like the iPhone will only draw up to 1.1A of current no matter the charger.

If you use a high amp on your device you’re not going to blow up your phone or anything crazy like that. And the myth that charging your device at a faster rate will reduce the life of your device’s battery is false. For some older devices, the higher specced charger just won’t work at all, while newer devices will just charge faster.

Once you’ve got the right charger for your gadget, the next consideration is the power source. 

While most outputs provide enough power, some – like the USB port on a computer – won’t provide enough, even if you’re using the perfect charger.

If you’re using a wall socket, there’s more than enough power on tap to charge any mobile device – up to 13A. It’s a similar situation in a car’s cigarette lighter socket, which typically provides up to 12A.

USB ports that you’d find on a computer are a little more complicated. Standard USB ports will only provide 500 mA, but there are also special high power USB ports that provide up to 1500 mA. However, it’s difficult to know which is which at a glance.

Generally, the most important thing to remember is to use wall outlets and cigarette sockets when you can, and USB as a last resort.

font:

Mobilefun

Wired

Protective-case friendly: some charging cables require users having to remove the device from its protective-cases in order for the Lightening connector to fully connect with the device, which is inconvenient and time consuming.


Project Fulfilment

Wooke Store has been in the market for over a year and throughout this time I have gained valuable experience in how to deal with all obstacles we may possibly face.

Products will be assembled and packaged at the supplier and I will be stocking and dispatching them to the backers and buyers. The large volume of orders will then be posted by me, working with British Royal Mail, whose service I have been using so far and haven't had any problems with. UK deliveries are quick and they also offer great coverage worldwide. The template for the address labels, printed with the Wooke Store logo, is already set up; and additional bubble envelopes will be stocked as soon as the order is placed with the manufacturer.

A healthy relationship has been developed and nurtured with my suppliers, and where as I can't be there physically to solve problems, Skype calls are made and emails sent. In addition pictures and all relevant information needed is exchanged in order to make sure I can see what the situation is and deal with it, taking the best solution possible.

I have already had one item produced by the cable supplier, so I know how well they work and I trust their quality. In addition they are an Apple certified MFi Manufacturer, which means a high standard is required to produce the items.

Cable Supplier Profile:

Apple authorised, developing accessories for iPhone, iPad and iPod, using the latest technologies and innovative crafts. Providing design and high quality products, successfully completed many Apple accessory projects working from the research and design stage, to mock-up, schematics and final to mass production. Product range covers from Backup power station, FM Transmitter, Car Charger, Travel Charger, AV transformer, RF remote control, cases, armbands etc.

I have worked with the cable holders supplier for a shorter period of time then the cable supplier. However they have reached all expectation in quality and communication. Samples are always sent before mass production and a clear channel of communication has been key to reaching high standards of quality. Hard work and customer satisfaction is part of their daily routine.

Verifying samples before shipment. Verifying samples before shipment. Packaging

I initially developed a box-style type of packaging that protects the cable, but which proved not to be cost effective for posting. I am therefore researching ways of reducing this cost with new packaging that still best showcases the product, whilst still focusing on the cable protection and the ability to ship more affordably.


Schedule

November:

- funding

December

- stocking cables

- dispatching end of December

January

- stretch goals patterns delivery

Stretch Goals

If I reach over the total value requested, more colour patterns will be added to the project. I have quite a few great colour patterns ready to go into production and I would love to show them here, however in order for my patterns not to be copied I will only release them when they are ready to became available on the market. 

Thank you for your support, make your pledge and tell everyone! We really need you to share this project within your network and help us bring these cables to life!


Risks and challenges

Delay on delivery for Christmas time!
