story:
Short Summary

We are a small team of two based in Pretoria, South Africa, with big dreams. Ishe is the one who came up with the revolutionary idea of Bounz and Gerhard is responsible for making things happen.

Ishe realised that most people are very creative and should not be limited to only being able to share posts with people that happen to follow them. This denies both them and their posts the attention that they deserve, but all of this can be changed by allowing posts to "bounz". What this means is that when you see something you like, you can pull it down so that it "bounzes" to everyone you follow and this process can continue until everyone in the world is reached!

We wanted to create a platform that is truly open and specifically for expressing creativity. In the present climate of privacy violation, our solution is very simple - no privacy. Bounz is specifically for posting content you want to share with complete strangers and nothing else. There is no confusion and no risk!

Having taught himself the art of computer programming at the age of 10, Gerhard now has about a decade's worth of valuable experience in software development and all the know how to get the app done. In fact, he has managed to single handedly develop the app to where it is now including all manners of programming and even graphic design!

Unfortunately Gerhard is only one man, specially one who is also trying to get through a university engineering degree and he has realised that there is just no way he will ever get this app finished on his own.

We have tried to get other student programmers to help but just could not get anyone suitable. We have also tried exhaustively to get traditional funding but we found that unfortunately South African investors are a bit too conservative to invest in groundbreaking social apps.

Finally we realised that there is a better way to get the app done, we can ask the wonderful people ❤️ who will be using it for some help!

What Makes Bounz Different

If you have come this far (and hopefully watched the video) you might be wondering what makes Bounz different from say Instagram or even Twitter. At first sight a "bounz" might not look very different from a "like" or a "share".  The reason for this is quite simple, a "bounz" is both a "like" and a "share" at the same time.

The idea behind Bounz is that all of its users will form a community of people who want to view and help spread creative visual content (AKA posts). What this means is that if you like a post, you express your liking by making it "bounz" which then shares it to all your followers and makes it reach more people because it is likeable.

The real difference here is that Bounz is actually quite impersonal and centred solely around sharing awesome posts. Bounz creates an almost game-like experience where the goal is to share as much worthy content as possible through a fun and interactive bouncing motion.

Still not getting it? The significance of Bounz being so focused on sharing creative visual content with as many people as possible is that your creativity will not get buried in vast amounts of traditional social interactions (what exisitng platforms focus on) and be left unnoticed. Instead, they will be set free!

Won't They Just Copy Us?

It might seem like an obvious risk that a place like Instagram can quite simply copy our unique bouncing motion. Firstly we would like to point out that this would be a very lame and somewhat desperate thing of anyone to  do... Secondly though, Bounz is about more than just the motion, Bounz is about being an entire platform focused on sharing and promoting creative content. The only way to copy Bounz would be to copy it in its entirety, It cannot exist as simply part of a larger platform.

What We Need & What You Get

Because we have continued to develop the app whilst in search of funding we have actually gotten it quite far but there is still a healthy amount of work left.

We have estimated to the best of our ability that there is about 250 hours of development work left on the app of which most is back-end related and necessary to ensure the smooth running of our service irrespective of the (hopefully massive) workload.

We also have one major outstanding feature that we need to develop. This is the ability to filter posts based on topics. We have realised that without such filtering, users would soon become overwhelmed by posts that they do not care to see. Our simple solution is to give users the ability to specify what topics they want to allow into their field and have others specify topics while posting. Lastly, you will also be able to search for posts (even ones you have not received yet) based on topics.

A significant part of the work that stills needs to be done is the completion of a comprehensive and robust system for the reporting and removal of inappropriate content. This is of course very important on a platform where everything is open and because it can never be entirely automated we will need to hire people to oversee it. Thus far we can reliable block all kinds of nudity but work is needed on things like graphic and verbal violence detection.

A fairly complicated feature that is already complete but still worth mentioning as a result of its awesomeness is our entirely real-time architecture. You never have to refresh anything, every piece of data that you can look at updates immediately as it is changed. We chose to implement our app this way because we would personally not be happy with anything less!

Beyond the technical requirements, as neither of us have legal degrees, we will need to pay for a significant amount of legal advice to set up numerous policies and make sure that everything we do is in the clear so that we do not have to shut down prematurely.

Our "mention" and "badge" type perks are all about helping you, our very special supporters, stand out on a platform that is bound to become huge. Being mentioned on either our website or inside the app itself will mean that you are in eternal halls of fame. Badges though will proclaim your profound support of the platform to anyone who views your profile.

If you opt to buy one of the perks for beta access then you will of course be able to experience this amazing app before anyone else on the planet! Oh and the reason why the iOS access is so expensive is because Apple limits the amount of places we can give out...

The other perks should be pretty self explanatory.

Once past the beta phase of course everyone will have access to the revolutionary app known as Bounz all thanks to your generous contribution!

If you are a bit selfish though and don't want to pay for something that others will be getting for free, think of it this way, the more users there are, the more people can appreciate your breathtaking posts...

As you might have noticed, we do not have traditional physical merchandise like T-shirts etc. (aka "swag") on offer as part of our perks lineup. The reason for this is quite simple and goes by the name of "logistics". We are only two people (for now) and trying to get such items shipped globally is a huge amount of work and introduces financial risks aplenty. Quite simply we cannot afford to distract ourselves from our main goal for such novelties at the moment. If we receive enough feedback requesting such items, we will reconsider. 

According to our calculations and based on current developer rates, the amount of money we hope to raise should be enough to cover all planned development, other costs and serve as a bit of a buffer for unexpected expenses. Should we receive less money, we will use it to develop as much as we can but there will be a real risk of someone bringing a clone to market before us. If we raise more money, we will be able to work faster than planned and even introduce some extra features very soon.

Below is our timeline for the project including what has been done and what is being planned:

The Impact

The ultimate benefit of this app will be to you, the end user!

The reason we believe this is because through our free app you will finally be able to have your creative side embraced by a far greater audience than your immediate social circles.

Through our fun "bounz" action you will also be able to help the creative content of others to reach the audience that it deserves.

We are completely open to the idea of offering paid subscriptions instead of/alongside ads if we get enough feedback showing interest in this. Unlike many of the existing players, we really don't have any desire to exploit your personal data for personal profit, we just need some form of income to keep our app running and initially we will be sticking to the industry standard.

Finally, we are not trying to replace existing social platforms by providing similar features and promoting the sharing of personal information. Instead we are focusing on a specific social experience that we feel people have a need for but cannot currently service with existing social apps that are not tailored to this goal.

We hope to be a safe place for people to express their creativity and appreciate the creativity of others by letting people know that this is all that our app is about and that it is meant for public content only. If there is no confusion, there can be no risk!

Oh, If you are into that type of thing... we are of course an "African" startup being based in South Africa and all that so this this will be very much a first of its kind app for something originating in Africa. Wouldn't you want to be part of something as groundbreaking as that?

Risks & Challenges

Obviously there is a limit to how realistic our estimation of a 250 hour work deficit can be. Unexpected difficulties in the development process can completely derail our efforts and we will need some reserve development funds to get back on track in such a situation.

As a user, you have to understand that a social media app like this places an enormous stress on the computer infrastructure behind it and users (rightfully) expect the system to remain highly responsive despite a user-base of millions. The cost of running such a system is tremendous and as our only income will be from ads we need to make sure that the system is efficient enough before going live as to not bankrupt the company immediatly and deny you the opportunity to use this awesome app.

One of our biggest challenges is also our attention to detail. We simply cannot tolerate any bugs or inconsistencies in our app and this has cost us quite a bit of time already but we believe it to ultimately be to the benefit of everyone.

We are not experts in the law but know that social media apps are very sensitive in that regard and as such all we know is that our legal expenses can become significant. We will try our best to ensure that we do nothing wrong and keep these expenses as low as possible as they won't really go towards making the app feel nicer for anyone.

Launching in Europe will also be a challenge because there are among others, many regulations about where data is stored. Getting the app translated will also take time. As such, we will unfortunately initially only be launching an English version of the app in the United States and other countries where legislation is not too prohibitive. Should our financial position allow for it, getting the apps into the hands of as many other people as possible will be a top priority.

Once the development challenges have been overcome, our biggest challenge will be to procure enough active usage to have advertising revenue surpass our server costs. If we cannot get this done quickly enough, we will run out of money and fail. The only solution we have for this is to ensure that the app is so good that many people will want to use it and to ask our loyal users to spread the word!

Other Ways You Can Help

We need as many people to help as possible if we are to have any change of reaching our goal. We believe that most people will be excited by our pitch and if you share this campaign with everyone you know (Indiegogo has nice tools for this), odds are some of them will be able to contribute!

Spreading the word about our free app will also be very important once it has launched because we need to grow fast in order to offset our costs. Just being an active user will also do wonders for this!

If you can be a bit lenient with your app reviews for the first few versions or so while we iron out the type of nasty bugs that only show up once in production that will also go a long way towards helping us as well.

We tried to think of as many perks that do not involve having to ship physical items as we can but we know that we have not thought of everything. If you have got a great idea for something else that we can offer, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Finally, the best way to for us to avoid unnecessary legal costs would be for no-one to sue us senseless for no good reason...

As such, we will unfortunately initially only be launching an English version of the app in the United States and other countries where legislation is not too prohibitive. Should our financial position allow for it, getting the apps into the hands of as many other people as possible will be a top priority.
Once the development challenges have been overcome, our biggest challenge will be to procure enough active usage to have advertising revenue surpass our server costs. If we cannot get this done quickly enough, we will run out of money and fail. The only solution we have for this is to ensure that the app is so good that many people will want to use it and to ask our loyal users to spread the word!

Other Ways You Can Help
We need as many people to help as possible if we are to have any change of reaching our goal. We believe that most people will be excited by our pitch and if you share this campaign with everyone you know (Indiegogo has nice tools for this), odds are some of them will be able to contribute!
Spreading the word about our free app will also be very important once it has launched because we need to grow fast in order to offset our costs. Just being an active user will also do wonders for this!
If you can be a bit lenient with your app reviews for the first few versions or so while we iron out the type of nasty bugs that only show up once in production that will also go a long way towards helping us as well.
We tried to think of as many perks that do not involve having to ship physical items as we can but we know that we have not thought of everything. If you have got a great idea for something else that we can offer, please do not hesitate to let us know.
Finally, the best way to for us to avoid unnecessary legal costs would be for no-one to sue us senseless for no good reason...

story:
About You

How much do you pay for cable or satellite television?
How many channels do you watch?
Is it worth it?

Our Story

We're ivi (pronounced "ivy") and we are the guys who can finally lower your cable bill. We are fighting a legal battle to give consumers what they have wanted for over a decade, complete Internet television for under $10/mo on any device, anywhere, anytime.

Our Back Story

We launched our ivi TV service1 late last year on windows, mac, and linux computers, challenging the cable companies head-on. With us you could watch over 70 channels (including ABC, NBC, CBS, Fox, The CW, PBS, and more) anywhere in the US over the Internet for less than 10 bucks a month. The largest media and distribution companies do not like competition, have sued us, forced us to stop (but shouldn't have2), and we are appealing that now.

The Impact

Our case is going to decide3 if the Internet will compete with Cable and Satellite. If we win, all popular channels will be able to be carried on the Internet immediately and you can cancel your high cable bill and watch online. If we lose, the Internet will probably never compete directly with Cable and Satellite, and you will be stuck with your current cable company, forever paying outrageous fees for a lot of programming that you probably don't even watch.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to keep fighting for what is right4. You get: an online alternative to your high cable bill, the ability to watch television on any Internet connected device, anywhere, at anytime, the joy of helping us revolutionize television, and of course perks for donations! We will continue to fight for what is right no matter what. If you can help donate--great! If you can help by spreading the word--great! If you can help by sending us positive comments--great! They all help!

Use of Funds

All donations will go towards funding our operations and legal battle to revolutionize television. Everybody at ivi is volunteering to fight for what is right, challenging the largest media and distribution companies to give you an inexpensive Internet alternative to high cable bills.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can rally your friends behind this effort "do you hate your high cable bill? help ivi, they are fighting to lower it."
  • You can email your buddies for support "you must help ivi fight against the cable companies!"
  • You can tweet, wall post, share, "fight to lower your high cable bill!"
  • You can make posters, postcards, or post-it-notes "Cable stinks! Help ivi revolutionize TV!"
  • You can make up your own slogan, print t-shirts, tell us about it!
  • Write your representative and tell them "TV is too expensive, I want ivi TV!", find your representative here.

Thank you!

Thank you for your help! We can win, with your help!

References

  1. VentureBeat - ivi delivers what we've all been waiting for — live TV on the Internet
  2. PaidContent - ivi TV Loses Major Court Decision—But Shouldn’t Have
  3. Forbes - The Case That Could Finally Put Live TV on the Internet
  4. FierceOnlineVideo - ivi TV Founder Todd Weaver: It's better to be right than rich

story:
Deka™ uses Bluetooth 3.0 technology, HD speaker, microphone, multicolor light visualizer and sound sensor. What makes the Deka a revolutionary product is that it's changing the way you look at Bluetooth headset. It's not just a device that you use only to take calls. The Deka uses a patent pending system that allows for the simple swapping of design faceplates. 

From sports to flowers, your favorite designs are in your control. It is the most versatile, smartest and customizable Bluetooth headset.

 

 

The Deka Bluetooth headset is a detachable device that comes as a stand alone base with our Deka Slides. The Deka Slide comes as a 3D Printable or Custom Photo image cap. You can use your Deka Bluetooth with your smartphone, music player, laptop or any personal communication device.

 


Your Bluetooth should be a reflection of who you are. From being a sports fan to a creative designer look, you can change the way you want to express yourself by simply changing out the Deka Slide Caps.

 

Here are some of our 3D designs that we created. There are so many things that you can do with Deka 3D Slides. The options to have a stylish and fashionable Bluetooth are limitless. 

 

Custom Headsets Bring Interchangeable Looks And Custom 3D Printed Styles To Bluetooth

Sometimes an entrepreneur comes along that just “gets it”. They seem to have a natural knack for creating businesses and making a success out of them. 

Deka Bluetooth headsets aren't only unique but we're also on a mission and that's to encourage people to be hands free while driving. So, we started our Hands Free Me® initiative, where people can take the pledge to keep their hands on the steering while driving.

When you're on the road, you're going to fall in love with driving again. That's because you can now be fashionable with your own personalized Deka Bluetooth headset. Not only does Deka give you reliable Bluetooth connection, comfort and great sound quality but also fits your lifestyle.

That was easy right? Now your turn. Just point your camera and take a picture. The sky's the limit. Pictures can be of your dog, cat, favorite sport, company logo, or anything that you can imagine.

 

 Take a picture of whatever you want. Next, just send us that picture. We'll create your favorite artwork, hobby, animal and custom image. If you can think it, we can make it.


The Deka isn't just a Bluetooth, it's an accessory that you can make a fashion statement. Imagine if you can wear a Bluetooth as part of your outfit. Wouldn't that be cool? Go ahead and be different. Be a fashion icon.

To own a Deka, you're a trendsetter. The Deka is designed for everyone that wants a device that reflects their personality or personal style. You can be stylish and successful - with the Deka, the world will know it. 

The Deka Bluetooth headset is more than just a personal communication device. It's one of the smartest Bluetooth headset in the market. When we decided to build the Deka, we wanted to make sure that when we combined beauty, there had to be a smart technology component. So, we came up with a mobile app for the Deka that lets you do more than just change out designs. 

With the Deka Smart Mobile App, you can take advantage of the LED lighting system that we've integrated into our Bluetooth. Here are just some of the features that you can do with your Deka Smart Mobile App:

 

Deka uses the latest in noise cancellation technology. Never miss a word or beat in a crowded place. Deka is the perfect on the go companion for a phone call, listening to music or an audio book.

 

Never fear water again. Moisture from sweat and accidental drops of water are the main causes for damage to Bluetooth headsets. With the Deka Bluetooth headset, it's important that we protect your technology investments. That's why the Deka is coated with Liquipel's water safe technology.

 

 

All of these features are currently in development and sent out to a small group of private alpha testers. For example, we're currently working on a beat detection feature that will rhythmically respond to moods. We plan to provide our Deka mobile app as soon as we've ironed out all the kinks to the rest out our backers. At Deka, we're thinking outside the box to build our Bluetooth headsets as not only a smart wearable technology but a lifestyle device.

Just mix and match. Show off your favorite designs. From country flags to artistic designs, the possibilities are limitless. You can send us designs from your child's first drawings, musicians or company logos...The Deka is just fun and fashionable.

 

Using the Deka Slide (3D or Canvas Caps), putting one on is simple. Just attach any Deka Slide onto a Deka Bluetooth base unit and go. No hassles or headaches.

 

The Deka has been a dream concept for a few years. It wasn't until recently that our breakthrough moment came when we discovered that a round base was the path to interchangeability. In this section, we'll show you our engineering and design story at work. Let's start with the technical specifications below:

 

 

 

To become the world's smartest Bluetooth, the Deka is raising the bar for the future of wearable technologies. The Deka Bluetooth is one of the most advanced wearable device on the market with next generation technology features such as voice command, touch sensitive power on/off, caller ID, video game compatibility, and RGB LED lighting beat detection.

 

 

The Deka Bluetooth headset is about the same size as a quarter. As a wireless Bluetooth headset, Deka will be one of the smallest and lightest on the market. However, what it packs inside is what matters: noise cancelation, HD quality sound, water safe, Bluetooth 3.0, LED lighting and more. Deka is small enough to be comfortable in your ear but big enough to make a statement.

 

 

These are some of our early design concepts. We started out with small tweaks to an industry standard, where each Deka was a dedicated design to a Bluetooth unit. Then, one day we had our eureka moment, when we asked, what if people wanted the ability to change designs. Is that possible? That one question lead us to the image designs below.

 

This is our breakthrough design that led to Deka becoming the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset, where you can interchange between various designs. 


Once we knew that we were onto something, we then did our research and found that this was our groundbreaking moment. We filed out patents and immediately started working on our first round Deka Base prototypes. This rounded shaped is the key to having the ability to swap out various Deka Slides.

 

 

We designed and grew our first interchangeable Deka Skull Slide. This design then led us to create other elaborate Deka 3D slides. From flowers, butterflies to popular sports, we knew the possibilities were going to be endless. 

It was from those brainstorm sessions that we thought this idea would be a great crowdfunding concept. Now, let's imagine if the entire world was able to reimagine what Bluetooth can look like. What if the world thought outside the box? What if fashionable Bluetooth was worldwide? What if the world can discover Bluetooth and how cool it can be. That's our dream.


 

With this crowdfunding campaign, we want the world to know that Bluetooth does not have to be boring anymore. Our vision is to bring the idea to everyone that Bluetooth headset can be fun and fashionable.

So if you have ideas for a Deka Slide design, we can make it. If you want us to help you with this, the process is simple. Just contact us and we will create your very own custom Bluetooth headset.

How the process works? Easy. Creating a design is as simple as coming up with an idea, submitting that to us and we'll help you make your custom Bluetooth come to life. If you have questions, just contact us for details.


As a Bluetooth headset, Deka is just as technologically advanced as the premium brands on the market but affordable. The suggested retail price will be roughly about $69.99. We'll know more about our final price once we're able to put in our first production run order. 

However, what makes Deka unique is our limitless design possibilities. Deka is about creating a community and marketplace for artists and designers. If you can think it, it can be printed. With Deka, you'll never be stuck with the same old boring Bluetooth headset again. 

  

Need an easy way to understand our perk levels? Here's a diagram to give you a reference point. 

NOTE: THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION WILL BE IN GOLD. If you still have questions, please refer to our FAQs below or contact us at support@dekasounds.com



Fact #1: In 1994 a group of engineers at Ericsson, a Swedish company, invented a wireless communication technology, later called Bluetooth. In 1998, the original group of Promoter companies—Ericsson, Intel, Nokia, Toshiba and IBM -- came together to form the Bluetooth Special Interest Group (SIG). Since no single company owns the technology, the SIG member companies work together to preserve, educate, and further Bluetooth technology as a means to bring devices into the connected world.

Fact #2: Distraction has been identified as a contributing factor in 22% of car crashes and near crashes and 71% of truck crashes (and 46% of near crashes) in naturalistic driving studies.

Fact #3: Using a mobile phone while driving is highly distracting and increases your risk of a crash four-fold.

Fact #4: One of the fastest growing Bluetooth devices is “Bluetooth hands free ” and the second largest global application, just behind the hands free is the Bluetooth stereo audio. 

Fact #5: Bluetooth wireless technology is built into billions of products, from cars and mobile phones to medical devices and computers and even forks and toothbrushes. Bluetooth technology allows you to share voice, data, music, photos, videos and other information wirelessly between paired devices.

Fact #6: The name "Bluetooth" comes from the 10th century Danish King Harald Blåtand or Harold Bluetooth in English.

Fact #7: Mobile phones, FM radio and television all use radio waves to send information wirelessly. And while Bluetooth technology also uses radio waves, it transmits them over a shorter distance.

 

This is Bluetooth reimagined. Whatever your hobbies and interests are, the Deka can be your self-expression personal communication device. The Deka is truly a unique product that gives us the option that we've always lacked with Bluetooth devices.

 


We currently have a working prototype and we're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
  • Optimizing the sound sensor
  • Integration of streaming music service to work with our sound sensor
  • Finalizing the product technical specifications

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Packaging Design for Retail
  • Filing product certifications
  • Designing the supply chain process
  • Material Tooling
  • Materials procurement
  • First Production Run

 


The past several years have been very tough. However, we never gave in to the challenges of innovation. We've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing, so that we can make Deka available to you and the millions of people who have never before experience what the possibilities of Bluetooth headsets can be. Let's change the way we all feel about our Bluetooth. They don't have to be boring. Bluetooth can be fun, fashionable and most importantly make our roads safer. It is possible to combine wearable technology with style.

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first to experience the new generation of stylish technology.
  • You love being creative and can't wait to be one of the first to customize your very own Bluetooth headset.

Imagine the possibilities of what your Bluetooth can look like now. That's our goal and vision for the Deka, being the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset. We feel this is innovation moving forward. Please join us in our journey to help make this dream a reality.


Deka is fun and also has a purpose. When we came up with the idea behind Deka, we believe that Bluetooth should be stylish and fun. However, there is another main reason on why Bluetooth is important. — helping people be hands free while driving. 


But the problem was that we found no one really wanted to use their Bluetooth. The common perception by most people is that Bluetooth headsets are just for business professionals or gadget nerds. As a result, Bluetooth headsets have no personal attachment for many people.

With the Deka, our mission is to change that perception through design and style. With our Deka, Bluetooth headsets can now be fun and most importantly encourage the usage of hands free personal electronic communication. 

 

When it comes to creating a product that's never been created. Deka is creating the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset and since we're manufacturing electronics at scale, there are normally significant challenges that any company big or small faces. That being said, mass manufacturing has a lot of logistical process flow involved in order to scale at mass volumes. Our goal is to make sure the entire production process is secure and reliable, and most importantly the delivery high quality products.

  1. We're in the home stretch. We've completed most of our technical specification requirements for our moulds. This product is has two parts: Deka the base unit and the slide unit. The Deka unit is a fully functional Bluetooth headset with or without the Deka Slide. This is what we're taking to the manufacturer to mass produce.
  2. Injection moulds usually require long lead times up to 45 days. However, bear in mind that doesn't include any unforeseen issues and iterations that need to be done to improve the mould.  We want to make sure that our products are of the highest standards and quality. As a result of our attention to detail, this process can add 90 days to planned dates.  We will try OUR BEST to get all of these challenges out of the way as soon as possible.
  3. Our team has the industry's brightest talents from the electronic industry and over 15 years of product development experience in tech products. Deka is designed with mass production in mind.  We didn't think of this idea over night. We've spent countless hours have been put into the product design, functionality, PCB layouts, etc.  This ensures that we won't have "unforeseen" issues during manufacturing and assembly.
  4. We work with the industry's best in Electronics Manufacturing Service (aka EMS) to ensure we can manufacture the Deka Bluetooth headsets on a mass scale. These EMS factories manufacture millions of electronic Bluetooth units monthly. With Deka's layout, assembly and planning completed, any risk has also been decreased significantly.
  5. Lead times vary for different components.  Some take as long as three months just to deliver. We will be splitting our component orders based on manufacturing times. Therefore, as soon as we have a good idea of estimated orders, we will immediately place orders for components that take longer to manufacture first. This will decrease our time to receive the components from suppliers.
  6. When it comes to shipping internationally, there are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the Deka. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistic. This will ensure that we are able to get your Deka Bluetooth headset into your hands in the least amount of time!


The road ahead is bright for us...

Thank you for taking the time to read this far. We're doing everything we can to provide you with the best product. Creating the Deka is a labor of love and it's our passion to make a difference in people view Bluetooth headsets. Our goal is to deliver the future of the world's FIRST and MOST CUSTOMIZABLE Bluetooth headset. At Deka, we want to help you move forward into the future by showing you a glimpse of what it looks like now. We're all very excited to see our small idea become a big reality. Let's make this happen together.

   Have questions? Get them answered here.

 

 1) Are there any more styles that I can choose from other than the ones listed?

A: Yes you can. New styles will be launch on our website. That's coming soon.

2) Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?

A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. 

3) Help! What if I forget to pay for shipping?

A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!

4) What do you mean by water safe with Liquipel?

A: The Deka Bluetooth headset is treated with nano technology provided by Liquipel, where water is repelled away from all the hardware components.

5) When can I download the Deka Mobile App?

A: All pledge supports will have the latest updates to our progress.

6) How do I update my address?

A: Please contact us at support@dekasounds.com.

7) How many different color styles does the Deka Bluetooth come in?

A: Currently we offer black, white, and gray.

8) I ordered Dekas to the same shipping address, how much does shipping cost?

A: You only need to pay shipping once for the same shipping address.

9) I'd like to buy 2 or more Deka Bluetooth headsets, can I pay extra using the same perk?

A: No, unless you choose the multiple headset perk options, you will have to place them in a separate order.

10) Will Deka have shipping issues with countries like Germany, Italy, Japan, or any other countries outside of the USA?

A: No, we will be working with world class logistic companies, along with having all the necessary shipping and compliance paperwork, CE, FCC, etc.... 

11) Will there be any VAT for EU countries

A: Clients in the EU will be responsible for any VAT that arises.

12) How do I upgrade my perk?

A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the difference you need to pay to upgrade. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and email us at support@dekasounds.com to inform us of the change.

13) Can I submit a design that I did not create?

A: If the customer uploads a design or influences the product in any other way (text personalization), the customer assures Deka that text and design are free from any third-party rights. Please see dekasounds.com terms of service regarding copyright material.

14) What is the recommended size to print a Deka Slide?

A: For maximum comfort, our ideal size is 25mm in diameter.

15) If I have further questions where can I contact Deka support. 

A: You can reach us at support@dekasounds.com.

16) What happens if I don't pledge for a Deka unit now, when will this be available in stores?

A: We don't have a definitive timeline when Dekas will be available retail stores. We do recommend getting them through this campaign so that you avoid having to wait at all.

17) How does the custom design process work? 

A: We custom print your photos or 3D designs onto our Deka Slides. Photo printing are printed on our Deka Slide Caps, while 3D printing are designed and made onto our Deka 3D Slides. 

18) What files do I send to get my Deka Bluetooth made?

A: For Deka Slide Caps, simply send us your high resolution photo (300dpi) and we will do our best to produce the closest image production as possible.

For Deka 3D Slides, just send us your CAD designs and we'll do the best to produce the closest 3D production image as possible.

We started out with small tweaks to an industry standard, where each Deka was a dedicated design to a Bluetooth unit. Then, one day we had our eureka moment, when we asked, what if people wanted the ability to change designs. Is that possible? That one question lead us to the image designs below. This is our breakthrough design that led to Deka becoming the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset, where you can interchange between various designs. Once we knew that we were onto something, we then did our research and found that this was our groundbreaking moment. We filed out patents and immediately started working on our first round Deka Base prototypes. This rounded shaped is the key to having the ability to swap out various Deka Slides.  We designed and grew our first interchangeable Deka Skull Slide. This design then led us to create other elaborate Deka 3D slides. From flowers, butterflies to popular sports, we knew the possibilities were going to be endless. It was from those brainstorm sessions that we thought this idea would be a great crowdfunding concept. Now, let's imagine if the entire world was able to reimagine what Bluetooth can look like. What if the world thought outside the box? What if fashionable Bluetooth was worldwide? What if the world can discover Bluetooth and how cool it can be. That's our dream. With this crowdfunding campaign, we want the world to know that Bluetooth does not have to be boring anymore. Our vision is to bring the idea to everyone that Bluetooth headset can be fun and fashionable.So if you have ideas for a Deka Slide design, we can make it. If you want us to help you with this, the process is simple. Just contact us and we will create your very own custom Bluetooth headset.How the process works? Easy. Creating a design is as simple as coming up with an idea, submitting that to us and we'll help you make your custom Bluetooth come to life. If you have questions, just contact us for details.As a Bluetooth headset, Deka is just as technologically advanced as the premium brands on the market but affordable. The suggested retail price will be roughly about $69.99. We'll know more about our final price once we're able to put in our first production run order. However, what makes Deka unique is our limitless design possibilities. Deka is about creating a community and marketplace for artists and designers. If you can think it, it can be printed. With Deka, you'll never be stuck with the same old boring Bluetooth headset again.   Need an easy way to understand our perk levels? Here's a diagram to give you a reference point. NOTE: THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION WILL BE IN GOLD. If you still have questions, please refer to our FAQs below or contact us at support@dekasounds.comFact #1: In 1994 a group of engineers at Ericsson, a Swedish company, invented a wireless communication technology, later called Bluetooth. In 1998, the original group of Promoter companies—Ericsson, Intel, Nokia, Toshiba and IBM -- came together to form the Bluetooth Special Interest Group (SIG). Since no single company owns the technology, the SIG member companies work together to preserve, educate, and further Bluetooth technology as a means to bring devices into the connected world.Fact #2: Distraction has been identified as a contributing factor in 22% of car crashes and near crashes and 71% of truck crashes (and 46% of near crashes) in naturalistic driving studies.Fact #3: Using a mobile phone while driving is highly distracting and increases your risk of a crash four-fold.Fact #4: One of the fastest growing Bluetooth devices is “Bluetooth hands free ” and the second largest global application, just behind the hands free is the Bluetooth stereo audio. Fact #5: Bluetooth wireless technology is built into billions of products, from cars and mobile phones to medical devices and computers and even forks and toothbrushes. Bluetooth technology allows you to share voice, data, music, photos, videos and other information wirelessly between paired devices.Fact #6: The name "Bluetooth" comes from the 10th century Danish King Harald Blåtand or Harold Bluetooth in English.Fact #7: Mobile phones, FM radio and television all use radio waves to send information wirelessly. And while Bluetooth technology also uses radio waves, it transmits them over a shorter distance. This is Bluetooth reimagined. Whatever your hobbies and interests are, the Deka can be your self-expression personal communication device. The Deka is truly a unique product that gives us the option that we've always lacked with Bluetooth devices. We currently have a working prototype and we're now focused on:
Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
Optimizing the sound sensor
Integration of streaming music service to work with our sound sensor
Finalizing the product technical specifications
We will soon begin the process of:
Packaging Design for Retail
Filing product certifications
Designing the supply chain process
Material Tooling
Materials procurement
First Production Run
 The past several years have been very tough. However, we never gave in to the challenges of innovation. We've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing, so that we can make Deka available to you and the millions of people who have never before experience what the possibilities of Bluetooth headsets can be. Let's change the way we all feel about our Bluetooth. They don't have to be boring. Bluetooth can be fun, fashionable and most importantly make our roads safer. It is possible to combine wearable technology with style.So why should you support us?
Be the first to experience the new generation of stylish technology.
You love being creative and can't wait to be one of the first to customize your very own Bluetooth headset.
Imagine the possibilities of what your Bluetooth can look like now. That's our goal and vision for the Deka, being the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset. We feel this is innovation moving forward. Please join us in our journey to help make this dream a reality.Deka is fun and also has a purpose. When we came up with the idea behind Deka, we believe that Bluetooth should be stylish and fun. However, there is another main reason on why Bluetooth is important. — helping people be hands free while driving. But the problem was that we found no one really wanted to use their Bluetooth. The common perception by most people is that Bluetooth headsets are just for business professionals or gadget nerds. As a result, Bluetooth headsets have no personal attachment for many people.With the Deka, our mission is to change that perception through design and style. With our Deka, Bluetooth headsets can now be fun and most importantly encourage the usage of hands free personal electronic communication.  When it comes to creating a product that's never been created. Deka is creating the world's first customizable Bluetooth headset and since we're manufacturing electronics at scale, there are normally significant challenges that any company big or small faces. That being said, mass manufacturing has a lot of logistical process flow involved in order to scale at mass volumes. Our goal is to make sure the entire production process is secure and reliable, and most importantly the delivery high quality products.

We're in the home stretch. We've completed most of our technical specification requirements for our moulds. This product is has two parts: Deka the base unit and the slide unit. The Deka unit is a fully functional Bluetooth headset with or without the Deka Slide. This is what we're taking to the manufacturer to mass produce.


Injection moulds usually require long lead times up to 45 days. However, bear in mind that doesn't include any unforeseen issues and iterations that need to be done to improve the mould.  We want to make sure that our products are of the highest standards and quality. As a result of our attention to detail, this process can add 90 days to planned dates.  We will try OUR BEST to get all of these challenges out of the way as soon as possible.


Our team has the industry's brightest talents from the electronic industry and over 15 years of product development experience in tech products. Deka is designed with mass production in mind.  We didn't think of this idea over night. We've spent countless hours have been put into the product design, functionality, PCB layouts, etc.  This ensures that we won't have "unforeseen" issues during manufacturing and assembly.


We work with the industry's best in Electronics Manufacturing Service (aka EMS) to ensure we can manufacture the Deka Bluetooth headsets on a mass scale. These EMS factories manufacture millions of electronic Bluetooth units monthly. With Deka's layout, assembly and planning completed, any risk has also been decreased significantly.

Lead times vary for different components.  Some take as long as three months just to deliver. We will be splitting our component orders based on manufacturing times. Therefore, as soon as we have a good idea of estimated orders, we will immediately place orders for components that take longer to manufacture first. This will decrease our time to receive the components from suppliers.

When it comes to shipping internationally, there are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the Deka. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistic. This will ensure that we are able to get your Deka Bluetooth headset into your hands in the least amount of time!

The road ahead is bright for us...Thank you for taking the time to read this far. We're doing everything we can to provide you with the best product. Creating the Deka is a labor of love and it's our passion to make a difference in people view Bluetooth headsets. Our goal is to deliver the future of the world's FIRST and MOST CUSTOMIZABLE Bluetooth headset. At Deka, we want to help you move forward into the future by showing you a glimpse of what it looks like now. We're all very excited to see our small idea become a big reality. Let's make this happen together.   Have questions? Get them answered here.  1) Are there any more styles that I can choose from other than the ones listed?A: Yes you can. New styles will be launch on our website. That's coming soon.2) Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. 3) Help! What if I forget to pay for shipping?A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!4) What do you mean by water safe with Liquipel?A: The Deka Bluetooth headset is treated with nano technology provided by Liquipel, where water is repelled away from all the hardware components.5) When can I download the Deka Mobile App?A: All pledge supports will have the latest updates to our progress.6) How do I update my address?A: Please contact us at support@dekasounds.com.7) How many different color styles does the Deka Bluetooth come in?A: Currently we offer black, white, and gray.8) I ordered Dekas to the same shipping address, how much does shipping cost?A: You only need to pay shipping once for the same shipping address.9) I'd like to buy 2 or more Deka Bluetooth headsets, can I pay extra using the same perk?A: No, unless you choose the multiple headset perk options, you will have to place them in a separate order.10) Will Deka have shipping issues with countries like Germany, Italy, Japan, or any other countries outside of the USA?A: No, we will be working with world class logistic companies, along with having all the necessary shipping and compliance paperwork, CE, FCC, etc.... 11) Will there be any VAT for EU countriesA: Clients in the EU will be responsible for any VAT that arises.12) How do I upgrade my perk?A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the difference you need to pay to upgrade. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and email us at support@dekasounds.com to inform us of the change.13) Can I submit a design that I did not create?A: If the customer uploads a design or influences the product in any other way (text personalization), the customer assures Deka that text and design are free from any third-party rights. Please see dekasounds.com terms of service regarding copyright material.14) What is the recommended size to print a Deka Slide?A: For maximum comfort, our ideal size is 25mm in diameter.15) If I have further questions where can I contact Deka support. A: You can reach us at support@dekasounds.com.16) What happens if I don't pledge for a Deka unit now, when will this be available in stores?A: We don't have a definitive timeline when Dekas will be available retail stores. We do recommend getting them through this campaign so that you avoid having to wait at all.17) How does the custom design process work? A: We custom print your photos or 3D designs onto our Deka Slides. Photo printing are printed on our Deka Slide Caps, while 3D printing are designed and made onto our Deka 3D Slides. 18) What files do I send to get my Deka Bluetooth made?A: For Deka Slide Caps, simply send us your high resolution photo (300dpi) and we will do our best to produce the closest image production as possible.For Deka 3D Slides, just send us your CAD designs and we'll do the best to produce the closest 3D production image as possible.

story:
Hi,

I've always been passionate about sports and active lifestyle. While attempting to track and measure my performance I ended up with a bag of sensors: foot pod for running and X-country skiing, speed and cadence for cycling, one for tennis, one for golf, two for swimming and three for rowing. 

Why can't I have one sensor which reliably measures all my activities?
 


There are many motion sensors on the market. Most of them use accelerometer or gyro or both. 3DmotionTM Smart Sensor uses Earth magnetic field sensing technology. It draws very little power and is not susceptible to any shock nor vibrations.

The Earth magnetic field sensing technology works like a compass.
When you rotate a compass the arrow is always pointing to the North Pole. If you attach the compass to your arm or a leg or any object you could measure its orientation and motion relative to the North Pole. 3DmotionTM Smart Sensor uses 3-axis electronic compass and can measure any pivotal motion in 3D. 
It works reliably anywhere on earth. Maybe not on the North Pole.

We already have a Smart Sensor which uses Earth magnetic field sensing technology to measure  cycling speed    and cadence  

VeloComputer.com

               

VeloComputerTM  app on AndroidTM  SmartPhone and SmartWatch

    

  The new firmware will support the standard and    
profile for running speed    or pace and cadence    steps per minute SPM. You could use it with existing sport watches and apps supporting these standard profiles:

Android, Android Wear, Android Smartwatch, Apple Watch, iPhone, iPod  apps for running which uses Bluetooth Smart  running speed and cadence profile (RSCP)


AlpineSportTM



Adidas, Beurer, Garmin, Motorola, O-synce, Suunto, Timex

            

The new Bluetooth Smart profile for water sports: swimming, rowing, paddling, kayaking, surf skiing, canoeing, outrigger and stand up paddleboarding (SUP) will be released in spring of 2016 together with Android and Android Wear or Smartwatch apps. 

iPhone and Apple Watch apps will be released later in summer.

Developers

You can use Bluetooth Smart  UART profile via SDK to see how the Earth magnetic field sensing technology works in 3D. See UART examples.
Other Bluetooth Smart profiles supported: Battery, DIS, DFU for over-the-air firmware updates.

Together we create new profiles for other sports.

Our Goal

Provide you with a single 3DmotionTM Smart Sensor  for all sports. 

You will get a sensor for cycling, running and water sports which you could wirelessly update in the future with new sport profiles as they are becoming available.

Join us in this 3D motion revolution!


Risks & Challenges

  • The hardware is already on the market and certified

  • Tested in dust, mud and water immersion up to 1 m - 3 feet.
  • Our manufacturing partner is a reliable company from Asia and we worked with them in the past. 
  • The sensor firmware can be updated over-the-air from your smartphone. 
  • The mounts:
    We have designed a universal rubber mount which we tested on bicycle wheel hub and crank, rowing oar, outrigger, kayak and stand-up paddle, golf club, tennis racket, hockey stick, baseball bat and many round { D 10-50mm; ~1/2" - 2" } or flat objects from 10mm ~1/2" wide.

             


    Shoe clip is also available for running.



    We expect some feedback from you and will be making mechanical improvements for other sports.
  • New firmware. Our team has years of experience writing real-time and embedded firmware and apps. We have already created firmware for cycling speed    and cadence    and a high precision Bluetooth Smart  REVolution profile. We are working on Bluetooth and ANT+ running speed and cadence profile and will be creating new profiles for other sports. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Make some noise!
  • Share this with your friends.

    Legal 
    Multiple patents pending
    3Dmotion, AlpineSport, VeloComputer are trademarks of SoundOfMotion
    Android, Android Wear are trademarks of Google Inc.
    ANT+ is a trademark of Dynastream Innovations Inc.
    Bluetooth is a trademark of Bluetooth SIG
    iPhone, iPod, Apple Watch, iOS are trademarks of Apple Inc.
    Other trademarks maybe used on this website

story:
Progress update:


XGIMI and Harman Kardon have partnered to bring high quality audio to an amazing home entertainment experience.
When you purchase an XGIMI Z4 Aurora smart projector, you will also receive a coupon code for $200 off the regular price of a Harman Kardon SB 26.*
If you are seeking the best theater, music and gaming sound experience, we think this bundle will be your best choice!

*$200 discount applies on one regular price Harman Kardon SB 26 at HarmanKardon.com (US only - excludes PR), purchased from May 27, 2016, 12:00 a.m. ET to June 30, 2016, 11:59 p.m. ET. Cannot be combined with any other offers or promotions. Certain restrictions apply. Coupon code may not be transferred or sold. Limit: one Coupon code per household. Lost, stolen, deleted or mutilated Coupon codes will not be replaced. Offer limited to consumer customers only. Coupon codes must be redeemed by the promotion end date. Discount is applicable on regular price Harman Kardon SB 26 merchandise only and do not apply on taxes and/or expedited shipping.


Brightness comparison

There are some backers asked for the video that shows the brightness difference of Z4 Aurora old version (600 ANSI Lumens) and new version (700 ANSI Lumens), and  here is the video taken by iPhone 6S, feel free to check it out. 


Video review by Chris Barraclough from Recombu and Matt Barnette from KATV ABC 7



3/14/2016    XGIMI Z4 Aurora debut at Indiegogo HQ         
XGIMI team has debut the new XGIMI Z4 Aurora Projector at Indiegogo HQ in SF, USA, on Mar. 14th, 2016. Many indiegogo community members attended. Check out what they think about Z4 Aurora! We will update more event video later, just finish a crazy and wonderful night!

During the amazing happy hour event, Aaron Liao and Ivy Wu from XGIMI shared the amazing experience of launching a campaign on Indiegogo! Check it out!

Z4 Aurora in Media Press

The video output quality and the sound quality of the device is impressive. 

                                                                                              -------------- Jason Perlow, ZDNet

The first time I heard the Harman Kardon speakers I had to laugh because they were so unexpectedly loud. 

                                                                                      -------------- Thomas Ricker, The Verge

The Z4 Aurora continues the evolution of the home projector by building in Wi-Fi capability, a music player, gesture control, outstanding speakers and 3D viewing.

                                                                                        -------------- Michael Franco, Gizmag

The Z4 Aurora is a solid home theatre projector, capable of casting a massive HD image onto any flat surface. 

                                                                                     -------------- Chris Barraclough, Recombu

If you have been interested in a projector – be it for video games or movies, the Z4 Aurora is a quality made device. 

                                                                              --------------Matthew Furtado, Examiner.com


Referral program 

Why not share good things with your friends? A FREE tripod, which is very useful when you set up your Aurora will be sent you as a gift. Check our third campaign UPDATE for more referral program information. 


A smart projector beyond your imagination----XGIMI Z4 Aurora

The XGIMI Z4 Aurora is a Smart LED projector that can transform any surface into a 300-inch screen with unparalleled brightness and clarity. The built-in Harman Kardon stereo produces superior sound quality and the dimension converter brings all video content to life in brilliant 3D. Install apps and games onto the Z4 Aurora android system and wirelessly stream them directly onto the projector. The Z4 Aurora provides a truly connected, superior viewing experience.

The Z4 Aurora Aesthetic

Z4 Aurora aesthetic is simple and classic, which fits in perfectly with an understated, modern lifestyle.


Crystal-Clear Sound System

The Z4 Aurora's tailored crystal Harman Kardon stereo provides the ultimate acoustic experience.


A Virtual Home Theater

The Z4 Aurora can turn any surface into a 300-inch home theater. The Z4 Aurora boasts high pixel density to create a stunningly clear image projected onto any surface. Combine that with the Harman Kardon stereo and you’ve got yourself a movie night!

Z4 Aurora projects for more than 120'' screen in different light conditions. 

Note: the projection is just next to the window with very bright daylight. You will get much brighter projection screen if your project not too close to the window like what we did! 


We compared the brightness of the Z4 Aurora to that of a traditional television.


A demonstration of the Z4 Aurora’s unparalleled display


Cinema-Quality 3D Experience

The Z4 Aurora is equipped with the active shutter 3D-imaging technique used by DLP cinema projectors. With stunning 3D quality, bring any movie, game or sporting event to life in your own home.

Android Operating System

Quickly and easily install games, apps and stream video wirelessly through the Z4 Aurora Android Operating System. The Z4 Aurora also supports many video game consoles. Connect your XBOX, PS4 and other consoles and play on the big screen.

Multiple Streaming Options

No more messy cables! The Z4 Aurora can stream content wirelessly from your smart-phone, tablet and desktop. It is also equipped with HDMI, USB, and AV ports.

Innovative Gesture Control 

The Z4 Aurora can be controlled by simple hand gestures. The built-in 3D gesture recognition chip identifies the movement locus by 150dpi. Sampling frequency is up to 200 times/sec.


Keystone correction 

Most projectors have to be perfectly set up in order to produce the desired image. However, the Z4 Aurora is built with vertical +/-30 degree and horizontal +/-30 degree keystone correction that provides an optimal image from any angle, eliminating the hassle of set-up.

An Interactive Entertainment Companion

With cinema-quality image and sound and an Android Operating System, the Z4 Aurora is the ultimate entertainment center.


The Z4 Aurora in the Workplace

The Z4 Aurora also functions beyond entertainment. The projector can be switched from standard version into business version, where you can upload file management software. The Z4 Aurora software makes presenting to large groups easy on the big screen.


Extended Lifetime

The Z4 Aurora uses OSRAM LED illumination that extends its lifetime to 30,000 hours, which is six times longer than the average lifetime of traditional projectors. The LED light source is ecofriendly, using an energy-conserving bulb.


Bluetooth Remote Control

The XGIMI bluetooth remote control has a high-capacity rechargeable battery and built-in mouse function that supports more technical operations.


Product Specs


XGIMI Aurora is definitely your best choice of home theatre!

* ANSI lumens: the light output of projectors (including video projectors) is typically measured in lumens. A standardized procedure for testing projectors has been established by the American National Standards Institute, which involves averaging together several measurements taken at different positions.

Perks


CES interview－The Z4 Aurora was exhibited at CES 2016 in Las Vegas. See what visitors had to say about their experience!

Timeline

Team


Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."


FAQ

Where did the idea come from?

Our team is composed of traditional display manufacturers, and we saw that current TVs are too heavy and too expensive. We want to produce a simple, smart, affordable home theater projector. After two years of development and thousands of tests, we create the Z4 Aurora.

What language does Z4 Aurora support?

Z4 Aurora supports English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese (simplified), Chinese (traditional),  Russian, Italian, Portuguese, Thai.

How long can the projector run before it overheats? 

Aurora uses an LED Bulb that has a lifespan of 30,000 hours. Aurora's fan works efficiently and quietly, and has no danger of overheating.

How can I control the projector?

The Z4 Aurora is operated by hand gestures, or the Bluetooth remote control. If you shake the remote control twice, it can be used as a mouse for more precision control.

How large is the projection area when I place Z4 Aurora 7ft (2.13m) from the wall?

The throw ratio of Z4 Aurora is 1.2:1 (distance: width). At a distance of 7ft your screen will be 5.83ft (1.78m, 70-inch).

Can the Z4 Aurora transfer files through the USB port?

Yes, you can transfer the files through USB 2.0 or 3.0 port. The Z4 Aurora supports MP4, AVI, MKV, 3D, 4K and Blu Ray video formats. It also supports photos, Microsoft Office files and Android APK.

Can the Z4 Aurora be paired with different devices (e.g iOS, Windows and Android)?

The Z4 Aurora can be wirelessly connected to devices using:
-Wifi
-Hotspot
-XGIMI assistance

Can I install applications to the Z4 Aurora?

Yes, you can install any android app on Auroa . XGIMI developed ‘XGIMI UI’ based on android 4.4 installed in Aurora.
