Barnette from KATV ABC 7




3/14/2016    XGIMI Z4 Aurora debut at Indiegogo HQ         

XGIMI team has debut the new XGIMI Z4 Aurora Projector at Indiegogo HQ in SF, USA, on Mar. 14th, 2016. Many indiegogo community members attended. Check out what they think about Z4 Aurora! We will update more event video later, just finish a crazy and wonderful night!


During the amazing happy hour event, Aaron Liao and Ivy Wu from XGIMI shared the amazing experience of launching a campaign on Indiegogo! Check it out!
Z4 Aurora in Media Press

The video output quality and the sound quality of the device is impressive. 
                                                                                              -------------- Jason
Perlow, ZDNet
The first time I heard the Harman Kardon speakers I had to laugh because they were so unexpectedly loud. 
                                                                                      -------------- Thomas Ricker, The Verge
The Z4 Aurora continues the evolution of the home projector by building in Wi-Fi capability, a music player, gesture control, outstanding speakers and 3D viewing.
                                                                                        -------------- Michael Franco, Gizmag

The Z4 Aurora is a solid home theatre projector, capable of casting a massive HD image onto any flat surface. 
                                                                                     -------------- Chris Barraclough, Recombu
If you have been interested in a projector – be it for video games or movies, the Z4 Aurora is a quality made device. 
                                                                              --------------Matthew Furtado, Examiner.com






Referral program 
Why not share good things with your friends? A FREE tripod, which is very useful when you set up your Aurora will be sent you as a gift. Check our third campaign UPDATE for more referral program information. 


A smart projector beyond your imagination----XGIMI Z4 Aurora




The XGIMI Z4 Aurora is a Smart LED projector that can transform any surface into a 300-inch screen with unparalleled brightness and clarity. The built-in Harman Kardon stereo produces superior sound quality and the dimension converter brings all video content to life in brilliant 3D. Install apps and games onto the Z4 Aurora android system and wirelessly stream them directly onto the projector. The Z4 Aurora provides a truly connected, superior viewing experience.







The Z4 Aurora Aesthetic



Z4 Aurora aesthetic is simple and classic, which fits in perfectly with an understated, modern lifestyle.






Crystal-Clear Sound System
The Z4 Aurora's tailored crystal Harman Kardon stereo provides the ultimate acoustic experience.




A Virtual Home Theater
The Z4 Aurora can turn any surface into a 300-inch home theater. The Z4 Aurora boasts high pixel density to create a stunningly clear image projected onto any surface. Combine that with the Harman Kardon stereo and you’ve got yourself a movie night!
Z4 Aurora projects for more than 120'' screen in different light conditions. 
Note: the projection is just next to the window with very bright daylight. You will get much brighter projection screen if your project not too close to the window like what we did! 



We compared the brightness of the Z4 Aurora to that of a traditional television.



A demonstration of the Z4 Aurora’s unparalleled display

Cinema-Quality 3D Experience
The Z4 Aurora is equipped with the active shutter 3D-imaging technique used by DLP cinema projectors. With stunning 3D quality, bring any movie, game or sporting event to life in your own home.




Android Operating System
Quickly and easily install games, apps and stream video wirelessly through the Z4 Aurora Android Operating System. The Z4 Aurora also supports many video game consoles. Connect your XBOX, PS4 and other consoles and play on the big screen.



Multiple Streaming Options
No more messy cables! The Z4 Aurora can stream content wirelessly from your smart-phone, tablet and desktop. It is also equipped with HDMI, USB, and AV ports.



Innovative Gesture Control 

The Z4 Aurora can be controlled by simple hand gestures. The built-in 3D gesture recognition chip identifies the movement locus by 150dpi. Sampling frequency is up to 200 times/sec.




Keystone correction 
Most projectors have to be perfectly set up in order to produce the desired image. However, the Z4 Aurora is built with vertical +/-30 degree and horizontal +/-30 degree keystone correction that provides an optimal image from any angle, eliminating the hassle of set-up.



An Interactive Entertainment Companion
With cinema-quality image and sound and an Android Operating System, the Z4 Aurora is the ultimate entertainment center.




The Z4 Aurora in the Workplace
The Z4 Aurora also functions beyond entertainment. The projector can be switched from standard version into business version, where you can upload file management software. The Z4 Aurora software makes presenting to large groups easy on the big screen.





Extended Lifetime
The Z4 Aurora uses OSRAM LED illumination that extends its lifetime to 30,000 hours, which is six times longer than the average lifetime of traditional projectors. The LED light source is ecofriendly, using an energy-conserving bulb.


Bluetooth Remote Control
The XGIMI bluetooth remote control has a high-capacity rechargeable battery and built-in mouse function that supports more technical operations.






Product Specs














XGIMI Aurora is definitely your best choice of home theatre!



* ANSI lumens: the light output of projectors (including video projectors) is typically measured in lumens. A standardized procedure for testing projectors has been established by the American National Standards Institute, which involves averaging together several measurements taken at different positions.

Perks






CES interview－The Z4 Aurora was exhibited at CES 2016 in Las Vegas. See what visitors had to say about their experience!




Timeline

Team






    

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."
 

FAQ





Where did the idea come from?
Our team is composed of traditional display manufacturers, and we saw that current TVs are too heavy and too expensive. We want to produce a simple, smart, affordable home theater projector. After two years of development and thousands of tests, we create the Z4 Aurora.

What language does Z4 Aurora support?
Z4 Aurora supports English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese
(simplified), Chinese (traditional),  Russian, Italian,
Portuguese, Thai.
How long can the projector run before it
overheats?  
Aurora uses an LED Bulb that has a lifespan of 30,000 hours. Aurora's fan works efficiently and quietly, and has no danger of overheating.
How can I control
the projector?
The Z4 Aurora is operated by hand gestures, or the Bluetooth remote control. If you shake the remote control twice, it can be used as a mouse for more precision control.
How large is
the projection area when I place Z4 Aurora 7ft (2.13m) from the wall?
The throw ratio of Z4 Aurora is 1.2:1
(distance: width). At a distance of 7ft your screen will be 5.83ft
(1.78m, 70-inch).
Can the Z4 Aurora transfer files through the USB port? 

Yes, you can transfer the files through USB 2.0 or 3.0 port. The Z4 Aurora supports MP4, AVI, MKV, 3D, 4K and Blu Ray video formats. It also supports photos, Microsoft Office files and Android APK.Can the Z4 Aurora be
paired with different devices (e.g iOS, Windows and Android)?
The Z4 Aurora can be wirelessly connected to devices using:-Wifi-Hotspot-XGIMI assistance

Can I install applications to the Z4 Aurora? 
Yes, you can install any android app on Auroa . XGIMI developed ‘XGIMI UI’ based on android
4.4 installed in Aurora.

story:
Major Features of LeVAULT

 

What is LeVAULT?

(48 seconds)

 

How do I login to my LeVAULT account?

(1 minute 29 seconds)

 

How do I access my accounts and apps managed by LeVAULT?

(53 seconds)

 

How do I register a LeVAULT key?

(1 minute 42 seconds)

 

What happens when the LeVAULT key is disconnected or out of range?

(1 minute)

 

Can LeVAULT replace a device authentication with LeVAULT authentication?

(1 minute 25 seconds)

 

What operating systems or devices does LeVAULT work with?

LeVAULT will work with the following:

  • All versions of windows operating system.
  • All Android devices.
  • Macintosh operating system.
  • iPads.
  • iPhones.
  • Other tablets. 

 

What is coming next for LeVAULT?

(29 seconds)

 
 

Multiple Factors of Authentication

The use of multi-factor authentication provides a much more secure login process requiring more than just a simple username and password.

Unlike other products currently on the market that provide 2 or 3 factors of authentication, LeVAULT will provide numerous factors of authentication well beyond 3 factors. 

LeVAULT supports multiple factors of authentication through the following:

  • Something you have: A registered key

This “registered key” can be ANY device that is detected by a computer (mobile phone, Bluetooth device, tablet, or USB  device just to name a few) A user may have more than one registered key.

  • Something you know: The methodology to login to LeVAULT is fully managed and controlled by each individual, which can include a username and password combination as well as bio-metrics. This gives you multiple factors of authentication well beyond 3 factors.
  • Something you don’t know: A PIN number​

A new PIN number is sent to your cell phone or any other device. This happens upon each login request to LeVAULT. A new PIN is generated and sent each time you login to LeVAULT.

LeVAULT uses the above factors in conjunction with our easy to use password generation and management system. This makes accessing your private information very secure. The LeVAULT Authentication Server is often referred to as the "LAS".

 

Password Generation and Management

In today’s world, computer and network security is dependent on the management, generation, and security of passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys. Once hackers break into a system, their single, most important goal is to obtain a user login ID, passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys.

We know the following:

  • Passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys are too simple.
  • Passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys are not changed frequently enough.
  • Passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys are not kept in safe places. 

LeVAULT resolves the above by providing an unprecedented password security system that also supports encryption keys and PIN numbers. LeVAULT automates the generation and management of your passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys. This process is broken down into two categories.

  1. Passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys generation:

LeVAULT will automatically generate strong and complex passwords for each and every one of your individual accounts.

  1. Passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys management:

LeVAULT will automatically manage all of your passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys by remembering them so that you don’t have to. It will then change your passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys as often as you like. You just simply select the account that you would like to log into and click “login”.

This process makes the passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys more complex, changed frequently and kept in a safe place by LeVAULT.

 

Example of LeVAULT Auto Fill Process

LeVAULT  Auto-Login Process to a Facebook account

 

When you log into a website or application through LeVAULT, your username and password are filled in automatically. This makes the login process more secure, quicker and simpler for you.

 

Access Times

It's 2 a.m. Why is your secretary or another individual logging into your accounts or systems? 

We offer the option to set an individual’s “registered key” to only allow access into their LeVAULT account at certain times of the day (such as, but not limited to, 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.). If this individual attempts to login outside of these times, the LAS (LeVAULT Authentication Server) will deny the individual access and flag and report the attempted login as inappropriate activity.

 

Flagged Activity

LeVAULT's Red Flags display window

Activities flagged as “inappropriate” can be viewed by an individual or administrator  in a live report. This is intended to help you become aware of unauthorized attempts to access a LeVAULT account. If you have this knowledge, then you can take action to stop it before the hacker is successful.

Some activities that are flagged include:

  • Attempted login with incorrect PIN number
  • Attempted login with incorrect password
  • Attempted login with an “unregistered key”
  • Attempted login outside of “access times”
  • An attempt to  register a device that has already been registered. 

 

Example of Registered Key Removal

LeVAULT provides a “registered key” monitoring feature. This feature is comprised of three registered key removal options, listed below:

LeVAULT  Shutdown, Hibernate & Lock Options

  1. When the “registered key” is removed or out of range of the user's designated zone, the user has the following options:
  • Shutdown
  • Hibernate
  • Lock

If the user has not chosen one of the above three options, LeVAULT will still detect the removal of the “registered key” and default to shut down your computer.

Logout of LeVAULT & Logout of websites and applications options

  1. Upon the removal of the “registered key”, you can have LeVAULT logout of the applications and websites that are currently open, and to logout of the LeVAULT client once the computer enters shutdown, hibernate, or lock mode.

LeVAULT grayed out after the "registered key" has been removed

  1. When the monitoring system detects the removal of a “registered key”, LeVAULT will completely disable all but it’s “Logout” button. Once your “registered key" is reconnected or back in range, LeVAULT will re-enable itself automatically unless you have chosen the option to logout of the client (LeVAULT) upon removal of the key (see #2 above).

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

Why passwords are the best protection?

(3 minutes 37 seconds)

 

If you would like a more detailed demonstration of LeVAULT, view the video below.

(17 minutes)

To view in full screen mode click on "YouTube" in the video

After watching the videos and reviewing the “Features” section, feel free to reach out to us. We would love to offer you a demo of LeVAULT, as well as answer any questions you may have. Once LeVAULT is released, webinars will be held weekly at 10:00 a.m. mountain time. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

About the Company

LeVAULT is an advanced, user friendly security software that prevents identity theft through the management of dynamic and complex passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys.

Comet is an innovative and visionary tech company. It has been in the data management business  since 1994.  In response to global security vulnerabilities and the inability of the available products to effectively safeguard systems as well as personal and vital information, Comet has developed LeVAULT to protect you EVERYWHERE while giving you access from ANYWHERE.

Preventing identity theft is an ambitious effort. LeVAULT software will secure the internet, networks, servers, personal computers, and mobile devices. LeVAULT prevents identity theft by keeping private information out of hackers’ hands.

Users access their online accounts and private information on a daily basis. The manner in which the accounts are accessed is not secure. Whether you are an enterprise with complex networks and server setups, or an individual using your online accounts, LeVAULT will provide the security you need to keep your private information safe.

LeVAULT is currently available for enterprises, and is scheduled to be available for individual use in the summer of 2017.

 Please join our team in solving this global security problem by contributing to our campaign and spreading the word about the benefits of LeVAULT.  

We are offering several subscription options at heavily discounted amounts. Our subscription offerings are as follows:

_____________________________________________________________________________


A standard monthly subscription will be offered at $11.99 or higher once LeVAULT is released to the public.

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

FAQ's for Enterprises

 

How will this platform scale?

  • The LeVAULT Authentication Server (LAS) scales just like any other web-service, web-server, clustered server, etc. 
  • Users and employees are added and deactivated from LeVAULT by an administrator with the right privileges.
  • Applications, web sites, devices and other resources are added to LeVAULT by an administrator with the right privileges.
  • Additional services and solutions can be developed through the use of the LeVAULT API.

Is there high availability built in the architecture?

  • The LeVAULT Authentication Server (LAS) can be hosted on Google servers, Amazon (AWS), blue host, etc.
  • The LeVAULT Authentication Server (LAS) can be hosted internally and managed, by a business or entity.

Is there failover and redundancy built in?

  • LeVAULT manages the authentication layer; therefore, failover and redundancy are supported by LeVAULT.

What is the hardware configuration and system requirements for the platform?

  • A standalone/virtualized server that can support a web server (e.g., Apache Tomcat).

What is the specific performance impact on the network for low, medium and large deployments?

  • On the front end, very minimal because LeVAULT simply automates the authentication process.
  • On the back end, the LAS changes the passwords, PIN numbers and encryption keys on a predetermined frequency set by the administrators. The impact on the network will be increased by the frequency of the changes.

Do you have a plan to support Spark or Hadoop HDFS?

  • LeVAULT technology could be incorporated into any platform that supports web servers (i.e. Apache Tomcat).
  • LeVAULT manages the authentication and encryption of any database engine, server configuration, etc.

How can this system run on the edge of the network for IoT applications?

  • LeVAULT could be implemented at the edge of an IoT (internet of things) network. “Things” could be registered into LeVAULT through the use of the LeVAULT Administration Client. Registration, authentication and encryption will be managed by LeVAULT, insuring integrity of the private network. LeVAULT insures that commands come only from the authorized application and users.

Is there support for HIPAA?

  • HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act,) does not have a specific requirement for encryption and intrusion detection, it requires that those in possession of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) protect that information and, for the most part, leaves implementation up to the technologists involved. 
  • LeVAULT manages the access and authentication to applications, databases and PII.
  • The authorization to access and view PII is only allowed by those that have been given authorization to the PII.
  • Because LeVAULT manages passwords, encryption keys and PIN numbers, the sharing of such is impossible.

What does your security stack look like?

  • The VPN security stack can be Cisco OS, combined with a client whose OS could be many types.
  • Our stack would be a purpose-built server, running Linux or Windows OS with support for JAVA EE, MySQL database and Apache Tomcat.  The LeVAULT Authentication Server will be hosted here.
  • In the IoT solution, the internal stack would manage the encryption and authentication scheme built into the communication protocol between the “Things” and their controller. 
  • On the public facing side, we would be dependent on the stack already hosting the LeVAULT Authentication Server (LAS). There will be a LeVAULT Client with encryption, authentication, and detection running on a client device.

How is the system deployed for cloud, on-premises and hybrid environments?

  • LeVAULT can be either a cloud based solution, a VPN solution, or a hybrid solution. It depends on how the customer wants to implement and support the LeVAULT technology.

How can we test the system in an evaluation or POC?

  • We can provide a test environment with a limited number of users and time frame.
  • Training for the administrator to be in charge of managing and maintaining LeVAULT.
  • A full implementation will just involve increasing the total number of users.

 

What does LeVAULT work with?

LeVAULT will work with any device, website and application that requires authentication. From computers and physical access to your home and office or just logging into a website, LeVAULT offers endless security options in a very unsecure world.

Training for the administrator to be in charge of managing and maintaining LeVAULT.
A full implementation will just involve increasing the total number of users.

 
What does LeVAULT work with?LeVAULT will work with any device, website and application that requires authentication. From computers and physical access to your home and office or just logging into a website, LeVAULT offers endless security options in a very unsecure world.

story:
MagSix - US$6 with The 2nd Generation World's Small Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger : Lightning (Apple) or Micro USB (Android)

Let's make charging simply way! MagSix is a simple yet perfect solution to prevent frayed charging cables, tripping over cable resulting in smashed phones, pointless fiddling to plug in cable in the dark, water damage through charging outlet, and more! This 2nd Generation magnetic Super charging adapter will make your life just a bit more convenient.

2nd Gen. Lightning & Micro USB

MagSix is compatible with all your personal devices/accessories, as long as it has a Micro USB or a Lightning power slot, you are good to go.  Simply leave a MagSix Adaptor inside any one of your devices and you are ready to snap the MagSix into place and charge. We have been using the MagSix to charge our smartphones, tablets, speakers, headphones, power banks and even our light book! Order multiple adaptors to use on more devices/accessories!
story_txt:
MagSix - US$6 with The 2nd Generation World's Small Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger : Lightning (Apple) or Micro USB (Android)

Let's make charging simply way! MagSix is a simple yet perfect solution to prevent frayed charging cables, tripping over cable resulting in smashed phones, pointless fiddling to plug in cable in the dark, water damage through charging outlet, and more! This 2nd Generation magnetic Super charging adapter will make your life just a bit more convenient.
2nd Gen. Lightning & Micro USBMagSix is compatible with all your personal devices/accessories, as long as it has a Micro USB or a Lightning power slot, you are good to go.  Simply leave a MagSix Adaptor inside any one of your devices and you are ready to snap the MagSix into place and charge. We have been using the MagSix to charge our smartphones, tablets, speakers, headphones, power banks and even our light book! Order multiple adaptors to use on more devices/accessories! We wanted to make this familiar mundane everyday action just a little quicker and more convenient for everyone. So no matter what you're doing, MagSix is right there for you.

How it works? 

MagSix supports "Charging Process" as well as "Data Synchronization" and it’s designed for both Lightning cable (iPhone) and Micro-USB cable (Android).  






What Unique with MagSix?

MagSix Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger 

- Same Cable for "Lightning and MicroUSB"


What Unique with MagSix?
MagSix Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger 
- MagSix "Reversible USB"




The Features
Not only does it provide reversible plugging for Micro-USB, MagSix provides many other awesome features to protect your smartphone.



  



Charging and Data Transmission for Multiple devices
MagSix For Fast Charging and High Speed Data Transmission








MagSix is compatible with any device charged with a micro-usb port or a lightning port.


The MagSix Cable is a standard 1.2 meters. * Lightning  / Micro-USBSupports both Apple Lightning and Micro-USB Ports.* Easy Plug and DetachThe magnetic connection allows you to connect and detach your phone instantly.* WaterproofPrevents water damage at the charging socket.* MinimalMinimal footprint and design can fit any protecter cover.*Charger LED indicatorA small hidden LED indicates charging status.* Cable ProtectionProvides protection for the cable connector head.* Data SynchronisationEasy way for the data transfer* Affordable PriceJust $6 simply affordable to enhance this daily mundane action.* Reversible plug for chargingNever plug in your phone wrong way again.

The Design
MagSix is a 2nd Generation minimalist’s dream come true and perfect for those who love to accessorize. Thanks to our specialized micro-connector, MagSix is so small it will fit into any custom phone case so you don’t have to ditch your favorite phone cover.


MagSix is so smallIt will fit into any custom phone cover case
*some cases with protective flap on the charging port might not be able to close with MagSix in place.






















MagSix-PRO OTG Transformer


Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger Leading Technology Ahead








MagSix PRO OTG Transformer


Intelligent Metal Magnetic Super Charger


It can be used as a normal charging cable or you can plug it into your devices to power another one of your devices.The MagSix PRO is all you need, whether you are charging your Android, an iPhone, your headphones or even your camera, the MagSix PRO can do it all!By being able to transform from USB to Micro USB, you can use the MagSix PRO like any other regular charging cable or you can plug it into your Micro USB device and use that device as a power bank!


Perks Selection






Now MagSix are Ready to Ship soon, Please fill the survey to confirm all the Perk and data Correctly!
MagSix Packaging Lightning




MagSix Packaging MicroUSB








 

Why we need your support
Your support is critical to our long term success. We need your help to scale this Product and bring it to market direct and quickly at a lower consumer price point for early bird .
We will be taking the funds from Indiegogo to move directly into improving product design and purchasing necessary materials and the manufacturing of these products you booked.
Development stage
We All have currently completed:
Product tooling
Packaging design
Ready for mass production 

Risks & Challenges
While any new endeavor involves risk, The MagSix team have already completed all preparation for mass production. The order will be start to delivery on end of FEB, 2016. In the team’s experience, there are several points in the design, manufacturing and certification processes that could cause delays. We will keep you informed and ensure you know right away if we have run into challenges. Certification, software and hardware design all have the biggest potential to affect timing. There is always the possibility of supplier delays. Whatever happens along our production timeline, you can rest assured that we will keep you updated on our progress. 
Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

How you can help?
We know that contributing to the campaign isn't always a possibility for everyone. But if you like MagSix and the thing we are doing, please contribute in other ways! We are really thankful of all actions you can make. We made helping really simple for you. please share this page to your friends! 
We're Techman, we need you help!
We're looking for PR partner for world wide marketing, Welcome to join us !

story:
Hello, My name is Lou;(Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus)

First off, I am a tech-junkie. I have had the passion for technology my whole life. I am also an avid gamer. Growing up playing games has been one of my life long passions. I also working in the arcade and pinball industry for over 10 years. I am also passionate about my Harley Davidson Motorcycle and riding it. But most of all, I am now very dedicated to charity. I am a member of a Freeemason Lodge in Cambridge, MA. Seeing the charity first hand has been inspirational. Seeing a man donate most of his liver to save a friend. Seeing the smile of the homeless as we deliver baked good to the food pantry on the weekends. And see those veterans at the Soliders home for coffee hour on Sundays, and reminding them that they are not forgotten. I had the opportunity to ride in the Muscular Dystrophy Associations MDA Witch Ride in Oct. 2013 and through sponsorship, was able to raise over $1,500.00. (Video here MDA WItch Ride Video) Through that i will have the opportunity to visit the MDA summer camp this year to see that money directly used to make those kids happy.

Last week, I was selected to become a Google Glass Explorer. The price for the device is high, but the many ideas and would like to opportunity to own one of these so I can document these passions of my life. Also it would be great to bring these glasses to those who don't have the opportunity to try them out for themselves. These could be the inspiration to someone else to get them interested in science technology and of course charity. My immediate plans, are to use them to help document , also with the use of my GoPro Camera, my several charitable events and programs which I do on a weekly basis. Also to bring this technology to the children of the MDA Summer camp for use and documentation.I also plan to document PAX East 2014, the largest video game convention on the east coast. I also plan to try them out at large social events such a sporting events around Boston. The possibilities are limitless, and through your help, could be a reality.

Your help is needed and this is how the funding is broken down. Google Glass is not a cheap device. The current explorers have to pay $1500.00 for its purchase. I will be honest, I am not expecting to raise this entire amount. If I do not raise $1500, the entire amount raised will be donated to charity. The charity being the Muscular Dystrophy Association.  If I do raise $1500, only $1000 of it will go towards the Google Glass, everything above and beyond that WILL BE DONATED TO Charity, once again the Muscular Dystrophy Association. I will fund the $500 of Google Glass if the goal is reached.

Your contributions are highly valued and will be thoroughly documented. If possible, and with permission, I will post the first name, last name initial, city and state of all of those who contribute on social media.

The Impact of Your Help

With your support I can share my experiences, explore the social impact of wearing it to various places and events, record and report my experiences via social media, share some of the great videos from my adventures, and to explore its use in charity and the disabled.

I will share of of this iva my Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and Youtube accounts via pictures and videos and through the additional Google+ hangouts on weekends and throughout PAX East in April of 2014.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you  can’t help:
Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And also to note some of the events I will attend may not allow the use of recording or rebroadcast. I will try to my best of my ability to provide the best coverage I can but I will not violate local, state, or federal law as well as Google User End Agreement in the use of Google Glasses.

story:
My name is Nana Fatimah Ogunfemi and my background is in Healthcare Administration and Management. I have always loved technology and after inheriting my Aunty's old iPad and browsing the App Store, I began to research into what it would take to get into App development.I did a business course , found a fantastic app development team called Locassa and now we have Kinship, it  is a social activity and safety for friends and family application that is currently available only in the App store and was launched on the 9th of January 2014.


The Story Behind the Kinship App

I had gone through a difficult time and had been out of touch with family and friends. I am quite good at keeping in touch with people and wondered why my failure to behave in my usual fashion had yielded no calls to check on my well being? When I began to call round everyone's reply was that they had thought of me often but had been so busy. It came to me that this was very unsatisfactory and worrisome. After what I had been through, I knew that we should not accept the excuse of being busy as a satisfactory answer for losing touch with someone anymore. Not after receiving a call from someone that helped pick me up, set me right and made all the difference. I think I am tough but the truth is I almost cracked just before I got that call. Looking back to when I spoke to my friend, I marvel at how magically the darkness seemed to lift and I could feel a strength flowing back into me. 

We all have loved ones, the people who truly matter. When we are going through tough times and even good times, it’s these people we need to stay in contact with. As mobile technology grows, going silent and inactive on social media can be a cry for help. We need to study each other well enough to recognize each others patterns and to watch out for each other.Some people can deal with stuff on their own, not everybody can, or should even.Talking to and keeping regular contact with our loved ones is one way to keep each other, happy, build strong relationships and keep safe. When we have regular contact as a basis for our relationships, people are encouraged to open up and then problems shared become problems solved because you get help that is ready.

Kinship is the only social awareness app which tracks your closest people and alerts you when they go quiet. Checking the activity dial around each person’s profile picture to get a sense of their activity and checking in on those who need you most, when they need you is invaluable.  According to MIND (The UK Charity for Mental Health issues) Depression, loneliness, and suicidal thinking all can be helped by having good social contact.

Keeping someone in the know of your movements and who you’re with is not only common sense but perfect sense. If people get accustomed to loved ones always keeping someone in the loop about what they are doing, where they are going and with whom, it just becomes an easier, safer environment for everyone to thrive. 

 With Kinship you’ll always be part of someone’s circle and they’ll be part of yours.


What We Need & What You Get

  • I need to raise £10,000 and this will go towards making an android version of Kinship.
  • Kinship is free and having it on Android will allow many more to become involved. Becoming a part of this campaign by donating or helping raise awareness of the app means you help make it possible for others to build and maintain their relationships in a positive way. That feeling is better than any perk I could give you. I am honoured to place you in a unique group of Kinship supporters that will go into a Kinship Hall of Fame on my website. Nobody after this Campaign will be admitted to this group, members of which will continue receiving special considerations from my company Techsis Ltd. The best part is everybody who owns an Android version of Kinship will be know who they owe it to.
  • If I don’t reach my desired goal amount, I will put all I have raised towards paying for building the android version and continue looking for ways to to finish the product because I believe in it and know it will improve relationships globally..


The Impact

  • The Kinship project is important because I know and everyone who has ever been in a similar situation knows a hand up when you are down is the best thing we can give or receive as people. I know how difficult getting back on your feet again can be first hand. I went through one of the lowest times of my life very lonely, no one should go through that. It took someone who remembered to call me and reignite something in me to get me back on the road to recovery. Someone who cared to give me that push start I needed. It is my conviction that through the Kinship app which works like a second conscience for us, we will be prompted to make that call, because we need each other's support to make it anywhere in this life.


Ways to Help the Kinship Project

Pledge to help the project with any amount you can to help bring Kinship app to Android. Share the video, the links and engage with me on social media to get the word out there. Download the app and give me your feedback via the App store, or my website and social media to help me improve it. Share your stories of family, friends and strangers with us. Celebrate our Kinship, lets help make the world a better place by keeping our loved ones close.


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can contribute financially to my project, but money isn’t everything. You can help me tell others about it and this may make all the difference. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to do so. You can also copy the link and share. Get everybody to join!


Why I chose Indiegogo

Indiegogo is international, for everyone and anyone with a bank account anywhere, this is just fantastic. Everybody needs somebody and no one should be left out of forming and growing some kind of connection with family, friends and people no matter where in the world they are.


Risks and Challenges

This is my first App, it’s already in the app store, achieving this was not easy at all. I believe this demonstrates my commitment and determination to making this project a success considering where I started from. Having a fantastic App Development team like Locassa, who share much of my vision for my apps and for my company has simply been fantastic. I am also on the Launcher programme with the School for Start Ups with Doug Richard and I have received and continue to receive excellent business support and mentorship.  Prior to this I also completed a business course with HBV Enterprises in Hackney last April and I continue receiving back up support from them as well. I believe with the financial backing I can make a great success of this project.


Future plans

I would like to find a sponsor for the Kinship app and continue to make it free for everyone to share.


The Team

Right now for Techsis, there is just me, then there’s my tech development team at Locassa, my business mentor Chris Ciko at the School for Start Ups, the team Richard, Viv and John at HBV Enterprises and my wonderful group of friends and family supporting me all the way.

story:
bivvy want's to make it easier for people to find free campsites that are off the beaten path.

With user generated tips and info, bivvy opens the possibilities for campers to communicate and share their experiences with others. The bivvy platform hosts profiles where users can save campsite locations for future adventures. Through bivvy's user profiles, campers can show and share their experiences from the wilderness and beyond.

Key features of the app:

  • Interactive map to view campsites near you or search for sites around the U.S.. The map features a one click description, star rating and most liked tip. Click on the view more link to view the site in detail with tips generated by other bivvy users.
  • Full GPS navigation with downloadable maps for offline navigation.
  •  Create user profiles and join in on the adventure.
  • User profiles display your recorded camps, and open up the many functions available through bivvy's social network.
  • Add a campsite listing. With your bivvy account you can add campsites to share with others. 
  • Photo sharing, add photos of the sites you visit, and share them on Instagram or twitter.
  • Detailed Campsite Profiles learn about campsites before you leave, with pictures and tips generated by bivvy users.



About Us and The Campaign

We are a team of product designers and developers with a love for the outdoors and adventuring. 


Why bivvy and why IndieGoGo

  • We love to camp, after the snow melts from the harsh winters of Upstate New York we're longing for a nice weekend in the back-country. When the time comes, I usually hop on Google to search trails and sites around the area we're looking to travel. Dissatisfied with my lack of findings and difficult search queries, I usually end up heading out to find sites on our own. This technique never ends well, you spend more time looking for a site then you do enjoying it. That's were bivvy came in, and the idea of creating an easier way for people to find free campsites was conceived.

  • With the help from you and others alike we can create a platform to help and encourage people to get outdoors and enjoy what nature has to offer. Through the bivvy community we can help campers find the info they need to make their camping adventure a success.

  • We acknowledge the fact that in most cases mobile service will not be available on your trip, bivvy will offer downloadable topo maps for campers to download to their device for viewing outside of cellular service areas.


Creating a Mobile App like bivvy will require a lot of time, and dedication.

There are many cost associated with developing a product like bivvy.

  • We are looking to raise $10,000.00 for the first round of the project. A breakdown of where the funds raised will go, can be found below. We are fortunate enough to have the prototype design and development covered which drastically drops start-up costs.

    What we plan to accomplish on the first round:
  • Initial tasks and standard requirements for establishing a start-up company.
  • Development of a working prototype, to use for A/B and beta testing.
  • Development and implementation of a marketing plan
  • Legal fee re-payment and further legal assistance

    Where the funds are going:
         5% goes to Indiegogo
         5% goes to paypal
         90% goes to bivvy's first round of development


We got perks!

  • As a contributor we have setup levels of compensation determined by the amount of contribution. Checkout the bivvy perks. Perks will be given out 30 days after the end of the campaign.
  • If we do not reach our goal, progress will continue and the funds raised will still go toward our original plan. All contributors will receive perks as normal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to the campaign you can still help by spreading the word and sharing bivvy with your community. Indiegogo offers share tools to make it easier to make some noise.



What some of our followers are saying about bivvy

When the time comes, I usually hop on Google to search trails and sites around the area we're looking to travel. Dissatisfied with my lack of findings and difficult search queries, I usually end up heading out to find sites on our own. This technique never ends well, you spend more time looking for a site then you do enjoying it. That's were bivvy came in, and the idea of creating an easier way for people to find free campsites was conceived.
 With the help from you and others alike we can create a platform to help and encourage people to get outdoors and enjoy what nature has to offer. Through the bivvy community we can help campers find the info they need to make their camping adventure a success. 

We acknowledge the fact that in most cases mobile service will not be available on your trip, bivvy will offer downloadable topo maps for campers to download to their device for viewing outside of cellular service areas. 


    Creating a Mobile App like bivvy will require a lot of time, and dedication. There are many cost associated with developing a product like bivvy.   We are looking to raise $10,000.00 for the first round of the project. A breakdown of where the funds raised will go, can be found below. We are fortunate enough to have the prototype design and development covered which drastically drops start-up costs.What we plan to accomplish on the first round:

Initial tasks and standard requirements for establishing a start-up company.
Development of a working prototype, to use for A/B and beta testing. 

Development and implementation of a marketing plan
Legal fee re-payment and further legal assistanceWhere the funds are going:

         5% goes to Indiegogo         5% goes to paypal         90% goes to bivvy's first round of development
We got perks!

As a contributor we have setup levels of compensation determined by the amount of contribution. Checkout the bivvy perks. Perks will be given out 30 days after the end of the campaign.


 If we do not reach our goal, progress will continue and the funds raised will still go toward our original plan. All contributors will receive perks as normal.
    Other Ways You Can Help If you are unable to contribute to the campaign you can still help by spreading the word and sharing bivvy with your community. Indiegogo offers share tools to make it easier to make some noise. 



What some of our followers are saying about bivvy

story:
Designed for professional mobile gaming adventures, the DOOGEE S70 is the rugged smartphone for any adventure or rough challenge.

 

Featured on

 

Hands-on with S70 by XDADEVELOPERS

 

 

 

That’s right. The DOOGEE S70 is not only unbreakable—it’s the world’s first rugged smartphone for professional mobile gaming experiences.

Equipped with a comfortable grip gamepad and enclosure, the gamepad connects with the device by Bluetooth and lets you play on your phone as if it was a console—while keeping its phone features right there for whenever you need them.

The DOOGEE S70 unique gamepad has been designed to display the coolest look and offer the most comfortable grip feeling. For a long time, we submitted the gamepad to an extensive and lengthy research—it has been tested by over 20,000 pairs of hands from different countries, and with different hand shapes and ways of holding the gamepad, to ensure that any gamer in the world will find in the DOOGEE S70 the gaming device of his dreams.

  • Shut down background processes
  • Cool down CPU
  • Restricts app notifictation and calls

The DOOGEE S70 has a side key that’s been engineered to immediately set the phone to the gaming mode while clearing all other the applications to keep the CPU cool and the phone itself in constant cooling mode—while performing spectacularly.

Press for 5 seconds, the side button works as a custom function key also has 2 other possible functions besides the gameboost mode:

App Shortcut: touch it and jump right into the main application that you always use. No browsing, just direct app usage.

SOS Calling: set up your emergency contact, press the button, and your phone will immediately call your emergency or priority number.

 

Equipped with a 5500mAh Polymer battery produced by BAK, the No.1 battery brand, S70 ensures safety and has a long battery life.

 
 

With hyper-fast charging power at 24W of Pump Express 3.0, the charging speed of S70 is 40% faster than the average schemes’. Moreover, the high conversion chips inside the Type-C charger and phone realize lightning recharging.

 

S70 is equipped with a 5.99〃 FHD big screen in 18:9 full display. It boasts 403PPI with accurate color display and vivid image, which offers an immersive stunning theatre experience watching video or playing game indoors and outdoors alike. 

The DOOGEE S70 is definitely a rough phone that can take and resist anything with a digital smile on its screen. However, the fact that it is so rugged doesn’t mean it isn’t sensitive as well.

Actually, the device has been designed to allow its professional users to keep their gloves on—whether they’re working in a factory or going on a hiking adventure—while using the phone and its sensitive and responsive 5.99〃 FHD screen in 18:9 aspect ratio.

GAMEPAD DOOGEE G1

The Cool and Stylish Design of the Gamepad

 

Directions for use

Before using the gamepad G1, please press the switch on button for 3 seconds until the blue light blinks.

Gamepad Instruction
 

Durability Test

Dust-proof: even if exposed to dusty environments, it’s 99% protected against dust

IP68-rated Water-proof: you can have it working up to 1.5 meters deep in the water for 24 hours

IP69K-rated shock-proof: it’s protected against water pressure up to 100 bar (1450 psi) and against extreme temperatures of up to 80 degrees 

The DOOGEE S70 has performed impressively when tested for the exposure to different forms of pressure.

 

MIL-STD-810G Test

 

Withstands high altitudes, high and low temperatures and sudden temperature shocks.

S70 does not only have a screen made from 4th generation of Corning’s Gorilla Glass that’s almost as strong as steel, but it also has 4 soft rubber raised sides protecting it.

 

The DOOGEE S70 built-in camera is a 12.0MP SONY IMX363, embedded in the rear with the most accurate and fast Dual PD auto-focus tech. 

 

The Hardware & The Software

Whether you are a professional gamer, a professional diver or hiker, or have any other type of need for a smartphone that offers a stellar performance with an amazing resilience, you’ll like to know that it features:

Appearance

Color : Mineral Black,Imperial Red,Fire Orange

Dimension : 6.76〃 * 3.15〃 * 0.53〃

Weight : 278.3g

  • MTK high-end processor Helio P23(MT6763T) 2.5GHz—fast and powerful
  • Android™ 8.1 Oreo™ OS—the latest OS
  • 6GB RAM and 64GB ROM—with the memory of an elephant
  • Polymer 5500mAh battery + 12V/2A flash charger—charges in only 1h40m
  • Charging cable that connects with other phones, mouse, keyboard and USB stick
  • Equipped with Barometer, Compass, Noise meter, Gradienter, Height meter, Magnifying glass and other tools that cater to the needs of engineers, firemen, factory workers, adventurers and other hands-on users

 

Worldwide 4G Coverage

The DOOGEE S70 can be used anywhere in the world because it is equipped with a 6-module band that supports 27 frequencies—namely the major operators around the world.

 

Robust & Sleek Design

Whoever said that a smartphone that is worthy of warriors must look as rough as it is? Not the DOOGEE S70!

Features 4 external corners surrounded by ebonite, S70 ensures that the main body is well protected.

However, since we had the needs of professional gamers in mind, we designed the S70 to look as linear as possible, for which we used dual color injection molding to the chin and forehead. 

The S70’s back cover is stylishly made of leather, with a metal finishing on its upper area—giving it the sleek design that even a rugged phone should have.

 

Packaging

Unboxing S70

 

 

Product Specification Parameters

  • Device model: DOOGEE G1
  • Product size: 208x88x48 mm
  • Wireless protocol: Wireless 3.0/4.0 compliant
  • Wireless distance: 2-10m
  • Supported system: Android / iOS
  • CPU: ARM968E-SCore
  • Battery: 400mAh rechargeable lithium battery 3.7V  
  • Continuous game time: About 40 hours
  • Working current: 4-10mA
  • Standby current: 9uA

Add-ons

Metal and Leather, Specifically Designed to Match your S70 The W2 wireless charger is built to be something greater than just a charger – coupling a durable metal body with appealing leather panel. It is not only rugged, but looks impressive.

 

In celebration of the fifth year’s anniversary of Doogee, we specially invited world-renowned German designer Chris Von Neumann, a judge of the German Red Dot Design Competition, to design and forge Doogee Medal. The shield-shaped medal is crafted with British style pattern in profile and with sapphire blue as undertone coupled with gilding embroider that is typical of oriental enamel techniques. In the center of the medal is engraved in English round hand font with such words as “Doogee 5th Year’s Anniversary” and “Live your life”. What stretches the lower part is an orange ribbon inlaied with five gilding stars which stands for Doogee’s five-year incessant pursue building a premium brand.

 

AERMOO B3 IPX7 Waterproof TWS Headphones

Designed specially to match the S70, the B3 can effectively resist water ingress with the compact body, waterproof casing, and the specialized hydrophobic nano-coating. Compatible with multiple devices, B3 features the escalated Bluetooth version of 5.0 and LDS antenna, which synergize to offer unbreakable connectivity within a 10m range. The TWS mode and Noise-canceling features allow you to enjoy the true Hi-Fi sound and stereo audio quality without any cable mess.

 

Rewards and Price

 

Timeline

 

The S70’s Story So Far

The DOOGEE S70 is the result of an extensive work of technical research and premium design work. Developed with the Chinese technological input of Shenzhen KVD Communication Equipment Limited and with the design touch of DOOGEE Spain, the DOOGEE S70 has been created to be the world’s first gaming rugged smartphone to offer professional gamers the ultimate gaming experience while being ready to withstand any outdoor or indoor impact imaginable.

 

The S70 Team

 

We have started production!

 

Spread the word

Know someone who will benefit from this project?

Follow us on social media and help share the campaign.

 

lf you’d like to write about this project, click below for everything you’ll need.

story:
Yapper in a few lines

  • Instant sharing of audio messages and files with friends and people around the world
  • Set personal every-day preferences and get to know people who share your same interests through the random selection
  • Enhance your messages using a variety of audio-filters 

Yapper is an iPhone app enabling you to communicate with random people across the planet and your contacts by using your voice. You can send voice recordings we call "Yaps" and also audio files and songs to your a random user or to your contact. The fun part is that you can change your voice through filters. From the main menu, the Random Section connects you with a random person around the world. To be sure to find someone that will match your profile, you can establish preferences like age, gender, spoken language, country of residence and even interests so that you are sure to have something to talk about. The idea of Yapper is to share sounds and connect people around the world by using their voice that can be modified in original ways.

The features

Yapper is an app that can be used for fun conversations, business purposes but also entertaining random experiences. Here's a quick overview of the features our app offers:


The Random Section

Yapper's main feature is the random section. It enables you to kickstart a conversation with a random person around the world. We believe that this feature is quite revolutionary and unique as it doesn't exist in any other communication mobile application. Here is what this feature can offer you in more detail: 

  • From the main menu of Yapper you will find a 3D interactive globe. 

  • You can explore the globe and click on a part of the world more or less specific to launch a conversation with a random user that lives there. 
  • You can see the amount of user activity in any country or city just by looking at the globe
  • You can click on the "Preferences" button to establish preferences such as age, gender, spoken languages, country of residence or interests so that the match between the two users is more effective 
  • If you want to be more adventurous, you can just click on the Random Button to get in touch with a completely random person. You may be surprised!
  • Once the link between you and a person is established, you will access a typical conversation window where you can send yaps and files to that person
  • If you and the random person got along well, you can add them to your Yapper contacts to start a conversation with them whenever you want to


The Conversations

Conversations is Yapper's other big feature. It enables you to share your voice or sounds with your phone contacts that have Yapper. Here are all of the conversation's features explained in more detail:

  • The secondary menu is the conversation menu where you can see all of the people you are talking with. You can simply click on their name to begin a conversation 
  • You can talk with your contacts that have Yapper or with the random people you have added to your Yapper contact list
  • Within a conversation, hold the microphone to record your voice or sounds to and send it  
  • You can modify your voice by using one of the filters we provide such as "Hamster", "Soprano", "Robot" and many more
  • You can also send audio files and songs that you can import from your phone libraries, add a name to the file to let know your contact what you sent them
  • You can replay the previous audio files of the conversation as many times as you want
  • Add captions on top of your yaps to let your contacts know what you're saying


The team 

We are three fifteen year old students and we live in Paris. We came up with the idea of such a project a long time ago and have talked about it for a long time. Finaly, a few months ago we have decided to make our idea become true. Since then we have dedicated a lot of time to plan and create the application by meeting regularly after school. We all go to school together and all come from different parts of the world like Italy, Greece and Egypt. Our cultural differences and developing creativity gave us the idea of connecting people around the world simply using their voices. Our plan is to unite millions of people around the world, who speak different languages and are interested in different things. We are all amazing people and should all be able to get to know one another!


From left to right: Ion Esfandiari, Kevin El Sayed, Francesco Scarpetta

What we need

To fully complete our project we will need 5000 euros that will be invested entirely into the Application. The fundings will go to a professional programmer that will build our Application in a relatively short amount of time.
If we do not reach our total fund goal the money will anyways be invested into the construction of the Application and we will personally invest more so that our project is successful. Nevertheless if the funds reach less than 250 euros, the money will go to a charity organization. If however your pledges reach 10 000 euros, we will work on an Android version of Yapper to make it available to more people. 

The Impact

The world needs an Application like ours! The simple mechanisms of the App itself enable it to be a very simple way to talk to someone that may be living in China or Australia. Anyone with a iOS smartphone can download the App for free and can send friends or random people vocal messages that can be changed through filters, something no other smartphone App can do. Yapper is very unique as it permits people around to world to freely and easily communicate. There are no other apps on the market that have the same characteristics as Yapper and our main goal is that someday, people from all around the world will be using Yapper to communicate with their voice. 

The voice is what defines someone. Humans have used their voices for centuries to communicate with each other. We all use our voices everyday and with Yapper, we can keep on using them through our smartphones. Yapper is the closest you can get to a real life conversation. 


Yapper in your everyday life

Have you ever tried sending a voice message to a contact on your smartphone but have never been able to?  Have you ever been bored to send a long text message to a friend to tell him something? Have you ever needed to make a friend listen to a new song? Yapper makes all these necessities possible. Yapper is an intelligent way to send voice recordings and music to contacts in a simple and quick manner to make communication easier. 

Music is what the future is about and has united people for so long. If you play an instrument, sing, rap or produce music on your computer Yapper is an easy way to get your sound out of your garage and into the ears of the world. You can share musical files or just record yourself then send it to a random person or a contact. Via Yapper you can share your sound in a simple and organized manner!

Look around you and listen. Do you hear that? Wherever you are there is sound that is unique to your surroundings. You can share these sounds that can be anything from the sound of your cat purring to the sound of a Muezzin in the morning. You all live in places that you cannot find anywhere else and sharing your experiences with others is what Yapper is all about.

Contact Us

We need each and every one of you! Give us suggestions on how we can make our app better or even give us your ideas on a new concept, logo or design! Ask us questions and we were be very happy to answer them in a short amount of time. Your contribution is essential to the development of the project. 

Contact us by e-mail: yapperapplication@gmail.com

Check out our presentation video on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fb0SoT-BcxA

story:
Who are we?

Hello my name is David Block. Together with my father Aaron, we are happy to introduce you to the HandAble Phone Holder, the original mobile accessory designed to help you stop dropping your phone.

Mount HandAble to the back of any cell phone, tablet or ereader, for the most comfortable way to hold your devices without having to grip them!


What We Need

HandAble is currently available in both retail and wholesale markets. We launched in June of 2012, and not long after, received the Editors Pick award in Entrepreneur.com's "Indie Merchant Holiday Gift Guide", and ended the year with a debut on MSNBC's "Your Business".

Now, we need your help to take HandAble to the next level. We are asking for your contribution to help us in two areas. First, to enable further marketing and promotional campaigns through online and offline advertising. And, second, to help us develop new design sets, including the ability to offer gold and silver plated HandAbles.



Our Products

The HandAble Company created the original HandAble Phone Holder as an accessory that mounts easily to the back of any mobile phone. HandAble comes in your choice of nine colors, including black, white, green, purple, blue, red, yellow, pink, and U.S. flag.

For anyone interested in a more protective option, we offer the HandAble Case. Our original HandAble Phone Holder mounted onto a clear hard shell protective cover.



The Impact you will have

Your contribution is enormously important to the further development of our product, and the success of our company.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • PLEASE help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • AND, please use the Indiegogo share tools to TELL A FRIEND!

We thank you sincerely,
David and Aaron Block
The HandAble Company
http://www.HandAble.com

story:
Short Summary

My name is Marshel Copple and I'm an atheist in a fight with the State of California because they said I cannot be considered for religious accommodation.  I know that atheism is not a religion for everyone, but I have built a religion from atheist concepts and the biology and psychology that people have evolved with.  To be really specific I believe I need a full night's sleep before I go to a job where I might decide whether or not to fatally shoot a person with a rifle.  You see, psychology research has revealed that a person may increase the time required to make the same decision from about 2 seconds to about 7.  In a scenario where you work at a prison gun tower and need to decide in a couple seconds if you need to shoot one person to prevent a potentially fatal attack on another person, you should not be in a mind state that's costing you five more seconds of decision making. What if you decide too late or if you don't take the extra 5 seconds and just make the wrong decision?  The state said that a religion with beliefs like that cannot be legally legitimate because it's too scientific.  They actually described my religion as "codified science."  They also don't mind me being sleep-deprived when I go take the rifle in a tower position at one of their prisons.

The good news is that there is no law limiting a religion's scientific adherence.  The bad news is that I am losing the legal battle anyway.  The California superior court judge has supported the deputy attorney general's arguments and ruled that I do not get a trial.  I really need some help to keep my head above water and make this trial happen.  I am currently preparing my appeal which will be viewed by three more judges who can choose to give me a shot at a trial.

I hope you can agree that trying to get a good night's sleep before getting ready to shoot people is a great religious value that is totally appropriate for an atheist religion.  If you'd like to know more about my religion check out Sun Worshipping Atheism at withsun.livejournal.com.  If you'd like to know more about me, ask me questions in the messages (because I don't want to put myself out there for retaliation.) 

What We Need & What You Get

I am seeking money for direct court costs.  At this stage I am appealling for trial.  The cost of appeal is $775.  The cost of the clerk's transcript is $100.  The cost of the reporter's transcript is still unknown, but pricey. 

Any odd remaining money will be used for related legal aid or redonated to atheist/humanist groups to positively represent atheists/humanists (but I'm pretty sure I'll need all the money).

The Impact

Secular Humanism was recognized as a religion by the Supreme Court in 1961 (Torcaso v Watkins).  If the State of California wins on the arguments they are currently winning on, they successfully establish case law that this is no longer true and that a religion must be supernatural in order to be protected by the state.  Please, please, don't let this happen.

Civil rights in general took a big hit on this trial.  Rulings by the court in my summary hearing counter previous precedents and make it almost impossible for someone to sue for any type of civil action.  Look up equitable tolling and the definition of material adverse action, two things that were once very reasonable. The former is gone now and the latter has been revised to make employers immune if they harass an employee into quitting.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you happen to be/know an employment/appellate civil lawyer and believe you could provide helpful consultation, that would be great! Let me know!

If you are good at publicity, that would rock too!

If you're not, maybe you could just send a supportive message. If I can show that they are stepping on the toes and ideals of more than one person it will help get past some of the callous dismissiveness.

story:
Xpuff is very easy to assemble as it is only made up of three parts – a hard two-piece cover made of recyclable plastic and an inner soft foam.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Wind noise is greatly reduced

Xpuff is designed for wind reduction, improving the quality of phone conversations outdoors drastically.
 

Tactility response remains the same

Xpuff is designed with the user in mind,so a lot of research has gone into retaining tactility and optimizing simplicity.

 

 

 

 

Package prototypes

 

 

 

In-depth results from SP regarding the xpuff

 

 

 

 

First solution to the problem​

 

Early sketches

 

Prototype development

 

 

 

If you have shared our IndieGoGo campaign, please let us know by using this form:

 

 

Please make sure that you use the e-mail address associated with your IndieGoGo account, so that we can correctly add the extra foam reward to your pledge.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will never have to think twice about accepting that call when you are outside and it’s blowing.

Lastly, we must note that xpuff is more than a convenience product. We aim to change the quality of calls from today forward and make a much-needed impact on phone communication in the 21st century.

To walk, jog, ride a bicycle or sail in the open air without the constant scratches of wind sounded like a dream to us once. We are now pursuing this dream.

story:
**IMPORTANT**

NOT ONLY DO WE NOT NEED THIS MONEY, WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO NOT DONATE UNLESS YOU ARE SURE! We do not need this money. there is enough money in the kitty to keep us running for months. we have recieved bad press recently for making money from this, what people dont understand is that we have touched none of it. we pay the admins, and run the cost of the server, and the rest goes to a kitty we will use when donations stop! Whether you believe that or not is your choice, but thats what happens :) 

Currently there is enough money in the kitty to last us, if the donations STOP NOW, another: 5 months.

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

We have been required to introduce a cost to perk changes for two reasons. one, because it takes a fair amount of time to remake a perk, and two, it is easier for us to keep track of who has what, and the extra need to keep records of how many changes have been made etc.


you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

6. any form of machine gun


IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or on teamspeak.
step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 48 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**

Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. Funding is running well, the server is stable and we do not need any donations. however, due to popular demand, we will be keeping this donation page up :)

(the reason the perks are not cheaper, is so that not too many people are running around with 50 cals ;)
we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $560. ($260 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.

The Impact
You will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

connect to our TeamSpeak and just talk to us! we like to make new friends :)

($260 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.The ImpactYou will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z.
