We are a Team of connector developers, who have be working in the Information Transport System (ITS) industry for more than 10 years.  Over the years that we worked on ITS cabling products, we find that new solutions could be proposed to simply the way cabling has been done.  
We live in a world of inter-connected networks.  Almost every home has some network cabling.  It is quite often that you would need new cabling or change existing cabling from time to time.  Usually you would need to call your cable installer to do the professional job.  You could also get yourself some training, and buy some tools to do the job by yourself.  We have a solution which would make this job easier.






Our new connector Direct Attach Bending RJ45 (DAB-RJ) can be installed easily WITHOUT professional training and specialized crimp tool, as would be needed with legacy RJ45 plugs.



EASY AND LOW FAILURE CONNECTIONThe DAB-RJ is designed so that it can be easily installed correctly.  The DAB-RJ is designed with our patent pending Flexible PCB technology so that common problems of the network connector can be avoided.Problem 1 - often occurs during the transportation and handling of the connector, could ultimately lead to improper crimpingProblem 2 - damaged crimp tool, could ultimately lead to improper crimpingExample of mis-contact due to improper crimpingProblem 3 - cable compatibility
associated with plug types are sometime s confusing.  If a solid cable is connected to a plug
designed for stranded cable, there will be connection problems.
THE DIRECT ATTACH
The concept of direct attached connection is also a new concept to simplify unnecessary connection points in the cabling system.THE BENDINGThe Bendable design of DAB-RJ allows bending of the connector body without compromising the transmission performance.  This allows the plug to be used in space limited environment, and also relief bending stress on the network cable.
FIELD OF APPLICATIONS


Network cabling - 10/100/1000/10
000 Base-T Ethernet


Premise Cabling - patch cord
assembly, consolidation points


ISDN- VoIP


Token Ring 4/16 Mibts – 100 VG-AnyLAN


TP-PMD/TP-DDI – ATM 155, 622,
1200 Mbits


Ethersound


HDBase-T


Industrial Ethernet


Profinet


Field Cabling - Non-user-administered
IP facility devices such as security cameras, lighting controls, industrial
sensors, and Wi-Fi access points.


Electronic Safety and Security
(ESS) System Design, which the end devices links are relatively permanent




CABLING SPECIFICATIONS

ISO 11801 Edition 2 – Class E, EN
50173 Edition 2 – Class D, Class E, Class Ea


EIA/ TIA 568-C.2 - Channel
performance for Cat 3, Cat 5e, Cat 6, Cat 6A


TIA1096-A (formerly FCC part 68)


BICSI/ANSI D005– “Electronic Safety
and Security (ESS) Information Transport System (ITS) Design and Implementation
Best Practices”


ANSI/TIA-862-A Building
automation system


KEY FEATURES


Frequency Bandwidth 0~500MHz


Installation of solid twisted
cable for long distance transmission


Adaptable to big and small OD
conductors (22~24awg, solid)


Cable OD 5~8.5mm


Easy for field installation, no
special crimping or impact tool required for termination.


Plug dimension compliant with FCC
part 68 standard


Color codes


TIA 568 A/B


Industrial 4 pins


Balun connection


Audio/video connections



CABLING PERFORMANCETECHNOLOGYOur Team have spent a lot of effort in Research and Development to bring you this innovative solution.  This connector is highly engineered.  We have used computer simulations to optimize our design.  All the technical characteristics of this product have been verified in a professional laboratory.DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULEWhat you seen on the photos and video above are working prototypes.  These prototypes are fully functional tested.  We’ve already initiated the tooling and we expect to ship on January 13, 2014.  Depending where you are in the world, your DAB-RJ will arrive at your place in 2~3 weeks.What We Need & What You GetWe need your help through pre-orders to help funding commercialization of the DAB-RJ.  With your help, we can accelerate in our mold development, and launch our production orders.  This is also one of our assessment of demand for our product.  We would love to hear from you, our supports, at the early stage of our product commercialization.  Your comments are very important for us.  Further down the road, we hope to build long term relationship with our early supporters to continuously improve our product.Complimentary Goodie - simple cable stripper and wire cutter in one!Your installation can be done with this simple complimentary tool, and no other tool required.Please support us by pre-ordering.Or tell your friends and family about us :)Thank you very much for your support!

story:
Just like you, we love jogging and exercising with music. The right soundtrack makes working out 10x more motivating and most importantly, it helps keep you going longer. Along with good tunes, a heart rate monitor is vital for those who are serious about training. Tracking the major fitness metrics such as heart rate, oxygen uptake and respiration, improve your exercise efficiency and help you train with purpose.

Now V-Powerbuds Pro combines both great sound and valuable workout analytics. It tracks your fitness data - heart rate, oxygen uptake and respiration rate through an innovative biologically-designed set of earbuds. Thanks to its Bio-signal tracking, V-Powerbuds Pro will help you meet your exercise goals and improve your training performance. At the same time, you can enjoy your favorite music and talk on the phone without the need to touch a single button.
 


 









 


 

Enjoy an active lifestyle with secure-fitting earbuds, thanks to the specially designed sport ear hooks that hold firmly when you are on the move. Whether you’re jogging or working out at the gym, our cordless earbuds stay snugly in your ears while you’re in motion - ensuring that you never miss a beat. Let the music power you through your entire workout. 



 

 

V-Powerbuds Pro has brilliant performance, so your training can be the best. It tracks heart rate precisely along with oxygen levels using a built-in pulse oximeter that takes its measurements directly from the ears, which is much more accurate than readings taken at the wrist.

 

 Heart Rate Tracking
 

With this system, V-Powerbuds Pro tracks heart rate more precisely than even a sport watch.  First, it tracks PPG heart rate within the ear. Measuring from an enclosed space such as the ear means that the measurement process is less disturbed by external light, which can affect heart rate readings taken at the wrist by a sport watch. Then, because the distribution of blood vessels in the human ear is more extensive than that in the wrist, more data will be collected, analyzed and recorded.
 

 

V-Powerbuds Pro helps you maintain the perfect heart rate for effective exercise and optimal calorie burning. It monitors your heart rate and gives warnings when an unusually high or low heart rate is detected. It makes sure you’re getting the most from your workout while staying at a level that’s safe and effective for you. Therefore, you can reach and maintain your target heart rate safely even during intense exercise.

 

 Oxygen Tracking
 

V-Powerbuds Pro also tracks your oxygen uptake as well respiration rate to help you crush your fitness goals. A higher oxygen consumption allows one to produce more energy, thereby performing more work. As top athletes know, oxygen consumption is the "gold standard" measure of overall fitness. 
 

 

 More Sports Data
 

V-Powerbuds Pro captures and records key stats like time, cadence, pace alerts, distance, and calories burned, etc. Also, a comprehensive workout history and achievements page puts your workout data instantly at your fingertips to track your progress from day to day, helping you to follow your progress and achieve your fitness goals. 
 

 

 Accurate Data Tracking  


Using an innovative patented technology, V-Powerbuds pro tracks Photoplethysmography PPG heart rate, an optical measurement method that uses a light source and advanced photodetector to measure blood circulation at the skin. These measurements taken in the ear are more accurate than the heart rate measured at the wrist by a typical sports watch.

Here is an example. One subject wore V-Powerbuds pro TWS earbuds and chest-strap heart rate monitor at the same time while running on a treadmill. Here is the heart rate comparison results: 
 


 

According to the four tests above, the data collected through V-Powerbuds Pro are as accurate as a professional chest belt. 
 


 

 Offline Voice Control 
 

Using proprietary offline voice control, V-Powerbuds Pro can even control a smartphone by voice commands when your smartphone is offline.

This system can conveniently answer the phone, play music with simple voice commands.

 



 

 Noise-cancelling Design for Voice Wake Up  
 

Simply wake up your V-Powerbuds Pro by voice. Combined with their advanced noise-cancelling feature, the earbuds can detect and respond to your voice commands faster and more accurately.

 

 

A DSP for voice wake-up is integrated in V-Powerbuds Pro. Two digital PDM (pulse density modulation) microphones are connected to the DSP front-end, one for voice acquisition and the other for noise reduction. Therefore, this product has the function of wake-up noise reduction, which can ensure the accuracy of wake-up and offline speech recognition even in noisy environments.
 

 

 Passive Noise Isolation
 

V-Powerbuds Pro uses an advanced in-ear design that can passively isolate outside noise and provides you with better entertainment in busy and noisy environments such as in the gym or outdoors. 

 

 

  Great Audio Performance
 

For any TWS earbuds, sound quality is paramount. Equipped with a Qualcomm® aptX decoder and high sensitivity, V-Powerbuds Pro provides excellent audio performance. The bass is powerful, tight, and impactful, the highs are detailed but not harsh, and the mids are buttery smooth. 

 

 

Endurance
 

With a top quality rechargeable battery built-in and a high capacity 1000 mAh charging case, the earbuds keep you going for longer workouts, travel and all-day use, delivering outstanding performance for 24 hours per charge. 

 

Sweat Through Your Workout


V-Powerbuds Pro is IPX5 weatherproof. It's prepared to accompany your all sorts of outdoor adventures. 

 

 

 


 

 

Risks and challenges

With our years of experience in the TWS sports earbuds industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for V-Power Buds Pro TWS Sport Earbuds. However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them. Our team is making arrangements to expedite shipping now so that we can provide the best service for our backers when we reach our funding goal.

story:
More Open, More Powerful. More Fun, More Convenient.

 

1Cables is the world’s first, smart data sync cable. It breaks the limitations on cell phone operating systems by connecting to multiple devices with a single cable through a unique, 2-in-1, male/female switchable connector designed for smartphones. For instance, it can connect your cell phone to a camera to sync photos and videos; it can also connect your cell phone to many other external, expanding devices such as a mouse, a keyboard or a gaming controller. It can even connect your cell phone to another cell phone that is running out of battery and charge it up. It makes your cell phone work like a computer.

Male/female switchable connector design

As a transformative USB connector, 1CABLES's unlimited function extension is made possible by its instant transformation between male and female with a single switch.

Push the button down to switch to a female USB connector — now it becomes an unlimited, multifunction cable that can connect to many external devices.

Push the button up to switch to a male USB connector and restore to the original data sync cable.

 

Download photos and videos from a camera

After shooting with a SLR camera, you can directly connect the camera to your cellphone using 1Cables to download photos and videos, and instantly share them on social media, all without a computer.

Connect to a mouse or a keyboard

With 1Cables, you can directly connect your cell phone with any USB mouse or keyboard (iOS system only supports connection with keyboard, not with mouse), to take care of business anytime, anywhere.

Connect to a USB flash drive

Directly connect your computer with a USB flash drive to conveniently and quickly sync data and files. (iOS system only supports sync of photos and videos.)

Connect to a printer

With 1Cables, you can directly connect your cell phone to a printer to print and make copies of your photos anytime, anywhere, without worrying about having an internet connection of any kind. (No need to install Printershare. Currently does not support iOS system.)

Connect to a game controller

Not enough to play with only one game controller? With 1Cables, you can connect your cell phone to a game controller while playing video games for a more exciting playing experience.

 

Charge a cellphone with a cellphone

Depleted the power of your cell phone while playing games? With 1Cables, you can connect and charge your cell phone with another cell phone in case of emergency. You will be prepared for any contingency. (Currently, this function only supports Android systems.)

Apple’s new MacBook Pro cannot connect to other USB devices because it has only Type C jack. With 1Cables and its unique male/female switchable connector, you can connect your MacBook Pro or MacBook to all other devices, such as iPhones, USB flash drives, portable hard drives, etc. 1Cables makes your MacBook Pro work together with any other peripherals seamlessly with continuity.

In the era of quick charging, you need a safe charging cable. Low-quality charging cables pose a security threat.

Comparison Of Multi-Functional Cables 

In design and craftsmanship, 1CABLES meticulously forges every component to exceed the highest quality standards in the industry. 1Cables also uses twice as much as material as found in common.

Special Communication Channel of iOS 

1Cables uses the special communication channel of iOS to allow cell phones to communicate with different devices, connect to USB keyboards and transmit photos and videos, greatly expanding the functions of a cell phone. 

Android Cell Phones With OTG

The most significant improvements that OTG brings to USB 2.0 are more efficient power management and dual-role capabilities for connected devices, which can function as either a mainframe or a peripheral in relation to the cell phone. 

Apple devices do not support OTG. Please consult the manufacturer to confirm whether an Android phone supports OTG.

Functions with * may not be 100% guaranteed due to compatibility of devices.

 

The mission of 1Cables is to design innovative, functional, and technologically-advanced cables for smart phones that enhance the overall customer experience.

ITIWANT was founded in Fremont, CA with the purpose of developing smart products to enhance consumers’ quality of life. Our obligation to all consumers reflects an underlying design philosophy that places equal importance on conceptualization and actualization.

What is USB OTG?

USB On-The- Go (OTG) is a technology that allows mobile phones equipped with OTG to act as a host, allowing other USB devices, such as a mouse or keyboard, to be attached to them.

What are the most significant improvements that USB OTG brings to the USB 2.0?

More efficient power management and the capability to allow the connected device to perform dual roles, either as a mainframe or a peripheral.

How to make “phone-to-phone charging” under Android system with 1Cables?

1. Push down the button to switch to the female mode connector on 1Cables, and connect it to the Android cell phone that needs charging. 
2. Connect a common charging cable to the other Android cell phone. 
3. Connect 1Cables to the common cable to start charging, just like using a portable charger.

Why I can’t connect an iPhone to a USB flash drive, a card reader, a mouse or a game controller with 1Cables?

Because the iOS system and Apple devices do NOT have OTG functions. Most Android cell phones have OTG functions and can be connected and synced directly with a USB flash drive, a card reader, a mouse or a game controller using 1Cables.

What cell phones support OTG?

Before you make the pledge, please make sure that your cell phone supports OTG functions, or reverse charging function. Please contact your cell phone manufacturer to confirm.

How can I sync data between two Apple devices?

1. Push the button down on 1Cables to switch to a female mode connector, and connect it to the Apple device that need to be synced. 
2. Use a common data syncing cable along with the other Apple device that needs to sync data. 
3. Connect 1Cables with a common cable to automatically start reading photos and videos by selecting “Allow” on the dialog box (duration varies by sizes of the photos/videos). 
4. Select the photos and images you want to sync, and then select “Import.” You can also import all photos and videos by selecting “Import All.”

How can I download photos and videos from a camera to an Apple device?

1. Push the button down to switch to a female mode connector on 1Cables, and connect it to the Apple device (iOS 9.2 or above). 
2. Use the original data syncing cable that came along with the digital camera or the SLR camera. Connect 1Cables to the original cable to automatically start reading photos and videos in the camera by selecting “Allow” on the dialog box on the Apple device (duration varies by sizes of photos/videos). 
3. Select the photos and images you want to sync, and then select “Import”. You can also import all the photos and videos by selecting “Import All.”

Other than charging and data syncing, what other USB devices can be connected to 1Cables?

1Cables can also connect to USB headphones, USB mini speakers, USB MIDI keyboards/microphones/electronic pianos/digital pianos/electronic drums/electronic wind instruments (online live radio gear), USB LED lights, USB mini fans, etc. While connected with 1Cables, the amperage of these devices can not exceed 100mA. Warning: We do not guarantee 100% compatibility of 1Cables with all the devices mentioned above. Please confirm the compatibility before purchase.

Why can’t I quickly charge my cell phone with a Type-C jack by 1Cables?

Please check if your cell phone supports 9V/12V output.

 

REFUND POLICY

You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.

 

RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY

Please note all sales are final. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. There will be no exchanges or returns for change of mind. If you have a factory defect, please email the Customer Happiness Team on support@itiwant.us to arrange an assessment and replacement if deemed defective.

story:
Issues to be addressed

Our project is trying to develop technology for improving quality of life, e.g., providing point-of-care screening and exams for early detection of cancer, assisting people suffering from color blindness, helping color matching in our daily lives. 

Project description

We try to develop a miniature, low cost, and high-performance optical spectrometer and integrate it with a cell phone. Our goal is to make optical spectrometer affordable and accessible to everyone and transform a cell phone into a personal analytical tool while simultaneously taking advantage of its wireless communication capabilities for data sharing, access, and management.

Combining mobile optical spectroscopy with wireless technology can lead to many new applications such as personal health care, color analysis, chemical and bio-sensing. The integration of a spectrometer with a cell phone also provides a platform, which can enable even more applications or new APPs by fully taking advantage of the creativity of the community. The ability of data sharing will enable developers to access large amount of data to assess the results and further improve their specific applications.

We will design and develop a new type of high-performance miniature spectrometer to be integrated with a cell phone. Once a prototype is developed we will distribute it to potential users to obtain feedback and based on it to further improve the device. We will also collaborate with experts to develop the clinical applications, including early cancer detection (such as breast cancer and skin cancer) and monitoring of the healing process of surgical wound or injury.

Uniqueness

Our approach is based on a unique device, called G-Fresnel, which combines the optical components of a traditional spectrometer into a single device and creates a simpler spectrometer system. This simpler design enables a new level of miniaturization and performance which is difficult to achieve with traditional spectrometer technology.  The device can also be fabricated by replicating from a master pattern, leading to a low cost. Finally, the G-Fresnel has a small f/#, resulting in high spectral resolution. These unique properties of G-Fresnel make it possible to develop a high-performance, miniature, and low cost spectrometer to be integrated with a cell phone.  

What is an optial spectrometer?

Optical spectrometers provide the unique capability to decipher the “colors” of light, and can detect the way light interacts with materials to identify hidden chemical substances far more precisely than what our eyes can do. 

Where are they used? How come I've never heard of such a device?

Optical spectrometers have benefitted many areas of science and industry, and are demonstrated for many applications in healthcare, color analysis, and environmental monitoring.

However, the requirement of highly accurate performance has kept costs high, and spectrometers out of the reach of the general public. 

We seek to change this.

Our mission

We want to make optical spectroscopy affordable and accessible to everyone and transform a smart phone into a personal analytical tool while simultaneously taking advantage of its computing ability and wireless communication capability. 

Our team of research engineers at Penn State University have developed a new device (pictured) that has the capability to shrink the functionality of a traditional spectrometer significantly while maintaining high performance required for performing meaningful measurements. How small? Possibly, to dimensions on the order of a sugar cube or even smaller.

Our technology will put the power of spectroscopy into the palm of your hand, and bring with it the capability to determine chemical composition of substances at home or on the go.

How you can help

With your help, we will develop the next generation prototype mobile spectrometer that will be integrated with a cell phone. The funds will go directly towards development of the prototype, including creating a new mold to further miniaturize our design.

If you would like to help but can’t contribute monetarily, you can help by spreading the word – tell your friends, colleagues, neighbors about our project!

Learn more

Please visit our project webpage for more details about our technology and where it is headed!

http://ultrafastoptics.ee.psu.edu/mobile_spectrometer
story_txt:
Issues to be addressed
Our project is trying to develop technology for improving quality of life, e.g., providing point-of-care screening and exams for early detection of cancer, assisting people suffering from color blindness, helping color matching in our daily lives. 
Project description
We try to develop a miniature, low cost, and high-performance optical spectrometer and integrate it with a cell phone. Our goal is to make optical spectrometer affordable and accessible to everyone and transform a cell phone into a personal analytical tool while simultaneously taking advantage of its wireless communication capabilities for data sharing, access, and management.
Combining mobile optical spectroscopy with wireless technology can lead to many new applications such as personal health care, color analysis, chemical and bio-sensing. The integration of a spectrometer with a cell phone also provides a platform, which can enable even more applications or new APPs by fully taking advantage of the creativity of the community. The ability of data sharing will enable developers to access large amount of data to assess the results and further improve their specific applications.
We will design and develop a new type of high-performance miniature spectrometer to be integrated with a cell phone. Once a prototype is developed we will distribute it to potential users to obtain feedback and based on it to further improve the device. We will also collaborate with experts to develop the clinical applications, including early cancer detection (such as breast cancer and skin cancer) and monitoring of the healing process of surgical wound or injury.

story:
Simplify the way you charge your smartphone.

How we started ?

  • why must all docks look like docks?

  • why not make a portable dock that would also charge your smartphone anywhere?

  • why not have a unique dock?

We believe we have answered all of these questions with Sliced Dock.

We believe that the dock should look nice even if it doesn't have smartphone on it. 

Check out the perk for $30! Use your imagination and get Sliced Dock+HDMI for only $30.

Send us your engravement idea to: info@fruitanddreams.com

Simplify the way you charge your smartphone.

With built in batteries that are not only used to power high quality speakers inside the Sliced Dock, but also used to charge your smartphone while it is connected to the dock, this dock belongs to the unique category and is probably light years ahead from others. With Sliced Dock you will always have your smartphone battery at 100% beacause you can place the Sliced Dock anywhere in or outside your house with no need to hunt for power adapters and usb cables. Built in state of the art Li-ion batteries make the dock portable so you can take it anywhere. And when you take your dock anywhere you will also have a portable battery to charge your smartphone at your disposal.

Here is the main functionality:

  • With HDMI OUT you can easely connect it to your HDTV and enjoy watching movies or just mirror your device's screen on that big TV.
  • With AUDIO LINE OUT (left & right) you can connect Sliced Dock to any external receiver/speaker.
  • With AUDIO IN you can use internal Sliced Dock speakers for playing music from any mp3/mp4 player. Play music from virtually any device.
  • With SECOND CHARGE USB you can charge any other device besides your docked smartphone, just as long it can be charged via USB power supply.
  • With internal battery you can recharge your smartphone up to 10 times without recharging you Sliced Dock.

With normal smartphone charge routine you can use Sliced Dock for 8 days with no need of charging your Sliced Dock's internal battery.  

But we have not stopped here.

Why manufacture a dock that supports only one brand of smartphones?

Sliced Dock can be used with iPhones (apple 30 pin and apple lightning connector) and all of the other smartphones which have micro usb connector. For optimal position connector on the bottom of the smartphone is advised. Works great with Samsung Galaxy S2,S3 and Google Nexus and many others.

 

Why charge only one smartphone at a time ?

On the back of the dock we also inlcuded SECOND CHARGE USB  for charging any other device simultaneously while charging your docked smartphone. For example if your friend's phone battery is dead he can quickly recharge it on your dock wherever you are.

Customize your Sliced Dock.

Every Sliced Dock is unique.

The area where your Iphone leans on is made completely out of matte glass, iluminated by LED lights from inside the dock. 

IN GLASS PANEL YOU CAN TELL US WHAT TO ENGRAVE. IT IS TOTALLY UP TO YOU.

Just send us text/symbol or combination of those and we will professionally engrave it in your dock so it will always be iluminated (perfect for birthdays, christmas gifts and several other occasions).

Sliced Dock comes in many colors. Pick yours.

Two color edition - choose two colors you like and add more uniqueness to your Sliced Dock.

Innovative way of controling your music.

You can adjust music loudness by rotating stem on the top of the Sliced Dock.

 

Buttonless design.

To turn OFF/ON the glass ilumination and battery indicator just touch the aluminum panel that is around the connector for your smartphone. THIS DOES NOT MEAN YOU SHUT DOWN THE ENTIRE DOCK BUT ONLY ILUMINATION AND BATTERY INDICATOR. You can still listen to music and charge your smartphone.

Made with astonishing attention to details.

The body of Sliced Dock is plastic but all of the key components are made out of aluminum and glass for additional quality and fine touch.

Leaves on the top of the dock are made from aluminum and also come in handy when you want to move your dock around. You can easely grab the dock by the stem and take it anywhere you like. It's unique structure gives the leaves and stem incredible hardness and support for the whole dock.

Also very useful for tablets. iPad and Galaxy Tab.

 

We also designed Sliced Dock Mini

We have created Sliced Dock Mini more portable but still with a lot of functionality.

It is a perfect smartphone accessory which is easy to carry around and looks beautiful.

The Sliced Dock Mini specifications are bellow:

 
 

 

How will we use donated money:

 
We can’t wait to share this great project with you.
You will have the satisfaction that you helped us with our project when you  will see Sliced Dock on the shelf of many electronics store.

Why do we need funds for?

  • First production line

  • Global Bluetooth certificate (if we reach $300K)

  • Employ workers

  • Marketing 

Great companion for everyday activities.

Playing cards while listen to music from Sliced Dock.

 

FAQ

Question / How do you know what kind of connector do I have?

Answer/ We will ask for the type of your smartphone's connector laterafter the campaign is finished.


Question/ When will you start manufacturing?

Answer/ As soon as we get to 500 units we will start production immediately.

 

Question/ How long will the battery last ?

Answer/ It all depends on you how much you use Sliced Dock for listening music and charging your smartphone. For example if you charge your iPhone every second day you can easely go through a week without recharging your Sliced Dock while still listening to a lot of music on Sliced Dock's speakers.

story:
hours left!

Get your multilanguage keyboard:

 (Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Finnish, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish & Welsh)

Only $30 USD

Meet our team:

Gerard Cerchio (standing next to the airplane he built) is our main developer and also a great friend and mentor. He can build this keyboard no matter what happens...as long as we can pay him $8,000 USD.

Stan Osborne (bottom right) is also a great friend and mentor. He's the main man behind our marketing strategy.

Special thanks to Ren Dodge, Ben Ambrogi, Evan Cross, Tony LeTigre, Josh Berkowitz, Dan Freeman, Lia Burrell, Kevin Tierny Wood, David Chacon, Lilian Fleurs... (Some have worked for free. Some will earn a percentage of our campaign. Help support us!).

Thank you Noisebridge, Parisoma, YetiZen & Women 2.0! 


Want to learn more about us?

Read our story: http://www.slideshare.net/Polyglotte/polyglotte-story


We've added color: blue, green and white on black vinyl.


Special perk: Our founder, Daniela Semeco, will take you on a private tour of San Francisco and its surrounding areas! (Take this tour in English, Spanish, French or German.)


Our budget:

$8,000 - will go towards the development of firmware and drivers for most operating systems (Linux, MacOS & Windows)

$3,000 - will go towards buying an awesome vinyl cutter (kb sticker-making machine), vinyl and packaging materials.

$9,000 - will go towards marketing and R&D; (this includes localization). We want to include as many languages as we can!

Even if we don't earn this much money right away, no worries. We can deliver our promise no matter what happens. However, we may experience a three-month delay.

Polyglotte Inc. is a benefit corporation. We plan on donating PolyKeyboards to schools across the nation (and the world!) We believe that all positive change can be achieved through education and love. If you take care of society, it'll take care of you. In addition, we aim to support our local soup kitchens and our homeless (many of whom are veterans and/or permanently disabled) through art therapy programs such as Sixth Street Photography.


Join us!


*If you're short on money, please help us get the word out. Together, we can make this happen!

www.polykeyboards.com


Bibliography: http://gizmodo.com/382026/a-cellphones-missing-dot-kills-two-people-puts-three-more-in-jail


DISCLAIMER: Consistent with the definitions of Section 2(a) of the Securities Act of 1933 (“Act”) this campaign is not an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy securities. It does not form part of any solicitation or offering that may exist now or in the future. Securities offerings, if any, will only be made in accordance with the terms of all applicable securities and other laws.

To the extent that the prohibitions of the Indiegogo Terms of Use (“ToU”) may be broader or differ than those covered by the Act, this campaign is not an offer to sell stocks, bonds or other securities as those terms are used in the ToU. Any funds transferred to Polyglotte, Inc (“Company”) in return for Perks through this campaign will commit the Company only to the obligations detailed in the ToU.

story:
Our Pitch:

Awake is a third-person survival shooter game set in the year 2019, located in Bucharest, Romania. It is heavily accentuated by exploration, consequence-based actions, a heart-felt story and an in-depth weapon customization feature. The game will feature a survival horror setting in a post-apocalyptic world, unique to its own.


The game will be powered by the Unreal Engine and developed for PC, PlayStation 4 and XboxOne. We plan to release a trailer on 12/28/2013. 


Bio:

We started development on our game "Awake" in early October, 2013. With your contribution, we will be able to fund the necessary tools we need to continue working on our game. We are, in total, nine people working on modeling, texturing, programming, level designing, story writing, animating and the creation of concept art.

Our story is a tear jerking, heart-felt story with moments that will scare the player, sending shivers down his/ her spine. With a passion for video games, we feel that we are exploring new ground, creating an environment previously unseen by players. Our game mechanics are unique and intriguing.


Concept Art:



[Concept Art with accreditation to Andrei Pintea.]

Features and game-play breakdown:

  • Heart-felt story,
  • Large, unique environment, based in Bucharest, Romania,
  • Full character and weapon customization,
  • Consequence based-actions that effect the ending of the game,
  • Survival, adventure, horror-based third-person shooter game,
  • And a realism-based leveling system.


We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for reading and contributing to our project, 

The Awake Team
